quotes.quote: Taboos are falling across our culture like dominoes. What was unspeakable yesterday dominates talk shows today.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: The most strongly enforced of all known taboos is the taboo against knowing who or what you really are behind the mask of your apparently separate, independent, and isolated ego.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: A woman going out with a younger man feels like the last taboo.
quotes.author: Sam Taylor-Johnson

quotes.quote: It takes five years for a willing person's mind to change. Have patience with yourself and others when treading in an area protected by a taboo.
quotes.author: Garrett Hardin

quotes.quote: All taboos serve different human interests by avoiding those things which threaten to cause offense or distress.
quotes.author: Kate Burridge

quotes.quote: The naked truth is still taboo.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Social taboos are shy like virtue; once lost, there is no remedy.
quotes.author: Gunnar Myrdal

quotes.quote: A man might well pray that he may not taboo or curse any portion of nature by being buried in it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It's fun to explore areas that are taboo that you're not allowed to in real life as an actor.
quotes.author: Michelle Pfeiffer

quotes.quote: Prohibitions create the desire they were intended to cure.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: For every prohibition you create, you also create an underground.
quotes.author: Jello Biafra

quotes.quote: Walk where your heart leads you, there are no restrictions and no burdens.
quotes.author: Gao Xingjian

quotes.quote: It is the restrictions placed on vice by our social code which makes its pursuit so peculiarly agreeable.
quotes.author: Kenneth Grahame

quotes.quote: It's been taboo for so long to admit you had a mental health problem.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: Nothing is taboo if you have an angle on it.
quotes.author: Sarah Silverman

quotes.quote: There are more and more taboos about calling something, anything, ugly.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: There is no policy too sensitive to question, and no subject so taboo that you cannot even mention it.
quotes.author: Lee Hsien Loong

quotes.quote: To look without fear is a good subversive tool, undermining taboos.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Tillmans

quotes.quote: There are no taboos in bed, and there shouldn't be any taboos in bed.
quotes.author: Frank Langella

quotes.quote: Restriction generates yearning. You want what you cannot have.
quotes.author: Portia de Rossi

quotes.quote: Restrictions will set you free.
quotes.author: W.A. Mathieu

quotes.quote: Restrictions are difficult to enforce in a world where anybody can make anything.
quotes.author: Hod Lipson

quotes.quote: Tact is giving a person a pat on the back when you feel like giving him a kick in the pants.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Tact is the art of building a fire under people without making their blood boil.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: In the battle of existence, talent is the punch; tact is the clever footwork.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Tact is the ability to step on a man's toes without messing up the shine on his shoes.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Honey, tact is for people who aren't witty enough to be sarcastic.
quotes.author: Karen Walker

quotes.quote: Tact is the ability to make a person see lightning without letting him feel the bolt.
quotes.author: Orlando A. Battista

quotes.quote: Tact is the ability to shut your mouth before someone else does it for you.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: People with tact have less to retract.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: It is tact that is golden, not silence.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Tact is the ability to describe others as they see themselves.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Tact is the art of making a point without making an enemy.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: Tact is a combination of good temper, ready wit, quickness of perception and ability to take in the exigency of the occasion instantly.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Nowadays, tact is the last thing you would expect from a social setting and being blunt is even considered a quality that one should possess if he or she wants to make it big.
quotes.author: Monet Lu

quotes.quote: Tact ... is the unsaid part of what you think.... And there is only one thing more potent--its opposite--the unthought part of what you say.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Tact is the oil which lubricates society and prevents its harsh and heterogeneous particles from grating against each other; and in proportion as a person possesses this valuable emollient, so will he go roughly or smoothly through the world.
quotes.author: Charles William Day

quotes.quote: Tact is the intelligence of the heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The secret of man's success resides in his insight into the mood's of people, and his tact in dealing with them.
quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.quote: Without tact you can learn nothing. Tact teaches you when to be silent. Inquirers who are always questioning never learn anything.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Tact is ability to see others as they wish to be seen.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Tact in audacity is knowing how far you can go without going too far.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Perseverance and tact are the two great qualities most valuable for all those who would climb, but especially for those who have to step out of the crowd.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Tact is one of the first mental virtues, the absence of which is often fatal to the best of talents; it supplies the place of many talents.
quotes.author: William Simms

quotes.quote: Tact is the rare ability to keep silent while two friends are arguing, and you know both of them are wrong.
quotes.author: Hugh Allen

quotes.quote: The use of tact is always needful but it is especially necessary when speaking a truth that may strike a sensitive nerve in another.
quotes.author: Robert E. Fisher

quotes.quote: Tact is a relation in which a nonverbal stimulus or circumstance acts as a discriminative stimulus for a verbal response.
quotes.author: H. W. REESE & L. J. PARROTT

quotes.quote: Tact is after all a kind of mind reading.
quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quotes.quote: Tact is the unsaid part of what you think.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Tact is the discrimination of differences. It consists in conscious deviations.
quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

quotes.quote: The right of self-defense never ceases. It is among the most sacred, and alike necessary to nations and to individuals.
quotes.author: James Monroe

quotes.quote: Self-defense is not only our right; it is our duty.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: When two opponents of equal strength and technique fight it off, it is what is in their heart, and how they use their mind that will decide who will win.
quotes.author: Bruce Hyland

quotes.quote: To me, the extraordinary aspect of martial arts lies in its simplicity. The easy way is also the right way, and martial arts is nothing at all special; the closer to the true way of martial arts, the less wastage of expression there is.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: In self-defense and in defense of the innocent, cowardice is the only sin.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: The most difficult part ot traditional taekwondo is not learning the first kick or punch. It is not struggling to remember the motions of a poomsae or becoming aquainted with Korean culture. Rather, it is taking the first step across the threshold of the dojang door. This is where roads diverge, where choices are made that will resonate throughout a lifetime.
quotes.author: Doug Cook

quotes.quote: Think of your opponents hands and feet as swords.
quotes.author: Gichin Funakoshi

quotes.quote: Of those who start TaeKwonDo training, only about 5% stick with it until they achieve the Black Belt Rank. Then perhaps 80% of those who earn a Black stop there.
quotes.author: Duk Sung Son

quotes.quote: We learn martial arts as helping weakness. You never fight for people to get hurt. You're always helping people.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: Self-defense is a part of the law of nature; nor can it be denied the community, even against the king himself.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: Don't block with your face!
quotes.author: Master Bosse

quotes.quote: Protecting yourself is self defense. Protecting others is warriorship.
quotes.author: Bohdi Sanders

quotes.quote: A martial artist has to take responsibility for himself and accept the consequences of his own doing.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: A martial art that has no rules is nothing but violence.
quotes.author: Kenji Tomiki

quotes.quote: Martial arts, like any art, is an unrestricted athletic expression of an individual soul.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Practice, practice, and practice more. Watch others and learn from them.
quotes.author: Julia Cross

quotes.quote: All martial arts is simply an honest expression of one's body with a lot of deception in between.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The two most important things to do for self-defense are not to take a martial arts class or get a gun, but to think like the opposition and know where you're most at risk.
quotes.author: Barry Eisler

quotes.quote: Self-defense is not just a set of techniques; it's a state of mind, and it begins with the belief that you are worth defending.
quotes.author: Rorion Gracie

quotes.quote: The ultimate aim of Karate lies not in victory or defeat, but in the perfection of the character of its participants.
quotes.author: Gichin Funakoshi

quotes.quote: Martial arts is not about fighting; it's about building character.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: The 90% physical training is to develop that 90% mental attitude.
quotes.author: Master Bosse

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsh

quotes.quote: Self defense is a primary law of nature, which no subsequent law of society can abolish; the immediate gift of the Creator, obliges everyone to resist the first approaches of tyranny.
quotes.author: Elbridge Gerry

quotes.quote: It's not just self defense, it's about self control, body discipline, and mind discipline and breath techniques. It involves yoga. It involves meditation. It's an art, not a sport
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Martial arts is something you can learn or pick up and think you could do really well.
quotes.author: Michelle Yeoh

quotes.quote: Doing little things well is a step toward doing big things better.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Self-defense is the only honourable course where there is unreadiness for self-immolation.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Just as a stool requires three legs to stand upright so the taekwondoist must cultivate basic skills, meaningful forms, and effective sparring in order to have both feet firmly planted in the art.
quotes.author: Doug Cook

quotes.quote: Training in taekwondo for eight years and then being able to do it in a film was pretty amazing.
quotes.author: Dev Patel

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath, listen to your favorite song and realize everything is gonna be okay, nothing is permanent.
quotes.author: Camila Cabello

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath and take this to heart; God has nothing to do with broken promises. When He says, I promise, mark it down it's going to happen.
quotes.author: James McDonald

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath, pick yourself up, dust yourself off, and start all over again.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath and think of the three things you are grateful for, right in this moment.
quotes.author: M. J. Ryan

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath every morning; say thank you for your health. The alternative is unbelievably tough.
quotes.author: Gary Jobson

quotes.quote: Don't spin your wheels and stress. Take a deep breath, center yourself and make a plan.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath. Get present in the moment and ask yourself what is important this very second.
quotes.author: Greg McKeown

quotes.quote: In a quiet place, close your eyes, take a deep breath, and go inward. Place your attention on your heart, in the center of your chest. Sit quietly and easily let your attention remain there.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath and do the difficult thing first.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath and exhale slowly. Mentally picture all tiredness, tension, and fatigue leaving you. Visualize that a wave of golden light is entering you at the top of your head and passing throughout your entire body.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: A deep breath is a technique with which we minimize the number of instances where we say what we do not mean … or what we really think.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Listen, are you breathing just a little and calling it a life?
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: We too should make ourselves empty, that the great soul of the universe may fill us with its breath.
quotes.author: Laurence Binyon

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath and focus on what's really important.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath, relax and imagine yourself exactly as you wish to be.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Love sets your heart free. Be not afraid: dig deep, Take a deep breath And reach for the sky In your lover's heart.
quotes.author: Laura Ramirez

quotes.quote: Every moment allows your the opportunity to take a deep breath in and be grateful for the fact that you can take in a breath.
quotes.author: John Assaraf

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath and try to see how you can make things work.
quotes.author: Tom Welling

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath. It calms the mind.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath right now… Look at the sky; it's a beautiful night, isn't it?
quotes.author: Eyden I

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath. Inhale peace. Exhale happiness.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath and pause for one minute without doing anything! There did you feel the magic?
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just have to take a deep breath, relax, and let things go. Focus on what matters to you and who matters in your life. The rest will work itself out. Just take it one step at a time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you aren't making some mistakes, you aren't taking enough chances.
quotes.author: John Sculley

quotes.quote: If you're not scared then you're not taking a chance. If you're not taking a chance then what the hell are you doing anyway.
quotes.author: Ted Mosby

quotes.quote: I've got to take chances and get out there. What are you going to do, sit home and knit? I don't knit.
quotes.author: Cybill Shepherd

quotes.quote: Be passionate about your life. Learn to live without the fear of failing. Take a chance, you just might surprise yourself.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Our lives improve only when we take chances—and the first and most difficult risk we can take is to be honest with ourselves.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: To dare is to lose one's footing momentarily. To not dare is to lose oneself.
quotes.author: Sren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: A lifetime isn't forever, so take the first chance, don't wait for the second one! Because sometimes, there aren't second chances! And if it turns out to be a mistake? So what! This is life! A whole bunch of mistakes! But if you never get a second chance
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: You learn so much from taking chances, whether they work out or not. Either way, you can grow from the experience and become stronger and smarter.
quotes.author: John Legend

quotes.quote: The great thing about taking big chance when you're younger is you have less to lose and you don't know as much. So you take big swings.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: The important thing is not being afraid to take a chance. Remember, the greatest failure is to not try. Once you find something you love to do, be the best at doing it.
quotes.author: Debbi Fields

quotes.quote: We all need to decide whether to 'play it safe' in life and worry about the downside, or instead take a chance, by being who we really are and living the life our heart desires. Which choice are you making?
quotes.author: Charlie Badenhop

quotes.quote: Do you want to be safe and good, or do you want to take a chance and be great?
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.quote: He who takes no chances wins nothing.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: If you are never scared, embarrassed or hurt, it means you never take chances.
quotes.author: Julia Soul

quotes.quote: I believe in taking chances and living your life. Sometimes doors open and others close and you have to figure out which one you're going to take. I'm always for the one that's challenging.
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.quote: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Necessity is the mother of taking chances.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you want to achieve a high goal, you're going to have to take some chances.
quotes.author: Alberto Salazar

quotes.quote: Every chance taken is another chance to win.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing important was ever achieved without someone taking a chance.
quotes.author: H Jackson Brown Jr

quotes.quote: In life we take chances to prove to ourselves that we are strong enough to be here.
quotes.author: Shaylee Schmidt

quotes.quote: Take a chance. You never know how perfect something might turn out to be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never regret taking a chance, even if you fall on your face; It's better to know you tried and failed than to wonder the great 'what if?.
quotes.author: Devin Frye

quotes.quote: When we allow ourselves to become vulnerable, to take chances, and to risk our pride, that is when we find our own glory.
quotes.author: Richard Corman

quotes.quote: Life's not about sitting at home in front of the TV waiting for your life to begin. Get out there and take some chances.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: Taking chances on opportunities, even if they aren't right for you, gives you a clearer picture of where you want to go with your life and career.
quotes.author: Lauren Bush

quotes.quote: The successful man is the one who had the chance and took it.
quotes.author: Roger Babson

quotes.quote: You can't go through life protecting yourself from everything. You have to take chances. Because if you don't, then you might as well not be living.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every day, you'll have opportunities to take chances and to work outside your safety net. Sure, it's a lot easier to stay in your comfort zone.. in my case, business suits and real estate.. but sometimes you have to take risks. When the risks pay off, that's when you reap the biggest rewards.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Living at risk is jumping off the cliff and building your wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Life is being on the wire, everything else is just waiting.
quotes.author: Karl Wallenda

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I . . . I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The secret to my success is that I bit off more than I could chew and chewed as fast as I could.
quotes.author: Paul Hogan

quotes.quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: I always did something I was a little not ready to do. I think that's how you grow. When there's that moment of Wow, I'm not really sure I can do this,' and you push through those moments, that's when you have a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.quote: Pearls don't lie on the seashore. If you want one, you must dive for it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: You can't outwit fate by standing on the sidelines placing little sidebets about the outcome of life. Either you wade in and risk everything you have to play the game or you don't play at all. And if you don't play you can't win.
quotes.author: Judith Mcnaught

quotes.quote: If things seem under control, you are just not going fast enough.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: What you have to do and the way you have to do it is incredibly simple. Whether you are willing to do it is another matter.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Go out on a limb. That's where the fruit is.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to take a big step. You can't cross a chasm in two small jumps.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.quote: Unless you choose to do great things with it, it makes no difference how much you are rewarded, or how much power you have.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: No man is worth his salt who is not ready at all times to risk his well-being, to risk his body, to risk his life in a great cause.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Once we believe in ourselves we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Life is inherently risky. There is only one big risk you should avoid at all costs, and that is the risk of doing nothing.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Some men see things as they are and say, Why ' I dream of things that never were, and say, Why not
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Whenever you see a successful business, someone once made a courageous decision.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
quotes.author: Dr. Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: If we allow risk to be a fear, then we are sure not to succeed. But, if we approach risk with proper planning, and a good attitude, then most times we can minimize the risk and use it to our advantage.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: As we risk ourselves, we grow. Each new experience is a risk.
quotes.author: Fran Watson

quotes.quote: Dare to reinvent yourself. Dare to allow yourself to change your mind. Dare to go against what everyone else wants for you. Dare to say no to what everyone else wants from you.
quotes.author: Claire Louise Hay

quotes.quote: If you are not living on the edge, you are taking up too much room.
quotes.author: Jayne Howard

quotes.quote: The policy of being too cautious is the greatest risk of all.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: The men who have done big things are those who were not afraid to attempt big things, who were not afraid to risk failure in order to gain success.
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: You've got to go out on a limb sometimes because that's where the fruit is.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: No one respects a talent that is concealed.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Talents, to strike the eye of posterity, should be concentrated: rays powerless while they are scattered, burn in a point.
quotes.author: Robert Eldridge Aris Willmott

quotes.quote: Talent is a dreadfully cheap commodity, cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A talent somewhat above mediocrity, shrewd and not too sensitive, is more likely to rise in the world than genius.
quotes.author: Charles Cooley

quotes.quote: Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Every man has his own vocation, talent is the call.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I'd rather have a lot of talent and a little experience than a lot of experience and a little talent.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Talent isn't genius, and no amount of energy can make it so. I want to be great, or nothing. I won't be a commonplace dauber, so I don't intend to try any more.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Everybody is talented because everybody who is human has something to express.
quotes.author: Brenda Ueland

quotes.quote: Talent is a matter of quantity. Talent does not write on page, it writes three hundred.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Your talent determines what you can do. Your motivation determines how much you are willing to do. Your attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Everyone has talent. What's rare is the courage to follow it to the dark places where it leads.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Everyone has talent at twenty-five. The difficulty is to have it at fifty.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Talent without working hard is nothing.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quote: However you make your living is where your talent lies.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: If you ever find that you're the most talented person in the room, you need to find another room.
quotes.author: Austin Kleon

quotes.quote: Children's talent to endure stems from their ignorance of alternatives.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest happiness in using it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Never confuse the size of your paycheck with the size of your talent.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: Talent is a dull knife that will cut nothing unless it is wielded with great force.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Talent for talent's sake is a bauble and a show. Talent working with joy in the cause of universal truth lifts the possessor to new power as a benefactor.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: It takes little talent to see clearly what lies under one's nose, a good deal of it to know in which direction to point that organ.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: This is how I define talent; it is a gift that God has given us in secret, which we reveal without knowing it.
quotes.author: Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Talent is a tenant in the house owned by genius.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: Talent is never static. It's always growing or dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of talent, man-made talent and God-given talent. With man-made talent you have to work very hard. With God-given talent, you just touch it up once in a while.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: The idea that talent is directly proportional to your trophy cabinet is one I oppose.
quotes.author: Alex Turner

quotes.quote: Talent is nothing but a prolonged period of attention and a shortened period of mental assimilation.
quotes.author: Constantin Stanislavski

quotes.quote: After awhile you realize that putting your actions where your mouth is makes you less likely to have to put your money where your mouth is.
quotes.author: Cris Jammy

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap, but it can cost you plenty.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: Next time a man tells you talk is cheap, ask him if he knows how much a session of Congress costs.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap when your words are of no value.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: If you don’t think talk is cheap, we need to have a heart-to-heart conversation.
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap, but when you go out there and prove it - you're the first one to show up for practice, and you're the last to leave - that's how you lead by example.
quotes.author: Rajon Rondo

quotes.quote: The focus should not be on talking. Talk is cheap. It must be on action.
quotes.author: Howard Berman

quotes.quote: Talking much is a sign of vanity, for the one who is lavish with words is cheap in deeds.
quotes.author: Walter Raleigh

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Learn to listen with your eyes. Actions do speak louder than words. Watch what a person does more than what he says.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: If we only practice compassion on the mind level, we run a great risk of our compassion being just talk. As we know, talk is cheap. To develop true compassion we have to put our money where our mouth is.
quotes.author: Gelek Rimpoche

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. If it wasn't, people might not toss around 'I love you' like a marked-down phrase in a sales bin.
quotes.author: Tonya Hurley

quotes.quote: Live rather than talk. Talk is cheap and the tabloids scream about it every day.
quotes.author: Jon Foreman

quotes.quote: You just ignore it! It's not that you don't care anymore, it's that you stop listening and paying attention to it. Because everybody has an opinion. Talk is cheap - it's free! And I say that like, if you don't like the stuff I have to say, pay me no mind - it will cost you nothing.
quotes.author: Donald Faison

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap..It is the way we organize and use our lives every day that tell what we believe in.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Words are plentiful. Deeds are precious.
quotes.author: H. Ross Perot

quotes.quote: Numb is the new deep, done with the old me, and talk is the same cheap it's been.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap and easy. Making dreams real is hard. Humble work dreams in the midwest are acceptable. Just keep them to yourself. Maybe tell your family but don't just talk--Do something about it.
quotes.author: Peter Jenkins

quotes.quote: Being all talk speaks volumes about you
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: As a man sow, shall he reap. and I know that talk is cheap. But the heat of the battle is as sweet as the victory.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The basic problem is with the business model of journalism. That business model is premised on the idea that talk is cheap and reporting is expensive.
quotes.author: Jonathan Alter

quotes.quote: Life takes your dreams and turns them upside down. Friends talk about you when youre not around. People make promises that they never keep and Ive come to realize talk is cheap.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap...think twice if you see management unloading all of its shares while saying something else in media.
quotes.author: Ice cream

quotes.quote: After a while, your cheap talk don't even cause me pain, so let your bullets fly like rain.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Writing is something you Do and not discuss. Talk is cheap, wishes are free and a fool is included with every purchase. So spend your time wisely.
quotes.author: Jaime Reed

quotes.quote: I know I have something left, And I know talk is cheap. As long as the idea is burning in my mind--and it is--that I can still play. I've got to do it. But I can't just show up and assume all of what I had is still there.
quotes.author: Bret Boone

quotes.quote: A fool is made more of a fool, when their mouth is more open than their mind.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: People talk too much. Humans aren't descended from monkeys. They come from parrots.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quotes.quote: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The trouble with her is that she lacks the power of conversation but not the power of speech.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Human nature is, by definition, a talkative one, imprudent, indiscreet, gossipy, incapable of closing its mouth and keeping it closed.
quotes.author: José Saramago

quotes.quote: You can not control the thought, but you can control the tongue.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Before opening your mouth to talk, you should open your mind to think.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If talk is cheap, then being silent is expensive. And many people it seems, can't afford to buy into it.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: When you have nothing to say, say nothing.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: The talkative man speaks from his mouth, the eloquent man speaks from his heart.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: I have learned silence from the talkative, toleration from the intolerant, and kindness from the unkind; yet strange, I am ungrateful to these teachers.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: I'm a talkative person because I like to get to know a person and I like you to get to know me.
quotes.author: LisaRaye McCoy Misick

quotes.quote: A loud mind is greater than a loud mouth.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: For a silent person, your eyes are very talkative.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: Much talking is the cause of danger. Silence is the means of avoiding misfortune. The talkative parrot is shut up in a cage. Other birds, without speech, fly freely about.
quotes.author: Saskya Pandita

quotes.quote: We have two ears and one mouth and we should use them proportionally.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: When you talk, you are only repeating what you already know. But if you listen, you may learn something new.
quotes.author: The Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: In my circle of friends, I've always been loud and funny and talkative. But as soon as I step out of that circle, I get very quiet and introspective. I don't want the spotlight on me.
quotes.author: Rosie Perez

quotes.quote: Talkativeness is a symptom of deep-seated pessimism. Without it there would be no pessimistic literature.
quotes.author: Albert Vigoleis Thelen

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Weak people talk and do not act, strong people act and keep quiet.
quotes.author: Eliphas Levi

quotes.quote: Love is talkative passion.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: An introvert talks more than an extrovert because when the mouth is closed, the mind is opened.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Not every person that speaks less than you do is more ignorant than you are.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Vanity is a relative of Pride; Vanity is talkative, pride is silent. When Vanity and Pride get together, they could make monstrosities.
quotes.author: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The opposite of talking isn't listening. The opposite of talking is waiting.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Talking isn't doing. It is a kind of good deed to say well; and yet words are not deeds.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Talking is like playing on the harp; there is as much in laying the hands on the strings to stop their vibration as in twanging them to bring out their music.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: If you are still talking about what you did yesterday, you haven't done much today.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: A child seldom needs a good talking to as a good listening to.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Trust your intuition. It's your soul talking to you
quotes.author: Tony Kelbrat

quotes.quote: Wisdom comes with talking less frivolously and listening more seriously. The latter implies a learning attitude; the former assumes an air of omniscience that does not exist.
quotes.author: S.K. Chakraborty

quotes.quote: When the sweet talkin's done, a man is a two face, a worrisome thing who'll leave you to sing the blues in the night.
quotes.author: Johnny Mercer

quotes.quote: You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The time to stop talking is when the other person nods his head affirmatively, but says nothing.
quotes.author: Henry S. Haskins

quotes.quote: When a man gets talking about himself, he seldom fails to be eloquent and often reaches the sublime.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: I like to do all the talking myself. It saves time, and prevents arguments.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Talking much about oneself can also be a means to conceal oneself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Talking about our problems is our greatest addiction. Break the habit. Talk about your joys.
quotes.author: Rita Schiano

quotes.quote: One person's disaster is another person's talking point.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: If you can't add to the discussion, don't subtract by talking.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: If you think communication is all talking, you haven't been listening.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: I love talking about nothing. It is the only thing I know anything about.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I've always believed that a lot of the trouble in the world would disappear if we were talking to each other instead of about each other.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: When you don't know what you're talking about, it's hard to know when you're finished.
quotes.author: Tommy Smothers

quotes.quote: As great minds have the faculty of saying a great deal in a few words, so lesser minds have a talent of talking much, and saying nothing.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: To communicate through silence is a link between the thoughts of man.
quotes.author: Marcel Marceau

quotes.quote: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Much talking is the cause of danger. Silence is the means of avoiding misfortune. The talkative parrot is shut up in a cage. Other birds, without speech, fly freely about.
quotes.author: Saskya Pandita

quotes.quote: A psychiatrists is the next man you start talking to after you start talking to yourself.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words like "What about lunch?
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Doing leads more surely to talking than talking to doing.
quotes.author: Vinet

quotes.quote: If being a tall girl is a good thing, it is likely to be because of the advantages that the tall have over the short.
quotes.author: Iain Brassington

quotes.quote: Research does show a modest advantage of taller women.
quotes.author: Rachelle M. Smith

quotes.quote: The only difference is that the Jews are now a group of leggy women, and they meet and compete for a suitor who is supposedly a multi-millionaire.
quotes.author: Rabbi Shmuley Boteach

quotes.quote: The modern obsession with tallness -- its perceived association with strength, physical superiority, and moral virtue -- has many roots.
quotes.author: Stephen S. Hall

quotes.quote: Countless social science surveys have shown that the public uncritically ascribes positive traits to tall people -- more intelligent, more likable, more dependable, and better leaders.
quotes.author: Stephen S. Hall

quotes.quote: I always assumed the obvious: when you're tall, people don't mess with you.
quotes.author: Arianne Cohen

quotes.quote: Yet for society as a whole, there seems to be no advantage whatsoever in people being taller.
quotes.author: Stephen Michael Holland

quotes.quote: But in the real world, where women worked as waitresses, school-teachers, and secretaries, being tall bestowed few benefits.
quotes.author: Susan Cohen

quotes.quote: If a girl was too tall, her chances of finding a suitable mate would be severely compromised.
quotes.author: Susan Cohen

quotes.quote: The tall girl generally is admired by our society, but the girl who grows too tall--six feet or more--finds difficulty buying smart clothes, obtaining certain jobs (airline hostesses) or selecting suitable dance partners.
quotes.author: Susan Cohen

quotes.quote: Everyone knows that being tall has its benefits: greater social and economic prospects, an advantage in mate selection, a better shot of making it as a model.
quotes.author: Anahad O'Connor

quotes.quote: Studies shows that tall people are automatically considered more intelligent, more attractive and more likable.
quotes.author: Anahad O'Connor

quotes.quote: Only in a room full of tall people does it become apparent that height is a pivotal piece of identity, that height was the most defining force in our lives.
quotes.author: Arianne Cohen

quotes.quote: Being tall, I learned, has meaning far beyond just seeing over people's heads. We share the balancing act of being the chosen people, yet we live in a society that is not built for us.
quotes.author: Arianne Cohen

quotes.quote: Being tall has many advantages, it makes you extraordinary.
quotes.author: Charmina Mason

quotes.quote: Because clothes look better in tall people. They hang better, move better, show better.
quotes.author: Wendy Wax

quotes.quote: Tall, slim, blue eyed girl: this is what is seen--what is enforced to be the definition of beauty and utter inspiration.
quotes.author: Sabrina Eiya Makein

quotes.quote: Many women have said to me that they wish they were as tall as I am. My height in the end turned out to be a big advantage (modeling! volleyball!).
quotes.author: Gisele Bündchen

quotes.quote: Tall people are jealous of you because while they can't shrink, you can still 'grow.'
quotes.author: Becky Murphy

quotes.quote: Although shorter women faced clear disadvantage in the modelling industry, taller women also endured the problematic of being too tall.
quotes.author: Joanne Entwistle

quotes.quote: Being tall and having long legs is all fun & games, until you get into the back of a small car.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is not how tall you are, it is how good you are.
quotes.author: Marv Dunphy

quotes.quote: Because tanning and steroids are only a problem if you plan to live a long time.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: In a thousand years, archeologists will dig up tanning beds and think we fried people as punishment.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote:
Just don't fall into a tanning bed. These machines are for vapid, narcissistic, idiots who have barren vacuums where their thoughts, fears, and passions should be. Spending time in a tanning bed will only earn you the appearance and intellect of an inbred baked potato.
Don't be a baked potato.
quotes.author: Matthew Inman

quotes.quote: One must maintain a little bit of summer even in the middle of winter.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: if you can't tone it, tan it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Great tans don't happen by chance, they happen by appointment.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Not everyone has to ride off into the sunset with a man. Some of us just want a tan.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Even though we all know the facts, it's hard to resist the lure of a tan.
quotes.author: Jane Krakowski

quotes.quote: When you have a natural genetic tan developed over centuries and many generations, the idea of soaking up rays by the pool has never made sense.
quotes.author: Abraham Verghese

quotes.quote: Tanning is tricky, because a lot of people just look orange.
quotes.author: Laura Linney

quotes.quote: Quit your job. Buy a ticket. Get a tan. Fall in love. Never return.
quotes.author: Spencer Antle

quotes.quote: A tan is the best accessory for any outfit!
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.quote: When you're tan, you feel better about yourself.
quotes.author: Nicole Polizzi

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as a healthy tan, and that's what people need to understand.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Union

quotes.quote: The way to make coaches think you're in shape in the spring is to get a tan.
quotes.author: Whitey Ford

quotes.quote: People go tanning because they like to feel tan. You feel more sexy when you're tan and I don't understand why you would tax on that, because you're making yourself feel more happy about yourself.
quotes.author: Nicole Polizzi

quotes.quote: It's amazing what a spray-on tan will do.
quotes.author: David Cook

quotes.quote: Taoism extols the virtue of flexibility. What survives on earth is what effortlessly adapts to the changing environment and changing circumstances.
quotes.author: Ernie J Zelinski

quotes.quote: Taoism shows us how to deal with life and death by realizing everything here is transitory but its substance is eternal.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Be Content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: To Taoism that which is absolutely still or absolutely perfect is absolutely dead, for without the possibility of growth and change there can be no Tao. In reality there is nothing in the universe which is completely perfect or completely still; it is only in the minds of men that such concepts exist.
quotes.author: Alan W. Watts

quotes.quote: Taoism means streching your being, becoming both a man and a woman and joining within yourself, to be the heavens themselves, to stretch your awareness beyond the breaking point until all opposites are reconciled within yourself.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Taoism is the profoundest nonconformism that has ever been evolved anywhere in the world, at any time in history; essentially it is rebellion.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Taoism ... is the Religion of the Tao, a term meaning Path or Way, but denoting in this peculiar case the way, course or movement of the Universe, her processes and methods. In other words, Taoism is the Religion of Heaven and Earth, of the Cosmos, of the World or Nature in the broadest sense of these words. Hence we may call it Naturism.
quotes.author: Jan Jakob Maria de Groot

quotes.quote: Taoism has no rules. It's a suggestion for preceiving life in its wholeness, without unnessary categorization, yet enjoying the beauty of categorization.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Taoism is not a religion, although perhaps it has been made into one by some people. Lao Tsu's way of life occurs in any spiritual philosophy.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Taoism is simply the complete acceptance of yourself as you are right in this moment. It's about rolling with the changes, whether they are perceived as good or bad. Tao reminds us to live life through good actions (important for past karma and karma you are presently creating); through practicing things that engage our mind, body, and spirit.
quotes.author: Sheila M. Burke

quotes.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everyone will respect you.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Taoism is the gentle way. The path of least resistence.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Taoism as the "art of being in the world," for it deals with the presentâ€”ourselves. It is in us that God meets with Nature, and yesterday parts from to-morrow. The Present is the moving Infinity, the legitimate sphere of the Relative. Relativity seeks Adjustment; Adjustment is Art. The art of life lies in a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.author: Okakura Kakuzō

quotes.quote: Lao-tze's Taoism is the exhibition of a way or method of living which men should cultivate as the highest and purest development of their nature.
quotes.author: James Legge

quotes.quote: But the basic Taoism that we are concerned with here is simply a particular way of appreciating, learning from, and working with whatever happens in everyday life.
quotes.author: Benjamin Hoff

quotes.quote: Taoism is the way of water. The most frequent element or symbol refered to in Lao Tzu's wrtings is the symbol of water.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If you realize that all things change, there is nothing you will try to hold on to. If you are not afraid of dying, there is nothing you cannot achieve.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: We go from birth to death. Three out of ten follow life. Three out of ten follow death. People who rush from birth to death are also three out of ten. Why is that so? Because they want to make too much of life.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: No matter how dark the tapestry God weaves for us, there's always a thread of grace.
quotes.author: Mary Doria Russell

quotes.quote: The tapestry of history has no point at which you can cut it and leave the design intelligible.
quotes.author: Dorothea Dix

quotes.quote: The tapestry of history is woven of many threads.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.quote: Life is a great tapestry. The individual is only an insignificant thread in an immense and miraculous pattern.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The tapestry of my life was a ruin of unravelling threads. The brightest parts were a nonsensical madman's weaving. And now every day was a grey stitch, laid down with an outpatient's patience, one following the next following the next, a story in lines, like a railway track to nowhere, telling absolutely nothing.
quotes.author: Alexis Hall

quotes.quote: The mind is like a richly woven tapestry in which the colors are distilled from the experiences of the senses, and the design drawn from the convolutions of the intellect.
quotes.author: Carson McCullers

quotes.quote: Providence is like a curious piece of tapestry made of a thousand shreds, which, single, appear useless, but put together, they represent a beautiful history to the eye.
quotes.author: John Flavel

quotes.quote: Life is a tapestry woven by the decisions we make.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Destiny is thrifty. To weave her tapestry, she uses even the tiniest snips of thread.
quotes.author: Zelda Popkin

quotes.quote: In theÂ tapestryÂ of life, we're all connected. Each one of us is a gift to those around us helping each other be who we are, weaving a perfect picture together.
quotes.author: Anita Moorjani

quotes.quote: If you view your life as a piece of fabric or a tapestry, the photography is the stitching. It keeps everything together.
quotes.author: Joe McNally

quotes.quote: We look at life from the back side of the tapestry. And most of the time, what we see is loose threads, tangled knots and the like. But occasionally, God's light shines through the tapestry, and we get a glimpse of the larger design with God weaving together the darks and lights of existence.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Life resembles Gobelin tapestry; you do not see the canvass on the right side; but when you turn it, the threads are visible.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: The tapestry of history that seems so full of tragedy when viewed from the front has countless comic scenes woven into its reverse side. In truth, tragedy and comedy are the twin masks of history - its mass appeal.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: My life has been a tapestry of rich and royal hue, an everlasting vision of the ever changing view.
quotes.author: Carole King

quotes.quote: Destiny itself is like a wonderful wide tapestry in which every thread is guided by an unspeakable tender hand, placed beside another thread and held and carried by a hundred others.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: We all should know that diversity makes for a rich tapestry, and we must understand that all the threads of the tapestry are equal in value no matter what their color.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Readings are more like weaving a tapestry. Possibly people are getting a cathartic release - but music is physical. Music pummels you. It's got a beat; it's loud. Whereas this is more cerebral.
quotes.author: John Darnielle

quotes.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you're doing well, you're aÂ target, nobody's interested in you except how you can be of use to them.
quotes.author: Richard Grant

quotes.quote: You must not only aim right, but draw your bow with all your might.Â
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You will never be able to hit a target that you cannot see.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: You too, can determine what you want. You can decide on your major objectives, targets, aims, and destinations.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: It's a bizarre but wonderful feeling, to arrive dead center of aÂ targetÂ you didn't even know you were aiming for.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: There is always a path to our target; the problem is to discover it!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: TheÂ odds of hitting your target go up dramaticallyÂ when you aim at it.
quotes.author: Mal Pancoast

quotes.quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Never reduce a target.Â Instead,Â increase actions!
quotes.author: Grant Cardone

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Give time for a worthy cause with eagerness and you will be worthy and richly rewarded.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: You have to set goals that are almost out of reach. If you set a goal that is attainable without much work or thought, you are stuck with something below your true talent and potential.
quotes.author: Steve Garvey

quotes.quote: With your entire focus on your goal, you will reach levels of achievement that you never thought possible.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: You can do anything if you set goals.Â You just have to push yourself.
quotes.author: RJ Mitte

quotes.quote: Whenever you want to achieve something, keep your eyes open, concentrate and make sure you know exactly what it is you want. No one can hit their target with their eyes closed.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: To reach a great height, a person needs to have great depth.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Aim for the moon, if you miss, you may hit a star.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: You can't hit a target if you don't know what it is.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: HighÂ aimsÂ form high characters, and great objects bring out great minds.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: You can't hit a target unless you are aiming for it, and you can't achieve a goal without having it.
quotes.author: Shawn Doyle

quotes.quote: You should set goals beyond your reach so you always have something to live for.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Be sure you positively identify your target before you pull the trigger.
quotes.author: Tom Flynn

quotes.quote: Aim high. You may still miss theÂ targetÂ but at least you won't shoot your foot off.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: The target of anything in life should be to do it so well that it becomes an art.
quotes.author: Arsene Wenger

quotes.quote: When I look down the range at theÂ targetÂ all I can do is try to distinguish between the different colors.
quotes.author: Im Dong-Hyun

quotes.quote: Set your target and keep trying until you reach it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: To be sure of hitting theÂ target, shoot first, and, whatever you hit, call it theÂ target.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: By recording your dreams and goals on paper, you set in motion the process ofÂ becoming the person you most want to be.Put your future in good handsâ€”your own.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: The more obscure our tastes, the greater the proof of our genius.
quotes.author: Jennifer Donnelly

quotes.quote: Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels.
quotes.author: Kate Moss

quotes.quote: We never taste happiness in perfection, our most fortunate successes are mixed with sadness.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: Taste every fruit of every tree in the garden at least once. It is an insult to creation not to experience it fully. Temperance is wickedness.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When you have had a taste of excellence, you cannot go back to mediocrity.
quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

quotes.quote: Bad taste is simply saying the truth before it should be said.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: Bad taste creates many more millionaires than good taste.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: It is good taste, and good taste alone, that possesses the power to sterilize and is always the first handicap to any creative functioning.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Good taste doesn't exist. It is our taste. We have to be proud of it.
quotes.author: Franco Moschino

quotes.quote: It is a wretched taste to be gratified with mediocrity when the excellent lies before us.
quotes.author: Isaac D'Israeli

quotes.quote: Good taste is the modesty of the mind; that is why it cannot be either imitated or acquired.
quotes.author: Delphine de Girardin

quotes.quote: Genius creates, and taste preserves. Taste is the good sense of genius; without taste, genius is only sublime folly.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Good taste is the worst vice ever invented.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: When you taste super-success after tasting super-failure, there is huge relief.
quotes.author: Akshay Kumar

quotes.quote: Different taste in jokes is a great strain on the affections.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Taste, which enables us to distinguish all that has a flavor from that which is insipid.
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Taste is the only morality. Tell me what you like and I'll tell you what you are.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Good taste is the first refuge of the non-creative. It is the last-ditch stand of the artist.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: The taste of defeat has a richness of experience all its own.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: Taste is improved by cultivation.
quotes.author: Robert Aris Willmott

quotes.quote: Good taste is as tiring as good company.
quotes.author: Francis Picabia

quotes.quote: A truly elegant taste is generally accompanied with excellency of heart.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: It's bad taste to be wise all the time, like being at a perpetual funeral.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Taste is a result of a thousand distastes.
quotes.author: Francois Truffaut

quotes.quote: Nothing takes the taste out of peanut butter quite like unrequited love.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: One cannot develop taste from what is of average quality but only from the very best.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A taste for truth at any cost is a passion which spares nothing.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of taste, the taste for emotions of surprise and the taste for emotions of recognition.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Show me a man with a tattoo and I'll show you a man with an interesting past.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: The universality of tattooing is a curious subject for speculation.
quotes.author: Captain James Cook

quotes.quote: We are all tattooed in our cradles with the beliefs of our tribe; the record may seem superficial, but it is indelible.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

quotes.quote: Tattoos are like stories -- they're symbolic of the important moments in your life
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.quote: Tattoos exude pain and pleasure all at the same time.
quotes.author: Chester Bennington

quotes.quote: Tattoos tell stories of crime and passion, punishment and regret. They express an outlaw, antiauthoritarian point of view and communicate a romantic solidarity among society's outcasts.
quotes.author: Douglas Kent Hall

quotes.quote: The tattoo attracts and also repels precisely because it is different.
quotes.author: Margo Demello

quotes.quote: A tattoo is a true poetic creation, and is always more than meets the eye. As a tattoo is grounded on living skin, so its essence emotes a poignancy unique to the mortal human condition.
quotes.author: V. Vale And Andrea Juno

quotes.quote: Tattoo. What a loaded word it is, rife with associations to goons, goofs, bikers, tribal warriors, carnival artists, drunken sailors and floozies.
quotes.author: Jon Anderson

quotes.quote: I always look for a woman who has a tattoo. I see a woman with a tattoo, and I m thinking, okay, here s a gal who s capable of making a decision she ll regret in the future.
quotes.author: Richard Jeni

quotes.quote: Beauty is skin deep. A tattoo goes all the way to the bone.
quotes.author: Vince Hemingson

quotes.quote: Tattooing is about personalizing the body, making it a true home and fit temple for the spirit that dwells inside it.
quotes.author: Michelle Delio

quotes.quote: The tattoo has a profound meaning: the superficiality of modern man s existence.
quotes.author: Anthony Daniels

quotes.quote: The tattoo can only exist as part of the skin, as a drawing always is an incision in the material and therefore cannot be parted from it.
quotes.author: Antoni Tpies

quotes.quote: Tattoos have a power and magic all their own. They decorate the body but they also enhance the soul.
quotes.author: Michelle Delio

quotes.quote: Tattooing, when understood in its entirety, must be seen as a religious act. The human being brings forth images from the center of the self and communicates them to the world. Fantasy is embodied in reality and the person is made whole.
quotes.author: Spider Webb

quotes.quote: If the body is a temple, then tattoos are its stained glass windows.
quotes.author: Vince Hemingson

quotes.quote: If the body is a temple, then tattoos are its stained glass windows.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Our bodies were printed as blank pages to be filled with the ink of our hearts
quotes.author: Michael Biondi

quotes.quote: Tattoos, for me, are like a timeline of my life. I could look at a certain tattoo, and it reminds of me of a certain time in my life and why I got that tattoo.
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: I'm from a nice, suburban, middle-class family, but my tattoos remind me where I've been.
quotes.author: Tom Hardy

quotes.quote: Inking without a plan gives Booth freedom to explore the desires of those seated in his chair, he says, to feed off their energy, allowing his clients' demons to help guide the needle.
quotes.author: Joshua Lipton

quotes.quote: My body is a journal in a way. It's like what sailors used to do, where every tattoo meant something, a specific time in your life when you make a mark on yourself, whether you do it yourself with a knife or with a professional tattoo artist.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: A tattoo doesn't make you look like an individual.
quotes.author: Talcott Parsons

quotes.quote: My body is my journal and my tattoos are my story.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: My tattoos are reminders to hang in there when things get tough.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Tattoos are like marriage: it's a lifelong commitment, it hurts like hell, and the color fades over time.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Tattooed men who are not behind bars are either latent criminals or degenerate aristocrats. If someone who is tattooed dies in freedom, then he does so a few years before he would have committed murder.
quotes.author: Adolf Loos

quotes.quote: People who don't like me talk about it as though I'm trash because I have tattoos. I find that insane because it's 2008, not the 1950s. Tattoos aren't limited to sailors. It's a form of art I find beautiful. I love it.
quotes.author: Megan Fox

quotes.quote: Each body has its art...
quotes.author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quotes.quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including YOU.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: I don't want to be alone. I want to be left alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Men aren't necessities. They're luxuries.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: As I step off at the surface at Taurus-Littrow, I'd like to dedicate the first step of Apollo 17 to all those who made it possible.
quotes.author: Gene Cernan

quotes.quote: Truth exists. Only falsehood has to be invented.
quotes.author: George Braque

quotes.quote: I will never be a well-behaved woman.
quotes.author: Janne Robinson

quotes.quote: The secret to using power is not to use it. Just having it is enough.
quotes.author: Jessica Alba

quotes.quote: What doesn't kill us gives us a lot of unhealthy coping mechanisms and a really dark sense of humor.
quotes.author: Kelly Jamieson

quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Keep only those things that speak to your heart. Then take the plunge and discard all the rest. By doing this, you can reset your life and embark on a new lifestyle.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: Be happy in the moment, that’s enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: If we surrendered to earth’s intelligence, we could rise up rooted like trees.
quotes.author: Thomas Berry

quotes.quote: Sweet as sugar, hard as ice. Hurt me once, I'll kill you twice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A Taurus always appears to be calm and steady even when they feel like punching in the face.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The tighter you try to hold on to a taurus the more they will slip through your fingers.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A taurus will resent you for years if you do not apologize to them for being wrong and absolutely proclaim that they were right all along.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I can't stand to see red in my profit-or-loss column. I'm Taurus the bull, so I react to red. If I see it, I sell my stocks quickly.
quotes.author: Barbra Streisand

quotes.quote: Taureans are stubborn as hell. They never want to tell you what sign they are.... But underneath that tough Taurus hide beats the heart of a hopeless romantic.
quotes.author: Armistead Maupin

quotes.quote: Taxation is the price which civilized communities pay for the opportunity of remaining civilized.
quotes.author: Albert Bushnell Hart

quotes.quote: Taxation is the price we pay for failing to build a civilized society. The higher the tax level, the greater the failure. A centrally planned totalitarian state represents a complete defeat for the civilized world, while a totally voluntary society represents its ultimate success.
quotes.author: Mark Skousen

quotes.quote: Next to being shot at and missed, nothing is quite as satisfying as an income tax refund.
quotes.author: F.J. Raymond

quotes.quote: The difference between tax avoidance and tax evasion is the thickness of a prison wall.
quotes.author: Denis Healey

quotes.quote: The income tax has made more liars out of the American people than golf has. Even when you make a tax form out on the level, you don't know when it's through if you are a crook or a martyr.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The point to remember is that what the government gives it must first take away.
quotes.author: John S. Coleman

quotes.quote: To compel a man to furnish funds for the propagation of ideas he disbelieves and abhors is sinful and tyrannical.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: This is a question too difficult for a mathematician. It should be asked of a philosopher, when asked about completing his income tax form.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Tax rates should never be raised in some brackets without being raised in all brackets.
quotes.author: Bradley A. Smith

quotes.quote: The power to tax is the power to destroy.
quotes.author: John Marshall

quotes.quote: What people really want is fairness. They want people paying their fair share of taxes.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: You don't get gushers of revenue by raising tax rates. You get it through expansion.
quotes.author: George P. Shultz

quotes.quote: The power of taxing people and their property is essential to the very existence of government.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Tax reform means, don't tax you, don't tax me. Tax that fellow behind the tree.
quotes.author: Russell Long

quotes.quote: It is a good thing that we do not get as much government as we pay for.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The problem is not that the people are taxed too little. The problem is that government spends too much.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: What at first was plunder assumed the softer name of revenue.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: Collecting more taxes than is absolutely necessary is legalized robbery.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: You can't tax business. Business doesn't pay taxes. It collects taxes.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: If you make any money, the government shoves you in the creek once a year with it in your pockets, and all that don't get wet you can keep.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The only thing that hurts more than paying an income tax is not having to pay an income tax.
quotes.author: Thomas Dewar

quotes.quote: The only difference between a tax man and a taxidermist is that the taxidermist leaves the skin.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The nation should have a tax system that looks like someone designed it on purpose.
quotes.author: William Simon

quotes.quote: One thing is clear: The Founding Fathers never intended a nation where citizens would pay nearly half of everything they earn to the government.
quotes.author: Ron Paul

quotes.quote: I'm proud to pay taxes in the United States; the only thing is, I could be just as proud for half the money.
quotes.author: Arthur Godfrey

quotes.quote: Every culture has some ritual for joining two people together and making them stay that way, and ours is giving tax breaks.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.quote: The power to tax and spend is restricted by the enumerated powers.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.quote: Taxation with representation ain't so hot either.
quotes.author: Gerald Barzan

quotes.quote: When there's a single thief, it's robbery. When there are a thousand thieves, it's taxation.
quotes.author: Vanya Cohen

quotes.quote: Income tax returns are the most imaginative fiction being written today.
quotes.author: Herman Wouk

quotes.quote: The best taxes are such as are levied upon consumptions, especially those of luxury; because such taxes are least felt by the people. They seem, in some measure, voluntary; since a man may choose how far he will use the commodity: They naturally produce sobriety and frugality, if judiciously imposed: And being confounded with the natural price of the commodity, they are scarcely perceived by the consumers. Their only disadvantage is that they are expensive in the levying.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Taxes on consumption, like those on capital or income, to be just, must be uniform.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Taxes, well laid and well spent, insure domestic tranquility, provide for the common defense, and promote the general welfare. Taxes protect property and the environment; taxes make business possible. Taxes pay for roads and schools and bridges and police and teachers. Taxes pay for doctors and nursing homes and medicine.
quotes.author: Jill Lepore

quotes.quote: Taxes are like and unlike the rain, they fall upon the just and the unjust; most hardly upon the just because they will not resort to devious ways to escape the imposition.
quotes.author: Paul Carus

quotes.quote: Collecting more taxes than is absolutely necessary is legalized robbery.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Taxes on capital, taxes on labor, inflation, bureaucratic regulation, minimum wage laws, are all - to different degrees - unnecessary slices of the wedge that stand between an individual's effort and reward for that effort.
quotes.author: Jack Kemp

quotes.quote: The payment of taxes gives a right to protection.
quotes.author: James M. Wayne

quotes.quote: Taxes are nothing but a game of pick pocket.
quotes.author: Joseph Bonkowski

quotes.quote: Taxes are way too complicated, and people spend way too much time worrying about ways to get them lower.
quotes.author: Steve Mnuchin

quotes.quote: Taxes grow without rain.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Taxes are like hot potatoes that get passed around. The poor man who does not pay for water at home may pay for it when he buys coffee downtown, where tax-paying businesses pass the cost on to consumers.
quotes.author: K. Filip Palda

quotes.quote: Like mothers, taxes are often misunderstood, but seldom forgotten.
quotes.author: Lord Bramwell

quotes.quote: Taxes are collected by governments in order to finance their expenditures and also for purposes of stabilization, distribution and allocation. Particular taxes may cause changes in people's behaviour and have an impact on aggregate demand that, therefore, influences the level of economic activity. Taxes are the instruments through which governments redistribute income and wealth and, moreover, they are an integral part of a government's fiscal policy as they are used to stabilize aggregate demand.
quotes.author: Nikolaos Karagiannis

quotes.quote: Taxes are paid in the sweat of every man who labors.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Taxes are the lifeblood of government and no taxpayer should be permitted to escape the payment of his just share of the burden of contributing thereto.
quotes.author: Arthur Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: Tax reform is taking the taxes off things that have been taxed in the past and putting taxes on things that haven't been taxed before.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: Taxes are never popular.
quotes.author: Luis Videgaray Caso

quotes.quote: Taxes are just too high - that's obviously a priority.
quotes.author: Scott Garrett

quotes.quote: Taxes are simply contributions demanded of citizens as their share of the expenses of government.
quotes.author: Paul Leroy

quotes.quote: Taxes are not levied for the benefit of the taxed.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Taxes are how we pool our money for public health and safety, infrastructure, research, and services--from the development of vaccines and the Internet to public schools and universities, transportation, courts, police, parks, and safe drinking water.
quotes.author: Holly Sklar

quotes.quote: Taxes are what we pay for civilized society, for modernity, and for prosperity. The wealthy pay more because they have benefitted more.
quotes.author: Jill Lepore

quotes.quote: Taxes are like a double chain which by keeping the peasants in the commune where they were born, fixes them still to the soil; though they are no longer, by law, attached to their master, they are always, by law, attached to each other.
quotes.author: Joseph Wilbois

quotes.quote: In theory, taxes should be like shopping. What I buy is government services. What I pay are my taxes.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Taxation is the price which civilized communities pay for the opportunity of remaining civilized.
quotes.author: Albert Bushnell Hart

quotes.quote: Taxes, after all, are dues that we pay for the privileges of membership in an organized society.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
