quotes.quote: The avoidance of taxes is the only intellectual pursuit that still carries any reward.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: Taxes are like the wheat poured into the public hopper; rent, in whatever form, may be described as the flour that comes from the public mill. The privileged man, who is allowed to carry off the grist, eats his bread, as it were, at the taxpayer's expense.
quotes.author: Charles Bowdoin Fillebrown

quotes.quote: Any tax is a discouragement and therefore a regulation so far as it goes.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: Tax is never a stand alone issue. Tax is what you collect from the prosperity of the people, so if businesses are not thriving and individuals have no income, there is nothing to call tax.
quotes.author: Taiwo Oyedele

quotes.quote: Their occupations included a United States senator, a gangster, rapper, bankers, tradesmen, and even a dolphin trainer. The one thing they all had in common was the fact that they'd journeyed in the back of my London taxi.
quotes.author: Mark Solomon

quotes.quote: At the violet hour, when the eyes and back / Turn upward from the desk / when the human engine waits / like a taxi throbbing waiting.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: She likes taxis. She travels in buses and subways when she is trying to stop smoking
quotes.author: Maeve Brennan

quotes.quote: No matter how many times I visit this great city, I'm always struck by the same thing: a yellow taxi cab.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: As the taxi took me away, I sat quietly in the back, wondering what was next.
quotes.author: Glenna Hammer Moulthrop

quotes.quote: At least they looked that way to me / from the taxi window / and since I happened to be sitting / that fading Sunday afternoon / in the very center of the universe.
quotes.author: William Taylor Collins

quotes.quote: When I spoke to the taxi driver; my tone was rustic and wandering; instructing him to drift me deep into the hills; poignantly embrace the winds of nature.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Life is like a taxi. The meter just keeps a ticking whether you are getting somewhere or just standing still.
quotes.author: Lou Erickson

quotes.quote: There used to be a strong belief that if you wanted to know what was really going on in a country, the best thing to do was to go there and ask a taxi driver.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: The one thing you shouldn't do is try to tell a cab driver how to get somewhere.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: Driving a cab is not really a nurturing type of relationship. You take people and they tip you, they may not tip you, you don't know their names, they don't care about you, you don't care about them.
quotes.author: Pam Grier

quotes.quote: Four a.m., just getting started / Drive fast cars and crash your party / Boy, you're in over your head / Think it's time that I call you a taxi.
quotes.author: Charlotte Emma Aitchison

quotes.quote: When you're walking around and you're late / Buses are packed and the subways ya hate / Ya need a taxi cab / Ya need a taxi cab.
quotes.author: Nat Wolff

quotes.quote: Trying to make you disappear / Make ya pack your bags / Get the hell out of here / Ding-dong, the sound I'm waiting for / Your taxi's outside / And the driver's at the door.
quotes.author: Montell Jordan

quotes.quote: One would raise his hand, and it was the chase to get him before some other taxi coming from nowhere would cut him off. Be quicker to pick him up. That was the grind, the hustle all day long.
quotes.author: Mark C. Brown

quotes.quote: I had made good money driving a taxi and had been able to easily take care of all my expenses.
quotes.author: Mr. Donny Churchill

quotes.quote: Taxi drivers are the other Americans without voices.
quotes.author: Mr. Donny Churchill

quotes.quote: Driving a yellow taxi in New York City makes you publicly visible and exposed every minute of your workday.
quotes.author: Biju MAthew

quotes.quote: The first thing that strikes a visitor to Paris is a taxi.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: I have no limo. In cities, I usually hail a taxi like everyone else.
quotes.author: Robin Leach

quotes.quote: I have a driver's license, but the truth is that I hardly ever drive. I prefer to get around by taxi.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: For me, a taxi is like a public space because so many people get in that space.
quotes.author: Yasmine Hamdan

quotes.quote: In New York City, a lot of people think 'the great outdoors' is the area between your front door and a taxi cab.
quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.quote: I live in a bad neighborhood. Why, I saw two complete strangers share a taxi - yeah, one guy took the radio and the other guy took the tires.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: There are those who love to get dirty and fix things. They drink coffee at dawn, beer after work. And those who stay clean, just appreciate things. At breakfast they have milk and juice at night. There are those who do both, they drink tea.
quotes.author: Gary Snyder

quotes.quote: When you have nobody you can make a cup of tea for, when nobody needs you, that's when I think life is over.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Tea, though ridiculed by those who are naturally coarse in their nervous sensibilities will always be the favorite beverage of the intellectual.
quotes.author: Thomas de Quincey

quotes.quote: Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: Make tea, not war.
quotes.author: Monty Python

quotes.quote: Tea is quiet and our thirst for tea is never far from our craving for beauty.
quotes.author: James Norwood Pratt

quotes.quote: Tea is drunk to forget the din of the world.
quotes.author: T'ien Yi-heng

quotes.quote: If you are cold, tea will warm you; if you are too heated, it will cool you; if you are depressed, it will cheer you; if you are excited it will calm you.
quotes.author: William Ewart

quotes.quote: If man has no tea in him, he is incapable of understanding truth and beauty.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: There is something in the nature of tea that leads us into a world of quiet contemplation of life.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: There is a great deal of poetry and fine sentiment in a chest of tea.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I always fear that creation will expire before tea-time.
quotes.author: Rev. Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Tea- the cups that cheer but not inebriate.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Ecstasy is a glass full of tea and a piece of sugar in the mouth.
quotes.author: Alexander Puskin

quotes.quote: The best quality tea must have the creases like the leather boots of Tartar horsemen, curl like the dewlap of a mighty bullock, unfold like a mist rising out of a ravine, gleam like a lake touched by a zephyr, and be wet and soft like earth newly swept by rain.
quotes.author: Lu Yu

quotes.quote: Immortals, hear, said Jove, and cease to jar! Tea must succeed to Wine as Peace to War. Nor by the grape let man be set at odds, but share in Tea, the nectar of the Gods.
quotes.author: Peter Antine Motteaux

quotes.quote: The very act of preparing and serving tea encourages conversation. The little spaces in time created by teatime rituals call out to be filled with conversation. Even the tea itself - warm and comforting-inspires a feeling of relaxation and trust that fosters shared confidences.
quotes.author: Emilie Barnes

quotes.quote: In my own hands I hold a bowl of tea; I see all of nature represented in its green color. Closing my eyes, I find green mountains and pure water within my own heart. Silently sitting alone and drinking tea, I feel these become a part of me.
quotes.author: Sen Soshitsu

quotes.quote: Tea is wealth itself, because there is nothing that cannot be lost, no problem that will not disappear, no burden that will not float away, between the first sip and the last.
quotes.author: The Minister of Leaves, The Republic of Tea

quotes.quote: The mere chink of cups and saucers tunes the mind to happy repose.
quotes.author: George Gissing

quotes.quote: The spirit of the tea beverage is one of peace, comfort, and refinement.
quotes.author: Arthur Gray

quotes.quote: One sip of this will bathe the drooping spirits in delight, beyond the bliss of dreams.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: When tea becomes ritual, it takes its place at the heart of our ability to see greatness in small things. Where is beauty to be found? In great things that, like everything else, are doomed to die, or in small things that aspire to nothing, yet know how to set a jewel of infinity in a single moment.
quotes.author: Muriel Barbery

quotes.quote: Tea! thou soft, thou sober, sage, and venerable liquid,... thou female tongue-running, smile-smoothing, heart-opening, wind-tippling cordial, to whose glorious insipidity I owe the happiest moment of my life, let me fall prostrate.
quotes.author: Colley Cibber

quotes.quote: The first sip of tea is always the best... you cringe as it burns the back of your throat, knowing you just had the hottest carpe-diem portion.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Who would then deny that when I am sipping tea in my tearoom I am swallowing the whole universe with it and that this very moment of my lifting the bowl to my lips is eternity itself transcending time and space?
quotes.author: D.T. Suzuki

quotes.quote: Tea's proper use is to amuse the idle, relax the studious, and dilute the full meals of those who cannot use exercise, and will not use abstinence.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Tea tempers the spirit and harmonizes the mind; dispels lassitude and relieves fatigue, awakens thought and prevents drowsiness.
quotes.author: Lu Yu

quotes.quote: The Philosophy of Tea is not mere aestheticism ... for it expresses conjointly with ethics and religion our whole point of view about man and nature. It is hygiene, for it enforces cleanliness; it is economics, for it shows comfort in simplicity rather than in the complex and costly; it is moral geometry, inasmuch as it defines our sense of proportion to the universe.
quotes.author: Kakuzo Okakura

quotes.quote: The first cup moistens my lips and throat. The second shatters my loneliness. The third causes the wrongs of life to fade gently from my recollection. The fourth purifies my soul. The fifth lifts me to the realms of the unwinking gods
quotes.author: Chinese Mystic, Tang Dynasty

quotes.quote: Each cup of tea represents an imaginary voyage.
quotes.author: Catherine Douzel

quotes.quote: When tea becomes ritual, it takes its place at the heart of our ability to see greatness in small things. Where is beauty to be found? In great things that, like everything else, are doomed to die, or in small things that aspire to nothing, yet know how to set a jewel of infinity in a single moment?
quotes.author: Muriel Barbery

quotes.quote: I had a little tea party This afternoon at three. 'Twas very small-- Three guest in all-- Just I, myself and me. Myself ate all the sandwiches, While I drank up the tea; 'Twas also I who ate the pie And passed the cake to me.
quotes.author: JESSICA NELSON NORTH

quotes.quote: Another novelty is the tea-party, an extraordinary meal in that, being offered to persons that have already dined well, it supposes neither appetite nor thirst, and has no object but distraction, no basis but delicate enjoyment.
quotes.author: Jean-Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: The very act of preparing and serving tea encourages conversation. The little spaces in time created by teatime rituals call out to be filled with conversation. Even the tea itself–warm and comforting-inspires a feeling of relaxation and trust that fosters shared confidences.
quotes.author: Emilie Barnes

quotes.quote: We had a kettle; we let it leak: Our not repairing made it worse. We haven’t had any tea for a week… The bottom is out of the Universe.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Come along inside…. We’ll see if tea and buns can make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Kenneth Grahame

quotes.quote: Come and share a pot of tea, My home is warm and my friendship’s free.
quotes.author: Emilie Barnes

quotes.quote: Come, let us have some tea and continue to talk about happy things.
quotes.author: Chaim Potok

quotes.quote: Tea! Bless ordinary everyday afternoon tea!
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: There are few hours in life more agreeable than the hour dedicated to the ceremony known as afternoon tea.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Tea is a work of art and needs a master hand to bring out its noblest qualities. We have good and bad teas, as we have good and bad paintings -- generally the latter.
quotes.author: Kakuzo Okakura

quotes.quote: The most trying hours in life are between four o'clock and the evening meal. A cup of tea at this time adds a lot of comfort and happiness.
quotes.author: Royal S. Copeland

quotes.quote: Perhaps it is while drinking tea that I most of all enjoy the sense of leisure.
quotes.author: George Gissing

quotes.quote: Tea with us became more than an idealization of the form of drinking; it is a religion of the art of life.
quotes.author: Okakura

quotes.quote: Time for you and time for me, And time yet for a hundred indecisions, And for a hundred visions and revisions, Before the taking of toast and tea
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Find yourself a cup; the teapot is behind you. Now tell me hundreds of things.
quotes.author: Saki

quotes.quote: The dream begins with a teacher who believes in you, who tugs and pushes and leads you to the next plateau, sometimes poking you with a sharp stick called truth.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: The teacher who is indeed wise does not bid you to enter the house of his wisdom but rather leads you to the threshold of your mind.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The task of the excellent teacher is to stimulate apparently ordinary people to unusual effort. The tough problem is not in identifying winners: it is in making winners out of ordinary people.
quotes.author: Patricia Cross

quotes.quote: A master can tell you what he expects of you. A teacher, though, awakens your own expectations.
quotes.author: Patricia Neal

quotes.quote: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
quotes.author: Dr. William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: I have come to believe that a great teacher is a great artist and that there are as few as there are any other great artists. It might even be the greatest of the arts since the medium is the human mind and spirit.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Teachers are expected to reach unattainable goals with inadequate tools. The miracle is that at times they accomplish this impossible task.
quotes.author: Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: A good teacher is like a candle - it consumes itself to light the way for others.
quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

quotes.quote: The good teacher makes the poor student good and the good student superior.
quotes.author: Marva Collins

quotes.quote: I like a teacher who gives you something to take home to think about besides homework.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: A good teacher is a master of simplification and an enemy of simplism.
quotes.author: Louis Berman

quotes.quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
quotes.author: Henry Brooks Adams

quotes.quote: The very spring and root of honesty and virtue lie in good education.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: A good teacher, like a good entertainer, first must hold his audience's attention, then he can teach his lesson.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.quote: Who dares to teach must never cease to learn.
quotes.author: John C. Dana

quotes.quote: Teaching is not a lost art, but the regard for it is a lost tradition.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: Teaching is the greatest act of optimism.
quotes.author: Colleen Wilcox

quotes.quote: I am indebted to my father for living, but to my teacher for living well.
quotes.author: Alexander The Great

quotes.quote: He who opens a school door closes a prison.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: I think the teaching profession contributes more to the future of our society than any other single profession.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Teachers appreciate being appreciated, for teacher appreciation is their highest award.
quotes.author: William Prince

quotes.quote: One looks back with appreciation to the brilliant teachers, but with gratitude to those who touched our human feelings. The curriculum is so much necessary raw material, but warmth is the vital element for the growing plant and for the soul of the child.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Often, when I am reading a good book, I stop and thank my teacher.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

quotes.quote: Without teacher appreciation there can't be any student progress.
quotes.author: Theresa Grimm

quotes.quote: None of us got where we are solely by pulling ourselves up by our bootstraps. We got here because somebody bent down and helped us pick up our boots.
quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

quotes.quote: Modern cynics and skeptics see no harm in paying those to whom they entrust the minds of their children a smaller wage than is paid to those to whom they entrust the care of their plumbing.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Good teaching is one-fourth preparation and three-fourths pure theatre.
quotes.author: Gail Godwin

quotes.quote: What nobler employment, or more valuable to the state, than that of the man who instructs the rising generation.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: A true disciple shows his appreciation by reaching further than his teacher.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: To teach is to learn twice.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: A teacher is one who helps others and influences lives forever.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I think the teaching profession contributes more to the future of our society than any other single profession.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Teaching is more than imparting knowledge, it is inspiring change. Learning is more than absorbing facts, it is acquiring understanding.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Anyone who does anything to help a child in his life is a hero to me.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: A great teacher never strives to explain his vision. He simply invites you to stand beside him and see for yourself.
quotes.author: Bobby Ray Inman

quotes.quote: Teaching is the profession that teaches all of the other professions.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A good teacher must know the rules; a good pupil, the exceptions.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: What is a teacher? I'll tell you: it isn't someone who teaches something, but someone who inspires the student to give of her best in order to discover what she already knows.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The average teacher explains complexity; the gifted teacher reveals simplicity.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: All teachers teach history to those who will make history.
quotes.author: Greg Henry Quinn

quotes.quote: Students don't care how much you know until they know how much you care.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A good teacher is like a candle, it consumes itself to light the way for others.
quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

quotes.quote: Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.
quotes.author: Solomon Ortiz

quotes.quote: A very wise old teacher once said: I consider a day's teaching wasted if we do not all have one hearty laugh.
quotes.author: Gilbert Highet

quotes.quote: What we want is to see the child in pursuit of knowledge, and not knowledge in pursuit of the child.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There is no recipe to be a great teacher, that's what is unique about them.
quotes.author: Robert Sternberg

quotes.quote: A good teacher, like a good entertainer first must hold his audience's attention, then he can teach his lesson.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.quote: Teaching is the greatest act of optimism.
quotes.author: Colleen Wilcox

quotes.quote: One child, one teacher, one book, one pen can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The teacher is the one who gets the most out of the lessons, and the true teacher is the learner.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A teacher is a compass that activates the magnets of curiosity, knowledge, and wisdom in the pupils.
quotes.author: Ever Garrison

quotes.quote: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character, that is the goal of true education.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Teachers can change lives with just the right mix of chalk and challenges.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: If kids come to us from strong, healthy functioning families, it makes our job easier. If they do not come to us from strong, healthy, functioning families, it makes our job more important.
quotes.author: Barbara Colorose

quotes.quote: If you would thoroughly know anything, teach it to others.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

quotes.quote: The teacher who is indeed wise does not bid you to enter the house of his wisdom but rather leads you to the threshold of your mind.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
quotes.author: Henry Brooks Adams

quotes.quote: The task of the excellent teacher is to stimulate "apparently ordinary" people to unusual effort.Â  The tough problem is not in identifying winners:Â  it is in making winners out of ordinary people.
quotes.author: K. Patricia Cross

quotes.quote: What the teacher is, is more important than what he teaches.
quotes.author: Karl Menninger

quotes.quote: Don't try to fix the students, fix ourselves first. The good teacher makes the poor student good and the good student superior. When our students fail, we, as teachers too, have failed.
quotes.author: Marva Collins

quotes.quote: I'm not a teacher: only a fellow-traveller of whom you asked the way. I pointed ahead- ahead of myself as well as you.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A teacher is one who makes two ideas grow where only one grew before.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The best teacher lodges an intent not in the mind but in the heart.
quotes.author: Anne Michaels

quotes.quote: If you think education is expensive, try ignorance.
quotes.author: Derek Bok

quotes.quote: The purpose of education is to teach people how to study on their own.
quotes.author: R.E. Phillips

quotes.quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stop.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: One looks back with appreciation to the brilliant teachers, but with gratitude to those who touched our human feelings. The curriculum is so much necessary raw material, but warmth is the vital element for the growing plant and for the soul of the child.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: The true teacher defends his pupils against his own personal influence. He inspires self-trust. He guides their eyes from himself to the spirit that quickens him. He will have no disciples.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: The greatest sign of success for a teacher is to be able to say, 'The children are now working as if I did not exist.'
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Good teaching is one-fourth preparation and three-fourths pure theatre.
quotes.author: Gail Godwin

quotes.quote: I am indebted to my father for living, but to my teacher for living well.
quotes.author: Alexander of Macedon

quotes.quote: The test of a good teacher is not how many questions he can ask his pupils that they will answer readily, but how many questions he inspires them to ask him which he finds it hard to answer.
quotes.author: Alice Rollins

quotes.quote: Old teachers never die; they just grade away
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Teachers teach more by what they are than by what they say.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A master can tell you what he expects of you. A teacher, though awakens your own expectations.
quotes.author: Patricia Neal

quotes.quote: Teaching is the greatest act of optimism.
quotes.author: Colleen Wilcox

quotes.quote: A professor is one who talks in someone else's sleep.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: There are three things to remember when teaching: know your stuff; know whom you are stuffing; and then stuff them elegantly.
quotes.author: Lola May

quotes.quote: The splendid thing about education is that everyone wants it. Like influenza, you can give it away without losing any of it yourself.
quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.quote: The teacher's life should have three periods, study until twenty-five, investigation until forty, profession until sixty, at which age I would have him retired on a double allowance.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Someone once said, â€œThere are two good reasons to be a teacher â€” July and August.â€ In fact, there are three good reasons to be a teacher. The third reason is retirement.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Teaching should be such that what is offered is perceived as a valuable gift and not as a hard duty.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: No man can be a good teacher unless he has feelings of warm affection toward his pupils and a genuine desire to impart to them what he believes to be of value.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: A good teacher, like a good entertainer first must hold his audience's attention, then he can teach his lesson.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.quote: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: The teacher is the one who gets the most out of the lessons, and the true teacher is the learner.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
quotes.author: William A. Ward

quotes.quote: What nobler employment, or more valuable to the state, than that of the man who instructs the rising generation.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: He that teaches us anything which we knew not before is undoubtedly to be reverenced as a master.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Those who educate children well are more to be honored than they who produce them; for these only gave them life, those the art of living well.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A teacher is a person who never says anything once.
quotes.author: Howard Nemerov

quotes.quote: A good teacher is like a candle - it consumes itself to light the way for others.
quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

quotes.quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The teacher who is indeed wise does not bid you to enter the house of his wisdom but rather leads you to the threshold of your mind.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: One good teacher in a lifetime may sometimes change a delinquent into a solid citizen.
quotes.author: Philip Wylie

quotes.quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: The job of an educator is to teach students to see the vitality in themselves.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: A teacher who is attempting to teach without inspiring the pupil with a desire to learn is hammering on a cold iron.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: A teacher who is not dogmatic is simply a teacher who is not teaching.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: You can't stop a teacher when they want to do something. They just do it.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: Teachers, I believe, are the most responsible and important members of society because their professional efforts affect the fate of the earth.
quotes.author: Helen Caldicott

quotes.quote: The average teacher explains complexity; the gifted teacher reveals simplicity.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Good teachers are costly. Bad teachers cost more.
quotes.author: Bob Talbert

quotes.quote: The best teacher is very interactive.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Teachers are expected to reach unattainable goals with inadequate tools. The miracle is that at times they accomplish this impossible task.
quotes.author: Dr. Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: The best teachers teach from the heart, not from the book.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A teacher should have maximal authority, and minimal power.
quotes.author: Thomas Szaz

quotes.quote: A teacher is one who makes himself progressively unnecessary.
quotes.author: Thomas Carruthers

quotes.quote: A good teacher is a master of simplification and an enemy of simplism.
quotes.author: Louis A. Berman

quotes.quote: A teacher is a compass that activates the magnets of curiosity, knowledge, and wisdom in the pupils.
quotes.author: Ever Garrison

quotes.quote: A good teacher must be able to put himself in the place of those who find learning hard.
quotes.author: Eliphas Levi

quotes.quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
quotes.author: Mark Van Doren

quotes.quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A good teacher, like a good entertainer first must hold his audience's attention, then he can teach his lesson.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.quote: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Teaching is leaving a vestige of one self in the development of another. And surely the student is a bank where you can deposit your most precious treasures.
quotes.author: Eugene P. Bertin

quotes.quote: I have come to believe that a great teacher is a great artist and that there are as few as there are any other great artists. Teaching might even be the greatest of the arts since the medium is the human mind and spirit.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Teachers who inspire know that teaching is like cultivating a garden, and those who would have nothing to do with thorns must never attempt to gather flowers.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: In learning you will teach, and in teaching you will learn.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.quote: Teaching should be full of ideas instead of stuffed with facts.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: No man can reveal to you aught but that which already lies half asleep in the dawning of your knowledge.The teacher who walks in the shadow of the temple, among his followers, gives not of his wisdom but rather of his faith and his lovingness.If he is indeed wise he does not bid you enter the house of his wisdom, but rather leads you to the threshold of your own mind.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: I never teach my pupils, I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Teachers, I believe, are the most responsible and important members of society because their professional efforts affect the fate of the earth.
quotes.author: Helen Caldecott

quotes.quote: The dream begins, most of the time, with a teacher who believes in you, who tugs and pushes and leads you on to the next plateau, sometimes poking you with a sharp stick called truth.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: A good teacher is like a candle - it consumes itself to light the way for others.
quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Ataruk

quotes.quote: The future of the world is in my classroom today, a future with the potential for good or bad... Several future presidents are learning from me today; so are the great writers of the next decades, and so are all the so-called ordinary people who will make the decisions in a democracy. I must never forget these same young people could be the thieves and murderers of the future. Only a teacher? Thank God I have a calling to the greatest profession of all! I must be vigilant every day, lest I lose one fragile opportunity to improve tomorrow.
quotes.author: Ivan Welton Fitzwater

quotes.quote: There's no word in the language I revere more than 'teacher.' My heart sings when a kid refers to me as his teacher, and it always has. I've honored myself and the entire family of man by becoming a teacher.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: The whole art of teaching is only the art of awakening the natural curiosity of young minds for the purpose of satisfying it afterwards.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: If kids come to us from strong, healthy functioning families, it makes our job easier. If they do not come to us from strong, healthy, functioning families, it makes our job more important.
quotes.author: Barbara Colorose

quotes.quote: Teaching is not a lost art, but the regard for it is a lost tradition.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: The man (or woman) who can make hard things easy is the educator.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The test of a good teacher is not how many questions he can ask his pupils that they will answer readily, but how many questions he inspires them to ask him which he finds it hard to answer.
quotes.author: Alice Wellington Rollins

quotes.quote: Teaching kids to count is fine, but teaching them what counts is best.
quotes.author: Bob Talbert

quotes.quote: If we teach today's students as we taught yesterday's, we rob them of tomorrow.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Teaching is the one profession that creates all other professions.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: If a child can't learn the way we teach, maybe we should teach the way they learn.
quotes.author: Ignacio Estrada

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of teachers: the kind that fills you with so much quail shot that you can't move, and the kind that just gives you a little prod behind and you jump to the skies.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The greatest sign of success for a teacher ... is to be able to say, 'The children are now working as if I did not exist.'
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Teams are successful when they are focused, have a short cycle time, and are supported by the executives.
quotes.author: Tom Bouchard

quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Teams are not ends in themselves; they are a means by which to achieve other organizational goals.
quotes.author: Richard Wellins, William Byham, Jeanne Wilson

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a self-made man. You will reach your goals only with the help of others.
quotes.author: George Shinn

quotes.quote: A team is where a boy can prove his courage on his own. A gang is where a coward goes to hide.
quotes.author: Mickey Mantle

quotes.quote: All are one unless and until they are asked to work together to achieve a noble goal one.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: On our own, we are marshmallows and dried spaghetti, but together we can become something bigger.
quotes.author: C.B. Cook

quotes.quote: A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skills of others.
quotes.author: Norman Shidle

quotes.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: A group is a bunch of people in an elevator. A team is a bunch of people in an elevator, but the elevator is broken!
quotes.author: Bonnie Edelstein

quotes.quote: Sometimes being on a team means being humble and putting others first. It has to be about the team and not the individual
quotes.author: Maggie White

quotes.quote: Good teams incorporate teamwork into their culture, creating the building blocks for success.
quotes.author: Ted Sundquist

quotes.quote: Teams, not individuals, are the fundamental learning unit in modern organizations. This is where the "rubber stamp meets the road"; unless teams can learn, the organization cannot learn.
quotes.author: Peter M. Senge

quotes.quote: One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: When a team outgrows individual performance and learns team confidence, excellence becomes a reality.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: Great teams do not hold back with one another. They are unafraid to air their dirty laundry. They admit their mistakes, their weaknesses, and their concerns without fear of reprisal.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: There is no â€˜I' in team but there is in win.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: A successful team is a group of many hands and one mind.
quotes.author: Bill Bethel

quotes.quote: When a gifted team dedicates itself to unselfish trust and combines instinct with boldness and effort, it is ready to climb.
quotes.author: Patanjali

quotes.quote: None of us is as smart as all of us.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: A group becomes a team when each member is sure enough of himself and his contribution to praise the skills of the others.
quotes.author: Norman Shidle

quotes.quote: With an enthusiastic team you can achieve almost anything.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: It is a fact that in the right formation, the lifting power of many wings can achieve twice the distance of any bird flying alone.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If a team is to reach its potential, each player must be willing to subordinate his personal goals to the good of the team.
quotes.author: Bud Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.
quotes.author: Chris Bradford

quotes.quote: What sets apart high-performance teams, however, is the degree of commitment, particularly how deeply committed the members are to one another.

quotes.quote: No matter what accomplishments you make, somebody helped you.

quotes.quote: Respect your fellow human being, treat them fairly, disagree with them honestly, enjoy their friendship, explore your thoughts about one another candidly, work together for a common goal and help one another achieve it.

quotes.quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.

quotes.quote: It takes two flints to make a fire.

quotes.quote: Gettin' good players is easy. Gettin' 'em to play together is the hard part.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: If you can laugh together, you can work together

quotes.quote: A single arrow is easily broken, but not ten in a bundle.

quotes.quote: A leader must inspire or his team will expire

quotes.quote: We must all hang together, or assuredly, we shall all hang separately.

quotes.quote: You don't get harmony when everybody sings the same note.

quotes.quote: None of us is as smart as all of us.

quotes.quote: One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.

quotes.quote: Effective teamwork begins and ends with communication.

quotes.quote: Creating open teamwork is the best way to encourage innovation.

quotes.quote: Teamwork is what makes common people capable of uncommon results.

quotes.quote: Remember teamwork begins by building trust. And the only way to do that is to overcome our need for invulnerability.
quotes.author: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.quote: Teamwork is really a form of trust. It's what happens when you surrender the mistaken idea that you can go it alone and realize that you won't achieve your individual goals without the support of your colleagues.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: Teamwork is neither "good" nor "desirable." It is a fact. Wherever people work together or play together they do so as a team. Which team to use for what purpose is a crucial, difficult and risky decision that is even harder to unmake. Managements have yet to learn how to make it.

quotes.quote: Teamwork represents a set of values that encourage behaviors such as listening and constructively responding to points of view expressed by others, giving others the benefit of the doubt, providing support to those who need it, and recognizing the interests and achievements of others.

quotes.quote: When spider webs unite, they can tie up a lion.
quotes.author: Ethiopian Proverb

quotes.quote: A team effort is a lot of people doing what I say.
quotes.author: Michael Winner

quotes.quote: Whatever we accomplish is due to the combined effort.

quotes.quote: The combined efforts of millions of concerned citizens could do wonders to help the impoverished. The American people are ready for action!
quotes.author: Barbara Boxer

quotes.quote: Teamwork builds trust and trust builds speed.

quotes.quote: Teamwork is the glue which binds losers together.

quotes.quote: Teamwork is not a preference, it is a requirement.

quotes.quote: Teamwork doesn't come naturally. It must be taught.

quotes.quote: TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.

quotes.quote: Great teamwork is the only way we create the breakthroughs that define our careers.

quotes.quote: Teamwork is the best ever investment. If I make 3 and you make 5, together we will not make 8. We will make 15. Leaders build active teams.

quotes.quote: Teamwork requires that everyone's efforts flow in a single direction. Feelings of significance happen when a team's energy takes on a life of its own.

quotes.quote: Teamwork is the foundation of success. The three universal questions that an individual asks of his coach, player, employee, employer are: Can I trust you? Are you committed to excellence? And, do you care about me?

quotes.quote: Teamwork is not a matter of persuading yourself and your colleagues to set aside personal ambitions for the greater good. It's a matter of recognizing that your personal ambitions and the ambitions of the team are one and the same. That's the incentive.

quotes.quote: Teamwork can build friendships that last a lifetime.

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed. It is the only thing that ever has.

quotes.quote: The nicest thing about teamwork is that you always have others on your side.

quotes.quote: In teamwork, silence isn’t golden, it’s deadly.

quotes.quote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.

quotes.quote: We may have all come on different ships, but we’re in the same boat now.

quotes.quote: Good teams incorporate teamwork into their culture, creating the building blocks for success.

quotes.quote: Great teamwork is the only way we create the breakthroughs that define our careers.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: The key elements in the art of working together are how to deal with change, how to deal with conflict, and how to reach our potential the needs of the team are best met when we meet the needs of individual persons.

quotes.quote: And when members of a team have high-quality connections, they may also feel more safety and trust, resulting in greater cooperation and coordination.

I don't feel awful because I have to answer questions about it. I feel awful in that locker room because I could have done something more to help my teammates win.

The toughest part for me is how to keep my teammates accountable but at the same time do it in a loving way that doesnt judge or condemn them. It's definitely been a struggle and I'm trying to learn how to lead consciously in a way that honors God.

quotes.quote: My teammates, they put me on their backs and they wouldn't let me down.

quotes.quote: A tear is made of 1% water and 99% feelings.

quotes.quote: Every tear of sorrow sown by the righteous, springs up a pearl.

quotes.quote: The tears stream down my cheeks from my unblinking eyes. What makes me weep so? There is nothing saddening here. Perhaps it is liquefied brain.

quotes.quote: More tears are shed over answered prayers than unanswered ones.

quotes.quote: And the tear that we shed, though in secret it rolls, Shall long keep his memory green in our souls.

quotes.quote: The tears of those repenting are the wine of angels.

quotes.quote: Tears may soothe the wounds they cannot heal.

quotes.quote: Tears are a good alterative, but a poor diet.

quotes.quote: Our tears fatten upon our memories of joy.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Tears are the natural penalties of pleasure. It is a law that we should pay for all that we enjoy.
quotes.author: William Gilmore Simms

quotes.quote: For every laugh, there should be a tear.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Tears are the badges of sorrow.
quotes.author: Archimedes

quotes.quote: We cannot tear out a single page of our life, but we can throw the whole book in the fire.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: More tears are shed in playhouses than in churches.
quotes.author: Thomas Guthrie

quotes.quote: Tired of feeling lost, tired of letting go Tear the whole world down, tear the whole world down Failure.
quotes.author: Breaking Benjamin

quotes.quote: Let your tears come. Let them water your soul.
quotes.author: Eileen Mayer

quotes.quote: Every tear of sorrow sown by the righteous springs up a pearl.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Tears are words the heart can't express.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: The tears of the world are a constant quantity. For each one who begins to weep somewhere else another stops. The same is true of the laugh.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: Heaven knows we need never be ashamed of our tears, for they are rain upon the blinding dust of earth, overlying our hard hearts. I was better after I had cried, than before--more sorry, more aware of my own ingratitude, more gentle.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: We need never be ashamed of our tears.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Tears of joy are like the summer rain drops pierced by sunbeams.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Tears are God's gift to us. Our holy water. They heal us as they flow.
quotes.author: Rita Schiano

quotes.quote: The soul would have no rainbow had the eyes no tears.
quotes.author: John Vance Cheney

quotes.quote: Tears are the safety valve of the heart when too much pressure is laid on it.
quotes.author: Albert Smith

quotes.quote: Tears are like rain. They loosen up our soil so we can grow in different directions.
quotes.author: Virginia Casey

quotes.quote: Tears are the silent language of grief.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: More tears are shed over answered prayers than unanswered ones.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: A tear dries quickly when it is shed for troubles of others.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Perhaps our eyes need to be washed by our tears once in a while, so that we can see Life with a clearer view again.
quotes.author: Alex Tan

quotes.quote: Tears are the summer showers to the soul.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: Tears are due to human misery.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Tears are sometimes as weighty as words.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Tears are the natural penalties of pleasure. It is a law that we should pay for all that we enjoy.
quotes.author: William Gilmore Simms

quotes.quote: Tears are the symbol of the inability of the soul to restrain its emotion and retain its self command.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Words and tears are nature's most basic ways of helping us release our feelings of suffering.
quotes.author: Hospice of Du Page

quotes.quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting off a little water.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: Invisible tears are the hardest to wipe away. Just let it out, my friend.
quotes.author: Adabella Radici

quotes.quote: Sorrows humanize our race; tears are the showers that fertilize the world.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: What soap is for the body, tears are for the soul.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Repentant tears wash out the stain of guilt.
quotes.author: Saint Aurelius Augustine

quotes.quote: A teardrop on earth summons the King of heaven.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Certainly tears are given to us to use. Like all good gifts, they should be used properly.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: It's not a good idea to take a forecast from someone wearing a tie. If possible, tease people who take themselves and their knowledge too seriously.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: You can tease it's mane all you like, but you can't turn a house cat into a lion.
quotes.author: Anne Fortier

quotes.quote: Kids will tease you for just about anything.
quotes.author: James Badge Dale

quotes.quote: When a guy can make fun of you, thats attractive. Who knew that teasing could have so much power over women!
quotes.author: Rachel Bilson

quotes.quote: To make sense of bossiness, we need to tease apart two fundamental aspects of social hierarchy that are often lumped together: power and status. Power lies in holding a formal position of authority or controlling important resources. Status involves being respected or admired.
quotes.author: Adam Grant

quotes.quote: You have to tease your family. You tease the ones that you're closest to.
quotes.author: Parvesh Cheena

quotes.quote: Some men were nothing but overgrown boys who never got over the "fun" of teasing girls, just to get noticed
quotes.author: Esther M. Friesner

quotes.quote: It's fun to tease people about where fiction and life intersect.
quotes.author: Dorothy Allison

quotes.quote: A man might engage in flirtation with distinterest, even disdain. But he never teases without affection.
quotes.author: Tessa Dare

quotes.quote: He who makes fun of a short and fat man's weight is much less cruel than he who makes fun of his height.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Teasing out the way the world might look through another's eyes is what makes the creative process so fascinating and enjoyable.
quotes.author: Stephen L. Carter

quotes.quote: Teasing is very often a sign of inner misery.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Never tease an old dog; he might have one bite left.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: You can cease to be influenced by people who tease you... Just neglect their helps and elevate your steps... You can do it!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Before you make fun of someone, think about how you'd feel in their place. You shouldn't laugh, tease, or make fun of anyone.
quotes.author: Chris Poulos

quotes.quote: Listen, you only tease the ones you love.
quotes.author: John Boehner

quotes.quote: You have to tease enough misinformation and lack of information to hopefully make people want more.
quotes.author: Cary Fukunaga

quotes.quote: We tease each other, knock down each other, irritate each other, but can't live without each other.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: All of us need to be in touch with a mysterious, tantalizing source of inspiration that teases our sense of wonder and goads us on to life's next adventure.
quotes.author: Rob Brezsny

quotes.quote: People always tease me. They say, look at you, you went for so much psychoanalysis and you're so neurotic, you wind up marrying a girl so much younger than you.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Thou, silent form, dost tease us out of thought As doth eternity.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Everything starts with a dream, a particle of our imagination that teases us of what the future could be like, as long as we fight for it.
quotes.author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quotes.quote: What brothers say to tease their sisters has nothing to do with what they really think of them.
quotes.author: Esther M. Friesner

quotes.quote: The still must tease with the promise of a story the viewer of it itches to be told.
quotes.author: Cindy Sherman

quotes.quote: It's good to fight with your brothers, and it's good to tease them to give them advice.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: To please them, don't tease them; first seize them, then squeeze them.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: How do you defend yourself against that when someone is using it to tease you? Laugh factor: None.
quotes.author: Robert Hoge

quotes.quote: I might be teased. But I survived that first day unscathed, and returned home happy and excited.
quotes.author: Robert Hoge

quotes.quote: Teasing and all the fun words we tend to use are embedded in attraction.
quotes.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

quotes.quote: Teasing me with glimpses of the future / They shine so bright in the mist of darkness / Nearer and nearer almost there / I can almost touch them from here/Glowing lights / My future
quotes.author: Janice Harris

quotes.quote: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Our technological powers increase, but the side effects and potential hazards also escalate.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: Technology gives us power, but it does not and cannot tell us how to use that power. Thanks to technology, we can instantly communicate across the world, but it still doesn't help us know what to say.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.quote: Technological progress has merely provided us with more efficient means for going backwards.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Technology... is a queer thing. It brings you great gifts with one hand, and it stabs you in the back with the other.
quotes.author: Carrie Snow

quotes.quote: Technology is a gift of God. After the gift of life it is perhaps the greatest of God's gifts. It is the mother of civilizations, of arts and of sciences.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: Technology is always a two-edged sword. It will bring in many benefits, but also many disasters.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for Nature cannot be fooled.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: Technology is making gestures precise and brutal, and with them men.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Technological society has succeeded in multiplying the opportunities for pleasure, but it has great difficulty in generating joy.
quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

quotes.quote: Technology...the knack of so arranging the world that we don't have to experience it.
quotes.author: Max Frisch

quotes.quote: Technology is so much fun but we can drown in our technology. The fog of information can drive out knowledge.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: The Internet is so big, so powerful and pointless that for some people it is a complete substitute for life.
quotes.author: Andrew Brown

quotes.quote: You affect the world by what you browse.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: Technology is a word that describes something that doesn't work yet.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Technology made large populations possible; large populations now make technology indispensable.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: So much technology, so little talent.
quotes.author: Vernor Vinge

quotes.quote: The ultimate promise of technology is to make us master of a world that we command by the push of a button.
quotes.author: Volker Grassmuck

quotes.quote: Technology is the campfire around which we tell our stories.
quotes.author: Laurie Anderson

quotes.quote: Once a new technology rolls over you, if you're not part of the steamroller, you're part of the road.
quotes.author: Stewart Brand

quotes.quote: Technology presumes there's just one right way to do things and there never is.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: If we continue to develop our technology without wisdom or prudence, our servant may prove to be our executioner.
quotes.author: Omar N. Bradley

quotes.quote: Technology has to be invented or adopted.
quotes.author: Jared Diamond

quotes.quote: All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.quote: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
quotes.author: Christian Lous Lange

quotes.quote: Technology is anything that wasn't around when you were born.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: Technology will definitely solve all our problems, but in the process it will create brand new ones. But that's O.K. because the most you can expect from life is to get to solve better and better problems.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Technology is teaching us to be human again.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: Most people, almost everyone knows of a teen mom. Teen pregnancy rates are growing, and we need to bring awareness to that.
quotes.author: Madisen Beaty

quotes.quote: If adolescent pregnancy prevention is to become a priority, then our strategy, as advocates, must contain two key elements: civic engagement and education.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: Teen pregnancy went way down in the '90s, and 75 percent of it was because of increased use of contraception.
quotes.author: Al Franken

quotes.quote: Just saying no prevents teenage pregnancy the way 'Have a nice day' cures chronic depression.
quotes.author: Faye Wattleton

quotes.quote: I'm so fascinated by the concept of teen pregnancy for some reason. Not that I condone it or promote it, but it's just a very real thing in our country and culture.
quotes.author: Leven Rambin

quotes.quote: If pregnancy were a book they would cut the last two chapters.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: I am not finding pregnancy much of a joy. I am afraid of childbirth, but I am afraid I can't find a way of avoiding it.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: It's normal to gain weight during pregnancy. It's something that has to happen to your body.
quotes.author: Carnie Wilson

quotes.quote: Whether your pregnancy was meticulously planned, medically coaxed, or happened by surprise, one thing is certain - your life will never be the same.
quotes.author: Catherine Jones

quotes.quote: For many women - myself included - pregnancy brings on tremendous anxiety and confusion, along with the joy.
quotes.author: Emily Oster

quotes.quote: The thing that's nice about pregnancy is that in the end, you have a baby.
quotes.author: Ann Romney

quotes.quote: Going into a pregnancy is a really challenging time for a woman,because it's forever-changing, both mentally and physically.
quotes.author: Brooke Burke

quotes.quote: I don't particularly like being pregnant. I like the baby at the end. Pregnancy is a very distant thing for me. I can't seem to believe there's really a baby there. It's such a miracle.
quotes.author: Mary Beth Whitehead

quotes.quote: Pregnancy seemed like a tremendous abdication of control. Something growing inside you which would eventually usurp your life.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a process that invites you to surrender to the unseen force behind all life.
quotes.author: Judy Ford

quotes.quote: Let us make pregnancy an occasion when we appreciate our female bodies.
quotes.author: Merete Leonhardt-Lupa

quotes.quote: Part of being a parent is rolling with the punches, so consider an unexpected pregnancy the universe's way of helping you to learn to do that.
quotes.author: Heather Wittenberg

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is getting company inside one's skin.
quotes.author: Maggie Scarf

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a disease from which you recover in 18 years and 9 months.
quotes.author: Carrie Latet

quotes.quote: I think that what scares me more than getting fat during pregnancy is the responsibility of a child.
quotes.author: Carol Alt

quotes.quote: Unplanned pregnancy is an equal-opportunity affliction.
quotes.author: Ann McLane Kuster

quotes.quote: Pregnancy changed my body; it changed the way I walk.
quotes.author: Andie MacDowell

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is a very creative phase for me.
quotes.author: Natalie Massenet

quotes.quote: It's amazing, the mentality shift that occurs in pregnancy. All of a sudden you want to be good to yourself.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Hasselbeck

quotes.quote: A wanted pregnancy as much as a dreaded pregnancy can play differently than all one's previous imaginings.
quotes.author: Susie Orbach

quotes.quote: In pregnancy, there are two bodies, one inside the other. Two people live under one skin. When so much of life is dedicated to maintaining our integrity as distinct beings, this bodily tandem is an uncanny fact.
quotes.author: Joan Raphael-Leff

quotes.quote: A woman experiencing an unplanned pregnancy also deserves to experience unplanned joy.
quotes.author: Patricia Heaton

quotes.quote: For too many women pregnancy is just the start of loneliness and abuse. It is a cruel reality.
quotes.author: Fay Ripley

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is something that I always love. It's about hope and the future and a new baby.
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.quote: I never ever slept again after my first pregnancy.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.quote: As a teenager you are at the last stage in your life when you will be happy to hear that the phone is for you.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: When you are in your teenage years you are consciously experiencing everything for the first time, so adolescent stories are all beginnings. There are never any endings.
quotes.author: Aidan Chambers

quotes.quote: Young people are in a condition like permanent intoxication, because youth is sweet and they are growing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The area of teenage life is not necessarily rarefied; we've all gone through that period. It's not as rarefied as a western or a space adventure or a gangster film, but it has its own dynamic.
quotes.author: Gus Van Sant

quotes.quote: The young always have the same problem how to rebel and conform at the same time. They have now solved this by defying their parents and copying one another.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: One of the cruelties of teenagehood is that you’ll never know what your parents were really like at your age, and they’ll never accurately remember.
quotes.author: Una LaMarche

quotes.quote: She wanted to go back. She wanted to be a little girl again, the one who thought getting high meant being pushed on the swing and pain was falling off her bike.
quotes.author: Amy Zhang

quotes.quote: I try not to change, but I keep changing in all these tiny ways. I get a girlfriend. I have a beer. And every freaking time, I have to reintroduce myself to the universe all over again.
quotes.author: Becky Albertalli

quotes.quote: Anybody who has a problem with 'Skins' obviously doesn't understand teenage life.
quotes.author: Nicholas Hoult

quotes.quote: Drama, lies, tears...teenage years.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love being a teen because you don't have all the responsibilities of an adult yet.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gillies

quotes.quote: Teens think listening to music helps them concentrate. It doesn't. It relieves them of the boredom that concentration on homework induces.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: I don't know what better teenage life you could get than going around the world doing what you love to do.
quotes.author: Anna Kournikova

quotes.quote: Teenage life - possibly adult life too is all about what you want and can't have. And then about what you receive and misuse.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lethem

quotes.quote: Live your life like you are 80 years old looking back on your teenage years.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Teenagers complain there's nothing to do, then stay out all night doing it
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: Don't laugh at a youth for his affectations; he is only trying on one face after another to find a face of his own.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: How strange that the young should always think the world is against them - when in fact that is the only time it is for them.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Teenagehood -- that time in life when you show your individuality by looking like everyone else.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The donning of the ear buds marks the beginning of teen life, when children set off on their own for the passage through adolescence.
quotes.author: Amity Shlaes

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: In the time it takes you to understand a 14-year-old, he turns 15.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: It's difficult to decide whether growing pains are something teenagers have or are.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I think the hardest part about being a teenager is dealing with other teenagers - the criticism and the ridicule, the gossip and rumors.
quotes.author: Beverly Mitchell

quotes.quote: I haven't really forgotten what it's like to be a teenager and how much it sucked.
quotes.author: Ben Weasel

quotes.quote: A teenager is always too tired to hold a dishcloth, but never too tired to hold a phone.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I mean, really. Who sends their kid to boarding school? It’s so Hogwarts. Only mine doesn’t have cute boy wizards or magic candy or flying lessons.
quotes.author: Stephanie Perkins

quotes.quote: I wonder what it’s like to have that much power over a boy. I don’t think I’d want it; it’s a lot of responsibility to hold a person’s heart in your hands.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: Good habits formed at youth make all the difference.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: No boy is worth your teenage years!.
quotes.author: Hayley Williams

quotes.quote: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: Young love is a flame; very pretty, often very hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. The love of the older and disciplined heart is as coals, deep-burning, unquenchable.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: That amazing moment when your crush has a crush on you. It's a wonderful feeling knowing that the person who you want to be in a relationship with likes or loves you back.
quotes.author: Morgan Pierce

quotes.quote: If you make a girl laugh, she likes you. If you make a girl cry, she loves you...
quotes.author: Melchor Lim

quotes.quote: Just thinking about you brings a smile to face, a twinkle to my eye, and a skipped beat to my heart.
quotes.author: Ash Sweeney

quotes.quote: Too many adults wish to 'protect' teenagers when they should be stimulating them to read of life as it is lived.
quotes.author: Margaret A. Edwards

quotes.quote: For the record, I would like to point out that it is NOT being obsessive to memorize a boy's schedule so that you can accidentally bump into him. It is called being efficient.
quotes.author: Jess Rothenberg

quotes.quote: The young habitually mistake lust for love, they're infested with idealism of all kinds.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Talk not of wasted affection; affection never was wasted.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Love, free as air at sight of human ties, Spreads his light wings, and in a moment flies.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
quotes.author: Charles Augustin Sainte-Beuve

quotes.quote: The magic of first love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: No, this trick won't work...How on earth are you ever going to explain in terms of chemistry and physics so important a biological phenomenon as first love?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: To the world you may be just one person, but to one person you may be the world.
quotes.author: Brandi Snyder

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a mans last romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Every man is thoroughly happy twice in his life: just after he has met his first love, and just after he has left his last one
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: The minute I heard my first love story I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
quotes.author: Jalal ad-Din Rumi

quotes.quote: I maybe had a first love and had my heart broken, but reflecting on it, I don't think that was love. I think as I'm getting older and having more in-depth relationships, maybe I'll experience it. At the moment, I don't know, exactly, if I've been in love.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: My first love, I'll never forget, and it's such a big part of who I am, and in so many ways, we could never be together, but that doesn't mean that it's not forever. Because it is forever.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.quote: The loss of young first love is so painful that it borders on the ludicrous.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We are never so helplessly unhappy as when we lose love.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Love is indescribable and unconditional. I could tell you a thousand things that it is not, but not one that it is.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: The moment you have in your heart this extraordinary thing called love and feel the depth, the delight, the ecstasy of it, you will discover that for you the world is transformed.
quotes.author: J. Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: I'm so in love, every time I look at you my soul gets dizzy
quotes.author: Jaesse Tyler

quotes.quote: We're a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness and call it love true love.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Love is missing someone whenever you're apart, but somehow feeling warm inside because you're close in heart.
quotes.author: Kay Knudsen

quotes.quote: Telling a teenager the facts of life is like giving a fish a bath.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Arguing with a teenager is like wrestling in the mud with a pig. Sooner or later you figure out that they're enjoying it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In order to be successful, Teenagers need to be practical as challenges they are faceing in modern life are numerous and complex.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: I think the hardest part about being a teenager is dealing with other teenagers - the criticism and the ridicule, the gossip and rumors.
quotes.author: Beverley Mitchell

quotes.quote: Keeping that communication channel open with your teen is one of the most important things as a parent you can do.
quotes.author: C Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Teenagers who are never required to vacuum are living in one.
quotes.author: Fred G. Gosman

quotes.quote: Raising teenagers is like nailing Jell-o to a tree.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fantasy is literature for teenagers.
quotes.author: V. S. Naipaul

quotes.quote: A teenager out of sight is like a kite in the clouds; even though you can't see it you feel the tug on the string.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.quote: When your children are teenagers, it's important to have a dog so that someone in the house is happy to see you.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Teenagers are like people who express a burning desire to be different by dressing exactly alike.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Teenagers want to be able to fight for what's right - but finding out what's right is now 90 percent of the battle.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: Teenagers are free verse walking around on two legs.
quotes.author: Dorothy Allison

quotes.quote: Teenagers come to things fresh and can really teach us an awful lot.
quotes.author: Jane Goldman

quotes.quote: Remember that as a teenager you are at the last stage of your life when you will be happy to hear that the phone is for you.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Heredity is what sets the parents of a teenager wondering about each other.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: If you want to recapture your youth, just cut off his allowance.
quotes.author: Al Bernstein

quotes.quote: I tell my child, if I seem obsessed to always know where you've been, it is because my DNA will be found at the scene.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Us teenagers are at the perfect crossroads of childish naivete and adult realism -- we still believe that problems can be solved, and now we also have the tools and knowledge to solve them
quotes.author: Adora Svitak

quotes.quote: How strange that the young should always think the world is against them when in fact that is the only time it is for them.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Small children disturb your sleep, big children your life.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: Research shows that parents are the single biggest influence on children - if you are worried about your teen and drugs, talk to them.
quotes.author: John Walters

quotes.quote: I don't know what better teenage life you could get than going around the world doing what you love to do.
quotes.author: Anna Kournikova

quotes.quote: Teenagers only have to focus on themselves - its not until we get older that we realize that other people exist.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lawrence

quotes.quote: Being a teen can be tough. Just try to surround yourself with really good friends that really have your back and also be a really good friend to those who really care about you. If you're not sure about certain things talk to your friends that you trust and your family.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.quote: Teenagers complain there's nothing to do, then stay out all night doing it.
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: As a teenager, you're still discovering who you are, what your life is about, and who you want to be as a person. It's very intense.
quotes.author: Kaya Scodelario

quotes.quote: Being a teenager and figuring out who you are is hard enough without someone attacking you.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: If you liked being a teenager, there's something really wrong with you.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The interior of a teenager's mind is an endless war between Stupid and Clever.
quotes.author: William Landay

quotes.quote: You don't have to brush your teeth â€” just the ones you want to keep.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes, getting up in the morning and brushing your teeth is the hardest part of the day - it all just hurts.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.quote: An aching tooth is better out than in. To lose a rotting member is a gain.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.quote: The teeth of self-pity had gnawed away her essential self.
quotes.author: Willa Gibbs

quotes.quote: Nature is full of teeth that come in one by one, then decay, fall out
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: His smile bore the same relation to a real smile as false teeth do to real teeth .
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Teeth aren't pearly, until you smile.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Dentists tell you not to pick your teeth with any sharp metal object. Then you sit in their chair and the first thing they grab is an iron hook.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: You ever tried to pick up your teeth with a bunch of broken fingers
quotes.author: Triple H
