quotes.quote: For loose teeth the tooth fairy recommends tying your tooth to a brick and throwing said brick down the stairs.
quotes.author: Nicole McKay

quotes.quote: The world had teeth and it could bite you with them anytime it wanted.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Truth has sharp teeth, so do not expect anything beautiful (to see) when it smiles to you.
quotes.author: Rastko Petrović

quotes.quote: Don't let your teeth make you lose respect by permanently keeping them opened for the sake of being friendly.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: And truths, these days, are spokenThe same way promises are made,With gritted teeth and crossed fingers.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: Mouth of teeth on him like a vandalised graveyard but we all have our crosses.
quotes.author: Kevin Barry

quotes.quote: Every time you get the world by the tail, she thought, you gotta remember there's teeth on the other end
quotes.author: Sharon Lee

quotes.quote: His teeth sang in their individual sockets like tuning forks, each one pitch-perfect and clear as ethanol.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: Let us have a dagger between our teeth, a bomb in our hands, and an infinite scorn in our hearts.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: Just be sure you brush your teeth tonight. Morning breath is a fresh sea breeze compared to the hellitosis of blood breath.
quotes.author: Jaye Wells

quotes.quote: No matter what all your teeth and wet fingers anticipated, there was no accounting for the way that simple joy could shake you.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: If you grit your teeth and show real determination, you'll always have a chance.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Teeth are alive, and given the proper environment, they can regenerate; this is why internal factors that nourish the teeth are so important.
quotes.author: Nadine Artemis

quotes.quote: A man begins cutting his wisdom teeth the first time he bites off more than he can chew.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.quote: There were no words, and no movements but the tearing of teeth and claws.
quotes.author: William Golding

quotes.quote: There are people who laugh to show their fine teeth; and there are those who cry to show their good hearts.
quotes.author: Philibert Joseph Roux

quotes.quote: Take the tale in your teeth, then, and bite till the blood runs, hoping it's not poison.
quotes.author: Ursula K Le Guin

quotes.quote: If you are capable of brushing your teeth in mindfulness, then you will be able to enjoy the time when you take a shower, cook your breakfast, sip your tea.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The tongue hardly quarrels with the teeth even though they both live together. Let us as humans learn to live together because there is enough space for everyone to survive in life
quotes.author: Emmanuel Moore Abolo

quotes.quote: Teeth hadst thou in thy head when thou wast born, To signify thou camest to bite the world.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: All their teeth are yellow. No tooth-brush ever entered that convent. Brushing one's teeth is at the top of a ladder at whose bottom is the loss of one's soul.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Utility is when you have one telephone, luxury is when you have two, opulence is when you have three - and paradise is when you have none.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: The telephone is a good way to talk to people without having to offer them a drink.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: The news of life is carried via telephone. A baby's birth, a couple engaged, a tragic car accident on a late night highway - most milestones of the human journey, good or bad, are foreshadowed by the sound of a ringing.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: You should not be a slave to your telephone. The technology is there to serve you, not the other way around.
quotes.author: Martin Cooper

quotes.quote: The telephone was not his favorite object, and more than once he had considered getting rid of his. What he disliked most of all was its tyranny. Not only did it have the power to interrupt him against his will, but inevitably he would give in to its command.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: The telephone and visitors are the work destroyers.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The telephone is the greatest nuisance among conveniences, the greatest convenience among nuisances.
quotes.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quotes.quote: The telephone, which interrupts the most serious conversations and cuts short the most weighty observations, has a romance of its own.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Today the telephone takes precedence over everything. It reaches a point of terrorism, particularly at dinnertime.
quotes.author: Niels Diffrient

quotes.quote: The day will come when the man at the telephone will be able to see the distant person to whom he is speaking.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: The telephone is virtual reality in that you can meet with someone as if you are together, at least for the auditory sense.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.quote: I have always been allergic to telephones. As far as I am concerned, they are very seldom time-savers and very often the destroyers of schedules.
quotes.author: Frances Parkinson Keyes

quotes.quote: People used what they called a telephone because they hated being close together and they were scared of being alone.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Every time the telephone rings, you feel a frisson of excitement. The call is almost never exciting, but it is in our character to keep on believing.
quotes.author: Chloe Thurlow

quotes.quote: I thought talk was cheap until I saw our telephone bill.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: The telephone becomes an instrument of torture in the demonic hands of a beloved who doesn't call.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: I don't answer the phone. I get the feeling whenever I do that there will be someone on the other end.
quotes.author: Fred Couples

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a phone call in the night: first the ring, and then you wake up.
quotes.author: Evelyn Hendrickson

quotes.quote: The telephone is the most important single technological resource of later life.
quotes.author: Alex Comfort

quotes.quote: The telephone is the greatest single enemy of scholarship; for what our intellectual forebears used to inscribe in ink now goes once over a wire into permanent oblivion.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: We listen too much to the telephone and too little to nature. The wind is one of my sounds. A lonely sound, perhaps, but soothing.
quotes.author: Andre Kostelanetz

quotes.quote: Many a man wishes he were strong enough to tear a telephone book in half-especially if he has a teenage daughter.
quotes.author: Guy Lombardo

quotes.quote: The great advantage [the telephone] possesses over every other form of electrical apparatus consists in the fact that it requires no skill to operate the instrument.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: The telephone will be used to inform people that a telegram has been sent.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Television is a populous, derivative, democratic medium.
quotes.author: Dan Harmon

quotes.quote: Television is a medium because anything well done is rare.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: Television is like the invention of indoor plumbing. It didn't change people's habits. It just kept them inside the house.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Television probably has become the most evocative, widely observed signpost we have.
quotes.author: Robert Adams

quotes.quote: Today, watching television often means fighting, violence and foul language â€“ and that's just deciding who gets to hold the remote control.
quotes.author: Donna Gephart

quotes.quote: Television is the triumph of machine over people.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: Good journalism, good television, can make our world a better place.
quotes.author: Christiane Amanpour

quotes.quote: Television is an instrument which can paralyze this country.
quotes.author: William Westmoreland

quotes.quote: Television could perform a great service in mass education, but there's no indication its sponsors have anything like this on their minds.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: Television has proved that people will look at anything rather than each other.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Television provides the opportunity for an ongoing story, the opportunity to meld the cast and the characters and a world, and to spend more time there.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Television is more interesting than people.Â  If it were not, we should have people standing in the corners of our rooms.Â
quotes.author: ALAN COREN

quotes.quote: Television enjoys a de facto monopoly on what goes into the heads of a significant part of the population and what they think.
quotes.author: Pierre Bourdieu

quotes.quote: Network television has been attempting to lure viewers for years with its low-interest programming only to have those viewers discover later that their brains are bankrupt.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: All television is educational television. The question is: what is it teaching?
quotes.author: Nicholas Johnson

quotes.quote: TelevisionÂ is the most perfect democracy. You sit there with your remote control and vote.
quotes.author: Aaron Brown

quotes.quote: Television is a gold goose that lays scrambled eggs; and it is futile and probably fatal to beat it for not laying caviar.
quotes.author: Lee Loevinger

quotes.quote: Television has done much for psychiatry by spreading information about it, as well as contributing to the need for it.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Television has made dictatorship impossible, but democracy unbearable.
quotes.author: Shimon Peres

quotes.quote: Television contracts the imagination and radio expands it.
quotes.author: Terry Wogan

quotes.quote: Television is simply automated daydreaming.
quotes.author: Lee Loevinger

quotes.quote: Television is like the American toaster, you push the button and the same thing pops up everytime.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Television is chewing gum for the eyes.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Television has been the single greatest shaper of emptiness.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: The most corrosive piece of technology that I've ever seen is called television â€“ but then again, television, at its best, is magnificent.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Television is by nature the dominator drug par excellence. Control of content, uniformity of content, repeatability of content make it inevitably a tool of coercion, brainwashing, and manipulation.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: All you see on television are debased images.
quotes.author: Prince Rogers Nelson

quotes.quote: In television, everything is gone with the speed of light, literally. It is no field for anybody with intimations of immortality.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: Television is actually closer to reality than anything in books. The madness of TV is the madness of human life.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: It is hard to believe that a man is telling the truth when you know that you would lie if you were in his place.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: If you tell the truth you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Make yourself an honest man, and then you may be sure there is one less rascal in the world.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Honesty is the rarest wealth anyone can possess, and yet all the honesty in the world ain't lawful tender for a loaf of bread.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: I never lie because I don't fear anyone. You only lie when you're afraid.
quotes.author: John Gotti

quotes.quote: The Five Levels of Truth-Telling: First, you tell the truth to yourself about yourself. Then you tell the truth to yourself about another. At the third level, you tell the truth about yourself to another. Then you tell your truth about another to that other. And finally, you tell the truth to everyone about everything.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: No legacy is so rich as Honesty.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Truth is generally the best vindication against slander.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Truth is such a rare thing, it is delighted to tell it.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: When in doubt, tell the Truth.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you wish to astonish the whole world, tell the simple truth.
quotes.author: Rahel

quotes.quote: A truth that's told with bad intent beats all the lies you can invent.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The truth will set you free, but first it will make you miserable.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.quote: Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you.
quotes.author: Stephanie Klein

quotes.quote: Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Truthful lips endure forever, but a lying tongue is but for a moment.
quotes.author: Proverbs 12:19

quotes.quote: These are the things that you shall do: Speak the truth to one another; render in your gates judgments that are true and make for peace;
quotes.author: Zechariah 8:16

quotes.quote: Rather, speaking the truth in love, we are to grow up in every way into him who is the head, into Christ,
quotes.author: Ephesians 4:15

quotes.quote: Therefore, having put away falsehood, let each one of you speak the truth with his neighbor, for we are members one of another.
quotes.author: Ephesians 4:25

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to raise your voice for honesty and truth and compassion against injustice and lying and greed. If people all over the world would do this, it would change the earth.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: When a woman tells the truth, she creates the possibility for more truth around her.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: Honesty is more than not lying. It is truth telling, truth speaking, truth living, and truth loving.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Proclaim the truth and do not be silent through fear.
quotes.author: Catherine Of Siena

quotes.quote: But I suppose the most revolutionary act one can engage in is to tell the truth.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: I would rather be blamed for telling the truththan freed for telling a lie.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: It is an occupational hazard that anyone who has spent her life learning how to lie eventually becomes bad at telling the truth.
quotes.author: Hussein Nishah

quotes.quote: I dont think theres anything wrong with telling the truth. I know it isnt fashionable.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: Integrity is telling myself the truth. And honesty istelling the truth to other people.
quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

quotes.quote: In a time of universal deceit - telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Tell the truth boldly, whether it hurts or not. Never pander to weakness. If truth is too much for intelligent people and sweeps them away, let them go; the sooner the better.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: We are only the temporary custodians of the particles which we are made of. They will go on to lead a future existence in the enormous universe that made them
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: What happens outwardly in your life is not as important as what happens inside you. Your circumstances are temporary, but your character will last forever.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: One of the most common causes of failure is the habit of quitting when one is overtaken by temporary defeat.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Forget about the consequences of failure. Failure is only a temporary change in direction to set you straight for your next success.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary; the evil it does is permanent.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: One of the best temporary cures for pride and affection is seasickness; a man who wants to vomit never puts on airs.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Happiness is just an illusion caused by the temporary absence of reality.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Love is a temporary insanity curable by marriage or by removal of the patient from the influences under which he incurred the disorder.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Those who would give up essential liberty, to purchase a little temporary safety, deserve neither liberty nor safety.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Afflictive emotions - our jealousy, anger, hatred, fear - can be put to an end. When you realize that these emotions are only temporary, that they always pass on like clouds in the sky, you also realize they can ultimately be abandoned.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: There's not a single thing on offer in this all-too-temporary world for which you should ever sell your soul.
quotes.author: Alan Keyes

quotes.quote: Success is always temporary. When all is said and done, the only thing you'll have left is your character.
quotes.author: Vince Gill

quotes.quote: We have all encountered some failures in our life, but some people became failures because they perceived theirs to be permanent.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Temporary extreme fear while saying the truth is easy to overcome than the perpetual fear of the unspoken truth.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantari

quotes.quote: The real question is why are millions of people so unhappy, so bored, so unfulfilled, that they are willing to drink, snort, inject or inhale any substance that might blot out reality and give them a bit of temporary relief.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The temporary good is enemy to the permanent best.
quotes.author: Bill Wilson

quotes.quote: How satisfying it is to leave a mark on a blank surface. To make a map of my movement - no matter how temporary.
quotes.author: Craig Thompson

quotes.quote: Being temporary doesn't make something matter any less, because the point isn't for how long, the point is that it happened.
quotes.author: Robyn Schneider

quotes.quote: For what is seen is temporary, but what is unseen is eternal.
quotes.author: Jeri Smith-Ready

quotes.quote: Temporary release from work, through vacations, becomes more welcome, more pleasurable, even more necessary, as we grow older.
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Freedom is fragile and must be protected. To sacrifice it, even as a temporary measure, is to betray it.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: Wise are they who have learned these truths: Trouble is temporary. Time is tonic. Tribulation is a test tube.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Temporary madness may be necessary in some cases, to cleanse and renovate the mind; just as a fit of illness is to carry off the humours of the body.
quotes.author: Augustus Hare

quotes.quote: Everything is temporary. Well, except government programs.
quotes.author: Brooke Bida

quotes.quote: Follow the dreams that your heart visualizes, as what you actually see is just an illusion of temporary contentment.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: Passion and satisfaction go hand in hand, and without them, any happiness is only temporary.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The first panacea for a misguided nation is inflation of the currency; the second is war. Both bring a temporary prosperity; both bring a permanent ruin. But both are the refuge of political and economic opportunists.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: All descriptions of reality are temporary hypotheses.
quotes.author: Siddhartha Gautama

quotes.quote: Better to ask the way than go astray.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Bloom where you're planted.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Curiosity killed the cat.
quotes.author: E. O'Neill

quotes.quote: Don't bite off more than you can chew.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Even though you have ten thousand fields, you can eat but one measure of rice a day.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Every man has his price.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Gold is the devil's fishhook.
quotes.author: Italian (on temptation)

quotes.quote: If passion drives, let reason hold the reins.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you don't want trouble, don't go looking for it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's better to find a whole worm in your apple than half a worm.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never pick up what you didn't put down.
quotes.author: Virgin Islander (on temptation)

quotes.quote: Never trouble trouble 'til trouble troubles you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nor eye in a letter, nor hand in a purse, nor ear in the secret of another.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The bigger they are, the harder they fall.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The crow may be caged but his thoughts are in the cornfield.
quotes.author: Belizean (on temptation)

quotes.quote: The devil catches most souls in a golden net.
quotes.author: German (on temptation)

quotes.quote: The devil tempts but doesn't force.
quotes.author: Guyanan

quotes.quote: The grass is always greener in someone else's yard.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is a charm about the forbidden that makes it unspeakably desirable.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The devil doesn't come dressed in a red cape and pointy horns. He comes as everything you've ever wished for.
quotes.author: Tucker Max

quotes.quote: Temptation is the feeling we get when encountered by an opportunity to do what we innately know we shouldn't.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The greatest temptations are not those that solicit our consent to obvious sin, but those that offer us great evils masking as the greatest goods.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Temptation is stronger in the minds of people who are in doubt. Prayer makes it weaker.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Sometimes we have to behave indifferent towards people who proclaim their love to us, just to see if they are really different.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Temptation likes best those who think they have a natural immunity, for it may laugh all the harder when they succumb.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: Temptation is the fire that brings up the scum of the heart.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Every conquering temptation represents a new fund of moral energy. Every trial endured and weathered in the right spirit makes a soul nobler and stronger than it was before.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Temptation is like a knife, that may either cut the meat or the throat of a man; it may be his food or his poison, his exercise or his destruction
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.quote: Some temptations come to the industrious, but all temptations attack the idle.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Temptation wrings integrity even as the thumbscrew twists a man's fingers.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can circumvent or hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: It's the constant andÂ determinedÂ effort that breaks down all resistance, sweeps away all obstacles.
quotes.author: Claude M. Bristol

quotes.quote: The man who isÂ tenaciousÂ of purpose in a rightful cause is not shaken from his firm resolve by the frenzy of his fellow citizens clamoring for what is wrong, or by the tyrant's threatening countenance.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: The will of the strong will never be shaken byÂ doubts of the weak.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's how tenacious you are that will determine your success.
quotes.author: Steve Ballmer

quotes.quote: PersistentÂ people begin their success where others end in failure.
quotes.author: Edward Eggleston

quotes.quote: It is not enough that we do our best; sometimes we must do what is required.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: A small body ofÂ determinedÂ spirits fired by an unquenchable faith in their mission can alter the course of history.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Strong-willed heart attracts.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Tenacity is the ability toÂ hang onÂ when letting go appears most attractive.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People of mediocre ability sometimes achieve outstanding success because they don't know when to quit. Most men succeed because they areÂ determinedÂ to.
quotes.author: George Allan

quotes.quote: If you areÂ determinedÂ enough and willing to pay the price, you can get it done.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: It's not about what you're capable of, it's about what you are willing to endure.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: BeÂ tenacious. Get as much stage time as possible.
quotes.author: Ana Gasteyer

quotes.quote: Tenacious people don't rely on luck, fate, or destiny for their success. And when conditions become difficult, they keep working.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Just remember, you can do anything you set your mind to, but it takes action, perseverance, and facing your fears.
quotes.author: Gillian Anderson

quotes.quote: If we have the courage andÂ tenacityÂ of our forebears, who stood firmly like a rock against the lash of slavery, we shall find a way to do for our day what they did for theirs.
quotes.author: Mary Mcleod Bethune

quotes.quote: Make up your mind that no matter what comes your way, no matter how difficult, no matter how unfair, you will do more than simply survive. You will thrive in spite of it.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: You have to beat your strongest when you're feeling at your weakest.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: To the person with a firm purpose all men and things are servants.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: He who is firm in will molds the world to himself.
quotes.author: Johann Gottlieb Fichte

quotes.quote: You need to believe in yourself and what you do. Be tenacious and genuine.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: Tenacity is not about avoiding being overwhelmed but being indomitable in the face of the overwhelming odds of your venture's failure.
quotes.author: Andy Dunn

quotes.quote: Tenacity isn't just the most important thing,Â it's the only thing.
quotes.author: Mavis Leno

quotes.quote: AÂ determinedÂ soul will do more with a rusty monkey wrench than a loafer will accomplish with all the tools in a machine shop.
quotes.author: Robert Hughes

quotes.quote: We must remember that oneÂ determinedÂ person can make a significant difference, and that a small group ofÂ determinedÂ people can change the course of history.
quotes.author: Sonia Johnson

quotes.quote: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: To succeed in life in today's world, you must have the will and tenacity to finish the job.
quotes.author: Chin-Ning Chu

quotes.quote: To fall is not to fail. To fail is to never fall because I never got up in the first place.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Starting over is opportunity informed by failure, which is opportunity made intelligent.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Embrace who you are and your divine purpose. Identify the barriers in your life, and develop discipline, courage and the strength to permanently move beyond them, and keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: A commitment to never getting knocked down is in reality a decision to never stand up.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Tenacity is the mother of progress.
quotes.author: Valerie M. Hudson

quotes.quote: I really think that success in this field is about tenacity and just sticking with it.
quotes.author: Brent Spiner

quotes.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure , the process is its own reward.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Inspiration leads to invention. Tenacity is the breeding ground for inspiration. There can be no invention in the absence of tenacity.
quotes.author: Momofuku Ando

quotes.quote: To make our way, we must have firm resolve, persistence, tenacity. We must gear ourselves to work hard all the way. We can never let up.
quotes.author: Ralph Bunche

quotes.quote: We have a tenacity and a persistence and patience to stay after it and stay after it and stay after it.
quotes.author: Steve Ballmer

quotes.quote: If your determination is fixed, I do not counsel you to despair. Few things are impossible to diligence and skill. Great works are performed not by strength, but perseverance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Tenacity is when you follow your heart, when the whole world is screaming to get back into your head.
quotes.author: Sonia Choquette

quotes.quote: Do not be sad that all odds are against you; be happy that your real purpose is by you.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: Very few individuals have the tenacity and the love to propel them beyond everything they know and can trust to face the unknown, let alone be absorbed in it.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Courage is not having the strength to go on; it is going on when you don't have the strength.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The more I accomplish, the more I know I'm capable of accomplishing.
quotes.author: Tawny Lara

quotes.quote: The quality of a good leader therefore is his vision, tenacity, and his capability.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Where there is insistence, there is tenacity and where there is tenacity, there is anguish.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: Sometimes great achievements arrive much later than we expect, but they arrive, and they are great.
quotes.author: Sira Masetti

quotes.quote: There are few things so tender as a man's dignity.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: A light, tender, sensitive touch is worth a ton of brawn.
quotes.author: Peter Thomson

quotes.quote: The tender Mercy of God has given us one another.
quotes.author: Catherine McAuley

quotes.quote: A simple smile, a tender touch, speaks the true language of love.
quotes.author: Dan Fogelberg

quotes.quote: The happiness of the tender heart is increased by what it can take away from the wretchedness of others.
quotes.author: Jean Antoine Petit-Senn

quotes.quote: A tender heart is a wakeful, watchful heart. It watches against sin in the soul, sin in the family, sin in the calling, sin in spiritual duties and performances.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: The cure for tender sensibilities is to make more of our objects and less of ourselves.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: With the tough mind, there must also be a tender heart.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: It is better to have a tender than harden human heart.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Tender are a mother's dreams, But her babe's not what he seems. See him plotting in his mind To grow up some other kind.
quotes.author: Clarence Day

quotes.quote: Tender expressions of love and affection toward children are as much the responsibility of the father as the mother. Tell your children you love them.
quotes.author: Howard W. Hunter

quotes.quote: Tender words we spoke to one another are sealed in the secret vaults of heaven. One day like rain, they will fall to earth and grow green all over the world.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: There is nothing as strong as tenderness, And nothing as tender as true strength.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: Where you are tender, you speak your plural.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: Motherhood is at its best when the tender chords of sympathy have been touched.
quotes.author: Paul P. Harris

quotes.quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Fathers need to be tough and tender...you be tough for your family, be tender with your family. You protect them, and you be a safe place.
quotes.author: Mark Driscoll

quotes.quote: Our hearts grow tender with childhood memories and love of kindred, and we are better throughout the year for having, in spirit, become a child again at Christmas time.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: He who tenders doubtful safety to those in trouble refuses it.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Even the smallest tender mercy can bring peace when recognized and appreciated.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: And I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples and bastards and broken things.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: Just a tender sense of my own process, that holds something of my connection with the divine.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Her tender feet felt as if cut with sharp knives, but she cared not for it; a sharper pang had pierced through her heart.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: No power on earth compares to a mother's tender prayers.
quotes.author: Edwin Arnold

quotes.quote: Be patient with yourself. Self-growth is tender; it's holy ground. There's no greater investment.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Love is a tender plant; when properly nourished, it becomes sturdy and enduring, but neglected it will soon wither and die.
quotes.author: Hugh B. Brown

quotes.quote: True love is deemed to be the most tender of our emotions, as even the blind and deaf know; but I know, what few believe, that true friendship is more tender still.
quotes.author: August von Platen-Hallermunde

quotes.quote: It is in your self-interest to find a way to be very tender.
quotes.author: Jenny Holzer

quotes.quote: If no tender words are spoken, no tender hearts can be broken.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to avoid mentioning things because people's feelings are tender.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: I grew up in east Tennessee, and everybody knew everybody's business.
quotes.author: Kenny Chesney

quotes.quote: I grew up in Tennessee. We didn't know what Louis Vuitton was. I had to order all my prom outfits out of catalogs.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: In Tennessee where I grew up, there were animals, farms, wagons, mules
quotes.author: Tina Turner

quotes.quote: In Washington I'm thought of as a conservative, but in Tennessee I'm thought of as a Bolshevik.
quotes.author: Howard Baker

quotes.quote: Ooooh, I love Nashville! It seems like everywhere you walk, there's great music coming out of every wall.
quotes.author: Imelda May

quotes.quote: In Nashville, if people don't like someone, they say, 'I don't really like him,' then add, 'bless his heart.' In Hollywood, they kind of leave that last part off.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: What you need for breakfast, they say in East Tennessee, is a jug of good corn liquor, a thick steak and a hound dog. Then you feed the steak to the dog.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: We are famous for our three grand divisions of East, Middle and West Tennessee, represented by the three stars on our flag. It is important however to remember that the blue circle around the three stars on our flag represents the unity of our state. I believe that Tennesseans have much more that unites us than divides us.
quotes.author: Bill Lee

quotes.quote: I love Memphis, I guess you could say, in the way that you love a brother even if he does sometimes puzzle and sadden and frustrate you. Say what you want about it, it's an authentic place. I was born and raised in Memphis, and no matter where I go, Memphis belongs to me, and I to it.
quotes.author: Hampton Sides

quotes.quote: Many cities make music, but no city breathes music quite like Memphis. The songs and sounds that come from here are uniquely American.
quotes.author: Shawn Amos

quotes.quote: I placed a jar in Tennessee and round it was upon a hill.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: I come from this really small town near Nashville, Tennessee, where everything was la-di-da and normal.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.quote: In Tennessee where I grew up, there were animals, farms, wagons, mules.
quotes.author: Tina Turner

quotes.quote: I was one of the first three black students to go to an all-white school in Tennessee.
quotes.author: Gil Scott-Heron

quotes.quote: Tennessee is a program that I thought had a lot of tradition. A program that I thought stood for something.
quotes.author: Booger McFarland

quotes.quote: We in Tennessee know that low taxes, less government, and less spending are the ways to grow our economy.
quotes.author: Marsha Blackburn

quotes.quote: I love Tennessee, but they don't have the pine trees and the sandy soil and the black water that I grew up around.
quotes.author: Josh Turner

quotes.quote: Growing up on a mountain in Tennessee, I spent most of my childhood outside.
quotes.author: Rachel Boston

quotes.quote: I have a lot of friends who, especially in Tennessee, were looking forward to getting married who wanted to wait until it was legal in the state that they live in to get married.
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.quote: I am humbled by the opportunity to serve the people of West Tennessee, but I never intended to become a career politician.
quotes.author: Stephen Fincher

quotes.quote: Obviously I love Nashville, I love Tennessee. It's a great organization to play for.
quotes.author: Marcus Mariota

quotes.quote: Tennessee obviously has a proud history of military service, but unfortunately, that also means that we have lost a lot of people serving the country who are Tennesseans.
quotes.author: Bill Haslam

quotes.quote: As somebody who thinks Tennessee history is important, I want to make certain that's still a part of the curriculum. I think that's critical for the people growing up in our school system.
quotes.author: Bill Haslam

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, I'm certainly hopeful they can leave some time to focus on Tennessee history. But we understand the struggle when it comes to curriculum time and what you just physically don't have time for.
quotes.author: Bill Haslam

quotes.quote: Growing up in east Tennessee gave me my country roots, my twang, and a lot of my stories.
quotes.author: Kelsea Ballerini

quotes.quote: I have a lot of love for Tennessee.
quotes.author: Derrick Henry

quotes.quote: I grew up in east Tennessee, and everybody knew everybody's business.
quotes.author: Kenny Chesney

quotes.quote:
"What you need for breakfast, they say in East Tennessee, is a jug of good corn liquor, a thick steak and a hound dog. Then you feed the steak to the dog.
What you need for breakfast, they say in East Tennessee, is a jug of good corn liquor, a thick steak and a hound dog. Then you feed the steak to the dog.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: It did not give of bird or bush, Like nothing else in Tennessee.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Is that thy answer, strong and free, O loyal heart of Tennessee? What strange, glad voice is that which calls
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: In tennis, it is not the opponent you fear, it is the failure itself, knowing how near you were but just out of reach.
quotes.author: Andy Murray

quotes.quote: Tennis is mostly mental. Of course, you must have a lot of physical skill but you can't play tennis well and not be a good thinker. You win or lose the match before you even go out there.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Tennis is a perfect combination of violent action taking place in an atmosphere of total tranquility.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: The depressing thing about tennis is that no matter how good I get, I'll never be as good as a wall.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Tennis taught me so many lessons in life. One of the things it taught me is that every ball that comes to me, I have to make a decision. I have to accept responsibility for the consequences every time I hit a ball.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: The next point - that's all you must think about.
quotes.author: Rod Laver

quotes.quote: Tennis is the loneliest sport
quotes.author: Andre Agassi

quotes.quote: What matters isn't how well you play when you're playing well. What matters is how well you play when you're playing badly.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: Speed in tennis is a strange mixture of intuition, guesswork, footwork and hair-trigger reflexes. Many of the players famed for quickness on court would finish dead last in a field of schoolgirls in a race over any distance more than ten yards.
quotes.author: Eugene Scott

quotes.quote: It's difficult for most people to imagine the creative process in tennis. Seemingly, it's just an athletic manner of hitting the bal consistently well within the boundaries of the court. That analysis is just as specious as thinking that the difficulty in portraying King Lear on stage is learning all the lines.
quotes.author: Virginia Wade

quotes.quote: Tennis uses the language of life. Advantage, service, fault, break, love, the basic elements of tennis are those of everyday existence, because every match is a life in miniature.
quotes.author: Andre Agassi

quotes.quote: What is the single most important quality in a tennis champion? I would have to say desire, staying in there and winning matches when you are not playing that well.
quotes.author: John McEnroe

quotes.quote: That's what you do all the hard work for, to play in situations that put your body through gruelling times. If you're not up to it, pull out.
quotes.author: Lleyton Hewitt

quotes.quote: What a polite game tennis is. The chief word in it seems to be 'sorry' and admiration of each other's play crosses the net as frequently as the ball.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Tennis belongs to the individualistic past - a hero, or at most a pair of friends or lovers, against the world.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: The serve was invented so that the net could play.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Tennis is more than just a sport. It's an art, like the ballet. Or like a performance in the theater. When I step on the court I feel like Anna Pavlova. Or like Adelina Patti. Or even like Sarah Bernhardt. I see the footlights in front of me. I hear the whisperings of the audience. I feel an icy shudder. Win or die! Now or never! It's the crisis of my life.
quotes.author: Bill Tilden

quotes.quote: Tennis and golf are best played, not watched.
quotes.author: Roger Kahn

quotes.quote: Dating a tennis player is risky - love means nothing to us.
quotes.author: Anna Kournikova

quotes.quote: As a tennis player, you have to get used to losing every week. Unless you win the tournament, you always go home as a loser. But you have to take the positive out of a defeat and go back to work. Improve to fail better.
quotes.author: Stanislas Wawrinka

quotes.quote: As a tennis player you can win and you can lose, and you have to be ready for both. I practised self-control as a kid. But as you get older they both - winning and losing - get easier.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.quote: You are never really playing an opponent. You are playing yourself, your own highest standards, and when you reach your limits, that is real joy.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: When I was 40, my doctor advised me that a man in his 40s shouldn't play tennis. I heeded his advice carefully and could hardly wait until I reached 50 to start again.
quotes.author: Hugo L. Black

quotes.quote: Tennis is a perfect combination of violent action taking place in an atmosphere of total tranquillity.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: Tennis: a racquet sport in which two players compete to see who has the shortest temper, the worst memory, the poorest eyesight, and the slowest watch.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Tennis is an addiction that once it has truly hooked a man will not let him go.
quotes.author: Russell Lynes

quotes.quote: Tennis: the most perfect combination of athleticism, artistry, power, style, and wit. A beautiful game, but one so remorselessly travestied by the passage of time.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.quote: If you can keep playing tennis when somebody is shooting a gun down the street, that's concentration.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: Though your game is hardly the best, you can fray your opponent's nerves, by methodically bouncing the ball, at least ten times before your serves.
quotes.author: Arnold J. Zarett

quotes.quote: An otherwise happily married couple may turn a mixed doubles game into a scene from Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf.
quotes.author: Rod Laver

quotes.quote: One should never createÂ tensionÂ between one's footwear.
quotes.author: Rachel Caine

quotes.quote: One way to break up any kind of tension is good deep breathing.
quotes.author: Byron Nelson

quotes.quote: The greater the tension, the greater is the potential.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: It is theÂ tensionÂ between creativity and skepticism that has produced the stunning and unexpected findings of science.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: To createÂ tension, dialogue needs to be stretched out. That is, characters should not be immediately responsive.
quotes.author: Sol Stein

quotes.quote: When we give ourselves the chance to let go of all our tension, the body's natural capacity to heal itself can begin to work.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Tension is the mirror of our past.
quotes.author: Saab

quotes.quote: There was enoughÂ tensionÂ in the room to send a fleet of the nervous running for their tranquilizers.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: The creativeÂ tensionÂ with spirituality vs. practicality in the world of politics is a vital conversation.
quotes.author: Tim Daly

quotes.quote: AÂ tensionÂ or difficulty can signal the approach of a new grace of God. But it has to be looked at wisely and humanly.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: If we can stay with theÂ tensionÂ of opposites long enough "Â”sustain it, be true to it" Â”we can sometimes become vessels within which the divine opposites come together and give birth to a new reality.
quotes.author: Marie-Louise von Franz

quotes.quote: You can cut theÂ tensionÂ with a cricket stump.
quotes.author: Murray Walker

quotes.quote: TensionÂ is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: TensionÂ without cosmic pulsation to animate it is the transition to nothingness.
quotes.author: Oswald Spengler

quotes.quote: Each increase ofÂ tensionÂ has produced an increase of arms; each increase of arms has produced an increase ofÂ tension.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Tension, especially with regard to horror, is a very difficult thing to sustain in the big sense.
quotes.author: Bear McCreary

quotes.quote: Almost all stress,Â tension, anxiety, and frustration, both in life and in work, comes from doing one thing while you believe and value something completely different.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: SomeÂ tensionÂ is necessary for the soul to grow, and we can put thatÂ tensionÂ to good use. We can look for every opportunity to give and receive love, to appreciate nature, to heal our wounds and the wounds of others, to forgive, and to serve.
quotes.author: Joan Borysenko

quotes.quote: TheÂ tensions between authority and the people need to be heard, especially when they are suffering and they can't eat.
quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.quote: While nervous tension may be a component of stress, one can be stressed without feeling tension.
quotes.author: Gabor Mate

quotes.quote: Tension, in the long run, is a more dangerous force than any feud known to man.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Tension demands release. Unusual tension demands release that can only be described as appalling.
quotes.author: Garth Ennis

quotes.quote: Whatever may be theÂ tensions and the stresses of a particular day, there is always lurking close at hand the trailing beauty of forgotten joy or unremembered peace.
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: TensionÂ is a prerequisite for creative living.
quotes.author: Agnes Meyer Driscoll

quotes.quote: There is alwaysÂ tensionÂ between the possibilities we aspire to and our wounded memories and past mistakes.
quotes.author: Sean Brady

quotes.quote: TheÂ tensionÂ between the call to the desert and to the market place arises not from the greater presence of God in one or the other but from our varying psychological needs to apprehend him in different ways.
quotes.author: Sheila Cassidy

quotes.quote: There are interesting tensions that will naturally occur with any relationship. No matter what setting, what era, the tension is very, very real. It's basic human tension.
quotes.author: Lyriq Bent

quotes.quote: TheÂ tensionÂ in the world is theÂ tensionÂ between the ego and the feminine, not between the masculine and the feminine.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: TheÂ tensionÂ between "yes" and "no", between "I can" and "I cannot", makes us feel that, in so many instances, human life is an interminable debate with one's self.
quotes.author: Anatole Broyard

quotes.quote: You have to createÂ tensionÂ between reality and aspiration.
quotes.author: Sumantra Ghoshal

quotes.quote: Tequila is not even a drink; it's a way for having the cops around without using a phone.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.quote: Love is like tequila shots, not the quantity but strength matters.
quotes.author: Saru Singhal

quotes.quote: Take life with a grain of salt and a slice of lemon and a shot of tequila.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you want to make some memories, add some tequila.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
Take life with a pinch of salt
A shot of tequila and a wedge of lime
Do nothing at all
But take your time.
quotes.author: John Walter Bratton

quotes.quote: It was too much Tequila, or not quite enough.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: And no one drank just one shot of tequila.
quotes.author: Kristin Hannah

quotes.quote: Deal with your wins and losses alike. With tequila, lemon and a pinch of salt.
quotes.author: Saleem Sharma

quotes.quote: If you want to keep your dignity intact, stay away from tequila.
quotes.author: Alida Nugent

quotes.quote: Life is better with Tequila.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Tequila probably won't fix your problems, but it's worth a shot.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: At least you do' need a prescription for tequila.
quotes.author: Rachel Vincent

quotes.quote: Tequila is like acid in a glass.
quotes.author: Greg Proops

quotes.quote: Drinking tequila is more about the journey than the destination.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell

quotes.quote: One tequila, two tequila, three tequila, floor.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, get tequila and salt.
quotes.author: Sanjaya Malakar

quotes.quote: Tequila is like Duck tape, it fixes damn nearly everything.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I am well aware I'm not everyone's cup of tea, I'd rather be someone's shot of tequila anyway!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We should all believe in something, and I believe it's time for another shot of tequila.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: Tequila. Straight. There's a real polite drink. You keep drinking until you finally take one more and it just won't go down. Then you know you've reached your limit.
quotes.author: Lee Marvin

quotes.quote: There were years when I was a beer and tequila guy, then I got real fat. And then I found that you could actually go on a diet and drink scotch. Then I got hooked on scotch, and if you get hooked on scotch, then everything else just tastes wrong.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.quote: An ounce of breast milk is even more potent than the finest tequila.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: It's terrible to lose your brain and your power to be conscious or in the moment.
quotes.author: Graham Shiels

quotes.quote: Terrible is the temptation to be good.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: It is terrible to speak well and be wrong.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Terrible times breed terrible things, my lord.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: What a terrible thing it is to botch a farewell.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: It is a terrible thing to see and have no vision.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: What a terrible thing it is to lose one's mind...
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: There is a terrible weight in all kinds of beauty
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: Two terrible behaviors don't make a good behavior.
quotes.author: David Brooks

quotes.quote: What terrible tragedies realism inflicts on people.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: Terrible is the fight put up by the senses. Fight bravely! Conquer them you must.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: It's a terrible waste to be happy and not notice it.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Everything terrible is something that needs our love.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: What a terrible era in which idiots govern the blind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Nothing is more terrible than activity without insight.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: There are much more terrible things than physical injury.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: How terrible it is to be woman...but only because of men.
quotes.author: Ki Longfellow

quotes.quote: It's terrible the way words get attached to you like barnacles.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.quote: There is a terrible emptiness in me, an indifference that hurts.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The terrible thing about the quest for truth is that you find it.
quotes.author: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.quote: He was so terrible that he was no longer terrible, only dehumanized.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: It's a terrible thing wishing that it can be someone else's tragedy.
quotes.author: John Dyer

quotes.quote: How terrible is wisdom, when it brings no profit to the man that's wise
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: There is no more terrible fate for a comedian than to be taken seriously.
quotes.author: Barry Humphries

quotes.quote: It's a terrible thing to be lonesome, especially in the middle of a crowd.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: There are three terrible ages of childhood - 1 to 10, 10 to 20, and 20 to 30.
quotes.author: Cleveland Amory

quotes.quote: Yes, terrible things happen, but sometimes those terrible things- they save you.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Nothing is terrible except fear itself.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The most terrible of all things is terror.
quotes.author: William Rounseville Alger

quotes.quote: We all make terrible mistakes in our lives.
quotes.author: Scott Bradfield

quotes.quote: Death is terrifying, but it would be even more terrifying to find out that you are going to live forever and never die.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: It is such a terrifying thing to see a man cry.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berg

quotes.quote: Marriage is actually really terrifying. It doesn't work for many people.
quotes.author: Katherine Heigl

quotes.quote: Pleasure is terrifying because it breaks down the boundaries between people. Embracing passion means living with fear.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Uncovering your real desires can be terrifying. It can also set you spectacularly free.
quotes.author: Mark Epstein

quotes.quote: Death is terrifying and beautiful, a final thing we can all do together.
quotes.author: Shane Warren Jones

quotes.quote: Terrifying, that the loss of intimacy with one person results in the freezing over of the world, and the loss of oneself.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Once you realise that heroes die, everything becomes that much more terrifying.
quotes.author: David Benioff

quotes.quote: Success is terrifying. Like happiness, it is often appreciated in retrospect. It's only later that you place it in perspective. Years from now, I'll look back and say, â€˜God, wasn't it wonderful.'
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: Natural disasters are terrifying - that loss of control, this feeling that something is just going to randomly end your life for absolutely no reason is terrifying. But, what scares me is the human reaction to it and how people behave when the rules of civility and society are obliterated.
quotes.author: Eli Roth

quotes.quote: Madness alone is truly terrifying, inasmuch as you cannot placate it by threats, persuasion, or bribes.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: The first kiss can be as terrifying as the last.
quotes.author: Daina Chaviano

quotes.quote: We fear violence less than our own feelings. Personal, private, solitary pain is more terrifying than what anyone else can inflict.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: To feel is perhaps the most terrifying thing in this society.
quotes.author: Cecil Taylor

quotes.quote: It can be so terrifying to open yourself up to true love. That love can be with your mate, with your child, with yourself, because we are ultimately such vulnerable little creatures in this world.
quotes.author: Lauren Bowles

quotes.quote: It's terrifying to see someone inside of whom a vital spring seems to have been broken. It's particularly terrifying to see him in your mirror.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: It is a terrifying as well as hopeful truth that we tend to bring into being in form whatever we fashion in thought.
quotes.author: Alice Hegan Rice

quotes.quote: The truth is rarely as dreadful or as terrifying as what one imagines.
quotes.author: Hallie Ephron

quotes.quote: This terrifying world is not devoid of charms, of the mornings that make waking up worthwhile.
quotes.author: Wislawa Szymborska

quotes.quote: Life is a very scary thing because it's unknown. Anything can happen anytime, and that is terrifying for all of us: to not to be in control.
quotes.author: Dan Trachtenberg

quotes.quote: In a world we find terrifying, we ratify that which doesn't threaten us.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: People say that being in love is amazing. They lie. It's freaking terrifying.
quotes.author: Molly McAdams

quotes.quote: The threat is generally more terrifying than the thing itself.
quotes.author: Saul D. Alinsky

quotes.quote: Gentleman, it is a terrifying thing for a woman to trust a sinful man.
quotes.author: Mark Driscoll

quotes.quote: The most terrifying thing for most everybody in the whole Western World is to take responsibility for your own life and to experience real freedom.
quotes.author: Harry Dean Stanton

quotes.quote: The truth is you only have yourself to offer. And when you come to that realization, it's terrifying, because you think it's probably not enough.
quotes.author: Richard Jenkins

quotes.quote: The most terrifying things in the universe came from human minds.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The most terrifying thing is sometimes not what we see, but rather what we are forced to imagine.
quotes.author: Felix J. Palma

quotes.quote: Fear of danger is ten thousand times more terrifying than danger itself.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: The threat is usually more terrifying than the thing itself.
quotes.author: Saul Alinsky

quotes.quote: Whoever controls the territory possesses it.
quotes.author: Paul Virilio

quotes.quote: The only reason some people get lost in thought is because it's unfamiliar territory.
quotes.author: Paul Fix

quotes.quote: None of us see the world as it is but as we are, as our frames of reference, or maps, define the territory.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Enemy-occupied territory - that is what this world is.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Be as beneficent as the sun or the sea, but if your rights as a rational being are trenched on, die on the first inch of your territory.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When walking in open territory, bother no one. If someone bothers you, ask him to stop. If he does not stop, destroy him.
quotes.author: Anton Szandor LaVey

quotes.quote: We're going to be treated very poorly, I think that goes with the territory, and you have to get over it, get beyond it and know who you are among your peers and especially among your family when you look in the mirror.
quotes.author: Vince McMahon

quotes.quote: You stick your head above the crowd and attract attention and sometimes somebody will throw a rock at you. That's the territory. You buy the land, you get the Indians.
quotes.author: David Lee Roth

quotes.quote: Size is not grandeur, and territory does not make a nation.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Territory is but the body of a nation. The people who inhabit its hills and valleys are its soul, its spirit, its life.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: There is a lot of territory out there still to explore TV-wise, show-wise, movie-wise, everything.
quotes.author: Randy Jackson

quotes.quote: He entered the territory of lies without a passport for return.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: The eyes have a property in things and territories not named in any title-deeds, and are the owners of our choicest possessions.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Feelings take you into uncharted territory from time to time it's true, but you almost always benefit from the journey one way or the other. We tend to think of the rational as a higher order, but it is the emotional that marks our lives.
quotes.author: Merle Shain

quotes.quote: When you're trying to do character work that's different from what people expect from you, you're sort of in territory that is uncharted, and you don't know how it's playing all the time.
quotes.author: Mark Ruffalo

quotes.quote: The history of each and every territory is written in the blood of those who died trying to fulfill the aspirations of their ambitious leaders.
quotes.author: D. J. Machale

quotes.quote: Possession of territory is not primarily about laws and contracts, but first and foremost a matter of movement and circulation.
quotes.author: Paul Virilio

quotes.quote: The heart never forgets, never gives up, the territory marked off for those who came before.
quotes.author: Robert James Waller

quotes.quote: Sentiment and nostalgia are fatal for fiction. One must go into the territory of the imagination with sure feet, hot fainting with glorious misery.
quotes.author: Lynn Freed

quotes.quote: The only way to find that territory is trying to keep your mind constantly open. That's the only way that you're ever going to see the sort of signs of where to go.
quotes.author: Squarepusher

quotes.quote: Uncharged with invisible meaning, the visible is nothing, mere clay; and without visible circumstance, a territory, to connect to, our spirit is shapeless, nameless, and undefined.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.quote: Terrorism is the use of indiscriminate violence for political ends. It has a logic, even if it is one we mostly do not care to understand.
quotes.author: Jonathan Cook

quotes.quote: Terrorism is what we call the violence of the weak, and we condemn it; war is what we call the violence of the strong, and we glorify it.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Terrorism has no religion, terrorists have no religion and they are friends of no religion.
quotes.author: Manmohan Singh

quotes.quote: Terrorism will never cease in a country where the so called leaders are criminals and terrorists in disguise.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Terrorism can go anywhere where there is not strong government, or government that cannot control its hinterlands.
quotes.author: Robert D. Kaplan

quotes.quote: We do not create terrorism by fighting the terrorists. We invite terrorism by ignoring them.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Terrorism is the intentional use of, or threat to use violence against civilians or against civilian targets, in order to attain political aims.
quotes.author: Boaz Ganor

quotes.quote: Terrorism is always one bad day away from being issue No. 1.
quotes.author: John Avlon

quotes.quote: Terrorism against our nation will not stand.
quotes.author: George W Bush

quotes.quote: Terrorism is the tactic of demanding the impossible, and demanding it at gunpoint.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Terrorism has no religion is a theory, and the religion of terrorism is a real threat and practical thing.
quotes.author: Satyendra Singh 'Shyamal

quotes.quote: Terrorism has become the systematic weapon of a war that knows no borders or seldom has a face.
quotes.author: Jacques Chirac

quotes.quote: Any terrorism is an attack on libertarian values.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Terrorism, like viruses, is everywhere. There is a global perfusion of terrorism, which accompanies any system of domination as though it were its shadow, ready to activate itself anywhere, like a double agent.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Terrorism is the preferred weapon of weak and evil men.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Terrorism works better as a tactic for dictatorships, or for would-be dictators, than for revolutionaries.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: Terrorism is just a whole other level of anger management issues.
quotes.author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi

quotes.quote: It terrorism happened because intelligence, leadership and police failures made it possible.
quotes.author: Ashraf Ghani

quotes.quote: The terrorism is not in the bombs, in your hands; the terrorism is in your unconscious.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Terrorism grows when there are no other options, and when the center of the global economy is the god of money and not the person men and women this is already the first terrorism!
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Terrorism is a psychological warfare. Terrorists try to manipulate us and change our behavior by creating fear, uncertainty, and division in society.
quotes.author: Patrick J. Kennedy

quotes.quote: What distinguishes terrorism is the willful and calculated choice of innocents as targets.
quotes.author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quotes.quote: Everybody's worried about stopping terrorism. Well, there's a really easy way: stop participating in it.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Terrorism is a significant threat to peace and security, prosperity and people.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: If you want to end terrorism, you have to stop being terrorists
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: Terrorism is the war of the poor, and war is the terrorism of the rich.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Terrorism is global and can come from even remote countries.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: Terrorism must be outlawed by all civilized nations, not explained or rationalized, but fought and eradicated. Nothing can, nothing will justify the murder of innocent people and helpless children.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: The terrible thing about terrorism is that ultimately it destroys those who practice it. Slowly but surely, as they try to extinguish life in others, the light within them dies.
quotes.author: Terry Waite

quotes.quote: Terrorism has no nationality or religion.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: To hold a testimony, one must bear it often and live worthy of it.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: Never silence your testimony. It's meant for someone else; not you.
quotes.author: Asia Mouzone

quotes.quote: Testimony is to know and to feel, Conversion is to do and to become.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: How you live your life is a testimony of what you believe about God.
quotes.author: Henry Blackaby

quotes.quote: The flame of testimony burns brightly when fed with the oil of grace.
quotes.author: Harry Ironside

quotes.quote: If lips and life do not agree, the testimony will not amount to much.
quotes.author: Henry Allen Ironside

quotes.quote: Testimony is contingent on experience, that's why we're all free spirits.
quotes.author: Phil Collins

quotes.quote: There is abundant testimony that if we choose love rather than self, we gain immeasurably.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: No one can argue with a testimony, it is not a debatable issue. It is there to be accepted or rejected.
quotes.author: Bruce R. McConkie

quotes.quote: Sometimes a single phrase of testimony can set events in motion that affect someone's life for eternity.
quotes.author: Elder Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: With a strong testimony of the Savior and His restored gospel, you have limitless opportunities to shine.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: You know your testimony is strong when your roots are so deep that other people's storms will never knock you over.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: No human testimony can have such force as to prove a miracle, and make it a just foundation for any such system of religion.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: What you receive from others is a testimony to their virtue; but all that you do for others is the sign and clear indication of your own.
quotes.author: Giordano Bruno

quotes.quote: I will live and die by this testimony: that I loved a good conscience; that I never invaded another man's liberty; and that I preserved my own.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: If you look at a testimony of love from 2,000 years ago it can still exactly speak to you, whereas medical advice from only 100 years ago is ridiculous.
quotes.author: Jennifer Michael Hecht

quotes.quote: There is absolutely nothing in this world that will provide more comfort and happiness than a testimony of the truth.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Testimony always comes from people who are in some way disempowered.
quotes.author: Joshua Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: Testimony is not something you have today, and you are going to have always. A testimony is fragile. It is as hard to hold as a moonbeam. It is something you have to recapture every day of your life.
quotes.author: Harold B. Lee

quotes.quote: The greatest testimony to the human spirit that I'm witnessing now is the fact that people still come back to work, after all that has been done to them. They are still willing to participate for a more positive future if they would be sincerely invited.
quotes.author: Walter Wriston

quotes.quote: The testimony of scripture is so plain that to add anything were superfluous, were it not that the world is almost now come to that blindness, that whatsoever pleases not the princes and the multitude, the same is rejected as doctrine newly forged, and is condemned for heresy.
quotes.author: John Knox

quotes.quote: Testimony gives something to be interpreted.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: If you want a testimony, you are going to have a test.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Your personal testimony, however meaningful it is to you, is not the gospel.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: A testimony is a testimony, and it should be respected, whether it is small or large.
quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.quote: We acquire a testimony of the principles of the gospel by obediently trying to live them.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Expressions of solemn testimony have long been important to the children of God upon the earth.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Testimony demands to be interpreted because of the dialectic of meaning and event that traverses it.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: No matter what eyewitness testimony is in the court of law, it is the lowest form of evidence in the court of science.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: The value given to the testimony of any feeling must depend on our whole philosophy, not our whole philosophy on a feeling.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Texas has yet to learn submission to any oppression, come from what source it may.
quotes.author: Sam Houston

quotes.quote: I'd rather be a fencepost in Texas, than the king of Tennessee.
quotes.author: Chris Wall

quotes.quote: That's the thing about East Texas. Red dirt never quite washes out, and pine pollen is tenacious as original sin.
quotes.author: Markham Shaw Pyle

quotes.quote: Always marry a woman from Texas. No matter how tough things get, she's seen tougher.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: To me, it's really the heart of Texas. You don't know the Lone Star State until you've experienced Gruene Hall.
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.quote: In Texas we practically come out of the womb in jeans.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.quote: Texas is the finest portion of the globe that has blessed my vision.
quotes.author: Sam Houston

quotes.quote: Texas is a blend of valor and swagger.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: In Texas, we have the death penalty, and we use it. That's right. If you come to Texas and kill somebody, we will kill you back.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.quote: I've traveled all over the world, but I don't think there is any place better than Texas.
quotes.author: Red Adair

quotes.quote: I thought I knew Texas pretty well, but I had no notion of it's size until I campaigned it.
quotes.author: Ann Richards

quotes.quote: This is Texas. We're still figuring out how to spell tolerance.
quotes.author: Rachel Caine

quotes.quote: News events are like Texas weather. If you don't like it, wait a minute.
quotes.author: Jessica Savitch

quotes.quote: Being from Texas, I would say I favor a pair of jeans you can wear some boots with.
quotes.author: Jensen Ackles

quotes.quote: Texas is OK if you want to settle down and do your own thing quietly, but it's not for outrageous people, and I was always outrageous.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: Makes me want to go to leave the United States and go to a more sensible place, like Texas.
quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

quotes.quote: In the name of the constitution of Texas, which has been trampled upon, I refuse to take this oath. I love Texas too well to bring civil strife and bloodshed upon her.
quotes.author: Sam Houston

quotes.quote: Obviously people in Texas have a big hearts.
quotes.author: Katie Couric

quotes.quote: I just want Texas to be number one in something other than executions, toll roads and property taxes.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.quote: Like most passionate nations, Texas has its own history based on, but not limited by, facts.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Texas is a great place to be rich and a terrible place to be poor. It's got the highest percentage of people without health insurance in the country. If you get injured on the job, good luck getting workers' comp. And God help you if you're poor and mentally ill.
quotes.author: Gail Collins

quotes.quote: Texas does not, like any other region, simply have indigenous dishes. It proclaims them. It congratulates you, on your arrival, at having escaped from the slop pails of the other 49 states.
quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

quotes.quote: Texas has long been known as the nation's largest energy producer, but we are equally proud of our distinction as the nation's leading energy innovator.
quotes.author: Rick Perry

quotes.quote: A born Texan has instilled in his system a mind-set of no retreat or no surrender. I wish everyone the world over had the dominating spirit that motivates Texans.
quotes.author: Billy Clayton

quotes.quote: I love Texas because Texas is future-oriented, because Texans think anything is possible. Texans think big.
quotes.author: Senator Phil Gramm

quotes.quote: At the risk of descending to unscientific generalizations, 90 percent of Texans give the other 10 percent a bad name.
quotes.author: Mary Doria Russell

quotes.quote: I think Texans have more fun than the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Tommy Tune
