quotes.quote: There was a vastness here, more air, more sun, more space, and I thought that here a man drew some of that vastness into his soul.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: Texas is a state of mind. Texas is an obsession. Above all, Texas is a nation in every sense of the word. And there's an opening convey of generalities. A Texan outside of Texas is a foreigner.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Never forget, son, when you represent Texas, always go first class.
quotes.author: James Michener

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as chance in a text. Any text is the result of a repertoire, on conscious and unconscious levels, and can only be decoded by someone privy to the same repertoire.
quotes.author: Ivan Angelo

quotes.quote: As much as long conversations, laughter riots and wild meetups are desirable, there's still beauty and satisfaction in knowing via simple text messages that you wish someone well and they wish you back the same.
quotes.author: Hrishikesh Agnihotri

quotes.quote: Mind expressed as text sits quiet like a fire under moss.
quotes.author: Nick Harkaway

quotes.quote: You can find in a text whatever you bring, if you will stand between it and the mirror of your imagination.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Actual conversation is still okay... to a writer who types all day, texting is like never leaving work.
quotes.author: Nyki Mack

quotes.quote: There is a fine line between reading a message from the text and reading one into the text.
quotes.author: John Corvino

quotes.quote: A text without a context is a pretext for a proof text.
quotes.author: D. A. Carson

quotes.quote: Text is just ink on a page until a reader comes along and gives it life.
quotes.author: Louise Rosenblatt

quotes.quote: What is a moderate interpretation of the text? Halfway between what it really means and what you'd like it to mean?
quotes.author: Antonin Scalia

quotes.quote: The power of a text when it is read is different from the power it has when it is copied out. Only the copied text thus commands the soul of him who is occupied with it, whereas the mere reader never discovers the new aspects of his inner self that are opened by the text, that road cut through the interior jungle forever closing behind it: because the reader follows the movement of his mind in the free flight of day-dreaming, whereas the copier submits it to command.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: A text conversation is a short exchange of often grossly truncated language that corresponds to a thought made all the more shallow by the process.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Compare sending someone a text message and getting a love letter delivered by carrier pigeon. No contest.
quotes.author: Bryan Callen

quotes.quote: A text is evolutionary by its very nature.
quotes.author: Reif Larsen

quotes.quote: Speech is a text, gesture is a text, reality is a text in this new sense. This is not about re-establishing graphocentrism alongside logocentrism or phonocentrism or text-centrism. The text is not a centre. The text is an openness without borders, of ever-differentiating references.
quotes.author: Jacques Derrida

quotes.quote: Concentrate on the text for the moment: the other parts will fall into place in time.
quotes.author: Matthew Johnson

quotes.quote: Apply yourself wholly to the text; apply the text wholly to yourself.
quotes.author: Johann Albrecht Bengel

quotes.quote: Text messaging is just the most recent focus of people's anxiety; what people are really worried about is a new generation gaining control of what they see as their language.
quotes.author: David Crystal

quotes.quote: The true worth of a man is not to be found in man himself, but in the colours and textures that come alive in others.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Symbolism is no mere idle fancy or corrupt degeneration: it is inherent in the very texture of human life.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: I search for the realness, the real feeling of a subject, all the texture around it... I always want to see the third dimension of something... I want to come alive with the object.
quotes.author: Andrew Wyeth

quotes.quote: Never close your mind to a color. Remember, too, that texture is an important element. The same dress in the same shade of red may look wonderful on you in soft velvet but too harsh in a hard-finished taffeta. Think in terms of color combined with texture, not of one or the other independently.
quotes.author: Anne Fogarty

quotes.quote: There's many ways you communicate. With colour, texture, sound... Even words can communicate.
quotes.author: David Carson

quotes.quote: That's the chief lesson I have learned: the texture of our universe is one where there is no question at all but that good and laughter and justice will prevail.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: I loved you with texture. You loved with a softness. Texture brought detail, softness brought folds. Folds brought creases and creases had secrets.
quotes.author: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.quote: Texture can occur before you put brush to paper, it can be added during the process, or as the final step of the painting... The eye will be attracted to the textured areas... guide your viewer through the painting. The general rule is to use less not more.
quotes.author: Donna Baspaly

quotes.quote: Life is all about taking decisions, the precision or vagueness of which has an effect on the texture of our existence, our moral fabric and the rational side of our persona.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: The friends whom I have are invaluable, and although not numerous they are sufficient for my enjoyment; and the texture of my own mind renders me very indifferent to the rest of the world.
quotes.author: George Combe

quotes.quote: One of the goals of life is to try and be in touch with one's most personal themes-the values, the ideas, styles, colors that are the touchstones of one's own individual life, its real texture and substance.
quotes.author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: I feel the delightful, velvety texture of a flower, and discover its remarkable convolutions; and something of the miracle of Nature is revealed to me.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Novels are like paintings, specifically watercolors. Every stroke you put down you have to go with. Of course you can rewrite, but the original strokes are still there in the texture of the thing.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: My paintings of the landscape continued quickly in a free, impressionistic manner, until Mother Nature provided the texture in the form of rain!
quotes.author: John Darlinson

quotes.quote: Surfaces reveal so much. The marks painters make reveal so much about their work and themselves; their sense of proportion, line, and rhythm is more telling than their signature. Looking at the surfaces of nature may offer equivalent revelations. What do these shapes and patterns reveal about the world and their creator? Surfaces hide so much.
quotes.author: John Paul Caponigro

quotes.quote: I am convinced that abstract form, imagery, color, texture, and material convey meaning equal to or greater than words.
quotes.author: Katherine McCoy

quotes.quote: Memory is quite central for me. Part of it is that I like the actual texture of writing through memory.
quotes.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quotes.quote: The mixture of weird textures and organic surfaces creates an interesting dialogue.
quotes.author: Kelly Wearstler

quotes.quote: The eye’s perception of texture is pale compared to the lips’, and I didn’t know what velvety was until I knew it with my lips. Oh, kissing. Oh, violin boy.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: Art is the colors and textures of your imagination.
quotes.author: Meghan Trainor

quotes.quote: The past becomes a texture, an ambience to our present.
quotes.author: Paul Scott

quotes.quote: Texture is most evident where dark meets light on the turning edge and at the outer edge. Experience has taught us to assume that the areas in between have similar features.
quotes.author: Rex Brandt

quotes.quote: When we pay attention, whatever we are doing...is transformed and becomes a part of our spiritual path. We begin to notice details and textures that we never noticed before everyday life becomes clearer, sharper, and at the same time more spacious.
quotes.author: Rick Fields

quotes.quote: Texture is something we forget - it makes outfits look very expensive. You can do a monochromatic outfit, if you're afraid of things that are more colorful and printed, and still create interest.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Texture is very important. Just the feel of everything. It's not always about recording everything in pristine quality and having everything mixed where it's absolutely perfect. It's more about a vibe.
quotes.author: Washed Out

quotes.quote: The texture of experience is prior to everything else.
quotes.author: Willem de Kooning

quotes.quote: The imagination is of so delicate a texture that even words wound it.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The garden, historically, is the place where all the senses are exploited. Not just the eye, but the ear - with water, with birds. And there is texture, too, in plants you long to touch.
quotes.author: William Howard Adams

quotes.quote: Gazing into that stadium, looking up into those rows that can seat twenty thousand, you wonder what it must be like on a Friday night, when the lights are on and the hearts and soul of the town pours out over that field, across those endless plains.
quotes.author: H.G. Bissinger

quotes.quote: Friday night is what he lived for, bled for, worked so hard for.
quotes.author: H.G. Bissinger

quotes.quote: I didn't discover Shabbat until I was about twenty-four. Before that Friday and Saturday were days to shop, date, and catch a movie.
quotes.author: Lori Palatnik

quotes.quote: Lighting candles Friday night gave me great pleasure and soon became a significant part of my relationship with God.
quotes.author: Lori Palatnik

quotes.quote: Every Friday, my son, Michael, and I have breakfast together at the corner diner. Since he turned three, this has been our special time together and our favorite day of the week.
quotes.author: Dan Yaccarino

quotes.quote: Happiness increases ten percent on Fridays. Why is that? People are excited about the coming weekend, so they decide to be happier.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: They make up their minds on Fridays to enjoy their lives more.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: If you have the right mind-set, you can be just as happy on Monday as you are on Friday.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Yes, I know some days are more difficult than others. But if you program your mind in a positive way, you won't have to drag through certain days just hoping to get to Friday so you can finally enjoy life.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Finally, Friday afternoon arrives and we are off the clock. We do what we have to do for five days to enjoy what we want to do for two.
quotes.author: Nik Halik

quotes.quote: But the whole time we are playing, Sunday evening is lurking just around the corner. All too soon, we've turned the corner and are smacked back into reality.
quotes.author: Nik Halik

quotes.quote: There are essentially two drugs that Western civilization tolerates: caffeine from Monday to Friday yo energize you enough to make you a productive member of society, and alcohol from Friday to Monday to keep you too stupid to figure out the prison you are living in.
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.quote: England. All the foolish country sayings about Friday being an unlucky day to begin anything fresh upon.
quotes.author: William Cobbett

quotes.quote: Monday's child is fair of face, / Tuesday's child is full of grace, / Wednesday's child is full of woe, / Thursday's child has far to go, / Friday's child is loving and giving, / Saturday's child has to work for its living, / But a child that's born on the Sabbath day, / Is fair and wise and good and gay.
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: Midst the wealth of facts and fancies / That our memory may recall, / Thus the old school-day romances / Are the dearest of all!— / When some sweet thought revises / The half forgotten tune / That opened 'Exercises,' / On 'Friday afternoon.'
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: Although many believed the Friday after Thanksgiving is the busiest shopping day of the year, it is not. It is the fifth to tenth busiest day. It is, however, the day when the murder rate goes up significantly in almost 40 states.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: Every Friday, I like to high-five myself for getting through another week on little more than caffeine, willpower and inappropriate humor.
quotes.author: Nanea Hoffman

quotes.quote: Friday sees more smiles than any other day of the workweek.
quotes.author: Kate Summers

quotes.quote: Fridays are the hardest in some ways: you're so close to freedom.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Friday is a day to finish your goals for the week. It is a day to celebrate that which you set out to accomplish at the beginning of the week.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Friday is like a superhero that always arrives just in time to stop me from savagely beating one of my coworkers with a keyboard.
quotes.author: Rico

quotes.quote: I have never in my life found myself in a situation where I've stopped work and said, â€˜Thank God it's Friday.' But weekends are special even if your schedule is all over the place. Something tells you the weekend has arrived and you can indulge yourself a bit.
quotes.author: Helen Mirren

quotes.quote: On a Friday night, I like to go out because my friends, who have been working normal hours, just want to let go after a stressful week at work.
quotes.author: Douglas Booth

quotes.quote: Make a Friday a day to celebrate work well done that you can be proud of knowing that you just didn't put in time to the next pay check.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I think we're seeing in working mothers a change from 'Thank God it's Friday' to 'Thank God it's Monday.' If any working mother has not experienced that feeling, her children are not adolescent.
quotes.author: Ann Diehl

quotes.quote: If it comes back, I think that Friday night is not a good night to be on.
quotes.author: Amber Tamblyn

quotes.quote: Not for nothing is their motto TGIF â€“ â€˜Thank God It's Friday.' They live for the weekends, when they can go do what they really want to do.
quotes.author: Richard Nelson Bolles

quotes.quote: Friday' is about hanging out with friends, having fun. I felt like it was my personality in that song.
quotes.author: Rebecca Black

quotes.quote: Make each day of the week like Friday and your life will take on new enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: Gratitude gives infinite fullness of life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all the others.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: In ordinary life we hardly realize that we receive a great deal more than we give, and that it is only with gratitude that life becomes rich.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Gratitude is a quality similar to electricity: it must be produced and discharged and used up in order to exist at all.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: You can say it too little, but you can never say, Thank You, too many times.
quotes.author: LM Fields

quotes.quote: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.Â
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot.
quotes.author: Hansa Proverb

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: If you want to turn your life around, try thankfulness. It will change your life mightily.
quotes.author: Gerald Good

quotes.quote: The depth and the willingness with which we serve is a direct reflection of our gratitude.
quotes.author: Gordon T. Watts

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Gratitude is one of the least articulate of the emotions, especially when it is deep.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.quote: Feeling grateful or appreciative of someone or something in your life actually attracts more of the things that you appreciate and value into your life.
quotes.author: Northrup Christiane

quotes.quote: To say thank you, is in recognition of humanity.
quotes.author: Toni Mont

quotes.quote: Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Make it a habit to tell people thank you. To express your appreciation, sincerely and without the expectation of anything in return. Truly appreciate those around you, and you'll soon find many others around you. Truly appreciate life, and you'll find that you have more of it.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Gratitude is when memory is stored in the heart and not in the mind.
quotes.author: Lionel Hampton

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the memory of the heart.
quotes.author: Jean Baptiste Massieu

quotes.quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: When you are grateful fear disappears and abundance appears.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: 'Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.Â
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Take time to be kind and to say 'thank you.'Â
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Thankfulness is the beginning of gratitude.Gratitude is the completion of thankfulness. Thankfulness may consist merely of words. Gratitude is shown in acts.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: Two kinds of gratitude: The sudden kind we feel for what we take; the larger kind we feel for what we give.Â
quotes.author: Edwin Arlington Robinson

quotes.quote: Not what we say about our blessings, but how we use them, is the true measure of our thanksgiving.
quotes.author: W.T. Purkiser

quotes.quote: I thank you God for this most amazing day: for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and a blue true dream of sky; and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: We may thank God that we can feel pain and know sadness, for these are the human sentiments that constitute our glory as well as our grief.
quotes.author: Eugene Kennedy

quotes.quote: I don't think you should spend your life praying for things, but I do believe you should thank God for what He's given you... but I think the scripture teaches us that we can pray for our dreams, pray for the big things... he's not a small God; this God is incredible.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Remember God's bounty in the year. String the pearls of His favor. Hide the dark parts, except so far as they are breaking out in light! Give this one day to thanks, to joy, to gratitude!
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: I want to thank you, Lord, for life and all that's in it. Thank you for the day and for the hour, and the minute.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Thank you, God, for the dignity and beauty of self. The precious innate self. The only thing that can't be taken from us. The only thing we really own.
quotes.author: Marjorie Holmes

quotes.quote: Thank you, dear God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough. Thank you for the rain. And for the chance to wake up in three hours and go fishing: I thank you for that now, because I won't feel so thankful then.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: I have never had anyone love me the way you love me. I have never loved anyone the way I love you. Thank you God for showing us the way to each other.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: Thank God for the reality for which we were created, a moment-by-moment communication with God himself.
quotes.author: Francis Schaeffer

quotes.quote: Thank you, God, because I am lucky. Also let's face it, it turns out I'm black. And I'm having a career quite different from lots of people, so I feel doubly lucky.
quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

quotes.quote: I thank God for my handicaps for, through them, I have found myself, my work, and my God.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: I thank God for my failures. Maybe not at the time but after some reflection. I never feel like a failure just because something I tried has failed.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: The Sun you created is shining brightly under your command. The birds you set into the air chirp about your splendor. The flowers dance for joy at your greatness. And I have nothing more than a grateful heart to offer to you Oh Lord my God! Thank you for creating me.
quotes.author: Norman Jagger

quotes.quote: On the recollection of so many and great favours and blessings, I now, with a high sense of gratitude, presume to offer up my sincere thanks to the Almighty, the Creator and Preserver.
quotes.author: William Bartram

quotes.quote: O Lord, who lends me life, lend me a heart replete with thankfulness.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Thank you Lord, for being patient with me. For its so hard to see, when my eyes are on me.
quotes.author: Keith Green

quotes.quote: I have lived to thank God that all my prayers have not been answered.
quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

quotes.quote: So live for the kingdom of God. Seek to bring glory to Jesus Christ and the Lord will use you. It is my prayer, my constant and daily prayer, that God would keep me useable.
quotes.author: Chuck Smith

quotes.quote: Dear God thank you for everything you have given me and done for me also I would like to thank you for another day to be here I love u with every beat of my heart and would not have it any other way.
quotes.author: Steph Joseph Mayes

quotes.quote: Thank you Lord God for everything you have given me and continue to bless me with. Your goodness is greater than the love of friends and family because you blessed me with them. Help me follow your holy will.
quotes.author: Ruth Gatsby

quotes.quote: Thank God every morning when you get up that you have something to do that day, which must be done, whether you like it or not.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: The best way to say, 'I love you, God,' is to live your life doing your best. The best way to say, 'Thank you, God,' is by letting go of the past and living in the present moment, right here and now.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: On my bad days I seek you, on my good days I thank you, on my great days I praise you, but every day I need you, Thank you God for always being here for me.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: I am most thankful to Almighty Providence for mercies received, and determined still to press the case into public notice as a token of gratitude.
quotes.author: William Banting

quotes.quote: Every morning is a gift from the almighty God. Before you think about anything else remember that life comes from the one above and thank him for all that he blesses us with.
quotes.author: Kim Bathers

quotes.quote: Whatever happens in your life, no matter how troubling things might seem, do not enter the neighborhood of despair. Even when all doors remain closed, God will open up a new path only for you. Be thankful!
quotes.author: Elif Shafak

quotes.quote: Today I choose to forgive all those who have hurt me Lord. Not forgiving them is like landing in prison for their faults. I let go of all hatred and accept your love on this beautiful morning. Thank you Lord.
quotes.author: Weeny Shaw

quotes.quote: Let us thank God for having called us to His holy faith. It is a great gift, and the number of those who thank God for it is small.
quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

quotes.quote: I thought that all of the sacrifices and blessings of the whole history of mankind have devolved upon me. Thank you, God.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: The enlightened give thanks for what most people take for granted.
quotes.author: Michael Beckwith

quotes.quote: Thankfulness makes much of little.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: A thankful heart cannot be cynical.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Thankfulness eradicates entitlement.
quotes.author: Perry Noble

quotes.quote: Gratitude is infinite praise.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the root of joy.
quotes.author: Jonathan Jackson

quotes.quote: Gratefulness is a practice, just like happiness is a choice.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: Gratefulness has the courage to trust and so overcomes fear.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: Gratefulness is that fullness of life for which we are all thirsting.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: Gratefulness is the great task, the how of our spiritual work, because, rightly understood, it re-roots us.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: Being thankful for life itself is a way of making life better. When we look away from our problems, even for a short time, and generate joy in our hearts, we find that the world seems to change a bit.
quotes.author: John Harricharan

quotes.quote: In everything give thanks.
quotes.author: Paul the Apostle

quotes.quote: Thanks are the highest form of thought.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Gratitude is joyful act.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Gratitude is heaven itself.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: You should be thankful for the journey of life. You only make this journey once in your life time.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Thankfulness is the tune of angels.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: Give thanks to God, who made necessary things simple, and complicated things unnecessary.
quotes.author: Gregory Skovoroda

quotes.quote: A thankful heart is the greatest virtue.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Have an attitude of gratitude.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the smile of love.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the seedbed of joy.
quotes.author: Peter Kreeft

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the great multiplier.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the antidote to fear.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: It is gratefulness which makes the soul great.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: Gratefulness is a payment everyone can afford.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving being thankful or grateful results in more to be thankful for.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving opens up the windows of the opportunity for ideas to flow your way.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Being thankful and saying thanks are two habits of people who've discovered what it means to succeed in life.
quotes.author: Hal Urban

quotes.quote: Give thanks to the most high.
quotes.author: DJ Khaled

quotes.quote: Our rural ancestors, with little blest, patient of labor when the end was rest, Indulged the day that housed their annual grain, with feasts, and off’rings, and a thankful strain.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: It has been an unchallengeable American doctrine that cranberry sauce, a pink goo with overtones of sugared tomatoes, is a delectable necessity of the Thanksgiving board and that turkey is uneatable without it.
quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving creates abundance.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: A thankful heart is not only the greatest virtue, but the parent of all the other virtues.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving Day comes, by statute, once a year; to the honest man it comes as frequently as the heart of gratitude will allow.
quotes.author: Edward Sandford Martin

quotes.quote: I would rather be able to appreciate things I can not have than to have things I am not able to appreciate.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: What we’re really talking about is a wonderful day set aside on the fourth Thursday of November when no one diets. I mean, why else would they call it Thanksgiving?
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Drink and be thankful to the host! What seems insignificant when you have it, is important when you need it.
quotes.author: Franz Grillparzer

quotes.quote: If you want to turn your life around, try thankfulness. It will change your life mightily.
quotes.author: Gerald Good

quotes.quote: The Pilgrims made seven times more graves than huts. No Americans have been more impoverished than these who, nevertheless, set aside a day of thanksgiving.
quotes.author: H.U. Westermayer

quotes.quote: Give thanks for a little, and you will find a lot.
quotes.author: "Hausa Proverb West African "

quotes.quote: So what do we do?’ We do what all families do. Grin, bear it, and pass the mashed potatoes.
quotes.author: Heather Brewer

quotes.quote: I am grateful for what I am and have. My Thanksgiving is perpetual. It is surprising how contented one can be with nothing definite — only a sense of existence.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Pride slays thanksgiving, but an humble mind is the soil out of which thanks naturally grow. A proud man is seldom a grateful man, for he never thinks he gets as much as he deserves.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Remember God’s bounty in the year. String the pearls of your favor. Hide the dark parts, except so far as they are breaking out in light! Give this one day to thanks, to joy, to gratitude!
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: I’m from Canada, so Thanksgiving to me is just Thursday with more food. And I’m thankful for that.
quotes.author: Howie Mandel

quotes.quote: An optimist is a person who starts a new diet on Thanksgiving Day.
quotes.author: Irv Kupcinet

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving comes to us out of the prehistoric dimness, universal to all ages and all faiths. At whatever straws we must grasp, there is always a time for gratitude and new beginnings.
quotes.author: J. Robert Moskin

quotes.quote: He who thanks but with the lips Thanks but in part; The full, the true Thanksgiving Comes from the heart.
quotes.author: J.A. Shedd

quotes.quote: God is pleased with no music below so much as with the thanksgiving songs of relieved widows and supported orphans; of rejoicing, comforted, and thankful persons.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: An attitude of gratitude goes a long way when it comes to physical and emotional healing.
quotes.author: Jill Bolte Taylor

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving. It's like we didn't even try to come up with a tradition. The Thanksgiving tradition is, we overeat. ‘Hey, how about at Thanksgiving we just eat a lot?’ ‘But we do that every day!’ ‘Oh. What if we eat a lot with people that annoy the hell out of us?
quotes.author: Jim Gaffiga

quotes.quote: To speak gratitude is courteous and pleasant, to enact gratitude is generous and noble, but to live gratitude is to touch Heaven.
quotes.author: Johannes A. Gaertner

quotes.quote: And though I ebb in worth, I’ll flow in thanks.
quotes.author: John Taylor

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is an emotional holiday. People travel thousands of miles to be with people they only see once a year. And then discover once a year is way too often.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is the meal we aspire for other meals to resemble.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Only in America can someone start with nothing and achieve the American Dream. That's the greatness of this country.
quotes.author: Rafael Cruz

quotes.quote: A college degree is the key to realizing the American dream, well worth the financial sacrifice because it is supposed to open the door to a world of opportunity.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: To me, the American Dream is being able to follow your own personal calling. To be able to do what you want to do is incredible freedom.
quotes.author: Maya Lin

quotes.quote: Socialism never took root in America because the poor see themselves not as an exploited proletariat but as temporarily embarrassed millionaires.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The American Dream is to not have to work, so with unemployment at record levels, you'd think more people would be excited and grateful for the government intervention that got us to this glorious economic point.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Americans believe that they still live in the land of opportunity - the country that offers the greatest chance of economic advancement. But this is no longer the case.
quotes.author: Erik Brynjolfsson and Andrew McAfee

quotes.quote: The American dream is, in part, responsible for a great deal of crime and violence because people feel that the country owes them not only a living but a good living.
quotes.author: David Abrahansen

quotes.quote: There are those who will say that the liberation of humanity, the freedom of man and mind is nothing but a dream. They are right. It is the American Dream.
quotes.author: Archibald MacLeish

quotes.quote: People are so busy dreaming the American Dream, fantasizing about what they could be or have a right to be, that they're all asleep at the switch. Consequently we are living in the Age of Human Error.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: It's called the American dream because you have to be asleep to believe it.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Seeking the invisible through the imagery of the visible, the Americans never can get quite all the way to the end of the American dream.
quotes.author: Lewis H. Lapham

quotes.quote: I say to you today, my friends, so even though we face the difficulties of today and tomorrow, I still have a dream. It is a dream deeply rooted in the American dream. I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed: "We hold these truths to be self-evident: that all men are created equal.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The American Dream has run out of gas. The car has stopped. It no longer supplies the world with its images, its dreams, its fantasies. No more. It's over. It supplies the world with its nightmares now: the Kennedy assassination, Watergate, Vietnam
quotes.author: J.G. Ballard.

quotes.quote: A great wave of oppressive tyranny isn't going to strike, but rather a slow seepage of oppressive laws and regulations from within will sink the American dream of liberty.
quotes.author: George Baumler

quotes.quote: If the American dream is for Americans only, it will remain our dream and never be our destiny.
quotes.author: Rene de Visme Williamson

quotes.quote: American Dreams are strongest in the hearts of those who have seen America only in their dreams
quotes.author: Pico Iyer

quotes.quote: When it comes to the american dream, no one has a corner on the market. All of us have an equal chance to share in that dream.
quotes.author: J C Watts

quotes.quote: I am living proof that the american dream still exists. It is still alive and well. There is only one trick, you have to be willing to roll up your sleeves and work very, very hard.
quotes.author: Paula Deen

quotes.quote: That's what we do in this country. That's the american dream. That's freedom, and I'll take it any day over the supervision and sanctimony of the central planners.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: No social system in any country will bring us happiness, health and prosperity unless it is inspired by something greater than materialism.
quotes.author: Clement R. Attlee

quotes.quote: We believe that what matters most is not narrow appeals masquerading as values, but the shared values that show the true face of America; not narrow values that divide us, but the shared values that unite us: family, faith, hard work, opportunity and responsibility for all, so that every child, every adult, every parent, every worker in America has an equal shot at living up to their God-given potential. That is the American dream and the American value.
quotes.author: Senator John Kerry

quotes.quote: Build up your credit. Build up your self-esteem. Build up your bank account. Moving up in the scene. Everyone's living the American Dream so we can build up an army and SMASH it to pieces!
quotes.author: Christine Anderson

quotes.quote: In this remarkable time for the world, I refuse to believe it's time to stop believing in the possibilities of our remarkable country. I refuse to accept the downsizing of the American Dream. I refuse to bet against American entrepreneurial spirit and American ingenuity.The competition's tough, and it requires us to be tougher - tough-minded, never hard hearted.
quotes.author: Senator John Kerry

quotes.quote: So, then, to every man his chance--to every man, regardless of his birth, his shining, golden opportunity--to every man the right to live, to work, to be himself, and to become whatever thing his manhood and his vision can combine to make him--this, seeker, is the promise of America.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.quote: It is the immigrant hordes who keep this country alive, the waves of them arriving year after year.... Who believes in America more than the people who run down the gangplank and kiss the ground?
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.quote: America is not just a country, it's an idea.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: Success is the American Dream. And that success is not something to be ashamed of, or to demonize.
quotes.author: Susana Martinez

quotes.quote: As time goes on we get closer to that American Dream of there being a pie cut up and shared. Usually greed and selfishness prevent that and there is always one bad apple in every barrel.
quotes.author: Rick Danko

quotes.quote: The jobs crisis has reached a boiling point, which is why we see Occupy Wall Street protestors crying out for an America that lets all of us reach for the American Dream again - a dream that says if you work hard and play by the rules, you can have a good life and retire with dignity.
quotes.author: John Garamendi

quotes.quote: The American Dream is still alive out there, and hard work will get you there. You don't necessarily need to have an Ivy League education or to have millions of dollars startup money. It can be done with an idea, hard work and determination.
quotes.author: Bill Rancic

quotes.quote: A moment's beginning ends in a moment
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: The future can never lie about the past. In the end, you will see the beginning.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of an endless road, but the road with an end!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Everything is going to be fine in the end. If it's not, it's not the end.
quotes.author: Volksweisheit

quotes.quote: All stories end when they have returned to their beginnings.
quotes.author: Justin Cronin

quotes.quote: The end justifies the means. Sometimes you have to do the wrong thing to get the right result.
quotes.author: Sebastian Fitzek

quotes.quote: Happiness is not the victory, success or accomplishment; it is what happens at the end of the day?
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: In the end, the world returns to a grain.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: End is not the End, in fact, E.N.D means "Effort Never Dies".
quotes.author: Jerhia

quotes.quote: The truest end of life is to know the life that never ends.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: In the end, all or nothing will matter
quotes.author: Jay Mark D. Saga-ad

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: But if there must be an end, let it be loud. Let it be bloody. Better to burn than to wither away in the dark.
quotes.author: Mike Mignola

quotes.quote: You are the end of beauty and creativity one must have created so far.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: We are past the end of things now, but I don't want to leave.
quotes.author: Richard Ford

quotes.quote: Life's just a bunch of accidents, connected by one perfect end.
quotes.author: Daniel C. Tomas

quotes.quote: An endless path is frightening but the path that ends is even more frightening!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: But what if all the tranquility, all the comfort, all the contentment were now to come to a horrifying end?
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: It is good to have an end to journey towards; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Sometimes there is no solution. Sometimes there's simply an end.
quotes.author: Sara Ella

quotes.quote: There is an end to every journey.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: When we are at the end of life, to die means to go away; when we are at the beginning, to go away means to die.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The end always doesn't justify the means you used to reach there.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Sometimes things are most beautiful when they're coming to an end.
quotes.author: Kyra Jackson

quotes.quote: It's not the end of the physical body that should worry us. Rather our concern must be to live while we're alive.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: The end is the best part of any story
quotes.author: Michael Grant

quotes.quote: Beginning in itself has no value, it is an end which makes beginning meaningful, we must end what we begun.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Those who don't want to take risks in life end up been the losers.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: In the End, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The human heart has hidden treasures, In secret kept, in silence sealed; The thoughts, the hopes, the dreams, the pleasures, Whose charms were broken if revealed.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Whatever your heart clings to and confides in, that is really your God.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: A gentle heart is tied with an easy thread.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: The heart's memory eliminates the bad and magnifies the good.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The joyful heart sees and reads the world with a sense of freedom and graciousness.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: The heart will break, but broken live on.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A heart can no more be forced to love than a stomach can be forced to digest food by persuasion.
quotes.author: Alfred Nobel

quotes.quote: If you go deeper and deeper into your own heart, you'll be living in a world with less fear, isolation and loneliness.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: You do have to follow your heart, otherwise you're living a false life.
quotes.author: Eric Mabius

quotes.quote: A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: A woman's heart is a deep ocean of secrets.
quotes.author: Gloria Stuart

quotes.quote: And the heart that is soonest awake to the flowers is always the first to be touch'd by the thorns.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: The human heart, at whatever age, opens only to the heart that opens in return.
quotes.author: Maria Edgeworth

quotes.quote: An offended heart is the breeding ground of deception.
quotes.author: John Bevere

quotes.quote: There are strings in the human heart that had better not be vibrated.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Whatever it is your heart desires, please go for it, it's yours to have.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.quote: There never was any heart truly great and generous, that was not also tender and compassionate.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: When the heart speaks, its language is the same under all latitudes.
quotes.author: Ella Maillart

quotes.quote: The less you open your heart to others, the more your heart suffers.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Don't worry about your heart, it will last you as long as you live.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: A noble heart cannot suspect in others the pettiness and malice that it has never felt.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life. It is a waste to be asking the question when you are the answer.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Philosophers can debate the meaning of life, but you need a Lord who can declare the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Everyone now knows how to find the meaning of life within himself.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Each man must look to himself to teach him the meaning of life. It is not something discovered: it is something molded.
quotes.author: Charles-Augustin Sainte-Beuve

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is to adventurously discover our gift. The purpose of life is joyfully share our gift with the world.
quotes.author: Robert John Cook

quotes.quote: Whatever we are, whatever we make of ourselves, is all we will ever have - and that, in its profound simplicity, is the meaning of life.
quotes.author: Philip Appleman

quotes.quote: The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: What's the meaning of life? Other people.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: What is the essence of life? To serve others and to do good.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
quotes.author: Robert Byrne

quotes.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.author: The Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: MEANING OF LIFE: TO SHINE A LIGHT WHERE THERE IS NO LIGHT AND TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR SHINING THAT LIGHT.
quotes.author: Noelani Musicaro

quotes.quote: Life has meaning only if one barters it day by day for something other than itself.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is not an unquestionable answer; it is an unanswerable question.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: There is only one meaning of life: the act of living itself.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is life.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone-we find it with another.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Life is a fairy tale. Live it with wonder and amazement.
quotes.author: Welwyn Wilton Katz

quotes.quote: There is not one big cosmic meaning for all; there is only the meaning we each give to our life, an individual meaning, an individual plot, like an individual novel, a book for each person.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: What is the meaning of life? To be happy and useful.
quotes.author: H.H. the Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: I ask of life to shine meaning in everyone who is searching.
quotes.author: Aurora Hernandez

quotes.quote: The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit.
quotes.author: Nelson Henderson

quotes.quote: The meaning of Life is whatever we Choose.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is not simply to exist, to survive,but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: We get to CHOOSE the meaning for our lives.Our lives mean exactly what we say they do - no more, no less.Each of us chooses their path in life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: The meaning of life...I think the meaning of life is, I think it's love.
quotes.author: Julie Benz

quotes.quote: Life has no meaning the moment you loose the illusion of being eternal.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Because if you've found meaning in your life, you don't want to go back. You want to go forward.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.quote: Purpose is what gives life a meaning.
quotes.author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quotes.quote: The man who regards his own life and that of his fellow creatures as meaningless is not merely unfortunate but almost disqualified for life.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: A woman's mind is cleaner than a man's: She changes it more often.
quotes.author: Oliver Herford

quotes.quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Your own mind is a sacred enclosure into which nothing harmful can enter except by your permission.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: The mind is like an iceberg, it floats with one-seventh of its bulk above water.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The mind is the root from which all things grow if you can understand the mind, everything else is included.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: The mind has its own logic but does not often let others in on it.
quotes.author: Bernard DeVoto

quotes.quote: The mind ought sometimes to be diverted that it may return to better thinking.
quotes.author: Phaedrus

quotes.quote: The pendulum of the mind alternates between sense and nonsense, not between right and wrong.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Culture of the mind must be subservient to the heart.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: Everyone should have their mind blown once a day.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The conscious mind may be compared to a fountain playing in the sun and falling back into the great subterranean pool of subconscious from which it rises.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: What the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Whatever we plant in our subconscious mind and nourish with repetition and emotion will one day become a reality.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: The ignorant mind, with its infinite afflictions, passions, and evils, is rooted in the three poisons. Greed, anger, and delusion.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: The human mind always makes progress, but it is a progress in spirals.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: The more powerful and original a mind, the more it will incline towards the religion of solitude.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: It is requisite for the relaxation of the mind that we make use, from time to time, of playful deeds and jokes.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: I don't think the human mind can comprehend the past and the future. They are both just illusions that can manipulate you into thinking theres some kind of change.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: The mind is its own place and in itself, can make a Heaven of Hell, a Hell of Heaven.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: The human mind is our fundamental resource.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The moon is a friend for the lonesome to talk to.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: The moon puts on an elegant show, different every time in shape, colour and nuance.
quotes.author: Arthur Smith

quotes.quote: You can be the moon and still be jealous of the stars.
quotes.author: Gary Allan

quotes.quote: The moon was a ghostly galleon tossed upon cloudy seas.
quotes.author: Alfred Noyes

quotes.quote: Ten years ago the Moon was an inspiration to poets and an opportunity for lovers. Ten years from now it will be just another airport.
quotes.author: Emmanuel G. Mesthene

quotes.quote: The moon lives in the lining of your skin.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: The moon is a silver pin-head vast, That holds the heaven's tent-hangings fast.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.quote: The moon was reigning over their world, glowing its full splendor to all those willing to look up.
quotes.author: Irina Serban

quotes.quote: The moon rested right above the mountains, a place I call home.
quotes.author: Daniel Wallock

quotes.quote: The full moon - the mandala of the sky.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: The Moon is opposing Jupiter. Don't get involved, it's their problem.
quotes.author: Jim Critchfield

quotes.quote: It is no secret that the moon has no light of her own, but is, as it were, a mirror, receiving brightness from the influence of the sun.
quotes.author: Vitruvius

quotes.quote: The moon will guide you through the night with her brightness, but she will always dwell in the darkness, in order to be seen.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Every one is a moon, and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The moon, like a flower In heaven's high bower, With silent delight Sits and smiles on the night.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: The moon can never breathe, but it can take our breath away with the beauty of its cold, arid orb.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: The moon is beautiful only when the mind is seeking beauty and the heart is loving.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha, M.D.

quotes.quote: The wisdom of the Moon is greater than the wisdom of the Earth, because the Moonsees the universe better than the Earth can see it!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is something haunting in the light of the moon; it has all the dispassionateness of a disembodied soul, and something of its inconceivable mystery.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: The moon looks upon many night flowers; the night flowers see but one moon.
quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

quotes.quote: The moon is the reflection of your heart and moonlight is the twinkle of your love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: And he beholds the moon; like a rounded fragment of ice filled with motionless light.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: If the moon smiled, she would resemble you. You leave the same impression Of something beautiful, but annihilating.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: The sky was a midnight-blue, like warm, deep, blue water, and the moon seemed to lie on it like a water-lily, floating forward with an invisible current.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: I like to think that the moon is there even if I am not looking at it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The Moon is the first milestone on the road to the stars.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: The moon is brighter since the barn burned.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: The moon is essentially gray, no color. It looks like plaster of Paris, like dirty beach sand with lots of footprints in it.
quotes.author: James A. Lovell

quotes.quote: We'll go back to the moon by not learning anything new.
quotes.author: Burt Rutan

quotes.quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Although no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.author: Carl Brad

quotes.quote: An optimist stays up until midnight to see the New Year in. A pessimist stays up to make sure the old year leaves.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughn

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is the first blank page of a 365 page book. Write a good one.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: For last year's words belong to last year's language, and next year's words await another voice. And to make an end is to make a beginning
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Let our New Year's resolution be this: we will be there for one another as fellow members of humanity, in the finest sense of the word.
quotes.author: Goran Persson

quotes.quote: For a new year to bring you something new, make a move, like a butterfly tearing its cocoon! Make a move!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The new year stands before us, like a chapter in a book, waiting to be written. We can help write that story by setting goals.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.quote: New Year's most glorious light is sweet hope!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: New Year's Day is every man's birthday.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: The new year begins in a snow-storm of white vows.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.quote: The object of a new year is not that we should have a new year.It is that we should have a new soul.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Be always at war with your vices, at peace with your neighbors, and let each new year find you a better man.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Drop the last year into the silent limbo of the past. Let it go, for it was imperfect, and thank God that it can go.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: We will open the book. Its pages are blank. We are going to put words on them ourselves. The book is called Opportunity and its first chapter is New Year's Day.
quotes.author: Edith Lovejoy Pierce

quotes.quote: What the New Year brings to you will depend a great deal on what you bring to the New Year.
quotes.author: Vern McLellan

quotes.quote: A new year is unfolding--like a blossom with petals curled tightly concealing the beauty within.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Each age has deemed the new-born year. The fittest time for festal cheer.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: This bright new year is given me To live each day with zestTo daily grow and try to beMy highest and my best!
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Every man should be born again on the first day of January. Start with a fresh page.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: New year, same goal.
quotes.author: Joe King

quotes.quote: The Old Year has gone. Let the dead past bury its own dead. The New Year has taken possession of the clock of time. All hail the duties and possibilities of the coming twelve months!
quotes.author: Edward Payson Powell

quotes.quote: New Year's Day: Now is the accepted time to make your regular annual good resolutions. Next week you can begin paving hell with them as usual.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Approach the New Year with resolve to find the opportunities hidden in each new day.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: A new year brings not only happiness, it makes us happy with a hope to fulfill our dreams or a new beginning of our life. So, a new year is very special to everyone.
quotes.author: Santonu Kumar Dhar

quotes.quote: Let the new year be an entirely fresh start towards achieving all our goals. Lets kick start and era of excellence!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In the New Year, may your right hand always be stretched out in friendship, but never in want.
quotes.author: Irish Toast

quotes.quote: The New Year, like an infant heir to the whole world, was waited for, with welcomes, presents, and rejoicings.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The merry year is born Like the bright berry from the naked thorn.
quotes.author: Hartley Coleridge

quotes.quote: It wouldn't be New Year's if I didn't have regrets.
quotes.author: William Thomas

quotes.quote: Blue, green, grey, white, or black; smooth, ruffled, or mountainous; that ocean is not silent.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Being out there in the ocean, God's creation, it's like a gift He has given us to enjoy.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.quote: The sea is emotion incarnate. It loves, hates, and weeps. It defies all attempts to capture it with words and rejects all shackles. No matter what you say about it, there is always that which you can't.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: What would an ocean be without a monster lurking in the dark? It would be like sleep without dreams.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.quote: Because there's nothing more beautiful than the way the ocean refuses to stop kissing the shoreline, no matter how many times it's sent away.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: Ocean: A body of water occupying about two-thirds of a world made for man - who has no gills.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Those who live by the sea can hardly form a single thought of which the sea would not be part.
quotes.author: Hermann Broch

quotes.quote: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: The ocean is a central image. It is the symbolism of a great journey.
quotes.author: Enya

quotes.quote: The ocean is a mighty harmonist.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The ocean is the lifeblood of our world. If we were to lose our fish that we appreciate so much by overfishing; or if we were to lose some of our favorite beaches to overbuilding and pollution, then how would we feel? It's become a case of not knowing wha
quotes.author: Aaron Peirsol

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of the ocean.
quotes.author: Heidi Klum

quotes.quote: Pouring forth its seas everywhere, then, the ocean envelops the earth and fills its deeper chasms.
quotes.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

quotes.quote: Every drop in the ocean counts.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: The sea is the universal sewer.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: The sea, the great unifier, is man's only hope. Now, as never before, the old phrase has a literal meaning: we are all in the same boat.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: Health to the ocean means health for us.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: The ocean moans over dead men's bones.
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: An ocean which thinks there is nothing to learn from a lake is not a wise ocean!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Others may use the ocean as their road; Only the English make it their abode.
quotes.author: Edmund Waller

quotes.quote: The ocean stirs the heart, inspires the imagination and brings eternal joy to the soul.
quotes.author: Wyland

quotes.quote: To me the sea is a continual miracle; The fishes that swim?the rocks?the motion of the waves?the ships, with men in them, What stranger miracles are there?
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The cure for anything is salt water ? sweat, tears, or the sea.
quotes.author: Isak Dinesen

quotes.quote: We are tied to the ocean. And when we go back to the sea, whether it is to sail or to watch ? we are going back from whence we came
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The sea does not reward those who are too anxious, too greedy, or too impatient. One should lie empty, open, choiceless as a beach ? waiting for a gift from the sea.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Limitless and immortal, the waters are the beginning and end of all things on earth.
quotes.author: Heinrich Zimmer

quotes.quote: The sea lives in every one of us.
quotes.author: Wyland

quotes.quote: The Sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.
quotes.author: Jacques Cousteau

quotes.quote: That the sea is one of the most beautiful and magnificent sights in Nature, all admit.
quotes.author: John Joly

quotes.quote: The waves of the sea help me get back to me.
quotes.author: Jill Davis

quotes.quote: The past is never where you think you left it.
quotes.author: Katherine Anne Porter

quotes.quote: When we are tired, we are attacked by ideas we conquered long ago.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: The past can't hurt you anymore, not unless you let it.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: Your past is always your past. Even if you forget it, it remembers you.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Whenever I think of the past, it brings back so many memories.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.
quotes.author: Dale Turner

quotes.quote: I am not someone who is ashamed of my past. I'm actually really proud. I know I made a lot of mistakes, but they, in turn, were my life lessons.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: The past speaks to us in a thousand voices, warning and comforting, animating and stirring to action.
quotes.author: Felix Adler

quotes.quote: Just because the past taps you on the shoulders, doesn't mean you have to look back.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your past doesn't define who you are. It just gives you the starting point for who you're going to be.
quotes.author: Agent Carolina

quotes.quote: Don't let yesterday use up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The past is not a package one can lay away.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: The past is strapped to our backs. We do not have to see it; we can always feel it.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The past is a foreign country; they do things differently there.
quotes.author: Lesley P. Hartley

quotes.quote: The one charm of the past is that it is the past.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The past is always judged by the present.
quotes.author: Neith Boyce

quotes.quote: Whatever we think of the past, we must not be prisoners to it.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: We go to the past to lay the blame - since the past can't argue.
quotes.author: Glen Duncan

quotes.quote: When we recall the past, we usually find that it is the simplest things - not the great occasions - that in retrospect give off the greatest glow of happiness.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: he past is never there when you try to go back. It exists, but only in memory. To pretend otherwise is to invite a mess.
quotes.author: Chris Cobbs

quotes.quote: The past is our definition. We may strive, with good reason, to escape it, or to escape what is bad in it, but we will escape it only by adding something better to it.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Consider the past and you shall know the future.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: We can draw lessons from the past, but we cannot live in it.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Events in the past may be roughly divided into those which probably never happened and those which do not matter.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: Always look at what you have left. Never look at what you have lost.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Don't brood on the past, but don't forget it either.
quotes.author: Thomas H. Raddal

quotes.quote: To put the past behind you, you must accept that you've moved beyond it.
quotes.author: Ruth

quotes.quote: It's okay to look back at your past. Just don't stare.
quotes.author: Benjamin Dover

quotes.quote: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: The sea is emotion incarnate. It loves, hates, and weeps. It defies all attempts to capture it with words and rejects all shackles. No matter what you say about it, there is always that which you can't.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: To me the sea is a continual miracle; The fishes that swim, the rocks, the motion of the waves, the ships with men in them. What stranger miracles are there?
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: With every drop of water you drink, every breath you take, you're connected to the sea. No matter where on Earth you live.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: The sea is everything. It covers seven tenths of the terrestrial globe. Its breath is pure and healthy. It is an immense desert, where man is never lonely, for he feels life stirring on all sides.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.quote: The sea complains upon a thousand shores.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: The voice of the sea speaks to the soul. The touch of the sea is sensuous, enfolding the body in its soft, close embrace.
quotes.author: Kate Chopin

quotes.quote: In one drop of water are found all the secrets of all the oceans.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: We are tied to the ocean. And when we go back to the sea, whether it is to sail or to watch-we are going back from whence we came
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The sea does not reward those who are too anxious, too greedy, or too impatient. One should lie empty, open, choiceless as a beach - waiting for a gift from the sea.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Why do we love the sea? It is because it has some potent power to make us think things we like to think.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: For whatever we lose (like a you or a me), it's always our self we find in the sea.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: It is a curious situation that the sea, from which life first arose, should now be threatened by the activities of one form of that life. But the sea, though changed in a sinister way, will continue to exist: the threat is rather to life itself.
quotes.author: Rachel Carson

quotes.quote: To me, the sea is like a person--like a child that I've known a long time. It sounds crazy, I know, but when I swim in the sea I talk to it. I never feel alone when I'm out there...
quotes.author: Gertrude Ederle

quotes.quote: My soul is full of longing for the secrets of the sea, and the heart of the great ocean sends a thrilling pulse through me.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The tradition of freedom of the high seas has its roots in an era when there were too few people to seriously violate the oceans but in hindsight that era ended some 150 years ago.
quotes.author: James Carlton

quotes.quote: A lot of people attack the sea, I make love to it.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: The sea pronounces something, over and over, in a hoarse whisper; I cannot quite make it out.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: The sea has never been friendly to man. At most it has been the accomplice of human restlessness.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: When anxious, uneasy and bad thoughts come, I go to the sea, and the sea drowns them out with its great wide sounds, cleanses me with its noise, and imposes a rhythm upon everything in me that is bewildered and confused.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria

quotes.quote: Most of us, I suppose, are a little nervous of the sea. No matter what its smiles may be, we doubt its friendship.
quotes.author: H.M. Tomlinson

quotes.quote: I could never stay long enough on the shore; the tang of the untainted, fresh, and free sea air was like a cool, quieting thought.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: There was a magic about the sea. People were drawn to it. People wanted to love by it, swim in it, play in it, look at it
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: Because there's nothing more beautiful than the way the ocean refuses to stop kissing the shoreline, no matter how many times it's sent away.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: Hark, now hear the sailors cry / smell the sea, and feel the sky / let your soul & spirit fly, into the mystic.
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: I spent uncounted hours sitting at the bow looking at the water and the sky, studying each wave, different from the last, seeing how it caught the light, the air, the wind; watching patterns, the sweep of it all, and letting it take me. The sea.
quotes.author: Gary Paulsen

quotes.quote: Just as the wave cannot exist for itself, but is ever a part of the heaving surface of the ocean, so must I never live my life for itself, but always in the experience which is going on around me.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: I heard silence, silence infinite as the bottom of the ocean, a silence that sealed.
quotes.author: Anne Spollen

quotes.quote: There is, one knows not what sweet mystery about the sea, whose gently awful stirrings seem to speak of some hidden soul beneath.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Limitless and immortal, the waters are the beginning and end of all things on earth.
quotes.author: Heinrich Zimmer

quotes.quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: Food for the body is not enough. There must be food for the soul.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: The soul can split the sky in two and let the face of God shine through.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: You don't have a soul. You are a Soul. You have a body.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A sad soul can kill quicker than a germ.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: The soul that is within me no man can degrade.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: With all your science - can you tell how it is, and whence it is, that light comes into the soul?
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Soul shadows you everywhere.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: One thing in the world, of value, is the active soul.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Diseases of the soul are more dangerous and more numerous than those of the body.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: The soul, like the body, lives by what it feeds on.
quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.quote: The soul always knows what to do to heal itself the challenge is to silence the mind
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: It is the soul's duty to be loyal to its own desires. It must abandon itself to its master passion.
quotes.author: Dame Rebecca West

quotes.quote: The soul is placed in the body like a rough diamond, and must be polished, or the luster of it will never appear.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: The Soul can hear the violets grow! It can hear the throbbing heart of God!
quotes.author: Edwn Leibfried

quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: The soul is healed by being with children.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: When the soul of a man is born in this country there are nets flown at it to hold it back from flight.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: The soul of sweet delight, can never be defiled.
quotes.author: William Blake
