quotes.quote: Just as the soul fills the body, so God fills the world. Just as the soul bears the body, so God endures the world. Just as the soul sees but is not seen, so God sees but is not seen. Just as the soul feeds the body, so God gives food to the world.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: The soul of the slave, the soul of the "little man," is as dear to me as the soul of the great.
quotes.author: A. D. Gordon

quotes.quote: The soul of man is immortal and imperishable.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The greatest of wealth is the richness of the soul.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad

quotes.quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: If you're losing your soul and you know it, then you've still got a soul left to lose.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Your own soul is nourished when you are kind; it is destroyed when you are cruel.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.quote: The soul never thinks without a picture.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: When peoples care for you and cry for you, they can straighten out your soul.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: The sun is the most important thing in everybody's life, whether you're a plant, an animal or a fish, and we take it for granted.
quotes.author: Danny Boyle

quotes.quote: If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm.
quotes.author: Frank Lane

quotes.quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
quotes.author: Maori Proverb

quotes.quote: When sun shines, it not only brightens our day; it enlightens us, our soul, cleansing it of the gloominess that the night's darkness had brought in.
quotes.author: Tista Ray

quotes.quote: The sun does not shine for a few trees and flowers, but for the wide world's joy.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: The sun, with all those planets revolving around it and dependent on it, can still ripen a bunch of grapes as if it had nothing else in the universe to do.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: That the sun will not rise tomorrow is no less intelligible a proposition, and implies no more contradiction, than the affirmation, that it will rise.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: There is a muscular energy in sunlight corresponding to the spiritual energy of wind.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: The terrible thing about sunlight is it shows the dirt.
quotes.author: Brigid Berlin

quotes.quote: The Sun can be your greatest gloom, or your greatest comforter, depending on how you view its shine.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Even the sun directs our gaze away from itself and to the life illumined by it.
quotes.author: Eberhard Arnold

quotes.quote: Sunshine is Nature's hug and spirit breath to the earth.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: It's a brilliant surface in that sunlight. The horizon seems quite close to you because the curvature is so much more pronounced than here on earth. It's an interesting place to be. I recommend it.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: Sunlight is like the breath of life to the pomp of autumn.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: We must not fear daylight just because it almost always illuminates a miserable world.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: The sun lay like a friendly arm across her shoulder.
quotes.author: Margorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: When the sun has set, no candle can replace it.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The day of the sun is like the day of a king. It is a promenade in the morning, a sitting on the throne at noon, a pageant in the evening.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: No sun outlasts its sunset, but will rise again and bring the dawn.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The Sun is such a lonely star. Whenever he comes out to see his friends, they all disappear.
quotes.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quotes.quote: The sun burnt every day. It burnt time.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: If there is nothing new under the sun, at least the sun itself is always new, always re-creating itself out of its own inexhaustible fire.
quotes.author: Michael Sims

quotes.quote: The sun would be better than a flashlight, except it doesn't work at night. It probably needs to recharge its batteries from running all day.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: The sun is new each day.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Sunshine is a welcome thing. It brings a lot of brightness.
quotes.author: Jimmie Davis

quotes.quote: It is the unknown that excites the ardor of scholars, who, in the known alone, would shrivel up with boredom.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: It's the unknown that draws people.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Only the unknown frightens men. But once a man has faced the unknown, that terror becomes the known.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The unknown is too vast to live in known unhappiness.
quotes.author: Russell Eric Dobda

quotes.quote: Fear not the unknown. It is a sea of possibilities.
quotes.author: Tom Althouse

quotes.quote: Be bold and fly toward the unknown. Discover a road that was never known.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha, M.D.

quotes.quote: It's actually quite a good ethos for life: go into the unknown with truth,commitment, and openness and mostly you'll be okay.
quotes.author: Alan Cumming

quotes.quote: Prepare for the unknown by studying how others in the past have coped with the unforeseeable and the unpredictable.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The mind loves the unknown. It loves images whose meaning is unknown, since the meaning of the mind itself is unknown.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: I find the lure of the unknown irresistible.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: Man can learn nothing except by going from the known to the unknown.
quotes.author: Claude Bernard

quotes.quote: If we fear the unknown then surely we fear ourselves.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: The unknown is always interesting.
quotes.author: Michael Ovitz

quotes.quote: Do not fear the unknown, dare to be adventurous in life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A fear of the unknown keeps a lot of people from leaving bad situations.
quotes.author: Kathie Lee Gifford

quotes.quote: You must be fearless to travel on the journey of unknown.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Fear of the unknown is a terrible fear.
quotes.author: Joan D. Vinge

quotes.quote: We are sickened by the unknown, but knowledge can prove poisonous.
quotes.author: Steven Erikson

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: It's much easier to work with an unknown.
quotes.author: Taylor Hackford

quotes.quote: Exploring the unknown requires tolerating uncertainty.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.quote: How can we live without the unknown before us?
quotes.author: Rene Char

quotes.quote: To conquer the unknown you must trust.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: The challenge of the unknown future is so much more exciting than the stories of the accomplished past.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: There is nothing that man fears more than the touch of the unknown. He wants to see what is reaching towards him, and to be able to recognize or at least classify it. Man always tends to avoid physical contact with anything strange.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: We all have a fear of the unknown what one does with that fear will make all the difference in the world.
quotes.author: Lillian Russell

quotes.quote: Fear of the unknown is the greatest fear of all.
quotes.author: Yvon Chouinard

quotes.quote: Most people talk about fear of the unknown, but if there is anything to fear, it is the known.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Have no fear of moving into the unknown. Simply step out fearlessly knowing that I am with you, therefore no harm can befall you; all is very, very well. Do this in complete faith and confidence.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: It is good to love the unknown.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: There aren't enough days in the weekend.
quotes.author: Rod Schmidt

quotes.quote: Weekends are a bit like rainbows; they look good from a distance but disappear when you get up close to them.
quotes.author: John Shirley

quotes.quote: Weekends don't pay as well as weekdays but at least there's football.
quotes.author: S.A. Sachs

quotes.quote: The feeling of Sunday is the same everywhere, heavy, melancholy, standing still.
quotes.author: Jean Rhys

quotes.quote: Weekends don't count unless you spend them doing something completely pointless.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: It's a fine line between Saturday night and Sunday morning.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Weekends don't pay as well as weekdays but at least there's football.
quotes.author: SA Sachs

quotes.quote: Always strive to excel, but only on weekends.
quotes.author: Richard Rorty

quotes.quote: Be in the habit of getting up bright and early on the weekends. Why waste such precious time in bed?
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: There is little chance that meteorologists can solve the mysteries of weather until they gain an understanding of the mutual attraction of rain and weekends.
quotes.author: Arnot Sheppard

quotes.quote: A wild and crazy weekend involves sitting on the front porch, smoking a cigar, reading a book.
quotes.author: Robert M. Gates

quotes.quote: Sunday evenings often feel like the weekend is over before it's even begun.
quotes.author: Catherine McCormack

quotes.quote: Sometimes the weekend gets hijacked by work, but as my mother would say, this is the right problem.
quotes.author: Julian Fellowes

quotes.quote: The only reason why we ask other people how their weekend was is so we can tell them about our own weekend.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The rhythm of the weekend, with its birth, its planned gaieties, and its announced end, followed the rhythm of life and was a substitute for it.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Every man has a right to a Saturday night bath.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Sunday clears away the rust of the whole week.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: How pleasant is Saturday night, When I've tried all the week to be good, And not spoke a word that was bad, And obliged everyone that I could.
quotes.author: Nancy Sproat

quotes.quote: Why wait for the weekend to have fun.
quotes.author: Loesje

quotes.quote: I hate weekends because there is no stock market.
quotes.author: Rene Rivkin

quotes.quote: A Sunday well spent brings a week of content.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Nobody wants to give up a weekend long excuse to dress up and attempt to outshine one another.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Eulberg

quotes.quote: I respect the fact that people have worked hard all week and want to go to the movies on the weekend and be entertained.
quotes.author: Michael Moore

quotes.quote: Thank God it's Friday, because the weekend has landed and it's time to forget about work and tear it up!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'm learning the power of going away for the weekend and keeping myself company.
quotes.author: Zoe Saldana

quotes.quote: The only Happy END that I know it's the weekEND!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you're young, you should live out every weekend. Even if you look like a scarecrow, you just gotta go!
quotes.author: Jonathan Brandis

quotes.quote: Hands up if you're ready to do something you'll regret this weekend. Go forth! You have my blessing.
quotes.author: Florence Welch

quotes.quote: Not for nothing is their motto TGIF-?Thank God It's Friday.' They live for the weekends, when they can go do what they really want to do.
quotes.author: Richard Nelson Bolles

quotes.quote: You know what I want to do? Wake up one weekend and not have to go anywhere and do nothing.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The world is a dangerous place to live, not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Be a lover of the world, it is the only way to survive in it.
quotes.author: Janosch

quotes.quote: The world is not to be put in order. The world is order. It is for us to put ourselves in unison with this order.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: The most incomprehensible thing about the world is that it is at all comprehensible.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The world is a playground, and life is pushing my swing.
quotes.author: Natalie Kocsis

quotes.quote: The world is populated in the main by people who should not exist.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: The world needs anger. The world often continues to allow evil because it isn't angry enough.
quotes.author: Bede Jarrett

quotes.quote: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
quotes.author: Paul Dirac

quotes.quote: The world is more malleable than you think and it's waiting for you to hammer it into shape.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: The world is not in any sense in danger from itself. The world is in fact not in any danger at all. It is we who are in danger.
quotes.author: Daniel Quinn

quotes.quote: The world is not comprehensible, but it is embraceable: through the embracing of one of its beings.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: The world in which we were called to exist was an absurd world, and there was no other in which we could take refuge.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The world is getting to be such a dangerous place, a man is lucky to get fout of it alive.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: If the world is cold, make it your business to build fires.
quotes.author: Horace Traubel

quotes.quote: The world is a country which nobody ever yet knew by description; one must travel through it one's self to be acquainted with it.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: The world is full of a number of things, I'm sure we should all be as happy as kings.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The world knows nothing of its greatest men.
quotes.author: Sir Henry Taylor

quotes.quote: The world is a stage; each plays his part, and receives his portion.
quotes.author: Guillaume De Salluste Du Bartas

quotes.quote: The world's a stage where God's omnipotence, His justice, knowledge, love and providence, Do act the parts.
quotes.author: Guillaume De Salluste Du Bartas

quotes.quote: But in this world nothing is sure but death and taxes.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The world is a beautiful book, but of little use to him who cannot read it.
quotes.author: Carlo Goldoni

quotes.quote: The world's a theatre, the earth a stage, which God and nature do with actors fill.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: This world is full of beauty, as other worlds above, and if we did our duty, it might be as full of love.
quotes.author: Gerald Massey

quotes.quote: The world is but a perpetual see-saw.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The world is large, when its weary leagues two loving hearts divide; But the world is small, when your enemy is loose on the other side.
quotes.author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quotes.quote: I believe the world is incomprehensibly beautiful - an endless prospect of magic and wonder.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: The world is not something to understand. Instead, you just adapt to it.
quotes.author: Na Taejoo

quotes.quote: The world is like a dropped pie most of the time. Don't kill yourself trying to put it back together. Just grab a fork and eat some of it off the floor. Then carry on.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Live theater to me is much more free than the movies or television.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: The theater is the only branch of art much cared for by people of wealth; like canasta, it does away with the brother of talk after dinner.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Musical theater is great; you get painted up, you get to play princesses and witches, and you sing. The joy alone of that can really carry a lot.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.quote: The theater is so endlessly fascinating because it's so accidental. It's so much like life.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: Theater is, of course, a reflection of life. Maybe we have to improve life before we can hope to improve theater.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: In theater, they say a theater piece is only as good as its transitions.
quotes.author: Reggie Watts

quotes.quote: I think theater is a core need of a community.
quotes.author: Sam Underwood

quotes.quote: To me, theater is the mecca; if you really love to act, that's where it's the most fun, by a long shot.
quotes.author: Scott Caan

quotes.quote: Theater is the most enriching and thrilling thing to do as an actor.
quotes.author: Paul Rudd

quotes.quote: The theater, bringing impersonal masks to life, is only for those who are virile enough to create new life: either as a conflict of passions subtler than those we already know, or as a complete new character.
quotes.author: Alfred Jarry

quotes.quote: The theater is magical and addictive.
quotes.author: Angela Lansbury

quotes.quote: In the theater, characters have to cut the umbilical cord from the writer and talk in their own voices.
quotes.author: Irwin Shaw

quotes.quote: Theater is a living creature. It takes a while to break in, like a new pair of shoes.
quotes.author: Darren Criss

quotes.quote: The theater is a tough place. It's not cushioned the way it is in film and television.
quotes.author: Patti LuPone

quotes.quote: What I like about theater is its team work. Theater is also all-time creativity.
quotes.author: Goenawan Mohamad

quotes.quote: When you are performing in theater, you feel so connected to your audience. It's exhilarating!
quotes.author: Laura Marano

quotes.quote: The trick about the theater is at the end of the day you cannot take any of it personally.
quotes.author: William Ivey Long

quotes.quote: It's street theater. You have to make it entertaining so people don't get bored and walk away.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.quote: When theater becomes a soothing middle-class thing, when it's packaged as the Night Out, then that's the death of it.
quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.quote: To be in theater you have to be a kind of psychologist, for you're always trying to understand character and motives.
quotes.author: John Eldredge

quotes.quote: The theater needs continual reminders that there is nothing more debasing than the work of those who do well what is not worth doing at all.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: The energy of live theater is indescribable. You are just in the moment for an hour and a half.
quotes.author: Adrianne Palicki

quotes.quote: What people really want in the theater is fantasy involvement and not reality involvement.
quotes.author: Edward Albee

quotes.quote: Theater for me at one point was a lifestyle, too.
quotes.author: Al Pacino

quotes.quote: Theater is a space where you cross over from everyday life, because there are real people in that moment moving in front of you - you're being invited to believe in a story and cross that bridge.
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.quote: In the theater, everything is ephemeral. Everything is almost weightless and without a very clear definition of how you made it.
quotes.author: Rafael Vinoly

quotes.quote: Let's just say that the theater is not for the faint of heart.
quotes.author: Phylicia Rashad

quotes.quote: What is needed in the theater, in fact for all our art forms, is a vibrant critical tradition.
quotes.author: F. Sionil Jose

quotes.quote: Theater has to resonate in your heart in a way that movies don't.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: Theater has an incredible capacity to move people to social change, to address issues, to inspire social revolution.
quotes.author: Eve Ensler

quotes.quote: We have freedom of speech, but you got to watch what you say.
quotes.author: Viola Spolin

quotes.quote: Theatre exists only because it is overwhelming, because its acting is astonishing. Where a theatre and its acting are merely 'good,' merely 'correct,' merely 'in the proper style,' theatre dies a slow death.
quotes.author: Robert Cohen

quotes.quote: The word theatre comes from the Greeks. It means the seeing place. It is the place people come to see the truth about life and the social situation. The theatre is a spiritual and social X-ray of its time. The theatre was created to tell people the truth about life and the social situation.
quotes.author: Stella Adler

quotes.quote: Movies will make you famous; Television will make you rich; But theatre will make you good.
quotes.author: Terrence Mann

quotes.quote: The theatre, when all is said and done, is not life in miniature, but life enormously magnified, life hideously exaggerated.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Theater is, of course, a reflection of life. Maybe we have to improve life before we can hope to improve theater.
quotes.author: W. R. Inge

quotes.quote: You need three things in the theatre -- the play, the actors and the audience, and each must give something.
quotes.author: Kenneth Haigh

quotes.quote: Theater is a verb before it is a noun, an act before it is a place.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: In theater, the wellspring of the character comes from the doing of it, like a trial by fire, but in front of an audience.
quotes.author: Estelle Parsons

quotes.quote: In the theater, characters have to cut the umbilical cord from the writer and talk in their own voices.
quotes.author: Irwin Shaw

quotes.quote: The primary function of a theater is not to please itself, or even to please its audience. It is to serve talent.
quotes.author: Robert Brustein

quotes.quote: It's one of the tragic ironies of the theatre that only one man in it can count on steady work -- the night watchman.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: The theatre is a place where one has time for the problems of people to whom one would show the door if they came to one's office for a job.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Coughing in the theater is not a repiratory ailment. It is criticism.
quotes.author: Alan Jay Lerner

quotes.quote: My only regret in the theater is that I could never sit out front and watch me.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: The theater is so endlessly fascinating because it's so accidental. It's so much like life.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: In the theater the audience wants to be surprised but by things that they expect.
quotes.author: Tristan Bernard

quotes.quote: The theater needs continual reminders that there is nothing more debasing than the work of those who do well what is not worth doing at all.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: The theater, which is in no thing, but makes use of everything -- gestures, sounds, words, screams, light, darkness -- rediscovers itself at precisely the point where the mind requires a language to express its manifestations. To break through language in order to touch life is to create or recreate the theatre.
quotes.author: Antonin Artaud

quotes.quote: Theatre demands different muscles and different aspects of one's personality.
quotes.author: Victor Garber

quotes.quote: The difference between a theatre with and without an audience is enormous. There is a palpable, critical energy created by the presence of the audience.
quotes.author: Andy Goldsworthy

quotes.quote: No theater could sanely flourish until there was an umbilical connection between what was happening on the stage and what was happening in the world.
quotes.author: Kenneth Tynan

quotes.quote: I regard the theatre as the greatest of all art forms, the most immediate way in which a human being can share with another the sense of what it is to be a human being.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: Theatre is a weapon. For that reason it must be fought for.
quotes.author: Augusto Boal

quotes.quote: Nothing in theatre has any meaning before or after. Meaning is now.
quotes.author: Peter Brook

quotes.quote: The theatre is traditionally where people go to hear the truth.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: If you want to help the American theater, don't be an actress, be an audience.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: The theater is a great equalizer: it is the only place where the poor can look down on the rich.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The theater is so endlessly fascinating because it is so accidental. It's so much like life.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: Theater is dangerously open to repetition. It's exciting when you hit on a new way.
quotes.author: Fiona Shaw

quotes.quote: The theme of Death is to Poetry what Mistaken Identity is to Drama.
quotes.author: Dannie Abse

quotes.quote: Pick a theme and work it to exhaustion... the subject must be something you truly love or truly hate.
quotes.author: Dorothea Lange

quotes.quote: There is no reason why challenging themes and engaging stories have to be mutually exclusive - in fact, each can fuel the other.
quotes.author: Edward Zwick

quotes.quote: If there is an abiding theme in 'The Pursuit of Happiness,' it is the idea that you come into the world already shaped by other people's past histories.
quotes.author: Douglas Kennedy

quotes.quote: A theme of digital success is keeping it simple.
quotes.author: Walter Isaacson

quotes.quote: The theme of old age doesn't seem to fascinate Hollywood.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: A strong theme is always running through a well-told story.
quotes.author: Andrew Stanton

quotes.quote: A running theme in my life is my inability to say no to anything.
quotes.author: David Pogue

quotes.quote: A musical theme once exhausted, finds its due refuge and repose in silence.
quotes.author: Henri-Frédéric Amiel

quotes.quote: A theme is always necessary, a plain, simple, unadorned theme to confuse the ignorant.
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: The theme of the Bible is not that the world's not messy but that God's at work in the mess.
quotes.author: Matt Chandler

quotes.quote: There is a theme that runs through my work, and that is: the toxic property of keeping secrets.
quotes.author: Joyce Maynard

quotes.quote: If a theme or idea is too near the surface, the novel becomes simply a tract illustrating an idea.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: If the theme is simple, you can include a hundred details that create the illusion of actuality better.
quotes.author: Satyajit Ray

quotes.quote: If there is one abiding theme in the gym, it's the withering work in the ring. Those not fit do not survive.
quotes.author: Emanuel Steward

quotes.quote: A key theme is that human history, behavior and reality are governed not by what we know but by what we believe.
quotes.author: Richard B. Spence

quotes.quote: The overall theme of theology can be twofold: the search for meaning and the responsibility one has to the others.
quotes.author: Namsoon Kang

quotes.quote: One of the great themes in American literature is the individual's confrontation with the vast open spaces of the continent.
quotes.author: Justin Cronin

quotes.quote: There are some themes, some subjects, too large for adult fiction; they can only be dealt with adequately in a children's book.
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.quote: A recurring theme in the literature of secular humanism is the harsh assault upon traditional religion, especially Christianity.
quotes.author: Guenter Lewy

quotes.quote: There are certain themes of which the interest is all-absorbing, but which are too entirely horrible for the purposes of legitimate fiction.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: They say great themes make great novels. but what these young writers don't understand is that there is no greater theme than men and women.
quotes.author: John O'Hara

quotes.quote: Two increasing themes which appear to dominate our listening, reading and watching lives are propaganda and 'national security', or manufactured war.
quotes.author: John Pilger

quotes.quote: These are the themes in life which are consistent in Judaism, Islam, Hinduism - of being grounded in who you are and being engaged in an unjust world.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: The theme, or harmony, of a painting can be created by any one of its visual elements. A single colour... repetition of shapes... Light can be a theme.
quotes.author: Mike Svob

quotes.quote: A theme that appears repeatedly in the writings of the social critics of the second half of the 20th century is the sense of purposelessness that afflicts many people in modern society.
quotes.author: Theodore Kaczynski

quotes.quote: Themes of redemption, temptation, and faith don't necessarily apply directly to religion. A lot of people find faith in their lives outside of God and still deal with notions of temptation and redemption that aren't religious.
quotes.author: Will Poulter

quotes.quote: You can't tell any kind of a story without having some kind of a theme, something to say between the lines.
quotes.author: Robert Wise

quotes.quote: If there's an enduring theme in my work, it's probably the effects of class on American life.
quotes.author: Richard Russo

quotes.quote: Exploit a subject or a theme to its greatest potential by bringing all possible reference to bear - then put aside the reference and create again using the potential of your unfettered imagination.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: Disney's something to be a little alarmed about. It's not just a little theme park anymore. It's now an ethic and outlook and strategy that goes way beyond central Florida.
quotes.author: Carl Hiaasen

quotes.quote: I love theme parks but I'm a real chicken on rides. I'd rather invent scary rides for my books than go on them for real.
quotes.author: R.L.Stine

quotes.quote: Life's like a roller coaster till it drops, but what should I scream for? This is my theme park.
quotes.author: Dwayne Carter

quotes.quote: Life is not a theme park, and if it is, the theme is death.
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.quote: My wife loves Europe, but to me it's a bad day at a theme park.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: New York is a theme park for people with IQs over 108.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Imagination ... is not a Disney theme park, but is a incredible force that when unleashed ... can help greatly better humanity.
quotes.author: Timothy Pina

quotes.quote: 'Florida is a theme park,' said Serge. And the theme is weirdness.
quotes.author: Tim Dorsey

quotes.quote: The sixties are like a theme park to them. They wear the costume, buy their tickets, and they have the experience.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: If you go to a theme park, there will be so many rides. You will get an exciting experience in each of them. Like that, every film is an experience that entertains you. Some films will touch your heart. Some will touch you emotionally. There is nothing more than that.
quotes.author: Vijay Sethupathi

quotes.quote: AÂ theologyÂ without spirituality would be a sterile academic exercise.
quotes.author: John Macquarrie

quotes.quote: TheologyÂ must work itself out in the most practical relationships.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: The ultimate goal ofÂ theologyÂ isn't knowledge, but worship.
quotes.author: Sam Storms

quotes.quote: TheologyÂ without proclamation is empty, proclamation withoutÂ theologyÂ is blind.
quotes.author: Gerhard Ebeling

quotes.quote: TheologyÂ is not what we know about God, but what we do not know about nature.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Let us put theology out of religion. Theology has always sent the worst to heaven, the best to hell.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: You will find all true theology summed up in these two short sentences: Salvation is all of the grace of God. Damnation is all of the will of man.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The goal ofÂ theologyÂ is the worship of God. The posture ofÂ theologyÂ is on one's knees. The mode ofÂ theologyÂ is repentance.
quotes.author: Sinclair B. Ferguson

quotes.quote: DeepÂ theologyÂ is the best fuel of devotion; it readily catches fire, and once kindled it burns long.
quotes.author: Frederick William Faber

quotes.quote: TheologyÂ is only thought applied to religion.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: TheologyÂ is an attempt to explain a subject by men who do not understand it. The intent is not to tell the truth but to satisfy the questioner.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: ClassicalÂ theologyÂ has erred in its insistence thatÂ theologyÂ be 'God-centered,' not 'man-centered'.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: TheologyÂ without love simply is very badÂ theology.
quotes.author: Paul David Tripp

quotes.quote: ChristianÂ theologyÂ is not only opposed to the scientific spirit; it is opposed to every other form of rational thinking.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: The best theology is rather a divine life than a divine knowledge.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: TheologyÂ is taught by God, teaches God, and leads to God.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: TheologyÂ is now little more than a branch of human ignorance.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: Theology is not only about understanding the world; it is about mending the world.
quotes.author: Miroslav Volf

quotes.quote: Theology is but our ideas of truth classified and arranged.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Theology is a science of mind applied to God.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Theology, like fiction, is largely autobiographical.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: Any amount ofÂ theologyÂ can now be smuggled into people's minds under the cover of fiction without their knowing it.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: AnyÂ theologyÂ that is indifferent to the theme of liberation is not ChristianÂ theology.
quotes.author: James H. Cone

quotes.quote: A theology should be like poetry, which takes us to the end of what words and thoughts can do.
quotes.author: Karen Armstrong

quotes.quote: One man'sÂ theologyÂ is another man's belly laugh.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: An important function of theology is to keep religion tied to reason and reason to religion. Both roles are of essential importance for humanity.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: The shortest route to deeper and richer worship is a clearer theology.
quotes.author: P.D. Manson

quotes.quote: One of the main tasks of theology is to find words that do not divide but unite, that do not create conflict but unity, that do not hurt but heal.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: AnyÂ theologyÂ that does not lead to song is, at a fundamental level, a flawedÂ theology.
quotes.author: J. I. Packer

quotes.quote: TheologyÂ offers you a working arrangement, which leaves the scientist free to continue his experiments and the Christian to continue his prayers.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Experience without theory is blind, but theory without experience is mere intellectual play.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Never abandon a theory that explains something until you have a theory that explains more.
quotes.author: John McCarthy

quotes.quote: Theory without data is myth: data without theory is madness.
quotes.author: Phil Zuckerman

quotes.quote: Theories are private property, but truth is common stock
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: We must alter theory to adapt it to nature, but not nature to adapt it to theory.
quotes.author: Claude Bernard

quotes.quote: Experience by itself teaches nothing...Without theory, experience has no meaning. Without theory, one has no questions to ask. Hence without theory there is no learning.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: In theory there is no difference between theory and practice. In practice there is.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: A good scientific theory is one which is falsifiable, which has not been falsified.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Theory is worth but little, unless it can explain its own phenomena, and it must effect this without contradicting itself; therefore, the facts are sometimes assimilated to the theory, rather than the theory to the facts.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: It is the theory which decides what can be observed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The truth of a theory is in your mind, not in your eyes.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The difference between theory and practice is larger in practice than the difference between theory and practice in theory.
quotes.author: Jan L. A. van de Snepscheut

quotes.quote: Leave your theories. All theories, you see, even those of virtue, are bad, foolish, mischievous.
quotes.author: Romain Rolland

quotes.quote: The moment a person forms a theory, his imagination sees in every object only the traits which favor that theory.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Theories are usually the over-hasty efforts of an impatient understanding that would gladly be rid of phenomena, and so puts in their place pictures, notions, nay, often mere words.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A theory is no more like a fact than a photograph is like a person.
quotes.author: Edward W. Howe

quotes.quote: Generally the theories we believe we call facts, and the facts we disbelieve we call theories.
quotes.author: Felix Cohen

quotes.quote: A theory must be tempered with reality.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: All theories are legitimate, no matter. What matters is what you do with them.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: All theory, dear friend, is gray, but the golden tree of life springs ever green.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Theory and practice sometimes clash. And when that happens, theory loses. Every single time.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: A young man is a theory, an old man is a fact.
quotes.author: E.W. Howe

quotes.quote: Every theory is a self-fulfilling prophecy that orders experience into the framework it provides.
quotes.author: Ruth Hubbard

quotes.quote: Theories are neither hunches nor guesses. They are the crown jewels of science.
quotes.author: Carl Zimmer

quotes.quote: Those who say theory and practice are two unrelated realms are fools in one and scoundrels in the other.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The theory of rights enables us to rise and overthrow obstacles, but not to found a strong and lasting accord between all the elements which compose the nation.
quotes.author: Giuseppe Mazzini

quotes.quote: Theory helps us to bear our ignorance of fact.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: There is a distinction, but no opposition, between theory and practice. Each to a certain extent supposes the other. Theory is dependent on practice; practice must have preceded theory.
quotes.author: Sir William Hamilton

quotes.quote: An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory.
quotes.author: Friedrich Engels

quotes.quote: No theory is good unless it permits, not rest, but the greatest work. No theory is good except on condition that one use it to go on beyond.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Psychoanalysis pretends to investigate the Unconscious. The Unconscious by definition is what you are not conscious of. But the Analysts already know what's in it. They should, because they put it all in beforehand. It's like an Easter Egg hunt.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: In therapy, the therapist acts as a container for what we daren't let out, because it is so scary, or what lets itself out every so often, and lays waste to our lives.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Psychoanalysis has taught that the dead -- a dead parent, for example -- can be more alive for us, more powerful, more scary, than the living. It is the question of ghosts.
quotes.author: Jacques Derrida

quotes.quote: It is easier to tell our therapist about our sex life than it is to tell our accountant about our finances.
quotes.author: Vicki Robin

quotes.quote: In psycho-analysis nothing is true except the exaggerations.
quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

quotes.quote: Psychoanalysis is in essence a cure through love.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Psychologists have found that we are more likely, in looking back at our lives, to remember high points and dramatic shifts in far greater proportion than ongoing stretches of happiness or misery.
quotes.author: Sissela Bok

quotes.quote: Sometimes, just the act of venting is helpful. Counseling provides a safe haven for precisely that kind of free-ranging release: You can say things in the therapist's office, with the therapist present, that would be incendiary or hurtful in your living room.
quotes.author: Laura Wasser

quotes.quote: The role of the therapist is to reflect the being/accepting self that was never allowed to be in the borderline.
quotes.author: Michael Adzema

quotes.quote: Just about every therapist or counselor or social worker is practiced in dealing with people going through failing relationships, ending them, and confronting issues of custody and support.
quotes.author: Laura Wasser

quotes.quote: Psychologists really aim to be scientists, white-coat stuff, with elaborate statistics, running experiments.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Psychologists call this habituation, economists call it declining marginal utility, and the rest of us call it marriage.
quotes.author: Daniel Gilbert

quotes.quote: Any therapist will tell you that when you're ready, you will come out. To be outed means you weren't ready.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: Psychoanalysis is unlikely to be repealed; people are not going to go back to reading novels in order to understand themselves and their lives.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Nunberg

quotes.quote: Most therapists do not appear to know how to pinpoint and reverse therapeutic resistance - to head it off at the pass. Instead, they try to persuade the patient to change, or to do the psychotherapy homework, while the patient resists and 'yes-butts' the therapist. The therapist ends up feeling frustrated and resentful, and doing all the work.
quotes.author: David D Burns

quotes.quote: Psychoanalysis does not distort the truth by accident. It does so by necessity. It is an effective system for the suppression of the truth about childhood, a truth feared by our entire society. Not surprisingly, it enjoys great esteem among intellectuals.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: Psychoanalysis can provide a theory of 'progress,' but only by viewing history as a neurosis.
quotes.author: Norman O. Brown

quotes.quote: The daily clinical experience of thousands of massage therapists, physical therapists, and physicians strongly indicates that most of our common aches and pains - and many other puzzling physical complaints - are actually caused by trigger points, or small contraction knots, in the muscles of the body.
quotes.author: Clair Davies

quotes.quote: Effective psychotherapy works because the therapist continues to grow as a person and as a healer.
quotes.author: Jed Diamond

quotes.quote: Life as a therapist is ruthless; circumstances that are helpful to one neurotic may crush another.
quotes.author: Karen Horney

quotes.quote: No psychologist should pretend to understand what he does not understand... Only fools and charlatans know everything and understand nothing.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Psychoanalysis is confession without absolution.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: If you have a therapist who agrees with your every word, then your brain isn't getting proper exercise.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.quote: A therapist who rushes to help forgets to listen.
quotes.author: Noam Shpancer

quotes.quote: If everybody in the world saw a therapist, we would have a better world.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Time and rest are needed for absorption. Psychologists confirm that it is really in the summer that our muscles learn to skate and in the winter, how to swim.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: Psychoanalysis is a technique we practice at our cost; psychoanalysis degrades our risks, our dangers, our depths; it strips us of our impurities, of all that made us curious about ourselves.
quotes.author: E.M. Cioran

quotes.quote: A good therapist uses their whole being to engage fully with the whole being of the person coming for help.
quotes.author: Jed Diamond

quotes.quote: Fortunately analysis [psychoanalysis] is not the only way to resolve inner conflicts. Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.
quotes.author: Karen Horney

quotes.quote: A knowledgeable physical therapist can slowly build up patients' confidence by reassuring them that there is no structural problem and reminding them of the physiologic reason for the pain.
quotes.author: John E. Sarno

quotes.quote: Therapy is often a matter of tipping the first domino.
quotes.author: Milton H. Erickson

quotes.quote: The best therapy is actually the more aggressive kind when they break you open; they unleash you.
quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

quotes.quote: Therapy is like telling your nightmares when you're a kid; they lose their power to hurt and control.
quotes.author: Beth Orton

quotes.quote: Psychotherapy is a private, confidential conversation that has nothing to do with illness, medicine, or healing.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: Therapy is not to 'talk about' things, but to change the person's life, and to relieve suffering, such as depression, anxiety, or relationship problems.
quotes.author: David D. Burns

quotes.quote: The purpose of psychotherapy is to set people free.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Effective psychotherapy works because the therapist continues to grow as a person and as a healer.
quotes.author: Jed Diamond

quotes.quote: Psychotherapy may begin with the primitive, but it must end with the divine, for both are integral factors in the human mind.
quotes.author: Dion Fortune

quotes.quote: Psychotherapy can be one of the greatest and most rewarding adventures, it can bring with it the deepest feelings of personal worth, of purpose and richness in living.
quotes.author: Eda Leshan

quotes.quote: There thus appears to be an inverse correlation between recovery and psychotherapy; the more psychotherapy, the smaller the recovery rate.
quotes.author: Hans Eysenck

quotes.quote: Psychotherapy is a cyclical process from isolation into relationship. It is cyclical because the patient, in terror of existential isolation, relates deeply and meaningfully to the therapist and then, strengthened by this encounter, is led back again to a confrontation with existential isolation.
quotes.author: Irvin D. Yalom

quotes.quote: Therapy isn't radio. We don't need to constantly fill the air with sounds. Sometimes, when it's quiet, surprising things happen.
quotes.author: Mary Pipher

quotes.quote: Psychotherapy is the art of finding the angel of hope in the midst of terror, despair and madness.
quotes.author: Cloe Madanes

quotes.quote: Psychotherapy isn't a twentieth-century artifice imposed on nature, but the reinstatement of a natural healing process.
quotes.author: Patricia Love

quotes.quote: Everything is in slow motion down there and silent. It could replace psychotherapy.
quotes.author: Ashrita Furman

quotes.quote: I put myself out there; it's part of my job, and I get it: people will attack me. At first I was thrown off, but now I have a pretty thick skin about it.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.quote: Later on in my life, it became a big theme: just being okay and comfortable to take the risk and to have really thick skin and realize not everybody is going to love your product. Get over it, and if you believe in it, keep going forward.
quotes.author: Jesse Itzler

quotes.quote: People assume because I have a very thick skin that I don't have feelings. I don't, for the most part. But occasionally, I'm capable of great acts of charity. I tend to do it quietly.
quotes.author: Milo Yiannopoulos

quotes.quote: Dealing with negative comments is part of this job, and I've had to develop a thick skin, though some days it's easier than others.
quotes.author: Sara Sampaio

quotes.quote: You have to have a thick skin, yes. If you're going to do something as foolhardy as standup, you've got to be able to take it on the chin if someone has a go at you.
quotes.author: Bill Bailey

quotes.quote: The problem with thick skin is that it leaves you impervious to the sharpest of pins. Everything becomes dull. But without that sense of pain, there cannot be that sense of relief. Ultimately, the thickened skin leaves you numb, incapable of feeling the highs and lows of life. It leaves you rough like a rock and just as inanimate.
quotes.author: Michael Soll

quotes.quote: Focus on your work. Be the best you that you can be. Develop a thick skin and let things roll off your back. And keep a sense of humor!
quotes.author: Megan Alexander

quotes.quote: Starting a business isn't for everyone, and it's not what you should do if you aren't sure what else to do. It requires thick skin and the willingness to carry a great deal of stress, sometimes alone. It's more often a life of failure than a life of success, and the majority of successes came after a long road of disappointment, and often shame.
quotes.author: Kathryn Minshew

quotes.quote: My biggest advice for girls - and this is something that I wish I could have known when I was younger - is to have thick skin. It's something that you definitely develop when you get older, but when I first started, I was so obsessed with pleasing everybody. I wanted everybody to like me and to like my songs.
quotes.author: Kate Voegele

quotes.quote: Freud was the son of a Jewish merchant who had to move his whole family to Vienna because he couldn't get work. He, as a boy, had to watch his father be mocked and abused on the street for being Jewish... You develop a thick skin and you develop a certain kind of wit to defend yourself.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.quote: Without that thick skin and a clear vision of what it is you want to do, what it is you know you want to do, it can be really easy to get out here and get lost and swept away in whatever is going on. You really have to be steadfast in the mind for sure.
quotes.author: Stephen Boss

quotes.quote: Millions of people have decided not to be sensitive. They have grown thick skins around themselves just to avoid being hurt by anybody. But it is at great cost. Nobody can hurt them, but nobody can make them happy either.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: People say that one of the most important things about being an actor is to have thick skin, but I don't think that's it. Because you can't just walk around being tough, you have to be able to be vulnerable to do this. So really, it's about not being defensive.
quotes.author: Jess Weixler

quotes.quote: You have to realize, when you're a comedian, that you have to have a thick skin. And trust me, being onstage in front of people is already difficult enough. Somebody's personal attack in an email is not as hard as getting onstage.
quotes.author: Dane Cook

quotes.quote: The life of a dancer is not for everyone. You really have to have some thick skin. You really have to know what you're going into and how competitive the field is.
quotes.author: Stephen Boss

quotes.quote: Because 98 percent of our ideas are not great ideas, or everyone would be a billionaire. So yeah. That's something people have had a lot of experience in: being told our idea is bad or our performance is bad. I think that's the one common thread between all working actors is that they have a pretty thick skin - or you'd like to hope. You're used to rejection, that's for sure.
quotes.author: Dax Shepard

quotes.quote: Even if you can sing or even if you can write a song, it takes a lot of determination, it takes some kind of thick skin, because you got to persevere despite the fact that people tell you you shouldn't do this or you shouldn't do that or you're not good enough or your style's too different. I've heard all of that stuff.
quotes.author: John Legend

quotes.quote: Having a thick skin doesn't mean that you're hard or harsh. I was lucky because I was born with a thick skin. That doesn't mean that things don't bother me, but you have to keep it in perspective.
quotes.author: Shelley Moore Capito

quotes.quote: I have a very thick skin. I take everything that comes and let it bounce right off me because I know the time will come when nobody will be able to speak falsely.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: You know, when you go to high school or, you know, when kids are younger and there's not an understanding of differences. But I built up a very strong, thick skin.
quotes.author: Alexander Wang

quotes.quote: When you live in the Philippines or a country like that, you develop something of a very thick skin because you're confronted every day with all of the problems all around you.
quotes.author: Miguel Syjuco

quotes.quote: God, make me a man with thick skin and a soft heart. Make me a man who is tough and tender. Make me tough so I can handle life. Make me tender so I can love people. God, make me a man.
quotes.author: Darrin Patrick

quotes.quote: When I was in first grade, the kids called me 'fatso.' It hurt, but the way I overcame it was to outrun every kid in the class. So I developed a thick skin, and athletics became my way of performing and being accepted.
quotes.author: Billy Casper

quotes.quote: An African woman carries heavy loads anyway. That's how we are trained; we are brought up that nothing is unbearable. I use that now, positively. I use that now to have the thick skin that I have, and not fear, and move forward, and push; and push forward.
quotes.author: Joyce Banda

quotes.quote: I've been thinking recently about all the qualities you need in order to be an actor. First and foremost, you've got to have a thick skin and give out an 'I don't give a monkey's what you think' kind of vibe, while at the same time really caring what everyone thinks. You've got to be tough and sensitive at the same time.
quotes.author: Jessica Raine

quotes.quote: A human being has so many skins inside, covering the depths of the heart. We know so many things, but we don't know ourselves! Why, thirty or forty skins or hides, as thick and hard as an ox's or bear's, cover the soul. Go into your own ground and learn to know yourself there.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Make sure to be honest with yourself, about if that's really what you want to do with your life - to make music. It takes a commitment - a tremendous, thick-skinned commitment of being the first one to get there and the last one to leave, doing what you want to do even if you have to work twice as hard as anybody else ever did.
quotes.author: Charlie Daniels

quotes.quote: Hey, you've got to have a thick skin. You've got to take negativity for what it is. You've got to keep working, keep pushing.
quotes.author: Jon Gruden

quotes.quote: I now look back fondly at those being the most constructive years for preparing me for life in the real world, ... You have to have pretty thick skin and you have to have big shoulders.
quotes.author: Tom Curley

quotes.quote: Hope has a thick skin and will endure many a blow; it will put on patience as a vestment and will endure all things (if they be of the right kind) for the joy that is set before it. Hence patience is called patience of hope,' because it is hope that makes the soul exercise long-suffering under the cross until the time comes to enjoy the crown!
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: To steal ideas from one person is plagiarism; to steal from many is research.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The thief or swindler who has gained great wealth by his delinquency has a better chance than the small thief of escaping the rigorous penalty of the law.
quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.quote: Even the best thief in the world can't steal time.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: Good artists copy, great artists steal.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Lie to a liar, for lies are his coin; Steal from a thief, for that is easy; lay a trap for a trickster and catch him at first attempt, but beware of an honest man.
quotes.author: Arab Proverb

quotes.quote: Steal a little and they'll put you in jail, steal a lot and they'll make you king.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: The petty thief is imprisoned but the big thief becomes a feudal lord.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: If you steal, do not steal too much at a time. You may be arrested. Steal cleverly, little by little.
quotes.author: Mobutu Sese Seko

quotes.quote: A thief is a man in need. A liar is a man in fear.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A thief believes everybody steals.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Thief is not the one who steals, but the one that is caught.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You shall not steal, nor deal falsely, nor lie to one another.
quotes.author: Moses

quotes.quote: The thief, as will become apparent, was a special type of thief. This thief was an artist of theft. Other thieves merely stole everything that was not nailed down, but this thief stole the nails as well.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: A thief is one who insists on sharing his victimhood.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: One can steal ideas, but no one can steal execution or passion.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: The thief steals from himself. The swindler swindles himself. For the real price is knowledge and virtue, whereof wealth and credit are signs. These signs, like paper money, may be counterfeited or stolen, but that which they represent, namely, knowledge and virtue, cannot be counterfeited or stolen.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Slavery is theft, theft of a life, theft of work, theft of any property or produce, theft even of the children a slave might have borne.
quotes.author: Kevin Bales

quotes.quote: We hang the petty thieves and appoint the great ones to public office.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: You are a den of vipers and thieves. I intend to rout you out, and by the grace of the eternal God, I will rout you out.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: Every rascal is not a thief, but every thief is a rascal.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I'm going to Heaven just like the thief on the cross who said in that last moment: 'Lord, remember me.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Regret and fear are twin thieves that rob us of today.
quotes.author: Bob Hastings

quotes.quote: If you want to know what to do with a thief that you may find stealing, I say kill him on the spot, and never suffer him to commit another iniquity.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: Don't let a thief into your house three times. The first time was enough. The second time was a chance. The third time means you're stupid.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Sex divorced from love is the thief of personal dignity.
quotes.author: Caitlin Thomas

quotes.quote: Set a thief to catch a thief.
quotes.author: Callimachus

quotes.quote: My advice is to never do tomorrow what you can do today. Procrastination is the thief of time.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I would not put a thief in my mouth to steal my brains.
quotes.author: Charles Portis

quotes.quote: Death never comes at the right time, despite what mortals believe. Death always comes like a thief.
quotes.author: Christopher Pike

quotes.quote: The seconds tick. They always do. The power of an entire sun cannot stop them even for a moment, and so death comes between the moments, like a thief of light in the dark.
quotes.author: Christopher Pike

quotes.quote: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Think before you speak. Read before you think.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Reading furnishes the mind only with materials of knowledge; it is thinking that makes what we read ours.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: The mind is what it thinks. To make it true, think true.
quotes.author: Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: No problem can withstand the assault of sustained thinking.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Reading without reflecting is like eating without digesting.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to sit awhile and think.
quotes.author: Lorraine Hansberry

quotes.quote: You and I are not what we eat; we are what we think.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
quotes.author: Robert H Schuller

quotes.quote: We don t see things as they are, we see them as we are.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: No matter what the situation, remind yourself ?I have a choice.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: A great many people think they are thinking when they are merely rearranging their prejudices.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Clear thinking requires courage rather than intelligence.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: Few minds wear out; more rust out.
quotes.author: Christian N. Bovee

quotes.quote: It is well for people who think, to change their minds occasionally in order to keep them clean.
quotes.author: Luther Burbank

quotes.quote: Most of the mistakes in thinking are inadequacies of perception rather than mistakes of logic.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: A man who does not think for himself does not think at all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Take time to deliberate; but when the time for action arrives, stop thinking and go in.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: Thinking is easy, acting is difficult, and to put one's thoughts into action is the most difficult thing in the world.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Think for yourselves and let others enjoy the privilege to do so, too
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Thinking is the greatest torture in the world for most people.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Where else would any sane man want to be, but in your eyes, your heart, and your arms, a sea of passion ever moving, beating like my heart when I think of you.
quotes.author: Greg Mendoza

quotes.quote: If I had a single flower for every time I think of you, I could walk forever in my garden.
quotes.author: Claudia Adrienne Grandi

quotes.quote: I can go days without talking to you, months without seeing you, but not a second goes by that I'm not thinking about you.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Somewhere someone is thinking of you. Someone is calling you an angel. This person is using celestial colors to paint your image. Someone is making you into a vision so beautiful that it can only live in the mind.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: I've been thinking about you constantly since I left, wondering why the journey I'm on seemed to have led through you. I know my journey's not over yet, and that life is a winding path, but I can only hope it somehow circles back to the place I belong. That's how I think of it now. I belong with you.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I went to sleep last night thinking about you, I woke up this morning still thinking about you. When I'm down, I whisper your name to myself and smile. I still love you, don't doubt it.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: I think about you constantly, whether it's with my mind or my heart.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: My heart dances with joy when I think about you.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Every now and then my heart wanders back in time and all those old feelings awaken the memories in my mind.
quotes.author: Fad Ibra

quotes.quote: You are the sun in my day the wind in my sky the waves in my ocean and the beat in my heart... Thinking of You!
quotes.author: Paul

quotes.quote: Love reckons hours for months, and days for years; and every little absence is an age.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Do you know I never ever feel bored, never ever feel lonely, because you are always in my thoughts, morning, afternoon and night.
quotes.author: Mitch Cuento

quotes.quote: Just thought I'd let you know I've been thinking of you. So I thought I'd brighten up your day and bring a smile to you, praying God will touch your life in a more meaningful way and that you'll feel the warmth of God, today and every day.
quotes.author: M.S.Lowndes

quotes.quote: Lost in loneliness and pain. Black and unendurable, Thinking of You with every Corpuscle of my flesh, in Every instant of night And day.
quotes.author: Kenneth Rexroth

quotes.quote: Between a million yesterdays and a million tomorrows, there's only one today. And I would never let it pass without telling you I'm thinking of you.
quotes.author: Mitch Cuento

quotes.quote: When I think of you, I think of kindness, wisdom and love. Thanks for being you.
quotes.author: Sam Crow

quotes.quote: When we're together or when we're apart, you're first in my thoughts and first in my heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Laughter, acceptance, love. These are the things I think of whenever I think of you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Thinking of You is easy - I do it every day. Missing you is the heartache, that never goes away.
quotes.author: Michael Pryce

quotes.quote: My thoughts are free to go anywhere, but it's suprising how often they head in your direction.
quotes.author: Perez

quotes.quote: I'm thinking of you, that's all I do, all the time. You're always the first and the last thing on this heart of mine. No matter where I go, or what I do, I'm thinking of you.
quotes.author: Dierks Bentley

quotes.quote: Want to know a Secret? Someone out there can't stop thinking about you.You are Beautiful. Don't ever believe differently.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Thou perchance art thinking now. As I think of thee, and our thoughts in heaven above meet invisibly.
quotes.author: J.J. Britton

quotes.quote: I keep myself busy with the things I do. But in every moment when I pause, I still think of you.
quotes.author: Mitch Cuento

quotes.quote: Although we are miles apart, the thought and touch of you lives within my heart. It is for that reason my dear you will always feel near, even though we are thousands of miles APART!
quotes.author: Andrew Guzaldo

quotes.quote: Late at night when all the world is sleeping, I stay up and think of you. And I wish on a star that somewhere you are thinking of me too.
quotes.author: Selena Quintanilla Perez

quotes.quote: Thinking of You where ever you are- We pray for our sorrows to end and hope that our hearts will blend now I will step forward to realize this wish- And who knows starting a new journey may not be so hard or maybe it's already begun- There are many worlds but they share the same sky one sky one destiny.
quotes.author: Shiro Amano

quotes.quote: If I had a rose for every time I thought of you, I'd be picking roses for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Dylan McNair

quotes.quote: I am waiting and hoping and wishing for the time, when we can be together again! Thinking of You...
quotes.author: James

quotes.quote: When I think of you I get this feeling that I want to see you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do not curse the well that quenches your thirst.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: My spirit thirst for the living water.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Thirst is the aim for quest, it keeps inspiring to find more and more; Otherwise, satisfied we would sit, and lazily rest on the shore!
quotes.author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

quotes.quote: You don't know what thirst is until you drink for the first time.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quotes.quote: There is a deep dryness of the soul and all of the recalcitrant contrivances of man to quench his own thirst will bring not a single drop of moisture to those parched places, for God and God alone holds the water that satiates the soul.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Appreciate water before you are thirsty! Appreciate all the good things before you need them!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: No one can know the infinite importance of a tiny drop of water better than a thirsty bird or a little ant or a man of desert!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Knowledge is the only water which makes one thirsty when it is drunk.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: IfÂ noÂ one opens, knock onÂ several doors atÂ once.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: WeÂ all can find something bad orÂ imperfect inÂ each other. But IÂ prefer toÂ look for grains ofÂ gold.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: Dig your well before you're thirsty.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Fame is the thirst of youth.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: One glass of water doesn't equal another. One may just appease the thirst, the other you may enjoy thoroughly. In Japan, people know about this difference.
quotes.author: Jil Sander

quotes.quote: The thirst to know and understand, a large and liberal discontent.
quotes.author: William Watson

quotes.quote: Let's choose today to quench our thirst for the 'good life' we thinks others lead by acknowledging the good that already exists in our lives. We can then offer the universe the gift of our grateful hearts.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote: These are fountains of salvation that they who thirst may be satisfied with the living words they contain. In these alone is proclaimed the doctrine of godliness. Let no man add to these, neither let him take out from these.
quotes.author: Athanasius

quotes.quote: The idea of eternity lives in all of us. We thirst to live in a belief which raises our small personality to a higher coherence - a coherence which is human and yet superhuman, absolute and yet steadily growing and developing, ideal and yet real.
quotes.author: Christian Lous Lange

quotes.quote: Good as drink is, it ends in thirst.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: No matter how much we try to run away from this thirst for the answer to life, for the meaning of life, the intensity only gets stronger and stronger. We cannot escape these spiritual hungers.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: The insatiable thirst for everything which lies beyond, and which life reveals, is the most living proof of our immortality.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: As much as we thirst for approval we dread condemnation.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.quote: The desire of knowledge, like the thirst of riches, increases ever with the acquisition of it.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: The thirst for education that comes with the change the gospel brings can be a blessing or a curse, depending on our motives.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: The thirst for powerful sensations takes the upper hand both over fear and over compassion for the grief of others.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: In your thirst for knowledge, be sure not to drown in all the information.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: There is a huge thirst for knowledge among the younger generation for contemporary art, but most of them learn about it by going on the Internet.
quotes.author: Dasha Zhukova

quotes.quote: The soul's deepest thirst is for God Himself, who has made us so that we can never be satisfied without Him.
quotes.author: F. F. Bruce

quotes.quote: Like hunger or thirst, the instinct for balance is built into the human body.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: A great thirst is a great joy when quenched in time.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the thirst of the soul.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of thought; it is the greatest path to discovery.
quotes.author: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.quote: If there were one word that could act as a standard of conduct for one's entire life, perhaps it would be thoughtfulness.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The thoughtful soul to solitude retires.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: Stop the habit of wishful thinking and start the habit of thoughtful wishes.
quotes.author: Mary Martin

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: We are here to change the world with small acts of thoughtfulness done daily rather than with one great breakthrough.
quotes.author: Harold S. Kushner

quotes.quote: Meeting important emotional needs creates the feeling of love, but thoughtfulness keeps it alive.
quotes.author: Willard F. Harley

quotes.quote: Thoughtfulness is the beginning of great sanctity. If you learn this art of being thoughtful, you will become more and more Christ-like, for his heart was meek and He always thought of others. Our vocation, to be beautiful, must be full of thought for others.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Thoughtfulness is like a glue that holds a married couple together. Be creative and consistent in finding thoughtful ways to show your spouse that you love them and they are always on your mind.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: The thoughtful man becomes a hermit in the thoroughfares of the marketplace.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The two most powerful things in existence: a kind word and a thoughtful gesture.
quotes.author: Kenneth Langone

quotes.quote: Be purposeful and thoughtful in the choices you make when the options are neatly infinite.
quotes.author: Michael Bierut

quotes.quote: Thoughtful people are concerned with the future because that is the only area of experience about which anything can be done. We cannot change the past, and the present is gone as soon as it is reported, but the future is that in which we can make a difference.
quotes.author: D. Elton Trueblood

quotes.quote: The more thoughtful you are of others, the more thoughtful they will be of you. The more you respect them, the more you will win their respect.
quotes.author: Dorothy Sarnoff

quotes.quote: When a thoughtful human being has overcome incentives to vice and is aware of having done his bitter duty, he finds himself in a state that could be called happiness, a state of contentment and peace of mind in which virtue is its own reward.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Being a sensitive, thoughtful person opens you up for criticism and being affected by it.
quotes.author: Tory Burch

quotes.quote: Thoughtfulness begins with seeing.
quotes.author: Mattias Klum

quotes.quote: Deeply earnest and thoughtful people stand on shaky footing with the public.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goeth

quotes.quote: Thoughtful people of different political philosophies can disagree, but in a very agreeable manner.
quotes.author: Bob Ehrlich

quotes.quote: Thoughtful lightness can make frivolity seem dull and heavy.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: Become the world's most thoughtful friend.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: All thoughtful men are solitary and original in themselves.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: It's important to be thoughtful and mindful about the things you say to other people.
quotes.author: Evan Spiegel

quotes.quote: Be thoughtful of others and you will not be shy, for they are incompatible addictions.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: The purest and most thoughtful minds are those which love colour the most.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The most valuable gift one can receive is thoughtful criticism
quotes.author: Eric Beinhocker

quotes.quote: Thoughtfulness is the way to deathlessness, thoughtlessness the way to death. The thoughtful do not die: the thoughtless are as if dead already.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: What we are today comes from our thoughts of yesterday, and our present thoughts build our life of tomorrow: Our life is the creation of our mind.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: You are today where your thoughts have brought you; you will be tomorrow where your thoughts take you.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: How you think when you lose determines how long it will be until you win.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton
