quotes.quote: We are all just the tip of a pinprick of the millions of things that had to happen in order for us to be here.
quotes.author: Grace Potter

quotes.quote: Today's ParentingÂ Tip: Treat a difficult child the way you would your boss at work. Praise his achievements, ignore his tantrums and resist the urge to sit him down and explain to him how his brain is not yet fully developed.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: My top beautyÂ tipÂ is to drink lots of water. It might sound lame, but it works.
quotes.author: Georgia Salpa

quotes.quote: You don't have to tip anybody, anywhere, anything. You do so only because you want to, in appreciation for service well-rendered.
quotes.author: Michael Frome

quotes.quote: Best beauty tip is forgiveness for yourself and others
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.quote: ParentingÂ tip: complement your child on something well done when they don't think you are looking!
quotes.author: Kevin Heath

quotes.quote: WhenÂ hints of sadness creep into our soul, we must not flee into happy or distracting thoughts. Pondering the sadness until it becomes overwhelming can lead us to deep change in the direction of our being from self-preservation to grateful worship.
quotes.author: Larry Crabb

quotes.quote: ConflictÂ tip: What comes out of someone else's mouth is a reflection of their heart ... not yours.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: The only gamblingÂ tipÂ which amounts to anything is to keep out of the game.
quotes.author: E. W. Howe

quotes.quote: The word "tip" stands for "to insure promptness." So when should you give it? Up front,of course. Sophisticated people don't take chances on poor service, they insure good service.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: There were hints of sunrise on the rim of the sky, yet it was still dark, and the traces of morning color were like goldfish swimming in ink.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: AÂ tipÂ for increased sales or in situations of life or death: Try to always refer to the lady as Miss. or Ms. Using the term: Ma'am could piss her off.
quotes.author: Ginnetta Correli

quotes.quote: Hint: money flows into most funds after good performance, and goes out when bad performance follows.
quotes.author: John C. Bogle

quotes.quote: Police violence is the tip of the iceberg when it relates to the conditions overall of black people across the globe.
quotes.author: Alicia Garza

quotes.quote: It is amazing how manyÂ hints and guides and intuitions for living come to the sensitive person who has ears to hear what his body is saying.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Here's a hotÂ tip: Most girls don't like being stalked.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: A businessÂ tip, you never know who's having "pillow talk" with one another. Watch what u say, who u say it to, & WHO u talk about.
quotes.author: Keshia Chante

quotes.quote: Let me give you aÂ tipÂ on a clue to men's characters: the man who damns money has obtained it dishonorably; the man who respects it has earned it.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The best quickÂ tipÂ in golf is to focus on your rhythm and balance.
quotes.author: Hale Irwin

quotes.quote: The bestÂ tipÂ for writing is just to write; to sit down and write, to begin doing it and not to be scared by the blank page.
quotes.author: David Almond

quotes.quote: TheÂ tipÂ no jewel needs to wear: TheÂ tipÂ is jewel of the ear.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: Here's aÂ tipÂ for new parents: Start lowering those expectations early, it's going to pay off later.
quotes.author: Colson Whitehead

quotes.quote: GolfÂ tip: Lay off for three weeks and then quit for good.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: There is aÂ hintÂ of despair in the cry of 'I told you so,' an element of disappointment in the apparent satisfaction when idols turn out to have clay feet. The human race, when it thinks it has proved that no one is superior, is partly gratified and partly depressed.
quotes.author: Alice Thomas Ellis

quotes.quote: TheÂ bonusÂ is really one of the great give-aways in business enterprise. It is the annual salve applied to the conscience of the rich and the wounds of the poor.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: NoÂ hintÂ of genuine charity ameliorates our vision of society, once sentimentalism has been laid side. What passes for cooperation turns out to be a mixture of opportunism and exploitation. Scratch an altruist and watch a hypocrite bleed.
quotes.author: Michael Ghiselin

quotes.quote: The only thing aÂ titleÂ can buy is a little time-either to increase your level of influence with others or to undermine it.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: It is a great deal of difference to receive an honorary title or a title in his profession.
quotes.author: Leon Askin

quotes.quote: Titles are too â€œthinâ€ for the nineteenth century.
quotes.author: Beecher

quotes.quote: The longer the title, the less important the job.
quotes.author: George Mcgovern

quotes.quote: It is not titles that honor men, but men that honor titles.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Titles or organizational structures, that's not the lens through which we see our peers.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

quotes.quote: When youÂ titleÂ yourself, you immediately lend yourself to all kinds of pretension.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: The three highest titles that can be given a man are those of martyr, hero, saint.
quotes.author: Gladstone

quotes.quote: HighÂ titlesÂ debase, instead of elevate, those who know not how to support them.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: A man's name,Â title, and rank are artificial and impermanent; they do nothing to reveal what he really is, even to himself.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Titles are but nicknames, and every nickname is a title.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: TheÂ titleÂ is one of the most important things. It is the first thing that people read.
quotes.author: Robert Munsch

quotes.quote: An abstractÂ titleÂ suggests another value to the subject, perhaps an artistic quality that sets the viewers' sensitivities into action.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: Titles do not count with posterity.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: A goodÂ titleÂ holds magic, some cognitive dissonance, a little grit between the teeth, but above all it is the jumping-off place into wonder.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: No matter yourÂ title, people will not follow you if they don't trust you.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Titles distinguish the mediocre, embarrass the superior, and are disgraced by the inferior.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The wholeÂ titleÂ by which you possess your property, is not aÂ titleÂ of nature but of a human institution.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, the position is just a position, a title is just a title, and those things come and go. It's really your essence and your values that are important.
quotes.author: Queen Rania of Jordan

quotes.quote: AnyÂ titles, money, or privilege you inherit are actually hindrances. They delude you into believing you are owed respect.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Titles are like a magicians wand which circumscribe human facility and prevent us from living the lives of man.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: One of the greatestÂ titlesÂ in the world is parent, and one of the biggest blessings in the world is to have parents to call mom and dad.
quotes.author: Jim Demint

quotes.quote: If ourÂ titles recall the known myths of antiquity, we have used them again because they are the eternal symbols upon which we must fall back to express basic psychological ideas.
quotes.author: Mark Rothko

quotes.quote: Titles have never given a just idea of things; were it otherwise, the work would be superfluous.
quotes.author: Gustave Courbet

quotes.quote: Being named among the best at something is special and beautiful. But if there are no titles, nothing is won.
quotes.author: Lionel Messi

quotes.quote: Titles of honor are like the impressions on coins, which add no value to gold or silver, but only render brass current.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Titles are valuable; they make us acquainted with many persons who otherwise would be lost among the rubbish.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Titles are of no value to posterity; the name of a man who has achieved great deeds imposes more respect than any or all epithets.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Titles are marks of honest men, and wise; The fool or knave that wears aÂ titleÂ lies.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: A goodÂ titleÂ should be like a good metaphor. It should intrigue without being too baffling or too obvious.
quotes.author: Walker Percy

quotes.quote: We'll laugh and toast to nothing, and smash our empty glasses down.
quotes.author: Joni Mitche

quotes.quote: So before we end and then begin, we'll drink a toast to how it's been. A few more hours to be complete, a few more nights on satin sheets. A few more timees that I can say, that I've loved these days.
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: I'd catch moonlight in a bottle, if we could drink a toast to hapiness.
quotes.author: Toby Keith

quotes.quote: We drank a toast to innocence, we drank a toast to now. And tried to reach beyond the emptiness, but neither one knew how.
quotes.author: Dan Fogelberg

quotes.quote: You've travelled through life together Enjoying years of wedded bliss We congratulate you on reaching And we toast your happiness.
quotes.author: John Walter Bratton

quotes.quote: Let's raise our glass to toast the stars, for they are the only comfort at nights. Let's imagine with a constant eye to the path beyond ache for we awaited to meet each other.
quotes.author: Himanshi Sharma

quotes.quote: With my wife I don't get no respect. I made a toast on her birthday to 'the best woman a man ever had.' The waiter joined me.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: My toast would be, may our country always be successful, but whether successful or otherwise, always right.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: I am very superstitious about toasts. I never toast with water, and I'm very careful to make eye contact with everyone I toast with.
quotes.author: Maggie Grace

quotes.quote: To absent friends, lost loves, old gods, and the season of mists; and may each and every one of us always give the devil his due.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: I have no idea what I'm going to say when I stand up to give a toast. But I do know that anything I say I find funny.
quotes.author: Don Rickles

quotes.quote: In a world of woes and blues She was losing grip in life's shoes. With slurred voice blurred vision Seeking for a phase of transition. Her soul wandered for solace Surprisingly his arms and pace. Boosted her to face Spurred her spirit to race. She raises a toast of tribute today With teary eyes, this is all she has got to say, Thank you for walking in my life when the rest walked out.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I never strove to rule the roast, She ne'er refus'd to pledge my toast.
quotes.author: Matthew Prior

quotes.quote: We raised our glasses in a toast, you loved the champagne but I loved you the most.
quotes.author: Dos Corazone

quotes.quote: Let's raise our glass to make a toast to chime in the New Year, Dedicating warm regards to friends and family we hold dear. Good vibes will rain in lit up the skies with blasts of starry glow. With open arms let's offer the year a welcoming hello!
quotes.author: S.R.Chappell

quotes.quote: Here's champagne for our real friends, and real pain for our sham friends.
quotes.author: Mardy Grothe

quotes.quote: Don't be surprised if I demur, for, be advised my passport green. No glass of ours was ever raised to toast the queen.
quotes.author: Seamus Heany

quotes.quote: Tobacco is also a drug it works slow like a slug you won't even feel a bug but it is making you an ignorant mug and then on your welcome rug, Cancer will greet you with a warm hug your death bed is being dug so stop tobacco now, don't ignore and shrug.
quotes.author: Sanjucta Roy

quotes.quote: The use of tobacco is one of the most evident of all the retrograde influences of our time. It invades all classes, destroys social life, and is turning, in the words of Mantegazza, the whole of Europe into a cigar divan.
quotes.author: Charles R. Drysdale

quotes.quote: The believing we do something when we do nothing is the first illusion of tobacco.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Tobacco surely was designed to poison, and destroy mankind.
quotes.author: Philip Freneau

quotes.quote: Tobacco is a traveler, Come from the Indies hither; It passed sea and land Ere it came to my hand, And 'scaped the wind and weather. Tobacco's a musician, And in a pipe delighteth; It descends in a close, Through the organ of the nose, With a relish that inviteth.
quotes.author: Barten Holyday

quotes.quote: Tobacco smoke contains chemicals that weaken the body's immune system, making it more susceptible to disease and handicapping its ability to destroy cancer cells.
quotes.author: Michael Greger

quotes.quote: Tobacco, divine, rare superexcellent tobacco, which goes far beyond all panaceas, potable gold and philosopher's stones, a sovereign remedy to all diseases.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: Tobacco use is the single leading cause of preventable death. The vast majority of all adult tobacco users became addicted as teens. If we don't work to prevent teens from using tobacco, we risk losing thousands of lives and spending more and more money treating tobacco-related illnesses.
quotes.author: Dr. Joann Schaefer

quotes.quote: Tobacco is a filthy weed, that from the devil does proceed; It drains your purse, it burns your clothes, and makes a chimney of your nose.
quotes.author: Benjamin Waterhouse

quotes.quote: Tobacco is the only industry that produces products to make huge profits and at the same time damage the health and kill their consumers.
quotes.author: Margaret Chan

quotes.quote: Because tobacco is responsible for an impressive one third of cancers, prevention efforts naturally begin with it.
quotes.author: Bernard Levin

quotes.quote: Tobacco is a culture productive of infinite wretchedness.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: There's nothing quite like tobacco: it's the passion of decent folk, and whoever lives without tobacco doesn't deserve to live.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Tobacco addiction sinks its claws in deeply, it's just as powerful of sic an addiction as heroin or crack cocaine.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Tobacco is the plant that converts thoughts into dreams.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: A cigarette is a roll of paper, tobacco, and drugs, with a small fire on one end and a large fool at the other. Some of its chief benefits are cancer of the lips and stomach, softening of the brain, funeral procesions, and families shrouded in gloom and grief. Although a great many people know this, they still smoke in order to appear sophisticated.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Tobacco, in its various forms, is one of the most mischievous of all drugs. There is perhaps no other drug which injures the body in so many ways and so universally as does tobacco. Some drugs offer a small degree of compensation for the evil effects which they produce; but tobacco has not a single redeeming feature and gives nothing in return.
quotes.author: John Harvey Kellogg

quotes.quote: Some things are better eschewed than chewed; tobacco is one of them.
quotes.author: George D. Prentice

quotes.quote: A cigarette is a pipe with a fire at one end and a fool at the other.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The tobacco companies knew quite early on the addictive nature of their product.
quotes.author: Neil Cavuto

quotes.quote: None of the tobacco prevention programs designed by tobacco companies have been effective at preventing youth smoking.
quotes.author: Cynthia Hallett

quotes.quote: Tobacco is hazardous for health it could ruin all your wealth Soon, you could celebrate the cremation of your's dream death so before swallowing it, think once in depth.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Whatever may be said against the chewing of tobacco, this at least can be said of it, that it gives a man time to think between sentences.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: The worst drug of all by far is tobacco; the death toll from tobacco is just overwhelming.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Tobacco and opium have broad backs, and will cheerfully carry the load of armies, if you choose to make them pay high for such joy as they give and such harm as they do.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A cigarette is a pinch of tobacco rolled in paper with fire at one end and a fool at the other.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It's all one thing both tend into one scope to live upon tobacco and on Hope, the one's but smoke, the other is but wind.
quotes.author: Sir Robert Aytoun

quotes.quote: The roots of tobacco plants must go clear through to hell.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The cigarette is a mortal passion.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Tobacco is never ever free. It cost your life.
quotes.author: Omi

quotes.quote: Today will die tomorrow.
quotes.author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quotes.quote: All the flowers of all the tomorrows are in the seed of today.
quotes.author: Croft M. Pentz

quotes.quote: Today can be just another day or it can be the day that you finally went above and beyond your usual.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Today is the only time we can possibly live.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Today is a gift from God - that is why it is called the present.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Someone died today. Someone was born today. It's not just a dayâ€”it's a moment.
quotes.author: Lana M. H. Wilder

quotes.quote: You had better live your best and act your best and think your best today; for today is the sure preparation for tomorrow and all the other tomorrows that follow.
quotes.author: Harriet Martineau

quotes.quote: Today is a most unusual day, because we have never lived it before; we will never live it again; it is the only day we have.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Today is a new day, so rise up and move forward into the victory God has prepared for you!
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Live only for today, and you ruin tomorrow.
quotes.author: Charles Simmons

quotes.quote: By studying yesterday, you will understand today.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem
Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Devote today to something so daring even you can't believe you're doing it.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Be happy with your today, don't chase the yesterday, and work hard for your desired tomorrow.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Today well lived makes every yesterday a dream of happiness and every tomorrow a vision of hope. Look well therefore to this day
quotes.author: Francis Gray

quotes.quote: Forget yesterday â€“ it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow â€“ you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift â€“ today.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Never let yesterday use up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Today is only one day in all the days that will ever be.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Today is the first day of the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Charles Dederich

quotes.quote: Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Don't ever stumble over whats behind you. Neither trip over tomorrow. Just focus on today.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: he beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. Don't let your today be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Today is a tomorrow that we thought about yesterday. Don't worry about tomorrow. Take care of today because if you take care of today tomorrow will take care of itself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Yesterday is a canceled check. Tomorrow is a promissory note. Today is the only cash you have. So spend it wisely.
quotes.author: Kay Lyons

quotes.quote: One today is worth two tomorrows.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It's perfectly possible to love your toddler but struggle to like them when times are hard.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.quote: Parents have the glorious opportunity of being the most powerful influence, above and beyond any other, on the new lives that bless their homes.
quotes.author: L. Tom Perry

quotes.quote: The kids never listen to you, especially the youngest ones.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: Your toddler will be good if he feels like doing what you happen to want him to do and does not happen to feel like doing anything you would dislike. With a little cleverness you can organize life as a whole, and issues in particular, so that you both want the same thing most of the time.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: In a houseful of toddlers and pets, you can start out having a bad day, but you keep getting detoured.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: The stirrings of morality emerge early in childhood. Toddlers spontaneously offer toys and help to others and try to comfort people they see in distress.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: Kids are very visual, and they might not eat a food just because of its colour.
quotes.author: Tom Aikens

quotes.quote: Always kiss your children goodnight even if they're already asleep.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr

quotes.quote: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Adams

quotes.quote: There are benefits to adopting a toddler. They can tell you what's wrong. And everything we did with our daughter was a first. Her first tooth fairy. Santa
quotes.author: Nia Vardalos

quotes.quote: With toddlers around, times are always interesting.
quotes.author: Beth Ann Fennelly

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like falling in love again, both with your husband and your child.
quotes.author: Tina Brown

quotes.quote: I always wondered why babies spend so much time sucking their thumbs. Then I tasted baby food.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: The world is as many times new as there are children in our lives.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: I'm sure the other kids wouldn't mind not being lectured by another toddler over the virtues of sharing and the mental benefits of toy blocks.
quotes.author: Hayden Thorne

quotes.quote: Babies are always more trouble than you thought and more wonderful.
quotes.author: Charles Osgood

quotes.quote: Toddlers can make you feel as if you have violated some archaic law in their personal Koran and you should die, infidel.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: I've been performing since I came out of the womb. I've been dancing and singing since I was a toddler. Acting seemed like a natural progression from that.
quotes.author: Mary Elizabeth Winstead

quotes.quote: Kids: they dance before they learn there is anything that isn't music.
quotes.author: William Stafford

quotes.quote: The toddler must say no in order to find out who she is. The adolescent says no to assert who she is not.
quotes.author: Louise J. Kaplan

quotes.quote: It would seem that something which means poverty, disorder and violence every single day should be avoided entirely, but the desire to beget children is a natural urge.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Kids have been a great clarifier incredibly rewarding.
quotes.author: Joanne Whalley

quotes.quote: Whenever a toddler sees a pile of blocks, he wants to tear it down.
quotes.author: J. J. Abrams

quotes.quote: Toddlers are so powerful and so egocentric and teenagers are also so powerful, so egocentric.
quotes.author: Laura Huxley

quotes.quote: A babe in the house is a wellspring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: The toddler craves independence, but he fears desertion.
quotes.author: Dorothy Corkille Briggs

quotes.quote: Loving a baby is a circular business, a kind of feedback loop. The more you give the more you get and the more you get, the more you feel like giving.
quotes.author: Penelope Leach

quotes.quote: My child was not only carried by me, but by the universe.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: Every child comes with the message that God is not yet discouraged of man.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: The needs of babies and toddlers were constant and drained the life out my sense of self and my familys relationship with each other.
quotes.author: Mika Brzezinski

quotes.quote: Constant togetherness is fine - but only for Siamese twins.
quotes.author: Victoria Billings

quotes.quote: We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.
quotes.author: Ryunosuke Satoro

quotes.quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: If you want to go quickly, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: If one suffers we all suffer. Togetherness is strength. Courage.
quotes.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

quotes.quote: In mere moments of togetherness, families forge their most indelibe memories.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: Togetherness is a substitute sense of community, a counterfeit communion.
quotes.author: Gabriel Vahanian

quotes.quote: Fight for every moment of togetherness with your family, for far more circumstances deny you the priviledge than ever make it feasible.
quotes.author: Wes Fessler

quotes.quote: When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: We are all in this together. We will all make it or none of us will make it. If everyone cleans up their act except one big ole country, it isn't going to work.
quotes.author: Ted Danson

quotes.quote: I can do things you cannot, you can do things I cannot; together we can do great things.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Let there be spaces in your togetherness.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: We must all hang together, or assuredly we shall all hang separately.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: Birds of the same feathers flock together, and when they flock together they fly so high.
quotes.author: Cecil Thounaojam

quotes.quote: We cannot accomplish all that we need to do without working together.
quotes.author: Bill Richardson

quotes.quote: If we don't have each other, we go crazy with loneliness. When we do, we go crazy with togetherness.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: I'm just like everyone. I like to feel togetherness with someone.
quotes.author: Lucinda Williams

quotes.quote: Determined people working together can do anything.
quotes.author: Jim Casey

quotes.quote: Eagles fly alone, but sheep flock together.
quotes.author: Polish Proverb

quotes.quote: Behold, how good and pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Feathers are light; but when they come together, they become heavy!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: In our togetherness (as a team) castles are built.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Perhaps only those people who are capable of real togetherness have that look of being alone in the world.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: A family is only as strong as its commitment to togetherness.
quotes.author: Wes Fessler

quotes.quote: A snowflake is one of God's most fragile creations, but look what they can do when they stick together!
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: The flush toilet, more than any single invention, has 'civilized' us in a way that religion and law could never accomplish.
quotes.author: Thomas Lynch

quotes.quote: Every time you step into your toilet you should appreciate how your body is expelling toxins and waste. You should feel refreshed and grateful.
quotes.author: Shoukei Matsumoto

quotes.quote: Just like the rest of the home, the toilet is the place to be considerate of others as well as yourself.
quotes.author: Shoukei Matsumoto

quotes.quote: When the sh–t hits the fan, you really have to ask yourself why you weren't sitting on the toilet.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: You know an odd feeling? Sitting on the toilet eating a chocolate candy bar.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: You do live longer with bran, but you spend the last fifteen years on the toilet.
quotes.author: Alan King

quotes.quote: There comes a time in every man's life when he needs his own toilet.
quotes.author: Patrick Süskind

quotes.quote: Life before toilet paper was not worth living.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: The world is divided up into two kinds of people - those who look at their body waste in the toilet bowl, and those who don't.
quotes.author: John Gregory Dunne

quotes.quote: The only process you've mastered is the process of elimination, and the only reason you've mastered that is because you can do it in the toilet.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Public toilets have a duty to be accessible, poetry does not.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Hill

quotes.quote: There's no place like home. And there's no toilet like your own.
quotes.author: Taylor York

quotes.quote: There probably was a time when the idea of having a toilet inside a house was repulsive.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Sooner or later, all magazines end up in the toilet.
quotes.author: Maurizio Cattelan

quotes.quote: In many parts of the world, more people have access to a mobile device than to a toilet or running water...
quotes.author: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.quote: You learn a lot about people when you're sitting on their bathroom floor or on their toilet seat, rifling through their stuff.
quotes.author: Emily Weiss

quotes.quote: Tokyo would probably be the foreign city if I had to eat one city's food for the rest of my life, every day. It would have to be Tokyo, and I think the majority of chefs you ask that question would answer the same way.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: Working in Tokyo has convinced me that, contrary to what people think, it is actually one of the world's most beautiful cities.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.quote: If you took the city of Tokyo and turned it upside down and shook it you would be amazed at the animals that fall out: badgers, wolves, boa constrictors, crocodiles, ostriches, baboons, capybaras, wild boars, leopards, manatees, ruminants, in untold numbers. There is no doubt in my mind that that feral giraffes and feral hippos have been living in Tokyo for generations without seeing a soul.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: Tokyo is like the New York of Asia. Although the people there are all basically from Japan, they celebrate what they like about various cultures.
quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

quotes.quote: If you go to Tokyo, I think it becomes very obvious that there's this almost seamless mixture of popular culture and Japanese traditional culture.
quotes.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quotes.quote: Tokyo is a very safe city. At night it becomes quiet the way New York never does.
quotes.author: Rick Kennedy

quotes.quote: Tokyo - still - offers the most tightly integrated infrastructure, where smooth, technology-driven experiences take place when engaging in everyday actions, such as verifying personal identity, paying for goods, and buying tickets.
quotes.author: Jan Chipchase

quotes.quote: The disadvantages of a decentralized, spread out urban area are tremendous, and the environmental damage of urban sprawl cannot be ignored. As a large city, Tokyo must be used more efficiently and the population density increased.
quotes.author: Minoru Mori

quotes.quote: In Tokyo, we have more three-star Michelin restaurants than Paris.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.quote: Shibuya is a trendy part of Tokyo where young people come to meet and have a good time.
quotes.author: Rebecca MacKinnon

quotes.quote: Tokyo style is so specific. And I'm a very big fan of their history. It's pretty simple. A lot of the time, people expect to see the wild style that comes out of Japan, but I think, traditionally, the style is very simple.
quotes.author: Thundercat

quotes.quote: Tokyo may have more money and Kyoto more culture; Nara may have more history and Kobe more style. But Osaka has the biggest heart.
quotes.author: Vikas Swarup

quotes.quote: The best city for fashion is Tokyo. You see styles there you won't see in London, Paris, Milan or New York. I also like the fashion scene in Los Angeles - it has a unique look.
quotes.author: Tommy Hilfiger

quotes.quote: Tokyo was an origami city folded over and over until something was made of virtually nothing.
quotes.author: Christopher Barzak

quotes.quote: Look at London or Paris: they’re both filthy. You don’t get that in Tokyo. The proud residents look after their city.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.quote: There are so many more people in Tokyo than in New York, but it’s pristine. It’s so organized, and yet the address system is in complete chaos.
quotes.author: Nick Wooster

quotes.quote: For those with restless, curious minds, fascinated by layer upon layer of things, flavors, tastes and customs, which we will never fully be able to understand, Tokyo is deliciously unknowable. I’m sure I could spend the rest of my life there, learn the language, and still die happily ignorant.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: One of my favorite cities is Tokyo because of sushi, and Asian food in general, but then also the way Tokyo operates, because it’s so clean, and there’s space for a lot of variety of stores.
quotes.author: Lauv

quotes.quote: If Japan is enigmatic, then Tokyo is the heart of that riddle, its rhythm and essence so utterly alluring that it demands to be explored. It has a depth that keeps travelers in a constant state of rapture and delight. Whatever your vice, Tokyo has you covered.
quotes.author: Michael Ryan

quotes.quote: Visiting Tokyo for the first time will change your life. It’s mesmerizing, exciting, and resolutely individual, an unrivaled parade of fashion, design, architecture and the best of both high culture and pop culture. It’s a city of contrasts; whether you’re standing in the middle of the Shibuya scramble, a blur of pedestrians rushing past you while you try to snap that perfect crowd shot, or standing before a small shrine, quiet and contemplative, you will feel the intensity and multi-layered nature of this very special place.
quotes.author: Michelle Mackintosh

quotes.quote: Japan, and Tokyo in particular has been my muse for decades. Every trip brings a little more depth to my understanding of this complex, multi-layered city.
quotes.author: Michael Ryan

quotes.quote: I feel tranquility in Tokyo, even though it is the largest populated metropolitan area in the world. The feeling seems counterintuitive, yet Tokyo begs you to relax and enjoy each layer, facet or slice of whatever you may have stumbled upon, or booked months in advance – always in knowledge that you’re without a hope of ticking all boxes, even in a lifetime of tours.
quotes.author: Michael Ryan

quotes.quote: Tokyo is cities within cities, towns within towns; it is made of ecosystems that grow in a very organic and intimate way, like flowers pushing through the cracks and fissures of urbanisation. It’s the illusion of utter chaos – mad crowds of people rushing about their daily lives – layered over an extraordinarily ordered cluster of urban hubs.
quotes.author: Michelle Mackintosh

quotes.quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Tolerance implies no lack of commitment to one's own beliefs. Rather it condemns the oppression or persecution of others.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Tolerance is the positive and cordial effort to understand another's beliefs, practices, and habits without necessarily sharing or accepting them.
quotes.author: Joshua Liebman

quotes.quote: Tolerance and celebration of individual differences is the fire that fuels lasting love.
quotes.author: Tom Hannah

quotes.quote: Tolerance is the oil which takes the friction out of life.
quotes.author: Wilbert E. Scheer

quotes.quote: Tolerance is giving to every other human being every right that you claim for yourself.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Tolerance only for those who agree with you is no tolerance at all.
quotes.author: Ray Davis

quotes.quote: What is tolerance?--it is the consequence of humanity. We areall formed of frailty and error; let us pardon reciprocally eachother's folly--that is the first law of nature.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Tolerance comes of age. I see no fault committed that I myselfcould not have committed at some time or other.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The test of courage comes when we are in the minority.The test of tolerance comes when we are in the majority.
quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

quotes.quote: Tolerance becomes a crime when applied to evil.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Sometimes true tolerance requires an extraordinary strength, which we are often too weak to exercise.
quotes.author: Fausto Cercignani

quotes.quote: Unlimited tolerance must lead to the disappearance of tolerance. If we extend unlimited tolerance even to those who are intolerant, if we are not prepared to defend a tolerant society against the onslaught of the intolerant, then the tolerant will be destroyed, and tolerance with them. [...] We should therefore claim, in the name of tolerance, the right not to tolerate the intolerant.
quotes.author: Karl Popper

quotes.quote: Compassion and tolerance are not a sign of weakness, but a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.quote: The responsibility of tolerance lies with those who have the wider vision.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Toleration is good for all, or it is good for none.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Tolerance is the virtue of the man without convictions.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Tolerance is the eager and glad acceptance of the way along which others seek the truth.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Besant

quotes.quote: Tolerance is a very dull virtue. It is boring. Unlike love, it has always had a bad press. It is negative. It merely means putting up with people, being able to stand things.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: Tolerance implies a respect for another person, not because he is wrong or even because he is right, but because he is human.
quotes.author: John Cogley Commonweal

quotes.quote: Tolerance is another word for indifference.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The highest result of education is tolerance.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Tolerance implies a gratuitous assumption of the inferiority of other faiths to one's own.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: We tend to idealize tolerance, then wonder why we find ourselves infested with losers and nut cases.
quotes.author: Patrick Nielsen Hayden

quotes.quote: Tolerance can lead to learning something.
quotes.author: Jakob Dylan

quotes.quote: Tolerance is the first principle of community; it is the spirit which conserves the best that all men think.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Tolerance it a tremendous virtue, but the immediate neighbors of tolerance are apathy and weakness.
quotes.author: James Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Tolerance is held to be a condition of mind which is encouraged by,and is necessary for, civilization.
quotes.author: Arthur Keith

quotes.quote: Tolerance always has limits - it cannot tolerate what is itself actively intolerant.
quotes.author: Sidney Hook

quotes.quote: Tolerance is the ability to forgive those who tend to speak before thinking.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The tomato hides its griefs. Internal damage is hard to spot.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: The tomato offers its gift of fiery color and cool completeness.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: A world without tomatoes is like a string quartet without violins.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: Of plants tomatoes seemed the most human, eager and fragile and prone to rot.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Knowledge is knowing a tomato is a fruit; wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.
quotes.author: Miles Kington

quotes.quote: A tomato may be a fruit, but it is a singular fruit. A savory fruit. A fruit that has ambitions far beyond the ambitions of other fruits.
quotes.author: E. Lockhart

quotes.quote: The difference between a bland tomato and great one is immense, much like the difference between a standard, sliced white bread and a crusty, aromatic sourdough.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.quote: A cooked tomato is like a cooked oyster: ruined.
quotes.author: Andre Simon

quotes.quote: The raw tomato, devoured in the garden when freshly picked, is a horn of abundance of simple sensations, a radiating rush in one's mouth that brings with it every pleasure. . . . a tomato, an adventure.
quotes.author: Muriel Barbery

quotes.quote: Pamper a tomato, overfeed it, overwater it and you will get a Paris Hilton of a tomato.
quotes.author: Nigel Slater

quotes.quote: Three tomatoes are walking down the street-a poppa tomato, a mamma tomato, and a little baby tomato. Baby tomato starts lagging behind. Poppa tomato gets angry, goes over to the baby tomato, and smooshes him and says, Catch up.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than picking up sun-warmed tomatoes and smelling them, feeling them and scrutinizing their shiny skins for imperfections, dreaming of ways to serve them.
quotes.author: Jose Andres

quotes.quote: You need an entire life just to know about tomatoes.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: Botanically speaking, tomatoes are the fruit of a vine, just as are cucumbers, squashes, beans and peas.
quotes.author: Horace Gray

quotes.quote: A little tomato who knows her onions can go out with an old potato and come home with a lot of lettuce and a couple of carats.
quotes.author: Herbert V. Prochnow

quotes.quote: It's important to salt the tomatoes before draining them because that helps pull out the water. Fresh herbs, some garlic and pepper will also enhance the flavor.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Zakarian

quotes.quote: There's a point of no return when you're cooking tomatoes. A little too much heat, a little too long in the pot, and you lose that sense of fresh ripeness that makes tomatoes so great.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Zakarian

quotes.quote: If you're buying tomatoes pick them up and smell them-they should have a lovely perfume. They need to be kept at fifty degrees or above, particularly during the growing season, because that's when they develop their flavor.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, you can't compete with Mother Nature. If you've got a great tomato, just a pinch of sea salt is all you need.
quotes.author: Zac Posen

quotes.quote: Be aware of what you cook tomatoes with. The high acid content of the tomato slows down the cooking process of some other foods. Dried beans cooked with tomatoes added to the pot can take up to 20 percent more cooking time than beans without tomatoes added.
quotes.author: Andrew Zimmern

quotes.quote: The potential hot tomato of today can turn into the cold pop tart of tomorrow, and I know that.
quotes.author: Diane Lane

quotes.quote: When I eat a tomato I look at it the way anyone else would. But when I paint a tomato, then I see it differently.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: I was such a tomboy in elementary school! I played soccer and was even friends with boys.
quotes.author: Liz Prince

quotes.quote: I was not ladylike, nor was I manly. I was something else altogether. There were so many different ways to be beautiful.
quotes.author: Michael Cunningham

quotes.quote: The kid keeps talking to me, asking me stuff, showing me her Lego helicopter. 'Leave her be,' the mom says. The kid looks right at me. 'I don't think he is a lady. I think he is a man with very pretty eyes.'
quotes.author: Ivan Coyote

quotes.quote: Tomboys are confident, rebellious, and adventurous. They are bold, brazen, fierce— and sexy. They aren't known for following rules, they are known for doing— and wearing— whatever they want..
quotes.author: Lizzie Garrett Mettler

quotes.quote: Tomboys were once so beloved that many adult women who probably weren't particularly tomboyish claimed to have been tomboys!
quotes.author: Lisa Selin Davis

quotes.quote: Childhood tomboys grow up to claim many different sexualities and gender identities.
quotes.author: Lisa Selin Davis

quotes.quote: They dress like boys and like sports. They wear their hair in ponytails, and they don't wear makeup or nail polish. And they probably don't sit around blabbing about how cute TV stars or boy bands are.
quotes.author: Allison Bell

quotes.quote: Tomboys are athletic and strong. And they are not interested in boys...at least not in that way.
quotes.author: Allison Bell

quotes.quote: Tomboys are an assertion of reality, of practically. Forced femininity is a waste of energy and resources, and therefore of oneself. Live to live.
quotes.author: Morgan Torva

quotes.quote: I'm a tomboy at heart. I always like to say that I'm an ordinary girl doing extraordinary things.
quotes.author: Ciara

quotes.quote: Well, it's lucky I enjoy it. I'm a tomboy at heart.
quotes.author: Karima Adebibe

quotes.quote: I'm a tomboy at heart, and I've got the battle wounds to prove it!
quotes.author: Cassie Scerbo

quotes.quote: A tomboy is a bisexual girl's dream lover.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: She remembers these as happy times - tomboy days, when she still glittered like quartz in her father's eye. Until puberty came along, as puberty will, and shattered the cosy sense of conspiracy.
quotes.author: Alison Fell

quotes.quote: I've been a tomboy my whole life. But then you get older, you get married, you soften up.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: Tomboy. Alright, call me a tomboy. Tomboys get medals. Tomboys win championships. Tomboys can fly. Oh. And tomboys aren't boys.
quotes.author: Julie Foudy

quotes.quote: March is a tomboy with tousled hair, a mischievous smile, mud on her shoes and a laugh in her voice.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: I grew up as a tomboy, so I'm used to being around guys.
quotes.author: Jennifer Bini Taylor

quotes.quote: The type of girl who runs around playing sports with the boys and doesn't care about what she looks like. I've decided that's who I am.
quotes.author: Allison Bell

quotes.quote: Tomboy is a word commonly used in Texas. It is a highly respected word. Many girls who are not tomboys wish that they were. And are jealous of the ones who are.
quotes.author: Lois Lenski

quotes.quote: These girls did not make good housewives. They were unhappy indoors. They refused to be held down by the artificialities of civilization. They knew and loved something more real than all that.
quotes.author: Lois Lenski

quotes.quote: To be clear, a tomboy is not a boy, nor does a tomboy want to be a boy. A tomboy is simply a girl who enjoys participating in activities that are usually marked for boys.
quotes.author: Kimberly Michelle

quotes.quote: I guess you could say that I was 'rough around the edges' and that I was the boy my father never had. I would go to basketball and football games with him, just like a son would.I didn't mind; I had a natural attraction to sports.
quotes.author: Kimberly Michelle

quotes.quote: I miss the carefree days of my tomboy childhood. I miss not worrying about breaking a nail, not worrying about my hair frizzing up in humidity, and not worrying about my feet hurting in a cute pair of heels.
quotes.author: Kimberly Michelle

quotes.quote: If you were a tomboy, you were a prisoner in your own clothes. As I grew into a bona fide tomboy, wearing dresses was hell on earth.
quotes.author: CM Writer

quotes.quote: I've been called a tomboy since elementary school. My Dad blames himself for not knowing how to raise a little girl.
quotes.author: Antoinette Sax

quotes.quote: I didn't want to wear girls clothes period. I felt more comfortable wearing boy's clothes. I remember the first time I was ever called a tomboy. I was at recess playing tag with a bunch of boys when a group of girls started saying that I wished I was a boy. I dressed like a boy and acted like a boy.
quotes.author: Antoinette Sax

quotes.quote: I've never considered myself a tomboy. Not really. It's not that I don't like girly things. I'm just surrounded by guys all the time.
quotes.author: Kelly Oram

quotes.quote: Tomorrow changes the face of reality.
quotes.author: Philip José Farmer

quotes.quote: The greatest thing about tomorrow is, I will be better than I am today.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is not guarantee to anyone,no expectations no disappointment.
quotes.author: Moyo Adekoya

quotes.quote: The vision of your tomorrow that you have today strengthens you for the morrow.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: You've got to believe in the possibilities. You've got to believe that tomorrow can be better than today. And here's the big one. Believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Tomorrow, I will take on all of these things. I will be unstoppable.
quotes.author: Marie Lu

quotes.quote: The sun will come out tomorrow so you gotta hang on 'til tomorrow, come what may! tomorrow, tomorrow, I love ya, tomorrow you're only a day away!
quotes.author: Martin Charnin

quotes.quote: Tomorrow will never call to ask your opinion; you don't control it. Stop allowing today's possibilities to be robbed by tomorrow's insecurities.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Tomorrow belongs to those who can hear it coming.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is a thief of pleasure.
quotes.author: Rex Harrison

quotes.quote: Tomorrow, chased by time, flies before us to eternity a point that can never be reached.
quotes.author: Charles William Day

quotes.quote: Yesterday's just a memory, tomorrow is never what it's supposed to be.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Your hand can seize today, but not tomorrow; and thoughts of your tomorrow are nothing but desire.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is not given to anyone. What is given is the now enjoy each minuet as if it were to be the last.
quotes.author: Mark Hook

quotes.quote: Every tomorrow is an outcome of what I do today, and the beauty of it all is that today is happening all the time.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: People were always getting ready for tomorrow. I didn't believe in that. Tomorrow wasn't getting ready for them. It didn't even know they were there.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Today is your own. Tomorrow perchance may never come.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: For a better tomorrow, forget about the past, make new start, live for today and don't let anything hold you back.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is fully for those who have fully lived today. Hope without plans is like a car without wheels.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is the next step in life not the next stop in life.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Don't follow in any footprints, make your own prints. Because, you are the future of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: Tomorrow, you promise yourself, things will be different, yet, tomorrow is too often a repetition of today. And you disappoint yourself again and again.
quotes.author: James T. Mccay

quotes.quote: Tomorrow will be more hopeful than this awful piece of time we call today.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: Tomorrow belongs to those who are sincerely learning and loving today.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Tomorrow the mirrors will mock me.
quotes.author: Anna Akhmatova

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is another opportunity to relentlessly and confidently push harder with your dream. You definitely haven't given it your all until you are living in its reality.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is a new day and it takes one ball to get you out but I am feeling confident and a double hundred is a possibility.
quotes.author: Younis Khan

quotes.quote: Tomorrows were full of awful things. Today, now, was the essential.
quotes.author: Ariana Franklin

quotes.quote: Fighting is essentially a masculine idea; a woman’s weapon is her tongue.
quotes.author: Hermione Gingold

quotes.quote: The tongue talkes at the heads cost.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The tongue has the power of life and death.
quotes.author: Solomon

quotes.quote: A generous heart repairs a slanderous tongue.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: An idle tongue is the mother of all conflicts.
quotes.author: Dennis E. Adonis

quotes.quote: A drunk tongue is an honest one in my opinion.
quotes.author: Adele

quotes.quote: Not all tongues that wag cohabit with a brain.
quotes.author: Donita K. Paul

quotes.quote: The tongue offends and the ears get the cuffing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A tongue has no bones but it can break a heart.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: The human tongue is a beast that few can master.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: The tongue is the best masseur of furrowed brows.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Never trust your tongue when your heart is bitter.
quotes.author: Samuel J. Hurwitt

quotes.quote: Wild tongues can't be tamed, they can only be cut out.
quotes.author: Gloria Anzaldua

quotes.quote: A person's tongue can give you the taste of his heart.
quotes.author: Ibn Qayyim Al-Jawziyya

quotes.quote: The tongue is the only tool that gets sharper with use.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: The magic of the tongue is the most dangerous of all spells.
quotes.author: Edward George Earl Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Violence of the tongue is very real — sharper than any knife.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Govern your tongue before all other things, following the gods.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Guard your tongue from praise as you have guarded it from blame.
quotes.author: Maruf Karkhi

quotes.quote: Teach thy tongue to say 'I do not know', and thou shalt progress.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: A flapping tongue has killed more men than sudden storms ever did.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: The tongue must be heavy indeed, because so few people can hold it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A still tongue keeps a wise head.
quotes.author: Barbara Ann Kipfer

quotes.quote: A still tongue makes a happy life.
quotes.author: Patrick McGoohan

quotes.quote: The tongue of man is a twisty thing, there are plenty of words there of every kind.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: The eye tells what the tongue would hide.
quotes.author: Chief Joseph

quotes.quote: The tongue is the vile slave's vilest part.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Man's chiefest treasure is a sparing tongue.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: Let your tongue speak what your heart thinks.
quotes.author: Davy Crockett

quotes.quote: The stillest tongue can be the truest friend.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is nothing, today is too late; the good lived yesterday.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: For what it's worth, it's never too late to be whoever you want to be.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Pause and remember It is never too late to begin again, to forgive someone, to have a dream, to meet someone or to start love yourself. It is never too late!
quotes.author: Jenni Young

quotes.quote: It is never too late to give up your prejudices.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If you wait until you are ready, it is almost certainly too late.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Between too early and too late, there is never more than a moment.
quotes.author: Franz Werfel

quotes.quote: Say it before you run out of time. Say it before it's too late. Say what you're feeling. Waiting is a mistake.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can never do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is not too late to take another path.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: Everything comes at the right time, but if the right time is too late to be patient, go earlier before it becomes too late.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: You're never too old, never too bad, never too late and never too sick to start from the scratch once again.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.quote: There is an immeasurable distance between late and too late.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: It is never too late to start growing.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Know your worth. Know what you deserve. Know when it's time to move on.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Sometimes we stare so long at a door that is closing that we see too late the one that is open.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: It's never too late. Don't focus on what was taken away. Find something to replace it, and acknowledge the blessing you have.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Whilst we deliberate how to begin a thing, it grows too late to begin it.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: It is never too late to do right.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Better late than too late.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: When lovely woman stoops to folly / And finds too late that men betray, / What charm can soothe her melancholy, / What art can wash her guilt away.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: You won't know whether you paid too much for it until it is too late.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: It's too late. There's something I must do. It shouldn't have happened this way.
quotes.author: Kim Novak

quotes.quote: Live for yourself. Take it before it's too late.
quotes.author: Chad Lowe

quotes.quote: No matter how early I get in—it's too late.
quotes.author: Jean Heather

quotes.quote: It is never too late to study, but it may be too late to learn.
quotes.author: Leonid S. Sukhorukov

quotes.quote: By the time we learn how to live, it's already too late.
quotes.author: Louis Aragon

quotes.quote: Life's tragedy is that we get old too soon and wise too late.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I have come too late into a world too old.
quotes.author: Alfred De Musset

quotes.quote: All tools have intrinsic politics and technology is the tool of now.
quotes.author: Godfrey Reggio

quotes.quote: Every contrivance of man, every tool, every instrument, every utensil, every article designed for use, of each and every kind, evolved from a very simple beginnings.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Any tool is a weapon if you hold it right.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: Each new tool we create ends an old relationship with the world and starts a new one. And we're changed by that relationship, inevitably. It changes the way we live, changes our patterns, changes our social organization.
quotes.author: Ellen Ullman

quotes.quote: Every tool carries with it the spirit by which it has been created.
quotes.author: Werner Heisenberg

quotes.quote: The strongest tool we, as Americans, have is our ability to rally together and to find solutions with unity of purpose.
quotes.author: Richard Burr

quotes.quote: The most important tool of the theoretical physicist is his wastebasket.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: if you have the tools but do not have the visual concept, the tools do not work
quotes.author: Betty Poluk

quotes.quote: We become what we behold. We shape our tools, and thereafter our tools shape us.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: It's best to have your tools with you. If you don't, you're apt to find something you didn't expect and get discouraged.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A good tool improves the way you work. A great tool improves the way you think.
quotes.author: Jeff Duntemann

quotes.quote: If the only tool you have is a hammer, it's hard to eat spaghetti.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: Technology and tools are useful and powerful when they are your servant and not your master.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: A tool is but the extension of a man's hand, and a machine is but a complex tool. And he that invents a machine augments the power of a man and the well-being of mankind.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The tools which would teach men their own use would be beyond price.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Tools get socially interesting after they're no longer technologically interesting.
quotes.author: Clay Shirky

quotes.quote: Choose your tools carefully, but not so carefully that you get uptight or spend more time at the stationery store than at your writing table.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: All the tools and engines on earth are only extensions of man's limbs and senses.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The master's tools will never dismantle the master's house.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Any tool can be used for good or bad. It's really the ethics of the artist using it.
quotes.author: John Knoll

quotes.quote: The basic tool for the manipulation of reality is the manipulation of words. If you can control the meaning of words, you can control the people who must use the words.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: The most important tool of my trade was a mirror.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.quote: Tools of many kinds and well chosen, are one of the joys of a garden.
quotes.author: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quotes.quote: I have become a marketing tool and I feel very uncomfortable with that. There's no space for me to express myself.
quotes.author: Janet McTeer

quotes.quote: The most important persuasion tool you have in your entire arsenal is integrity.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It is essential to have good tools, but it is also essential that the tools should be used in the right way.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: Tools have their own integrity.
quotes.author: Vita Sackville-West

quotes.quote: If my only tool is a hammer, then every problem is a nail.
quotes.author: Sholem Asch

quotes.quote: Some tools of thought are so blunt that they are almost useless; others are so sharp that they are dangerous. But the wise man will have the use of both kinds.
quotes.author: Gregory Bateson

quotes.quote: Discover the tools to build your own vision.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Music helps not the toothache.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: When you have a toothache, you think that not having a toothache will make you very happy. But when you don't have a toothache, often you are still not happy. If you practice awareness, you suddenly become very rich, very very happy.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Love and toothache have many cures, but none infallible, except possession and dispossession.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: For there was never yet philosopher, That could endure the tooth-ache patiently.
quotes.author: Leonato

quotes.quote:
An aching tooth is better out than in.
To lose a rotting member is a gain.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.quote: To the person with a toothache, even if the world is tottering, there is nothing more important than a visit to a dentist.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Toothaches afflict those who have no compassion for animals.
quotes.author: Nachman of Breslov

quotes.quote: An aching tooth is better out than in. To lose a rotting member is a gain.
quotes.author: Richard Baxter

quotes.quote: A toothache will cost a battle, a drizzle cancel an insurrection.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: The man with a toothache thinks everyone happy whose teeth are sound. The poverty-stricken man makes the same mistake about the rich man.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: If only this toothache would go away, I could write another chapter on the problem of pain.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Love conquers all things except poverty and toothache.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: There are two things in life that a sage must preserve at every sacrifice, the coats of his stomach and the enamel of his teeth. Some evils admit of consolations, but there are no comforters for dyspepsia and the toothache.
quotes.author: Henry Bulwer

quotes.quote: The man with a toothache thinks everyone happy whose teeth are sound.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Some tortures are physical And some are mental, But the one that is both Is dental.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: If suffering brought wisdom, the dentist's office would be full of luminous ideas.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: You remind me of someone with a badÂ toothacheÂ who's hitting herself in the head with a hammer to distract herself from the pain in her mouth.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.quote: A toothache, or a violent passion, is not necessarily diminished by our knowledge of its causes, its character, its importance or insignificance.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Faced with the choice of enduring a bad toothache or going to the dentist, we generally tried to ride out the bad tooth.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbera

quotes.quote: I think, therefore I am' is the statement of an intellectual who underrates toothaches.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Being on top of the world doesn't mean anything unless you know what it's like to be at the bottom.
quotes.author: Rachel Smith

quotes.quote: If you're at the top, then brace for the fall.
quotes.author: Tori Kelly

quotes.quote: On the top of each peak you are on the edge of the abyss.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: Life achieves its summit when it does to the uttermost that which it was equipped to do.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Summit of the well is the bottom of the ground! Man who has climbed up from the very low thinks that he did climb up to the very top!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It's not just a question of conquering a summit previously unknown, but of tracing, step by step, a new pathway to it.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: An apex is always surrounded only by emptiness.
quotes.author: Alan Dean Foster

quotes.quote: You climb to reach the summit, but once there, discover that all roads lead down.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.quote: The summit is not the only place on the mountain.
quotes.author: Laurence Gonzales

quotes.quote: The summit is just a halfway point.
quotes.author: Ed Viesturs

quotes.quote: There are no short cuts to the top.
quotes.author: Ed Viesturs

quotes.quote: No one ever complained their way to the top.
quotes.author: Frank Perdue

quotes.quote: Sometimes you gotta leave when you're on top.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: The one that works the hardest comes out on top.
quotes.author: Debbie Meyer

quotes.quote: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: It may take us a little longer to reach the summit, but never fear, we will get there!
quotes.author: Barbara Mertz

quotes.quote: Somewhere between the bottom of the climb and the summit is the answer to the mystery why we climb.
quotes.author: Greg Child

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to reach the top of the mountain, but there is no growth at the peak. It is in the valley that we slog through the lush grass and rich soil, learning and becoming what enables us to summit life's next peak.
quotes.author: Andy Andrews

quotes.quote: Don't you dare get to the top and not know what to do.
quotes.author: Julian Casablancas

quotes.quote: No one starts out on top. You have to work your way up.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The top of one mountain is always the bottom of another.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Get on top of the obstacles and they become vantage points.
quotes.author: Tom Althouse

quotes.quote: There is no top. There are always further heights to reach.
quotes.author: Jascha Heifetz

quotes.quote: When you reach the top, keep climbing.
quotes.author: Zen Proverb

quotes.quote: You climb to the summit and there is nothing there.
quotes.author: Yvon Chouinard

quotes.quote: Torah is not merely a collection of prohibitions, rigid strictures and boring observances. Rather, it is a narrative of the blessings and promises of God initially offered to one person and family, but through which the whole world will ultimately be blessed.
quotes.author: Walter C. Kaiser

quotes.quote: If human language, with its logic, is the way God has given us to understand the world, then the Torah must be understood in that same language and with that same logic.
quotes.author: David Novak

quotes.quote: The giving of the Torah is a story of God seeking to provide humanity with the opportunity to make moral decisions.
quotes.author: Meir Soloveichik

quotes.quote: Proper Torah observance must flow from a heart of love for our neighbor. If we claim to be Torah observant but neglect matters of justice, mercy, and faithfulness, then we are not truly Torah observant.
quotes.author: David Wilber

quotes.quote: The observant Jew has his own sense of values. Torah Judaism is his blueprint for this life, his target for existence.
quotes.author: Meir Kahane

quotes.quote: The search for the Torah codes is rooted in the unfathomable theological premise that the Torah - itself a set of five books of limited length - contains literally all truth.
quotes.author: Benjamin Wittes

quotes.quote: Judaism is my life. Everything I do is through the lens of Torah.
quotes.author: Matisyahu

quotes.quote: The Torah itself becomes coarse in the mouth of a man of pride.
quotes.author: Nachman of Breslov

quotes.quote: By increasing the amount of Torah (obligatory religious laws) in the world, they were extending His presence in the world and making it more effective.
quotes.author: Karen Armstrong

quotes.quote: It is easy for a rabbi to establish prohibitions, but a rabbi's real strength is to teach Torah and rule on law with an emphasis on what is permitted.
quotes.author: Ovadia Yosef

quotes.quote: That which is hateful to you, do not do to your fellow. That is the whole Torah; the rest is the explanation.
quotes.author: Talmud (Jewish Wisdom)

quotes.quote: I was always fascinated by the Torah, the Bible, in terms of story telling: heroes and villains, morality and flaws. There's no better epic. Also, being part Latin and Jewish means I have a sense of the theatrical. There were always a lot of people in my house. My home was always filled with a lot of storytellers.
quotes.author: Nina Tassler

quotes.quote: Where there is Torah, it sustains the world.
quotes.author: Ovadia Yosef

quotes.quote: The work of man is to respond to the Covenant by obeying the commandments of the Torah, those commandments that can be obeyed here and now.
quotes.author: David Novak

quotes.quote: It's no coincidence that the word 'holiday' suggests a holy day, or that the longest book in the Torah concerns the Sabbath. If you wish to advance in any sphere, the best way is to take a retreat.
quotes.author: Pico Lyer

quotes.quote: There is the illusion of the world and the reality of the Torah.
quotes.author: Meir Kahane

quotes.quote: Just as the Torah and Bible teach concern for those in distress, the Koran instructs all Muslims to make caring for widows, orphans, and refugees a priority.
quotes.author: Greg Mortenson

quotes.quote: Confucius is like the Torah, rules to follow. And Lao-Tzu is even more conservative, saying that if you do nothing you won't break any rules. You have to let tradition fall sometime, you have to take action, you have to eat bacon.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: One cannot accept Christ and still be part of the normative Jewish community; one cannot live by Torah and still be part of the Church.
quotes.author: David Novak

quotes.quote: And you can't make a mistake when you are reading the Torah, so you have men standing around who will correct you if you are reading it incorrectly.
quotes.author: Jami Gertz

quotes.quote: We are torn between the craving to know and the despair of having known.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: I was tired of hanging on, taking the torn pieces to make something whole with them.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: I glory in this world of men and women, torn with troubles, yet living on to love and laugh through it all.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: When someone is crying and her heart is torn, Be an angel of kindness and help her to carry on.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: Certain things, certain events, seem inexplicable only for a time: up to the moment when the veil is torn aside.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Each of us only feels the torn lining of his own coat and sees the wholeness of the other person's.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Character builds slowly, but it can be torn down with incredible swiftness.
quotes.author: Faith Baldwin

quotes.quote: The value of love will always be stronger than the value of hate. Any nation or group of nations which employs hatred eventually is torn to pieces by hatred.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A torn jacket is soon mended; but hard words bruise the heart of a child.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: The mask is torn off, while the reality remains
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: Our friends, neighbors, and their families have been forced to live in the shadows out of fear of being torn from their families and deported from what is, for many of them, the only country they have ever known.
quotes.author: Marc Veasey

quotes.quote: This is how your heart gets snagged, like a balloon on a barbed-wire fence, this is where pieces of you get torn away.
quotes.author: Pete Wentz

quotes.quote: To the field we are scattered from the day we are born to grow wild and sleep rough til from the earth we are torn.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: It seemed I was torn; I wanted my goodbye, and I didn't. I wanted him to make me stay, and I wanted to go.
quotes.author: Sam Mariano

quotes.quote: I am torn and I am mended - I want everything and need nothing - I love you and am content without you. Even so, come quickly!
quotes.author: Sarah Perry

quotes.quote: You can't put something together again unless you've torn it apart first.
quotes.author: Steven Brust

quotes.quote: A portion of life, every moment gets torn out of me hurting, and flees away.
quotes.author: Suman Pokhrel

quotes.quote: However often the thread may be torn out of your hands, you must develop enough patience to wind it up again and again.
quotes.author: Walter Gropius

quotes.quote: I was born poor and without religion, under a happy sky, feeling harmony, not hostility, in nature. I began not by feeling torn, but in plenitude.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The hardened mass of liquid stones had much stronger qualities than those which had simply torn. The skin remained a recognisable part of the molten stone.
quotes.author: Andy Goldsworthy

quotes.quote: Flying has torn apart the relationship of space and time: it uses our old clock but with new yardsticks.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: To appreciate the noble is a gain which can never be torn from us.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: When one man dies, one chapter is not torn out of the book, but translated into a better language.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Beautiful mosaics are made of broken or torn material. The most spectacular personal brands are compilations of the same.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: Speech is an old torn net, through which the fish escape as one casts it over them.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: In the eye of the tornado, there's no more high and low, no floor and sky.
quotes.author: Francis Alys

quotes.quote: At first, the tornado is nearly invisible. Against the sky, it's white on white.
quotes.author: Greg MacGillivray
