quotes.quote: We understand tornadoes scientifically, but it still feels supernatural. The randomness makes it feel supernatural.
quotes.author: Michael Koryta

quotes.quote: A tornado of thought is unleashed after each new insight. This in turn results in an earthquake of assumptions. These are natural disasters that re-shape the spirit.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: At the heart of the cyclone tearing the sky is a place of central calm.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: Today, the technology is there to give early and normally ample warning when a powerful tornado approaches. When a tornado strikes, all of us are at risk.
quotes.author: Spencer Bachus

quotes.quote: In other words, more violent tornadoes would, if anything, be a sign of 'global cooling', not 'global warming'.
quotes.author: Lawrence Solomon

quotes.quote: There is a safe spot within every tornado. My job is to find it.
quotes.author: David Copperfield

quotes.quote: The wind is scary.. during a tornado or in life in general.. never know when a gust is going to come in your direction and change everything
quotes.author: David Walsh

quotes.quote: You know the difference between a tornado and divorce in the south? Nothing! Someone is losing a trailer.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Seasons are like life. Some seasons are better than others. Some have more sun and rainbows. Others have storms and tornadoes. Some have both. You have to accept that, and bring colour and light to the season you're in as best you can, and always look forward to the next season.
quotes.author: Cathy Lamb

quotes.quote: I felt very still and empty, the way the eye of a tornado must feel, moving dully along in the middle of the surrounding hullabaloo.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Fearlessness requires attention and receptivity. It takes focus to stand in the still eye of a tornado and not be swept away by it.
quotes.author: Susan Piver

quotes.quote: I am a kite in a tornado, but I have a long string.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: A nation that spends billions to fix international problems will not have much left over for the victims of tornadoes in Oklahoma.
quotes.author: Deacon Jones

quotes.quote: If a tornado twists at 175 miles an hour and stays on the ground like a massive lawnmower for 50 miles, then God gave the command.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: What man's life is not overtaken by one or more of those tornadoes that send us out of the course, and fling us on rocks to shelter as best we may?
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Laughing together is as close as you can get to a hug without touching.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.quote: Soul music is about longevity and reaching and touching people on a human level - and that's never going to get lost.
quotes.author: Jill Scott

quotes.quote: The best part of touring, still, is touching people's hearts and igniting my band and igniting the people into what you call a spiritual revelation is sound and emotion.
quotes.author: Carlos Santana

quotes.quote: Anybody can write music of a sort. But touching the public heart is quite another thing.
quotes.author: John Philip Sousa

quotes.quote: The best thing you can do for someone is make them a beautiful plate of food. How else can you invade someone's body without actually touching them?
quotes.author: Padma Lakshmi

quotes.quote: Our legacy is really the lives we touch; altering someone's plan, if even for a moment.
quotes.author: Carrie Hamilton

quotes.quote: One looks back with appreciation to the brilliant teachers, but with gratitude to those who touched our human feelings. The curriculum is so much necessary raw material, but warmth is the vital element for the growing plant and for the soul of the child.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: We touch people mostly without touching them: We touch them with our words, with our smile, with our eyes, with our courage, with our madness, with millions of different ways! What are we? We are contacting beings without contacting!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: An awakened man who is driven by his heart and soul, can touch the heart of a woman he loves, without touching her
quotes.author: Angie karan

quotes.quote: One of the most beautiful words is touch; it exquisitely represents our need to prove ourselves that we are not in a dream!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It is nice to touch, it is nice to be touched, but it is so much nicer to touch someone's heart.
quotes.author: Dixie Waters

quotes.quote: Touching people is very rewarding to me.
quotes.author: Della Reese

quotes.quote: Well, there's nothing more touching than putting a smile on a kid's face when you can.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.quote: You can't write an image, a metaphor, a story, a phrase, without leaning a little further into the shared world, without recognizing that your supposed solitude is at every point of its perimeter touching some other.
quotes.author: Jane Hirshfield

quotes.quote: All of us want to know that we are doing great things, that we are touching a lot of people, and that what we are doing is something bigger than ourselves.
quotes.author: Alan Mulally

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you think you are done, it is just the edge of beginning. Probably that's why we decide we're done. It's getting too scary. We are touching down onto something real. It is beyond the point when you think you are done that often something strong comes out.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: It is very touching that you are able to create some kind of impact through a character.
quotes.author: Kiara Advani

quotes.quote: There's another way of making music, by touching the lives and feelings of ordinary people.
quotes.author: Gavin Bryars

quotes.quote: Too often, people think that solving the world's problems is based on conquering the earth, rather than touching the earth, touching ground.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Touching is a powerful act
quotes.author: Keith Ferrazzi

quotes.quote: Simple and plain things can touch your heart very easily! If you can be simple and plain, you can touch every heart!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I'm tough when I have to be, tender when I should be. When you find a really tough guy, he's not a predator. He doesn't have to prove himself. Guys who have to pretend to be tough, they ain't. I'm tough.
quotes.author: Mr. T

quotes.quote: The bravest sight in the world is to see a great man struggling against adversity.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: I detest bullies for their cowardice, and despise them for their cruelty. I never knew a tough man who preyed on the weak. Tough men hate bullies almost as much as bullies hate tough men.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.quote: A man who is strong and tough never needs to show it in his dress or the way he cuts his hair. Toughness is a quality of the mind, like bravery or honesty or ambition; it has nothing whatever to do with muscles.
quotes.author: E.R. Braithwaite

quotes.quote: Toughness is a good thing, yet it is considered good only in men. When a woman is tough, men can't stand it. I like being tough and smart.
quotes.author: Lillian Vernon

quotes.quote: Every tough man has a tough past and an even tougher future.
quotes.author: Baldur

quotes.quote: It's easy to be a tough guy when no one's going to come knocking on your door.
quotes.author: Pete Hamill

quotes.quote: My father was a very tough guy with me and my brothers. He wanted to teach us a lot of discipline and life philosophy. As I became more interested in martial arts, he started teaching a lot of fighting philosophy and karate philosophy. While he was a tough father, he also knew when to be sweet and show a softer side.
quotes.author: Lyoto Machida

quotes.quote: A tough guy, to me, stands for something, and he's not afraid to get a beating.
quotes.author: Frank Grillo

quotes.quote: When you're playing a tough guy, all the other guys want to be tough right back at you and it amps them up.
quotes.author: David Hayter

quotes.quote: I'm a tough guy, but I'm a good guy. I'm durable because when you play football they want you being tough, not just because you sprain your ankle crying 'Mama, mama!"
quotes.author: Mr. T

quotes.quote: I'm not trying to say I'm a big tough guy... I'm a typical American-waist deep in this violent culture.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: My mom used to say that I became a fighter and a scrapper and a tough guy to protect who I am at my core.
quotes.author: Vin Diesel

quotes.quote: By the time a man is 35 he knows that the images of the right man, the tough man, the true man which he received in high school do not work in life.
quotes.author: Robert Bly

quotes.quote: It's a very hard thing to resist, real goodness, in a tough man.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.quote: A tough man, usually ends up in prison, but a strong-minded man, will own the prison.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: I play tough guys in movies and behaved like one in front of the press because I thought that was what a man did.
quotes.author: Tom Sizemore

quotes.quote: I'm a pretty tough guy, you know. I'm a pretty hard man. I've got a lot of compassion, but I don't waste time with people.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.quote: A weak man's always in a hurry to punish somebody, so he can show how tough he is.
quotes.author: Robert Ferrigno

quotes.quote: If you think tough men are dangerous, wait until you see what weak men are capable of.
quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

quotes.quote: Behind every tough man, is a soft boy, who has vowed to be strong and unbreakable, against all odds.
quotes.author: Nuel E Dominics

quotes.quote: A tough man always enjoys his thug life.
quotes.author: Aanand Tamizh

quotes.quote: For the choke, there are no 'Tough guys'. With an arm lock he can be tough and resist the pain. With the choke he just passes out, goes to sleep.
quotes.author: Helio Gracie

quotes.quote: I'm not a tough guy. I'm just delivering the truth and only the truth and if you can't deal with it, too bad.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.quote: Without discipline, no matter how good you are, you are nothing! One day, and I might not be around; you're going to meet a tough guy who takes your best shot. He'll keep coming because he's tough. Don't get discouraged. That's when the discipline comes in.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: Cowboy boots with a suit? You're a rough, tough businessman. Chaps with a bow tie? You're in the rough, tough man business.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: I am a tough guy / With a soft heart / That's why people / Hurt me internally / Not externally
quotes.author: Md.omair

quotes.quote: If they didn't call you a tough guy, then what else would they call you? Something worse than that? I'm playing parts, and if they call you that, it's because I played the part right.
quotes.author: Ray Winstone

quotes.quote: You've got to stay strong to be strong in tough times.
quotes.author: Tilman J. Fertitta

quotes.quote: A Tough life with God is better than a good life without Him.
quotes.author: David Asscherick

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough take a nap.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.quote: To be tested is good. The challenged life may be the best therapist.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Life is as easy or as hard as you think it is.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Life is tough so get tougher.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's a tough life if you don't weaken.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The soul is renewed through tough times.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Life is tough; and if you have the ability to laugh at it, you have the ability to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: Life is, at times, tough...And all we need to do is to prove that we are tougher than it...
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: Life is tough, but it's tougher if you're stupid.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: The key to life when it gets tough is to keep moving. Just keep moving.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.quote: When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Life is tough - and you have to be tougher than life to change the world.
quotes.author: Sebastian Pinera

quotes.quote: A tough life can be defeated only by the tougher person!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough reinvent.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough go drinking.
quotes.author: Bret Easton Ellis

quotes.quote: A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: When you think life is tough, it can get a lot tougher
quotes.author: Kate Gosselin

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
quotes.author: Joseph P. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Life is a matter of really tough choices.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Life's a tough proposition, and the first hundred years are the hardest.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Life is tough, but so are you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life is very tough. If you don't laugh, it's tough.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Thoughts make life tough.
quotes.author: Bharath Mamidoju

quotes.quote: And once the storm is over, you won’t remember how you made it through, how you managed to survive. You won’t even be sure whether the storm is really over. But one thing is certain. When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what this storm’s all about.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: If you listen long enough you can hear my skin grow tough love is painful to the touch must be made of stronger stuff.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: Tough love and brutal truth from strangers are far more valuable than Band-Aids and half-truths from invested friends, who don't want to see you suffer any more than you have.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Sympathy constitutes friendship; but in love there is a sort of antipathy, or opposing passion. Each strives to be the other, and both together make up one whole.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor

quotes.quote: When a love comes to an end, weaklings cry, efficient ones instantly find another love, and the wise already have one in reserve.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It takes a minute to have a crush on someone, an hour to like someone and a day to love someone - but it takes a lifetime to forget someone.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: I wish I never fell so deep in love with you and now it ain't no way we can be friends.
quotes.author: Trey Songz

quotes.quote: The love that lasts the longest is the love that can never be.
quotes.author: S Maugh

quotes.quote: Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: If a hug represented how much I loved you, I would hold you in my arms forever.
quotes.author: Mandy Hampton

quotes.quote: Tough love is just the right phrase: love for the rich and privileged, tough for everyone else.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: The worst thing you can do for love is deny it; so when you find that special someone, don't let anyone or anything to get in your way.
quotes.author: Brandi Snyder

quotes.quote: We perceive when love begins and when it declines by our embarrassment when alone together.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Do you love me because I'm beautiful, or am I am beautiful because you love me?
quotes.author: Oscar Hammerstein

quotes.quote: Those who love deeply never grow old; they may die of old age, but they die young.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Pinero

quotes.quote: When we first sort of break in or bust into the house, if you will, there's some tough love.
quotes.author: Thom Filicia

quotes.quote: To love is to suffer. To avoid suffering, one must not love. But then, one suffers from not loving. Therefore, to love is to suffer; not to love is to suffer; to suffer is to suffer. To be happy is to love. To be happy, then, is to suffer, but suffering makes one unhappy. Therefore, to be happy, one must love or love to suffer or suffer from too much happiness.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr Seuss

quotes.quote: If kisses were the water I would give you the sea, if hugs were the leaves I would give you a tree, but if love was time, I would give you eternity. Before I met you I never knew what it was like. to look at someone and smile for no reason.
quotes.author: Yarne Gaskins

quotes.quote: To love someone is nothing, to be loved by someone is something, but to be loved by the one you love is everything
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: Sometimes you must seem to hurt something in order to do good for it.
quotes.author: Susan Cooper

quotes.quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: You can't stop loving or wanting to love because when its right, it's the best thing in the world. When you're in a relationship and it's good, even if nothing else in your life is right, you feel like your whole world is complete.
quotes.author: Keith Sweat

quotes.quote: If you're looking for love in these eyes, walk away. I've been blinded before!
quotes.author: Carl Stoynoff

quotes.quote: There is nothing in the world so wonderful as to love and be loved; there is nothing so devastating as love lost.
quotes.author: Larry Latta

quotes.quote: I don't want you to be just somebody I love. I want you to be the LOVE of MY LIFE!
quotes.author: Daffy Catalan

quotes.quote: Hearts are tough, Most times they don't break. Most times they are only bend
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Love is a tough, ever hopeful thing, not easily destroyed.
quotes.author: Kirby Wright

quotes.quote: Nothing glows brighter than the heart awakened to the unseen light of Love that lives within it
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: To the outside world we all grow old. But not to brothers and sisters. We know each other as we always were. We know each other's hearts. We share private family jokes. We remember family feuds and secrets, family griefs and joys. We live outside the touch of time.
quotes.author: Clara Ortega

quotes.quote: No love, no friendship, can cross the path of our destiny without leaving some mark on it forever.
quotes.author: Francois Mauriac

quotes.quote: Before the development of tourism, travel was conceived to be like study, and its fruits were considered to be the adornment of the mind and the formation of judgement.
quotes.author: Paul Fussell

quotes.quote: One of the upsides of tourism is that people begin to take themselves a little more seriously (and think their) culture is worth something. So rather than disparaging the local culture, they vitalize it.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Tourism requires that you see conventional things, and that you see them in a conventional way.
quotes.author: Paul Fussell

quotes.quote: The thing about tourism is that the reality of a place is quite different from the mythology of it.
quotes.author: Martin Parr

quotes.quote: The thing about tourism is just that it's incredibly powerful. It's like a gun and it's incredibly easy to be irresponsible with it. And the speed of the impact that tourism can have on a place can be quite breathtaking. It doesn't take years, it takes months. That's how quickly it works. And it can be quite a bleak thing to witness.
quotes.author: Alex Garland

quotes.quote: The routines of tourism are even more monotonous than those of daily life.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Space tourism is a logical outgrowth of the adventure tourist market.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: This is the grand fiction of tourism, that bringing our bodies somewhere draws that place closer to us, or we to it. It's a quick fix of empathy.
quotes.author: Leslie Jamison

quotes.quote: Medical tourism can be considered a kind of import: instead of the product coming to the consumer, as it does with cars or sneakers, the consumer is going to the product.
quotes.author: James Surowiecki

quotes.quote: Tourism does not go to a city that has lost its soul.
quotes.author: Arthur Frommer

quotes.quote: Tourism is a very big economic benefit to the Sherpa people, and also, they have very strong ties to their own social attitudes and their own religion, so fortunately, they're not too influenced by many of our Western attitudes.
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: A well-ordered life is like climbing a tower; the view halfway up is better than the view from the base, and it steadily becomes finer as the horizon expands.
quotes.author: Willam Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: Living in a tower, however secure it may feel, is hardly a social attribute.
quotes.author: Dirk Bogarde

quotes.quote: You can't just hoard your ideas inside the ivory tower. You have to get them out into the world.
quotes.author: George M. Church

quotes.quote: A tree trunk the size of a man grows from a blade as thin as a hair. A tower nine stories high is built from a small heap of earth.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: Wisdom is an endless tower. Who but One hath ever attained the summit?
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: Nor aught availed him now to have built in heaven high towers; nor did he scrape by all his engines, but was headlong sent with his industrious crew to build in hell.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Be like a solid tower whose brave height remains unmoved by all the winds that blow; the man who lets his thoughts be turned aside by one thing or another, will lose sight of his true goal, his mind sapped of its strength.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: The commonest ivory tower is that of the average man, the state of passivity towards experience.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: The higher the tower, the greater the fall thereof.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Managing life from our mental control towers, we have separated ourselves from our bodies and hearts.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: Be as a tower firmly set; Shakes not its top for any blast that blows.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: The tower of success stands on the pillars of vision, action, patience and the character to withstand criticisms.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Many live in the ivory tower called reality; they never venture on the open sea of thought.
quotes.author: Francois Gautier

quotes.quote: Pride juggles with her toppling towers, They strike the sun and cease, But the firm feet of humility They grip the ground like trees.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: When they come downstairs from their Ivory Towers, idealists are very apt to walk straight into the gutter.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Embrace the power of little things and you will build a tower of mighty things. Mighty things are made up varieties of little things put together!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: There's something ever egotistical in mountain-tops and towers, and all other grand and lofty things.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: You are your own forerunner, and the towers you have built are but the foundation of your giant-self. And that self too shall be a foundation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Great towers take time to construct.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Brave men are a city's strongest tower of defence.
quotes.author: Alcaeus

quotes.quote: Only imagination that towers can reproduce evanescence and render rigidity flexible.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: Ambition is to the mind what the cap is to the falcon; it blinds us first, and then compels us to tower by reason of our blindness.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Our problems may tower over us, but God towers over our problems.
quotes.author: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.quote: Towered cities please us then, And the busy hum of men.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: We built tall buildings, but we have not become any taller.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Towering genius disdains a beaten path. It seeks regions hitherto unexplored.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: On every failure you can build a tower of success with belief in yourself and a positive frame of mind.
quotes.author: Anil Sinha

quotes.quote: We should like to have some towering geniuses, to reveal us to ourselves in colour and fire, but of course they would have to fit into the pattern of our society and be able to take orders from sound administrative types.
quotes.author: J.B. Priestley

quotes.quote: The tower of power, too sweet to be sour!
quotes.author: Randy Savage

quotes.quote: Fame for fame's sake is toxic - some people want that, with no boundaries. It's unhealthy.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: Fantasy is toxic: the private cruelty and the world war both have their start in the heated brain.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Toxic remnants of war represent a profound challenge for the protection of public health and the restoration of the environment in countries affected by conflict.
quotes.author: Widad Akrawi

quotes.quote: Toxic masculinity hurts men, but there's a big difference between women dealing with the constant threat of being raped, beaten, and killed by the men in their lives, and men not being able to cry.
quotes.author: Robert Jensen

quotes.quote: Men and the world are mutually toxic to each other.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: Even the most beautiful things can be toxic.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Some people are doomed from birth because their environment is so toxic.
quotes.author: Charlie LeDuff

quotes.quote: Materialism is toxic to happiness, and we are losing our connection to the natural world.
quotes.author: James Gustave Speth

quotes.quote: Even if toxic people are right about what is "good," they are wrong if the approach is not healthy.
quotes.author: John Lewis Lund

quotes.quote: Instead of exposures to toxic materials and mechanical dangers, we are discovering the toxicity of social circumstances and patterns of social organization.
quotes.author: Richard G. Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Everything is toxic. That's the point. You can't avoid toxins. Thinking you can is just another symptom of the toxic overload stage.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: Learning your lesson from a mistake is healthy, but living forever in the emotions of your past mistakes is toxic and debilitating.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: There are two types of relationships: nourishing and toxic. Do not keep the toxic. What interaction does light have with darkness? None!
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Don't associate yourself with toxic people. It's better to be alone and love yourself than surrounded by people that make you hate yourself.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Worry is thinking that has turned toxic. It is jarring music that goes round and round and never comes to either climax or conclusion.
quotes.author: Harold Bridgwood Walker

quotes.quote: Sometimes toxic people are so resistant to change that therapy does not really help them - but they send everybody else into therapy to find ways to cope.
quotes.author: Amy Dickinson

quotes.quote: There's nothing more toxic and demoralizing than having to work in a work environment where a bully or stealth harasser gets to threaten, haze, feast, overpower, and exist daily.
quotes.author: Ty Howard

quotes.quote: The toxic residue of humanity - you have to guard yourself, guard that sensitivity even more heavily because otherwise you can pick up so many pollutants that you'll become more toxic.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: A negative and toxic person never feels teased with the genuine presence of the pretenders in his network and he always feels pleased with the absence of the genuine leader in his circle.
quotes.author: Anuj

quotes.quote: Toxic people attach themselves like cinder blocks tied to your ankles, and then invite you for a swim in their poisoned waters.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: Pay no attention to toxic words. What people say is often a reflection of themselves, not you.
quotes.author: Christian Baloga

quotes.quote: As you remove toxic people from your life, you free up space and emotional energy for positive, healthy relationships.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: Don't let toxic people sabotage your happiness, ruin your positive attitude, contaminate your mind or destroy your self-confidence. Instead, surround yourself with generous, positive, and nurturing people who will lift you up.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: Toxic people will pollute everything around them. Don’t hesitate. Fumigate.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Toxic people defy logic. Some are blissfully unaware of the negative impact that they have on those around them, and others seem to derive satisfaction from creating chaos and pushing other people's buttons.
quotes.author: Travis Bradberry

quotes.quote: Don’t let negative and toxic people rent space in your head. Raise the rent and kick them out.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: There's nothing more toxic or deadly than a human child. A single touch could kill you.
quotes.author: James Coburn

quotes.quote: Could it be that toxic mimics are toxic because they ignore responsibility, they ignore relationship, they ignore presence, they substitute control for fluidity and choice?
quotes.author: Ward Churchill

quotes.quote: Who has time for toxic relationships? If someone isn't honoring your feelings, it's not a real relationship. If you feel drained after spending time with someone, that's a red flag!
quotes.author: Doreen Virtue

quotes.quote: A toxic person kills, and by kills I mean totally destroys teamwork.
quotes.author: Rands

quotes.quote: To toy with something is to manipulate it, to try it out within sets of contexts none of which is determinate.
quotes.author: Susan Stewart

quotes.quote: Toys were lots of fun before they became capitalist tools.
quotes.author: Beth Copeland

quotes.quote: Only when human sorrows are turned into a toy with glaring colors will baby people become interested -- for a while at least. The people are a very fickle baby that must have new toys every day.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Toys are not a need people typically think of, but they've got all these kids who have absolutely nothing to do.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.quote: The best toys are 90 per cent kid, 10 per cent toy, with play fueled largely by the child's imagination.
quotes.author: Josh Golin

quotes.quote: Of all the toys available, none is better designed than the owner himself. A large multipurpose plaything, its parts can be made to move in almost any direction. It comes completely assembled, and it makes a sound when you jump on it.
quotes.author: Stephen Baker

quotes.quote: If Barbie is so popular, why do you have to buy her friends?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Those who play with the devil's toys will be brought by degrees to wield his sword.
quotes.author: Richard Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: A toy is seen both as a bauble and as an intellectual machine.
quotes.author: Brian Sutton-Smith

quotes.quote: Life is a toy made of glass; it appears to be of inestimable price, but in reality it is very cheap.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.quote: No one ever forgets a toy that made him or her supremely happy as a child, even if that toy is replaced by one like it that is much nicer.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: He who dies with the most toys is, nonetheless, still dead.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: As soon as a child has left the room his strewn toys become affecting.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It has not been for nothing that the word has remained man's principal toy and tool: without the meanings and values it sustains, all man's other tools would be worthless.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: The best toys are like unicorns. They include enough horse to seem real, but enough horn to become magical.
quotes.author: Amber & Andy Ankowski

quotes.quote: It's the broken toys that need the most love and attention.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: A child's appetite for new toys appeal to the desire for ownership and appropriation: the appeal of toys comes to lie not in their use but in their status as possessions.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: If little else, the brain is an educational toy.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: The simplest toy, one which even the youngest child can operate, is called a grandparent.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Our inventions are wont to be pretty toys, which distract our attention from serious things. They are but improved means to an unimproved end.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: We are more ready to try the untried when what we do is inconsequential. Hence the fact that many inventions had their birth as toys.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: A toy car is a projection of a real car, made small enough for a child's hand and imagination to grasp. A real car is a projection of a toy car, made large enough for an adult's hand and imagination to grasp.
quotes.author: Michael Frayn

quotes.quote: What is success? It is a toy balloon among children armed with pins.
quotes.author: Gene Fowler

quotes.quote: Bikes and planes aren't about going fast or having fun; they're toys, but serious ones.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: 90% of toys are made in china, which technically makes the chinese elves.
quotes.author: Sean Lock

quotes.quote: Give children toys that are powered by their imagination, not by batteries.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Toys are children's words and play is their language.
quotes.author: Garry L. Landreth

quotes.quote: Sports is the toy department of human life.
quotes.author: Howard Cosell

quotes.quote: The child's toys and the old man's reasons are the fruits of two seasons.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: People used to play with toys. Now the toys play with them.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Track and field is the best way to reach out for kids. It doesn't matter how fast you are. You always want to beat someone.
quotes.author: Carl Lewis

quotes.quote: Running is a thing worth doing not because of the future rewards it bestows, but because of how it feeds our bodies and minds and souls in the present.
quotes.author: Kevin Nelson

quotes.quote: The true measure of a runner isn't in time, but rather in the effort it took along the way.
quotes.author: Jenny Hadfield

quotes.quote: Life is often compared to a marathon, but I think it is more like being a sprinter; long stretches of hard work punctuated by brief moments in which we are given the opportunity to perform at our best.
quotes.author: Michael Johnson

quotes.quote: It's very hard in the beginning to understand that the whole idea is not to beat the other runners. Eventually you learn that the competition is against the little voice inside you that wants you to quit.
quotes.author: George Sheehan

quotes.quote: The gun goes off and everything changes the world changes and nothing else really matters.
quotes.author: Patti Sue Plummer

quotes.quote: Track is such a great metaphor for life...You try to jump as from where you started as you can, you throw all the heavy stuff away from you, and when life's hurdles knock you down, you get right back up.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Once they say set, i'm in beast mode.
quotes.author: Sierrah Negrette

quotes.quote: Run every race like its your last !!
quotes.author: Sierrah Negrette

quotes.quote: A lot of people run a race to see who is fastest. I run to see who has the most guts, who can punish himself into exhausting pace, and then at the end, punish himself even more.
quotes.author: Steve Prefontaine

quotes.quote: I let my feet spend as little time on the ground as possible. From the air, fast down, and from the ground, fast up.
quotes.author: Jesse Owens

quotes.quote: Scientists have proven that it's impossible to long-jump 30 feet, but I don't listen to that kind of talk. Thoughts like that have a way of sinking into your feet.
quotes.author: Carl Lewis

quotes.quote: Racing teaches us to challenge ourselves. It teaches us to push beyond where we thought we could go. It helps us to find out what we are made of. This is what we do. This is what it's all about.
quotes.author: PattiSue Plumer

quotes.quote: Good things come slow, especially in distance running.
quotes.author: Bill Dellinger

quotes.quote: I don't train. I just run my 3-15 miles a day.
quotes.author: Jack Foster

quotes.quote: The art form is to become one with the hurdle, to make it your friend, and I embraced that process.
quotes.author: Renaldo Nehemiah

quotes.quote: I never really worried about those hurdles. They were just standing there, and I was always zooming past them just to get back on the ground again.
quotes.author: Rod Milburn

quotes.quote: The hurdles have taught me that if you work really, really hard at perfecting the little things in your life, the big picture will come together.
quotes.author: John Shaffer

quotes.quote: If you're not ready to fall, you're not ready to hurdle.
quotes.author: Tonie Campbell

quotes.quote: A good hurdler has to be completely familiar with everything that goes on so if something happens he can automatically make an adjustment.
quotes.author: Rodney Milburn

quotes.quote: I'm going to go and leave my blood all over the track.
quotes.author: Nick Rogers

quotes.quote: Somewhere in the world someone is training when you are not. When you race him, he will win.
quotes.author: Tom Fleming

quotes.quote: The body does not want you to do this. As you run, it tells you to stop but the mind must be strong. You always go too far for your body. You must handle the pain with strategy... It is not age; it is not diet. It is the will to succeed.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Gareau

quotes.quote: While a man is racing he must hate himself and his competitors.
quotes.author: Percy Cerutty

quotes.quote: There is no time to think about how much I hurt; there is only time to run.
quotes.author: Ben Logsdon

quotes.quote: Running is like mouthwash; if you can feel the burn, it's working.
quotes.author: Brian Tackett

quotes.quote: Hurdling requires more than just speed. It requires flexibility, strength, and courage.
quotes.author: Reggie Towns

quotes.quote: If I am still standing at the end of the race, hit me with a board and knock me down, because that means I didn't run hard enough.
quotes.author: Steve Jones

quotes.quote: You must see yourself run the race over and over, time and time again. You must put yourself in critical positions and see how you would react in those positions before the race so when and if they do happen, the feedback is automatic.
quotes.author: Rodney Milburn

quotes.quote: The longer the race, the shorter the champ.
quotes.author: Manciata

quotes.quote: When will they make a tractor that can furnish the manure for farm fields and produce a baby tractor every spring?
quotes.author: George Erik Rupp

quotes.quote: That's the great thing about a tractor. You can't really hear the phone ring.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: I enjoy my John Deere tractor quite a lot. It's a tool that I must use to keep Mother Nature at bay. I have all kinds of things encroaching on my property.
quotes.author: Les Claypool

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if on your first date you had to ask your Dad to borrow the keys to the tractor.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: I don't know of a better argument in favor of farming with horses than trying to start an old tractor in the winter time
quotes.author: Gene Logsdon

quotes.quote: I drove a tractor almost as soon as I could reach the pedals.
quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

quotes.quote: I used to own an ant farm but had to give it up. I couldn't find tractors small enough to fit it.
quotes.author: Stwvwn Wright

quotes.quote: With tractors, you just don't get the feel of tilling that land. So when planting season comes around, I use a hoe. To grow one useful whore, that's the motto of my pimp farm.
quotes.author: M.C. Humphreys

quotes.quote: I was a regular hand when I was 7. I picked cotton. I drove tractors. Children grew up not thinking that this is what they must do. We thought this was the thing to do to help your family.
quotes.author: B.B. King

quotes.quote: The tractor must always be used as an aid to nature, not as a driver of nature. The tractor must work in harmony with the climate, and the fertility of the land, and the humble spirit of the farmers.
quotes.author: Marina Lewycka

quotes.quote: Why does a three-year-old, and it's usually boys, want to drive the tractor or have machinery and be in control of it? I don't know. Why wouldn't you ask to boil a kettle or something? Maybe you would, I dunno.
quotes.author: Michael Fassbender

quotes.quote: I used to practice my speeches on my tractor while I plowed my daddy's field.
quotes.author: Jim Hunt

quotes.quote: Happiness is the twinkle in your grandmother's eye as you reverse the tractor off her legs
quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

quotes.quote: His herding instinct is so strong that he confuses tractors on a baseball field for sheep. He was hospitalized twice. Once by a line drive and once for attacking a tractor tread.
quotes.author: Tom Hayden

quotes.quote: I can't write on the road. I have to be home. I have to be around all those rusted tractors and dilapidated fences and things like that, because it just grounds me in a way that I can't find in a hotel room.
quotes.author: John Fullbright

quotes.quote: TradeÂ is the best cure for prejudice.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Anything that makes it easier to imagine trading places with someone else increases your moral consideration for that other person.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: The key to trading success is emotional discipline. If intelligence were the key, there would be a lot more people making money trading.
quotes.author: Victor Sperandeo

quotes.quote: When you see thatÂ tradingÂ is done, not by consent, but by compulsion...th at in order to produce, you need to obtain permission from men who produce nothing-you may know that your society is doomed.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Much of our trading comes down to a battle between our patience and our impulses.
quotes.author: Steve Burns

quotes.quote: TradeÂ your cleverness for bewilderment.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: If you don't likeÂ trading, gambling and betting, then you don't like living.
quotes.author: William C. Brown

quotes.quote: Don'tÂ tradeÂ future blessings for temporary pleasures.
quotes.author: Don Davis

quotes.quote: Derivatives trading should be standardized and as much as possible moved to clearinghouses.
quotes.author: Paul Singer

quotes.quote: The majority of short term trading results are just random. In the long term the money ends up with those that can trade and manage risk.
quotes.author: Steve Burns

quotes.quote: The key toÂ tradingÂ success is emotional discipline. If intelligence were the key, there would be a lot more people making moneyÂ trading.
quotes.author: Victor Sperandeo

quotes.quote: The problem withÂ tradingÂ dominant players of that size is you never get in return what you've bargained away.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: There is no mercy in trading life for life. And certainly no righteousness. Mercy, once given, cannot be taken back.
quotes.author: Janet Morris

quotes.quote: When you'reÂ tradingÂ well, you have a better mental attitude. When you'reÂ tradingÂ poorly, you start wishing and hoping. Instead of getting into trades you think will work, you end up getting into trades you hope will work.
quotes.author: Randy McKay

quotes.quote: NoÂ tradeÂ will be made unless they want the thing more than they want their money.
quotes.author: Roy H. Williams

quotes.quote: Don'tÂ swapÂ horses in the middle of the stream.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Trading is very competitive and you have to be able to handle getting your butt kicked.
quotes.author: Paul Tudor Jones

quotes.quote: FreeÂ tradeÂ should not mean free labor.
quotes.author: Stephen F. Lynch

quotes.quote: Trading gives you an incredibly intense feeling of what life is all about.
quotes.author: Paul Tudor Jones

quotes.quote: Those who wouldÂ tradeÂ in their freedom for their protection deserve neither.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: ByÂ exchangingÂ quality time for 'turn-up' times, what many of today's wayward youngsters have become - men and women of the village have failed them.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Trading decisions should be made as unemotionally as possible.
quotes.author: Richard Dennis

quotes.quote: The first rule of trading - there are probably many first rules - is don't get caught in a situation in which you can lose a great deal of money for reasons you don't understand.
quotes.author: Bruce Kovner

quotes.quote: Trading is more or less like betting or gambling, but only without the pleasure show of the game.
quotes.author: William C. Brown

quotes.quote: FreeÂ tradeÂ is not a principle, it is an expedient.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: TradeÂ your expectations for appreciation and the world changes instantly.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: FreeÂ tradeÂ is not based on utility but on justice.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: InÂ trading/ investing it's not about how much you make, but how much you don't lose
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Your trading needs to boil down to rules, money management, and that is it.
quotes.author: Michael Covel

quotes.quote: TradeÂ has ever been the extinguisher of war, the eradicator of prejudice, the diffuser of knowledge.
quotes.author: Henry George

quotes.quote: Tradition, long conditioned thinking, can bring about a fixation, a concept that one readily accepts, perhaps not with a great deal of thought.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: A tradition without intelligence is not worth having.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Tradition lives because young people come along who catch its romance and add new glories to it.
quotes.author: Michael Novak

quotes.quote: Traditionalists are pessimists about the future and optimists about the past.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: Tradition is a guide and not a jailer.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Tradition means giving votes to the most obscure of all classes, our ancestors. It is the democracy of the dead. Tradition refuses to submit to the small and arrogant oligarchy of those who merely happen to be walking about.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Tradition is an important help to history, but its statements should be carefully scrutinized before we rely on them.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Tradition may be defined as an extension of the franchise. Tradition means giving votes to the most obscure of all classes, our ancestors. It is the democracy of the dead.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Tradition is the illusion of permanence.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Tradition is not the worship of ashes, but the preservation of fire.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: Tradition means taking account of a wonderful history but remembering that everybody today looks to the future.
quotes.author: Michael Kadoorie

quotes.quote: Tradition remains alive only when we struggle with it.
quotes.author: Mieczyslaw Jastrun

quotes.quote: Tradition was safety; change was danger.
quotes.author: Mary Doria Russell

quotes.quote: As soon as tradition has come to be recognized as tradition, it is dead.
quotes.author: Allan Bloom

quotes.quote: Traditions tell us where we have come from. Scripture itself is a better guide as to where we should now be going.
quotes.author: N.T. Wright

quotes.quote: Tradition is a process of debate over what links past, present, and future in a continuity that is meaningful and authoritative.
quotes.author: Zareena Grewal

quotes.quote: Tradition does not mean that the living are dead, but that the dead are living.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: When a tradition gathers enough strength to go on for centuries, you don't just turn it off one day.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: Tradition is a very powerful force.
quotes.author: John P. Kotter

quotes.quote: Tradition becomes our security, and when the mind is secure it is in decay.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Tradition usually rests upon something which men did know; history is often the manufacture of the mere liar.
quotes.author: Jefferson Davis

quotes.quote: Tradition is a set of solutions for which we have forgotten the problems. Throw away the solution and you get the problem back. Sometimes the problem has mutated or disappeared. Often it is still there as strong as it ever was.
quotes.author: Donald Kingsbury

quotes.quote: Traditions are the guideposts driven deep in our subconscious minds. The most powerful ones are those we can't even describe, aren't even aware of.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Without innovation, it is a corpse.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Tradition is an explanation for acting without thinking.
quotes.author: Grace Mcgarvie

quotes.quote: Traditions that have lost their meaning are the hardest of all to destroy.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: A tradition is kept alive only by something being added to it.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Tradition is a fragile thing in a culture built entirely on the memories of the elders.
quotes.author: Alice Albinia

quotes.quote: Tradition will accustom people to any atrocity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Tradition is the social equivalent of personal habit.
quotes.author: Hassan Fathy

quotes.quote: We are caught in a traffic jam of discursive thought.
quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.quote: Take your own route, not the route everyone is using or taking. Create your own way; there is always traffic on the common route.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: One way to solve the traffic problem is to keep all the cars that are not paid for off the streets.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: If our goal is to be tolerant of people who are different than we are, Chase, then we really are aiming quite low. Traffic jams are to be tolerated. People are to be celebrated.
quotes.author: Glennon Doyle Melton

quotes.quote: His idea of traffic safety is going too fast for the cops to catch up.
quotes.author: Mira Grant

quotes.quote: People are sitting in traffic longer, and the types of solutions that are needed to relieve that congestion are ones that are paid for by the Highway Trust Fund.
quotes.author: Anthony Foxx

quotes.quote: There's a simple solution to our traffic problems. We'll have business build the roads, and government build the cars.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Traffic was as much an emotional problem as it was a mechanical one.
quotes.author: Tom Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: First you learn to drive fast. Next, you learn to drive fast in traffic. Then, you learn how to do it for 500 miles.
quotes.author: Alan Kulwicki

quotes.quote: The beaten path is the safest, but the traffic's terrible.
quotes.author: Jeffery Taylor

quotes.quote: Traffic congestion is caused by vehicles, not by people in themselves.
quotes.author: Jane Jacobs

quotes.quote: You can't stop traffic on Times Square.
quotes.author: Sydney Pollack

quotes.quote: Avoid the traffic by using one of the park's shuttle buses and view the elk rut with a park ranger.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: More traffic means more advertising dollars
quotes.author: Jeff Zucker

quotes.quote: Take the high road, there's a lot less traffic up there.
quotes.author: Phil Mcgraw

quotes.quote: Take the road less traveled...there's less traffic!
quotes.author: Monika Zands

quotes.quote: Outside of traffic, there is nothing that has held this country back as much as committees.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Moroccan traffic isn't like normal traffic. It's armed combat, a war of wills, in which only the very bravest have a chance to survive.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: Sometimes all it takes to stop traffic is for that right pair of red pumps.
quotes.author: Tommy Ton

quotes.quote: If you are the kind of person who is waiting for the 'right' thing to happen, you might wait for a long time. It's like waiting for all the traffic lights to be green for five miles before starting the trip.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Traffic is only one of the side effects of growth.
quotes.author: Roy Barnes

quotes.quote: Stuck in traffic is not an excuse. It's a sign of bad planning.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.quote: Traffic accidents have increased 100 percent in the city since the hurricane
quotes.author: Don Kelly

quotes.quote: The modern world is a crowd of very rapid racing cars all brought to a standstill and stuck in a block of traffic.
quotes.author: Gilbert K Chesterton

quotes.quote: Parents are traffic signs that are always in our blind spots
quotes.author: Jeremy P Johnson

quotes.quote: If you provide good alternatives for public transport, you won't have traffic problems
quotes.author: Jaime Lerner

quotes.quote: Sometimes, when there's too much traffic clogging up the road, you need to take a different route. But following the same path as everyone else can stall your progress in reaching your investment goals too.
quotes.author: Mark Mobius

quotes.quote: If you make more roads, you will have more traffic.
quotes.author: Jan Gehl

quotes.quote: You don't make any money sitting in traffic.
quotes.author: Wayne Huizenga

quotes.quote: It is the tragedy of the world that no one knows what he doesn't know and the less a man knows, the more sure he is that he knows everything.
quotes.author: Joyce Cary

quotes.quote: When you close your eyes to tragedy, you close your eyes to greatness.
quotes.author: Stephen Vizinczey

quotes.quote: The tragedy of this world is that everyone is alone. For a life in the past cannot be shared with the present.
quotes.author: Alan Lightman

quotes.quote: In this world there are two tragedies. One is not getting what one wants, and the other is getting it. The last is much the worst.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Life is a comedy to those who think, a tragedy to those who feel.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: A single death is a tragedy; a million deaths is a statistic.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: A tragedy is the imitation of an action that is serious and also, as having magnitude, complete in itself with incidents arousing pity and fear, wherewith to accomplish its catharsis of such emotions.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Here is the tragedy: when you are the victim of depression, not only do you feel utterly helpless and abandoned by the world, you also know that very few people can understand, or even begin to believe, that life can be this painful.
quotes.author: Giles Andreae

quotes.quote: The tragedy about history - personally and globally is that while we may learn it we rarely learn from it.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
quotes.author: Sholom Aleichem

quotes.quote: Tragedy is a tool for the living to gain wisdom, not a guide by which to live.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: You use everything. You use tragedy you use everything.
quotes.author: Shannon Hoon

quotes.quote: There are two tragedies in life. One is to lose your heart's desire. The other is to gain it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Life's tragedy is that we get old too soon and wise too late.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Tragedy is like strong acid it dissolves away all but the very gold of truth.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: The greatest tragedy in mankind's entire history may be the hijacking of morality by religion.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: One of the greatest tragedies in life is to lose your own sense of self and accept the version of you that is expected by everyone else.
quotes.author: K.L. Toth

quotes.quote: The tragedy of this world is that no one is happy, whether stuck in a time of pain or of joy. The tragedy of this world is that everyone is alone. For a life in the past cannot be shared with the present. Each person who gets stuck in time gets stuck alone.
quotes.author: Alan Lightman

quotes.quote: Tragedy, for me, is not a conflict between right and wrong, but between two different kinds of right.
quotes.author: Peter Shaffer

quotes.quote: The tragedy of this world is that no one is happy, whether stuck in a time of pain or joy.
quotes.author: Alan Lightman

quotes.quote: There is nothing more tragic than to find an individual bogged down in the length of life, devoid of breadth.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: It's not the tragedies that kill us, it's the messes.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Tragedy is a representation of action that is worthy of serious attention, complete in itself and of some magnitude bringing about by means of pity and fear the purging of such emotions.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: This world is a comedy to those that think, a tragedy to those that feel.
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: A great tragedy is occurring. Millions of people are dying prematurely. These people are killing themselves and they don't even know it.
quotes.author: Tim Loy

quotes.quote: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: The tragedy is not that love doesn't last. The tragedy is the love that lasts.
quotes.author: Shirley Hazzard

quotes.quote: You get tragedy where the tree, instead of bending, breaks.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: A tragedy need not have blood and death; it's enough that it all be filled with that majestic sadness that is the pleasure of tragedy.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: Tragedy makes you grow up.
quotes.author: Jane Campion

quotes.quote: Be like a train; go in the rain, go in the sun, go in the storm, go in the dark tunnels! Be like a train; concentrate on your road and go with no hesitation!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Driving the train doesn't set its course. The real job is laying the track.
quotes.author: Ed Catmull

quotes.quote: The trains always arrive at your station. The question is which one to take?
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter which side of the tracks your from, the train still rolls the same.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.quote: We are the train and the tracks are the path our lives follow. In control at dispatch is God, and He is overseeing each of our movements and coordinating what happens.
quotes.author: Joshua Robinson

quotes.quote: Missing a train is only painful if you run after it! Likewise, not matching the idea of success others expect from you is only painful if that's what you are seeking.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: The only way to be sure of catching a train is to miss the one before it.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: If your train's on the wrong track every station you come to is the wrong station.
quotes.author: Bernard Malamud

quotes.quote: If a train doesn't stop at your station, then it's not your train.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: When a train goes through a tunnel and it gets dark, you don't throw away the ticket and jump off. You sit still and trust the engineer.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Sometimes the wrong train takes you to the right station.
quotes.author: The Lunchbox

quotes.quote: If a railroad is bent, the train shall turn over; if a man's character is bent, he shall turn over just like that train.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Everybody says they want to be free. Take the train off the tracks and it's free-but it can't go anywhere.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The right train of thought can take you to a better station in life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you board the wrong train, it is no use running along the corridor in the other direction.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: If a train is coming at you, closing your eyes won't save you ... but if you look right at it, you at least have a chance to jump.
quotes.author: Andrew Vachss

quotes.quote: The train may fall in love with a station, but it has to go and it goes! Don't be like the train; stay at the station you fell in love, go nowhere!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Many trains arrive at your station; treat them good whether they stay or leave!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Neither a wise man nor a brave man lies down on the tracks of history to wait for the train of the future to run over him.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Life is like a train station, people come and go all the time, but the ones that wait for the train with you are the ones that are worth keeping in it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't let the train of enthusiasm run through the station so fast that people can't get on board.
quotes.author: H V Morton

quotes.quote: Many times the wrong train took me to the right place.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: To be number one, you must train like you are number two.
quotes.author: Maurice Greene

quotes.quote: Train your child in the way in which you know you should have gone yourself.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: You train people how to treat you by how you treat yourself.
quotes.author: Martin Rutte

quotes.quote: If you want to be a lion you must train with lions.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: The train is a small world moving through a larger world.
quotes.author: Elisha Cooper

quotes.quote: If you train hard, you'll not only be hard, you'll be hard to beat.
quotes.author: Herschel Walker

quotes.quote: Sometimes you're the train, sometimes you're the track.
quotes.author: Luke Bryan

quotes.quote: AÂ goodÂ teacherÂ is likeÂ aÂ candle - it consumes itself to light the way for others.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: AÂ goodÂ teacher, likeÂ aÂ good entertainer first must hold his audience's attention, then he can teach his lesson.
quotes.author: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.quote: The best way a mentor can prepare another leader is to expose him or her to other great people.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: A mentor is someone who is willing to give you advice that isn't in the best interest for them. It takes a real mentor to put you first.
quotes.author: Caroline Ghosn

quotes.quote: AÂ teacherÂ should, above all things, first induceÂ aÂ desire in the pupil for the acquisition he wishes to impart.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: When the trainer talks to the fighter, there's a connection. You don't always have to say much.
quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quotes.quote: A good teacher offers practice, a bad one offers theories.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: Coaches have to watch for what they don't want to see and listen to what they don't want to hear.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: GoodÂ teachersÂ know how to bring out the best in students.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: It is not what the coach knows; it is what his players have learned.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A coach should never be afraid to ask questions of anyone he could learn from.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: As anÂ instructor, you must be able to distinguish between poor performance caused by lack of ability or aptitude on the part of the student and poor performance caused by lack of effort. You should treat the first with patience and the latter with firmness. You must never apply sarcasm and ridicule.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: InstructorsÂ should not only be skilful in those sciences which they teach, but have skill in the method of teaching, and patience in the practice.
quotes.author: Isaac Watts

quotes.quote: A life coach does for the rest of your life what a personal trainer does for your health and fitness.
quotes.author: Elaine Macdonald

quotes.quote: A good hittingÂ instructorÂ is able to mold his teaching to the individual. If a guy stands on his head, you perfect that.
quotes.author: Bill Robinson

quotes.quote: TheÂ trainerÂ trains the docile horse to turn, with his sensitive neck, whichever way the rider indicates.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: TheÂ teacherÂ must derive not only the capacity, but the desire, to observe natural phenomena. TheÂ teacherÂ must understand and feel her position of observer: the activity must lie in the phenomenon.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: All it takes is one coach that believes in you.
quotes.author: Jon Gruden

quotes.quote: A coach is someone who can give correction without causing resentment.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: AnÂ instructorÂ should exemplify the things he seeks to teach. It will be of great advantage if you yourself can do all you ask of your students and more.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: For the best return on your money, pour your purse into your head.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Learn as if you were not reaching your goal and as though you were scared of missing it
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: On the mountains of truth you can never climb in vain: either you will reach a point higher up today, or you will be training your powers so that you will be able to climb higher tomorrow.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: An individual step in character training is to put responsibility on the individual.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: The most important part of education is proper training in the nursery.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Not every difficult and dangerous thing is suitable for training, but only that which is conducive to success in achieving the object of our effort.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: In general, any form of exercise, if pursued continuously, will help train us in perseverance. Long-distance running is particularly good training in perseverance.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: No matter how long you train someone to be brave, you never know if they are or not until something real happens.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Art is unquestionably one of the purest and highest elements in human happiness. It trains the mind through the eye, and the eye through the mind. As the sun colors flowers, so does art color life.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Practice is the hardest part of learning, and training is the essence of transformation.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: If you want to teach people a new way of thinking, don't bother trying to teach them. Instead, give them a tool, the use of which will lead to new ways of thinking.
quotes.author: Richard Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Train up a child in such a way she or he should go; even when she or he is old she or he will not depart
quotes.author: Santosh Avvannavar

quotes.quote: Where my reason, imagination, or interest were not engaged, I would not or could not learn.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The essence of training is to allow error without consequence.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Athletes need to enjoy their training. They don't enjoy going down to the track with a coach making them do repetitions until they're exhausted. From enjoyment comes the will to win.
quotes.author: Arthur Lydiard

quotes.quote: If you want to be a successful runner, you have to consider everything. It's no good just thinking about endurance and not to develop fine speed.
quotes.author: Arthur Lydiard

quotes.quote: Microphones on the last stand, the world is in my hands / Basic training's over, time to war
quotes.author: Corey Woods

quotes.quote: Her eyes are open, her dreams are over / The sky is falling, it's broken, it's broken / Training to be a star, training to be a star / You know that you are
quotes.author: Brian K Diaz

quotes.quote: Tears do evaporate / But oh so slowly like piss on toilet seat / In training to run a marathon / Miles and miles and miles / With your Sunday shoes on
quotes.author: Vic Chesnut

quotes.quote: There's a training course / boys and girls of real ambition / start a new job in a factory / where they're making ammunition
quotes.author: Roger Charlery

quotes.quote: Demanding to be tested by the best / Not to be forgotten like all the rest / The time has come all training done / The muscle and the blood will come to pay
quotes.author: Joey Demaio

quotes.quote: Today is the day all the training through / We have come for the number one not the number two / Let the contest begin play hard fight to win / Immortality victory and fame
quotes.author: Joey Demaio

quotes.quote: Discipline, education training, / Persistence, training, objectivity / Faith, devotion, are things we must learn / If we wanna get anywhere we' been looking for
quotes.author: Eduardo Rodrigues Gomes

quotes.quote: For the second time they're twice as hard to catch / That's why I'm in training now to ask forgiveness / Getting in condition for my greatest match
quotes.author: Danny Dill

quotes.quote: Every moved you've learned is trained to that end / Yet, we wish to preserve life / The first thing to learn, is that difference / Then you can start training with us, from the beginning
quotes.author: Gary E Grice

quotes.quote: We don't rise to the level of our expectations, we fall to the level of our training.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: It's possible to train yourself to delay gratification-- but you need to work with the grain of human nature, not against it.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: To know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The essence of all religions is one. Only their approaches are different.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Nature provides exceptions to every rule.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: Nothing astonishes men so much as common sense and plain dealing.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Man seeks to change the foods available in nature to suit his tastes, thereby putting an end to the very essence of life contained in them.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: The essence of greatness is neglect of the self.
quotes.author: James Anthony Froude

quotes.quote: I am not responsible for the successful working of the machinery of society.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: As to the mental essence, we find it in infants devoid of every mental form.
quotes.author: Avicenna

quotes.quote: All unrest is but the struggle of the soul to reassure herself of her inborn immortality.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Back through the ages of barbarism and civilization, in all tongues, we find this instinctive pleasure in the imitative action that is the very essence of all drama.
quotes.author: George P. Baker

quotes.quote: I am suffocated and lost when I have not the bright feeling of progression.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: As if you could kill time without injuring eternity.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: God is, even though the whole world deny him. Truth stands, even if there be no public support. It is self-sustained.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There are always two parties; the establishment and the movement.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Place yourself in the middle of the stream of power and wisdom which animates all whom it floats, and you are without effort impelled to truth, to right and a perfect contentment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Not for nothing one face, one character, one fact makes much impression on him, and another none.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There are always difficulties arising that tempt you to believe your critics are right.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Allow yourself to trust joy and embrace it. You will find you dance with everything.
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: When Nature has work to be done, she creates a genius to do it.
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: It is easy in the world to live after the world's opinion; it is easy in solitude to live after our own; but the great man is he who in the midst of the crowd keeps with perfect sweetness the independence of solitude.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Time is but the stream I go a-fishing in. I drink at it; but while I drink I see the sandy bottom and detect how shallow it is.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Every man is the builder of a temple called his body.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them, and try to follow where they lead.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Self-trust is the first secret to success.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: This whole earth in which we inhabit is but a point is space.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: In most books, the I, or first person, is omitted; in this it will be retained; that, in respect to egotism, is the main difference.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: In absolute incommunicableness it stood apart, a thought, a system of thought which as yet had no symbol in spoken language.
quotes.author: Fitz Hugh Ludlow

quotes.quote: Very early, I knew that the only object in life was to grow.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: Transformation is a process, and as life happens there are tons of ups and downs. It's a journey of discovery - there are moments on mountaintops and moments in deep valleys of despair.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: The process of transformation consists mostly of decay.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: Transformation is an ongoing process that tends to appear ordinary, when, in fact, something extraordinary is taking place.
quotes.author: Suzy Ross

quotes.quote: When we genuinely believe that inner transformation is God's work and not ours, we can put to rest our passion to set others straight.
quotes.author: Richard J. Foster

quotes.quote: Yes, your transformation will be hard. Yes, you will feel frightened, messed up and knocked down. Yes, you'll want to stop. Yes, it's the best work you'll ever do.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Nothing gets transformed in your life until your mind is transformed.
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: Transformation without work and pain, without suffering, without a sense of loss is just an illusion of true change.
quotes.author: Paul Young

quotes.quote: Transformation doesn't take place with a vacuum; instead, it occurs when we are indirectly and directly connected to all those around us.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Real transformation requires real honesty. If you want to move forward - get real with yourself.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Transformation is an acquired tasteâ€”not for the faint of heart.
quotes.author: Bob Anderson

quotes.quote: The key to our transformation is simply this: the better we know ourselves the better equipped we will be to make our choices wisely.
quotes.author: Gregg Braden

quotes.quote: Transformation does not start with someone else changing you; transformation is an inner self reworking of what you are now to what you will be.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: To transform yourself, you don't need to do big things. Just do small things in big way. Transformation will follow you!
quotes.author: Rahul Sinha

quotes.quote: It is our own thoughts that hold the key to miraculous transformation.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Like an actor who transforms into the character that they're playing, you can transform into yourself.
quotes.author: Leeza Gibbons

quotes.quote: Transformed people transform people.
quotes.author: Richard Rohr
