quotes.quote: Transformation does not happen by learning new information. It happens when you change how you view and react to other people, events and things around you.
quotes.author: Med Jones

quotes.quote: If you wish to transform, pretend this day until it is so.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: Transformation literally means going beyond your form.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: You can't have a physical transformation until you have a spiritual transformation.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: Transformation doesn't have to be deep, dark and mysterious. If you screw up, fine - laugh at yourself, learn and move on.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: During a transformation, it's understandable to be hesitant about moving too fast, especially at the outset.
quotes.author: Irene Rosenfeld

quotes.quote: Transformation isn't a future event, it's a present day activity.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: Only love and compassion can bring true and lasting transformation.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Transformation is often more about unlearning then learning.
quotes.author: Richard Rohr

quotes.quote: Transformation can come in the mysterious guise of shape-shifting, or through a simple change of mind.
quotes.author: C.R. Strahan

quotes.quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Transformation in the world happens when people are healed and start investing in other people.
quotes.author: Michael W. Smith

quotes.quote: Know that transformation sometimes begins with a fall. So never curse the fall.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: As the caterpillar undergoes transformation within the cocoon before emerging as a butterfly; likewise, life experiences shape character.
quotes.author: Lorna Jackie

quotes.quote: The single best thing about coming out of the closet is that nobody can insult you by telling you what you've just told them.
quotes.author: Rachel Maddow

quotes.quote: Race, gender, religion, sexuality, we are all people and that's it. We're all people. We're all equal.
quotes.author: Connor Franta

quotes.quote: Gender preference does not define you. Your spirit defines you.
quotes.author: P.C. Cast

quotes.quote: The beauty of standing up for your rights is others see you standing and stand up as well.
quotes.author: Cassandra Duffy

quotes.quote: We should indeed keep calm in the face of difference, and live our lives in a state of inclusion and wonder at the diversity of humanity.
quotes.author: George Takei

quotes.quote: I am a strong, black, lesbian woman. Every single time I say it, I feel so much better.
quotes.author: Brittney Griner

quotes.quote: I want to do the right thing and not hide anymore. I want to march for tolerance, acceptance, and understanding. I want to take a stand and say, 'Me, too.’
quotes.author: Jason Collins

quotes.quote: When all Americans are treated as equal, no matter who they are or whom they love, we are all more free.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Everybody’s journey is individual. You you fall in love with a boy, you fall in love with a boy. The fact that many Americans consider it a disease says more about them than it does about homosexuality.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: I think being gay is a blessing, and it's something I am thankful for every single day
quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

quotes.quote: As if being transgender wasn't tough enough.
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.quote: It was a shock to me at first. I didn't even know who transgender people were or what that term meant. I just couldn't imagine you transforming into something else.
quotes.author: Brooke Sebold

quotes.quote: No matter gay, straight, or bi / Lesbian, transgender life / I'm on the right track baby / I was born to survive
quotes.author: Fernando Garibay

quotes.quote: I find the courage to admit that I am transgender, / And that does not mean that I am unlovable. / This world that we imagine in this room / Might be used to gain access to other rooms, / Other worlds, previously unimaginable.
quotes.author: William Bevan

quotes.quote: I don't know if I'm transgender I don't know if I'm CIS-gender / I always have this feeling something's wrong / Can someone please help me understand / The uncertainty is tearing me apart
quotes.author: Seventh Estate

quotes.quote: Hi my name is name is LGBT, / Don't take out your misery on me, / On me, on me / I'm happy, I'm happy / And free, and free / I'm happy, I'm happy / And free / LGBT, LOVE
quotes.author: Elizabeth Boland

quotes.quote: The LGBT community. Why is that a community / They talk about / Being non-binary. So am I, i'm not a computer
quotes.author: Flippy-G

quotes.quote: That kid thinks because he's in love with a transgender woman that he's gay. He's confused.
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.quote: I envy transgender people. They figured out what's going on with them... and they fixed it!
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.quote: You may not know this about me, but I am a transgender woman. I know what it's like to be... attacked and denied because of who I am.
quotes.author: Ali Adler

quotes.quote: Not that I'm judgmental mind you, people are all different - I'm bisexual for instance.
quotes.author: Barbara Wilson

quotes.quote: Homosexuality will become a more fashionable device than fornication.
quotes.author: Smollett

quotes.quote: Transgender people serves as a catalyst for self-recognition and acceptance, as they see themselves in others and realize that they are not alone in how they feel.
quotes.author: Genny Beemyn

quotes.quote: A common perception is that young transgender people today have it easier than transgender people in past decades because of the greater availability of resources and support services.
quotes.author: Genny Beemyn

quotes.quote: The internet and increased attention to transgender people in the news media and popular culture have made it possible for young people who think they might be transgender to learn about the topic readily and to meet transgender people virtually.
quotes.author: Genny Beemyn

quotes.quote: The term 'transgender' denotes a range of gender experiences, subjectivity and presentations that fall across.
quotes.author: Sally Hines

quotes.quote: Transgender' includes gender identities that have, more traditionally, been described as 'transsexual,' and a diversity of genders that call into question an assumed relationship.
quotes.author: Sally Hines

quotes.quote: Over the past decade, analyses of transgender have moved from the margins and transgender studies has established itself as one of the most creative sites of debate within gender and sexuality studies.
quotes.author: Sally Hines

quotes.quote: Trans identities were one of the most written about subjects of the late twentieth century. New communities of transgender people have created new industries, a new academic discipline, new forms of entertainment.
quotes.author: Institute of Medicine

quotes.quote: LGBT elders experience stigma, discrimination, and violence across the life course.
quotes.author: Institute of Medicine

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Light precedes every transition. Whether at the end of a tunnel, through a crack in the door or the flash of an idea, it is always there, heralding a new beginning.
quotes.author: Teresa Tsalaky

quotes.quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Life must be a preparation for the transition to another dimension.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Change is situational. Transition, on the other hand, is psychological. It is not those events, but rather the inner reorientation or self-redefinition that you have to go through in order to incorporate any of those changes into your life. Without a transition, a change is just a rearrangement of the furniture. Unless transition happens, the change won't work, because it doesn't take.
quotes.author: William Bridges

quotes.quote: A lot of people resist transition and therefore never allow themselves to enjoy who they are. Embrace the change, no matter what it is; once you do, you can learn about the new world you're in and take advantage of it.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: Transitions themselves are not the issue, but how well you respond to their challenges!
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: Never too old, never too bad, never too late, never too sick to start from scratch once again.
quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

quotes.quote: The transition was difficult. It's hard to stop something that you've enjoyed and that has been very rewarding.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.author: Maria Robinson

quotes.quote: When you are transitioning to a new season of life, the people and situations that no longer fit you will fall away.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Life is a transition from one form to another. The life of this world is the material for a new form.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Many transition states have a well-defined preferred geometrical requirement.
quotes.author: Derek Barton

quotes.quote: When shifts and transitions in life shake you to the core, see that as a sign of greatness that's about to occur.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter where you are, you are nowhere compared to where you can go.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: Some people believe holding on and hanging in there are signs of great strength. However, there are times when it takes much more strength to know when to let go and then do it.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself. That is something you have charge of.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: We can't become what we need to be by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Change does not roll in on the wheels of inevitability, but comes through continuous struggle. And so we must straighten our backs and work for our freedom. A man can't ride you unless your back is bent.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Any transition is easier if you believe in yourself and your talent.
quotes.author: Priyanka Chopra

quotes.quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: A transition period is a period between two transition periods.
quotes.author: George Stigler

quotes.quote: How can you know what you're capable of if you don't embrace the unkown?
quotes.author: Esmeralda Santiago

quotes.quote: The best thing you can do is the right thing; the next best thing you can do is the wrong thing; the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Translation is not appropriation, as is sometimes claimed; it is a form of listening that then changes how you speak.
quotes.author: Eliot Weinberger

quotes.quote: Translation is the art of failure.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Translation is that which transforms everything so that nothing changes.
quotes.author: Gunter Grass

quotes.quote: The original is unfaithful to the translation.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: Nor ought a genius less than his that writ attempt translation.
quotes.author: John Denham

quotes.quote: Through the act of translation we break out of linguistic confinement and reach many other communities.
quotes.author: Ngugi wa Thiong'o

quotes.quote: Translation is the paradigm, the exemplar of all writing. It is translation that demonstrates most vividly the yearning for transformation that underlies every act involving speech, that supremely human gift.
quotes.author: Harry Mathews

quotes.quote: Never trust the translation or interpretation of something without first trusting its interpreter.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Translation cannot be dissociated from the notion of progress, some even maintain that a society can be measured by the translation it accepts.
quotes.author: Jean-Francois Joly

quotes.quote: Translation is at best an echo.
quotes.author: George Borrow

quotes.quote: Translation is a two-edged instrument: it has the special purpose of demonstrating the learner's knowledge of the foreign language, either as a form of control or to exercise his intelligence in order to develop his competence.
quotes.author: Peter Newmark

quotes.quote: Translation means that a translator has picked one word above all the others: one winner, with all the finalists gone from the page forever. Translation always calls upon the translator to make a judgement call, and what the reader hears, then, is a judgement.
quotes.author: Aviya Kushner

quotes.quote: The clumsiest literal translation is a thousand times more useful than the prettiest paraphrase.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Woe to the makers of literal translations, who by rendering every word weaken the meaning! It is indeed by so doing that we can say the letter kills and the spirit gives life.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Translating from one language to another is the most delicate of intellectual exercises; compared to translation, all other puzzles, from bridge to crosswords, seem trivial and vulgar. To take a piece of Greek and put it in English without spilling a drop; what a nice skill!
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: To translate, one must have a style of his own, for otherwise the translation will have no rhythm or nuance, which come from the process of artistically thinking through and molding the sentences; they cannot be reconstituted by piecemeal imitation. The problem of translation is to retreat to a simpler tenor of one's own style and creatively adjust this to one's author.
quotes.author: Paul Goodman

quotes.quote: Any translation which intends to perform a transmitting function cannot transmit anything but information -- hence, something inessential. This is the hallmark of bad translations.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: It is neither the best nor the worst things in a book that defy translation.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Translations (like wives) are seldom strictly faithful if they are in the least attractive.
quotes.author: Roy Campbell

quotes.quote: The art of translation lies less in knowing the language than in knowing your own.
quotes.author: Ned Rorem

quotes.quote: Translation is not a matter of words only: it is a matter of making intelligible a whole culture.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: Translation is the circulatory system of the world's literatures.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: True translation is transparent: it does not obscure the original, does not stand in its light, but rather allows pure language, as if strengthened by its own medium, to shine even more fully on the original.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: Translation is not original creation - that is what one must remember. In translation, some loss is inevitable.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: It is in the translation that the innocence lost after the first reading is restored under another guise, since the reader is once again faced with a new text and its attendant mystery. That is the inescapable paradox of translation, and also its wealth.
quotes.author: Alberto Manguel

quotes.quote: f the translation respects the original, it may, and even should, be able to hold a dialog with it, face-to-face and hold its own. The aspect of respect does not mean destroying what is respected
quotes.author: Jean-Yves Masson

quotes.quote: If the dream is a translation of waking life, waking life is also a translation of the dream.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: Every language is a world. Without translation, we would inhabit parishes bordering on silence.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.quote: Translation is like a woman. If it is beautiful, it is not faithful. If it is faithful, it is most certainly not beautiful.
quotes.author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quotes.quote: All translation is a compromise - the effort to be literal and the effort to be idiomatic.
quotes.author: Benjamin Jowett

quotes.quote: Total transparency risks country's stability.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Transparency in the traditional school might destroy it.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Transparency may be the most disruptive and far-reaching innovation to come out of social media.
quotes.author: Paul Gillin

quotes.quote: Let your clarity define you, in the end, we will only just remember how it feels.
quotes.author: Rob Thomas

quotes.quote: Lack of clarity is always a sign of dishonesty.
quotes.author: Celia Green

quotes.quote: Transparency people talk a lot about, it's a goal everybody ascribes to but when push comes to shove, very few people actually adhere to it.
quotes.author: Keith Rabois

quotes.quote: Transparency is all about letting in and embracing new ideas, new technology and new approaches. No individual, entity or agency, no matter how smart, how old, or how experienced, can afford to stop learning.
quotes.author: Gina McCarthy

quotes.quote: That transparency is important. Look at what's inside products and seek out those that contain natural, plant-based ingredients - from toothpaste to cosmetics.
quotes.author: Sophie Heyman Uliano

quotes.quote: Transparency painted in a picture produces its effect in a different way than opaqueness.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: Eyes so transparent that through them the soul is seen.
quotes.author: Theophile Gautier

quotes.quote: Clarity is the ability to see the soul in action in the physical world.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Transparency is the key to good governance & e-governance is the only effective way of transparent governance.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: Our whole philosophy is one of transparency.
quotes.author: Valerie Jarrett

quotes.quote: Clarity is the counterbalance of profound thoughts.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Clarity is the politeness of the man of letters.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Transparency is the antidote to hypocrisy.
quotes.author: Britt Merrick

quotes.quote: There is a beautiful transparency to honest disciples who never wear a false face and do not pretend to be anything but who they are.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.quote: A lack of transparency that fuels the idea that she is either hiding something or simply not someone to be trusted.
quotes.author: Christopher Michael Cillizza

quotes.quote: Transparency is the new objectivity.
quotes.author: David Weinberger

quotes.quote: Through transparency we expose corruption, but then there is no action taken against the corrupt.
quotes.author: Aruna Roy

quotes.quote: There is no persuasiveness more effectual than the transparency of a single heart, of a sincere life.
quotes.author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

quotes.quote: Transparency and the rule of law will be the touchstones of this presidency.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Transparency is for those who carry out public duties and exercise public power. Privacy is for everyone else.
quotes.author: Glenn Greenwald

quotes.quote: Transparency and detail are everything in science.
quotes.author: Ben Goldacre

quotes.quote: Speak the truth. Transparency breeds legitimacy.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Clarity of mind means clarity of passion, too; this is why a great and clear mind loves ardently and sees distinctly what it loves.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Transparency is not about restoring trust in institutions. Transparency is the politics of managing mistrust.
quotes.author: Ivan Krastev

quotes.quote: Definition is the companion of clarity; clarity is the guide to your goals.
quotes.author: Tony Buzan

quotes.quote: A lack of transparency results in distrust and a deep sense of insecurity.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Transparency is not the same as looking straight through a building: it's not just a physical idea, it's also an intellectual one.
quotes.author: Helmut Jahn

quotes.quote: Transportation is the center of the world! It is the glue of our daily lives. When it goes well, we don't see it. When it goes wrong, it negatively colors our day, makes us feel angry and impotent, curtails our possibilities.
quotes.author: Robin Chase

quotes.quote: Public transportation is like a magnifying glass that shows you civilization up close.
quotes.author: Chris Gethard

quotes.quote: The reality about transportation is that it's future-oriented. If we're planning for what we have, we're behind the curve.
quotes.author: Anthony Foxx

quotes.quote: We want transportation as reliable as running water.
quotes.author: Travis Kalanick

quotes.quote: If transportation technology was moving along as fast as microprocessor technology, then the day after tomorrow I would be able to get in a taxi cab and be in Tokyo in 30 seconds.
quotes.author: W. Daniel Hillis

quotes.quote: Transportation made sublimation literal. It conveyed evil to another world.
quotes.author: Robert Hughes

quotes.quote: The solution to transportation inefficiencies lies at the intersection of collaborative consumption and the social graph: Shifting transportation from ownership to access.
quotes.author: John Zimmer

quotes.quote: There will be no transportation problems in Heaven-you can either glide along, float along or fly!
quotes.author: David Berg

quotes.quote: What's unique about transportation is that it's the one function that repeats itself throughout the supply chain.
quotes.author: John Murphy

quotes.quote: Mass transportation is doomed to failure in North America because a person's car is the only place where he can be alone and think.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: When dealing with complex transportation issues, the best thing to do is pull up with a cold beer and let somebody else figure it out.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: The system of transportation is not coherent; it is not treated as integral. Roads compete with with railroads and airlines in chaotic fashion, and at immense cost to the nation.
quotes.author: Anthony Stafford Beer

quotes.quote: Individual transportation has become synonymous for freedom and liberty, so it would be difficult to actually get rid of individualized transport, and in rural areas that would be impossible.
quotes.author: Hermann E. Ott

quotes.quote: Transportation is an essential part of our lives, and in New York City where driving is not a viable option most of the time, public transportation and taxis are the only way to get around.
quotes.author: Simi Linton

quotes.quote: I'm suspicious of any mode of transportation that requires a running start.
quotes.author: Alan Kotok

quotes.quote: Any businessman will tell you that transportation is fundamental to success.
quotes.author: John Hickenlooper

quotes.quote: There can be no doubt that the transportation sector is the most critical sector of our economy.
quotes.author: Robert Brady

quotes.quote: When you are talking about transportation, people aren't making their plans while in front of a computer.
quotes.author: Logan Green

quotes.quote: Transportation is going to transition from ownership to transportation as a service. What is the best model to address the largest part of that market? We believe it's peer-to-peer.
quotes.author: John Zimmer

quotes.quote: Intelligent transportation technology is key to better parking management. The adage that "You can't manage what you can't measure" fits parking perfectly.
quotes.author: Donald Shoup

quotes.quote: Transportation funding is a win-win for everyone involved.
quotes.author: Corrine Brown

quotes.quote: The key word for transportation in the 21st is 'choice.'
quotes.author: Anthony Foxx

quotes.quote: There are no practical alternatives to air transportation.
quotes.author: Daniel Goldin

quotes.quote: My main form of transportation at that time was a bicycle, because bicycles could move though the crowd.
quotes.author: John Pomfret

quotes.quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: A trap is only a trap if you don't know about it. If you know about it, it's a challenge.
quotes.author: China Miéville

quotes.quote: Knowing where the trap is—that's the first step in evading it.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self-rejection.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: Freedom is for honest people. No man who is not himself honest can be free – he is his own trap.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: The thing that gives you power also traps you.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Bitterness is the trap that snares the hunter.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Judgment traps you within the limitations of your comparisons. It inhibits freedom.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.quote: The real trap of fame is its irresistibility.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bengis

quotes.quote: Man is the only kind of varmint sets his own trap, baits it, then steps in it.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Debt is a trap which man sets and baits himself, and then deliberately gets into.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: It's really easy to fall into the trap of bellieving what we do is more important than what we are. Of course, it's the opposite that's true: What we are ultimately determines what we do!
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: We have to learn to be our own best friends because we fall too easily into the trap of being our own worst enemies.
quotes.author: Roderick Thorp

quotes.quote: Looks can be deceiving but let's not fall into the looks trap.
quotes.author: Fatima Faisal

quotes.quote: Life's a trap, you get caught in whatever direction you go.
quotes.author: Sneha Dewani

quotes.quote: The real purpose of books is to trap the mind into doing its own thinking.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Worry about being respected, never worry about being liked because that's the trap.
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: Somewhere in the depths of soltitude, beyond wilderness and freedom, lay the trap of madness.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: But difficult situations and wrong choices conspire to trap us in hopelessness.
quotes.author: Judah Smith

quotes.quote: Creative ideas in people's minds, but they fall into the trap of fear or rejection. Create a free judgment Wednesday and you spawn a thread creation.
quotes.author: Alexander Osborn

quotes.quote: We cannot leave the trap until we know we are in it.
quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

quotes.quote: Procrastination is the soul rebelling against entrapment.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Hate traps us by binding us too tightly to our adversary.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Building a better mousetrap merely results in smarter mice.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: The whole idea of motivation is a trap, forget motivation, just do it.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: To trap one's self-suffering is to risk being devoured from the inside.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Life is not fair, it never was and it is now and it won’t ever be. Do not fall into the trap. The entitlement trap, of feeling like you’re a victim. You are not.
quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

quotes.quote: Trash has given us an appetite for art.
quotes.author: Pauline Kael

quotes.quote: To gain the treasure, you must leave the trash.
quotes.author: Eric Samuel Timm

quotes.quote: Sometimes if you talk trash, you end up taking out the garbage.
quotes.author: Len Elmore

quotes.quote: Trash is something you get rid of - or disease. I'm not something you get rid of.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.quote: When someone throws trash on you, shake it off, stomp on it, and use it to rise to the top!
quotes.author: John Hagee

quotes.quote: A bit of trash now and then is good for the severest reader. It provides the necessary roughage in the literary diet.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: The trash and litter of nature disappears into the ground with the passing of each year, but man's litter has more permanence.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: From the first, in people and in things, there is no such thing as trash. These words point to the fundamental truth of Buddhism, a truth I could not as yet conceive in those days.
quotes.author: Soko Morinaga

quotes.quote: When we lack etiquette, we trash things. We trash each other. We trash the environment. We lose sight of the value of things. We suffer alienation when our spirit is disconnected from our physical awareness.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: You hang out with trash and you start to smell like garbage.
quotes.author: Caroline Manzo

quotes.quote: Do we hate paradise so much we need to make sure it becomes a trash heap?
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: I guess if your heart's in the right place, the trash can go anywhere.
quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

quotes.quote: I don't care how fancy you wrap trash, it's still trash.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: It's called loitering, which is like littering with human beings as the trash.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: Never trash-talk yourself or others. Stay curious. Speak your truth.
quotes.author: Claudia Black

quotes.quote: People don't want truth, they just want trash.
quotes.author: Kola Boof

quotes.quote: Ours is a culture and a time immensely rich in trash as it is in treasures.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: This is the dialectic - there is a very short distance between high art and trash, and trash that contains an element of craziness is by this very quality nearer to art.
quotes.author: Douglas Sirk

quotes.quote: You don't want to trash what you've done; that's your history.
quotes.author: Pat Benatar

quotes.quote: You can take the woman outta the trash, but you can't take the trash out a the woman.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: To leave the world better than you found it, sometimes you have to pick up other people's trash.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: I'd just much rather see an ugly person take the trash out than see somebody really pretty taking the trash out.
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.quote: When young, one is confident to be able to build palaces for mankind, but when the time comes one has one's hands full just to be able to remove their trash.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Smart people often talk trash about happiness and worse than trash about books on happiness, and they have been doing so for centuries - just as long as other people have been pursuing happiness and writing books about it.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: Recycling is a good thing to do. It makes people feel good to do it. The thing I want to emphasize is the vast difference between recycling for the purpose of feeling good and recycling for the purpose of solving the trash problem.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: Why will friends publish all the trash they can scrape together of celebrated people?
quotes.author: Maria Edgeworth

quotes.quote: Lovely flowers have been known to grow out of trash heaps.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kata

quotes.quote: Movies are so rarely great art that if we cannot appreciate great trash we have very little reason to be interested in them.
quotes.author: Pauline Kael

quotes.quote: Cheating on a good woman is like choosing trash over treasure.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: With too little judgement, we get trash. With too much judgement, we get blockage.
quotes.author: Stephen Nachmanovitch

quotes.quote: Trauma fractures comprehension as a pebble shatters a windshield. The wound at the site of impact spreads across the field of vision, obscuring reality and challenging belief.
quotes.author: Jane Leavy

quotes.quote: There is no one way to recover and heal from any trauma. Each survivor chooses their own path or stumbles across it.
quotes.author: Laurie Matthew

quotes.quote: Outside, the sun shines. Inside, there’s only darkness. The blackness is hard to describe, as it’s more than symptoms. It’s a nothing that becomes everything there is. And what one sees is only a fraction of the trauma inflicted.
quotes.author: Justin Ordoñez

quotes.quote: No trauma has discrete edges. Trauma bleeds. Out of wounds and across boundaries.
quotes.author: Leslie Jamison

quotes.quote: Nature has a way of deadening us to traumatic events, until we're ready to deal with it. And once you do, it's a volcanic reaction.
quotes.author: Patricia Montandon

quotes.quote: It's unrealistic to expect that you can bleach the trauma out of your mind. What treatment can help you do is learn how to cope with the experience, with the memories and to live in the present.
quotes.author: Lisa Lewis

quotes.quote: The willingness to face traumas - be they large, small, primitive or fresh - is the key to healing from them. They may never disappear in the way we think they should, but maybe they don’t need to. Trauma is an ineradicable aspect of life. We are human as a result of it, not in spite of it.
quotes.author: Mark Epstein

quotes.quote: There are wounds that never show on the body that are deeper and more hurtful than anything that bleeds.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Trauma is a fact of life. It does not, however, have to be a life sentence.
quotes.author: Peter A. Levine

quotes.quote: Sometimes I think we're exposed to things we shouldn't be exposed to too early. I think that sets the tone to a person's whole life. Trauma.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.quote: The paradox of trauma is that it has both the power to destroy and the power to transform and resurrect.
quotes.author: Peter A. Levine

quotes.quote: Someone who has experienced trauma also has gifts to offer all of us - in their depth, their knowledge of our universal vulnerability, and their experience of the power of compassion.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Trauma is a rude awakening, but also an opportunity to edit the script from believing to knowing. Self define for destiny's shine!
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: No experience is a cause of success or failure. We do not suffer from the shock of our experiences, so-called trauma - but we make out of them just what suits our purposes.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: The shock of any trauma, I think changes your life. It’s more acute in the beginning and after a little time you settle back to what you were. However it leaves an indelible mark on your psyche.
quotes.author: Alex Lifeson

quotes.quote: I had been fortified by trauma, the way a bone, once broken, grows back stronger than it had been.
quotes.author: Charles Blow

quotes.quote: Don't despair if your heart has been through a lot of trauma. Sometimes that's how beautiful hearts are remade: they are shattered first.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: Trauma is a unique phenomenon all on its own, as if it is an entity in and of itself.
quotes.author: Paul Levy

quotes.quote: Trauma reflected upon in tranquility can produce morally stunning insights – literary light! It can also produce maudlin rubbish.
quotes.author: Jennifer Stone

quotes.quote: Sometimes a breakdown can be the beginning of a kind of breakthrough, a way of living in advance through a trauma that prepares you for a future of radical transformation.
quotes.author: Cherrie Moraga

quotes.quote: All children have to be deceived if they are to grow up without trauma.
quotes.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quotes.quote: This is a dark time, filled with suffering and uncertainty. Like living cells in a larger body, it is natural that we feel the trauma of our world. So don’t be afraid of the anguish you feel, or the anger or fear, because these responses arise from the depth of your caring and the truth of your interconnectedness with all beings.
quotes.author: Joanna Macy

quotes.quote: Some people's lives seem to flow in a narrative; mine had many stops and starts. That's what trauma does. It interrupts the plot. You can't process it because it doesn't fit with what came before or what comes afterwards.
quotes.author: Jessica Stern

quotes.quote: You need to take the traumas and make them part of who you've come to be, and you need to fold the worst events of your life into a narrative of triumph, evincing a better self in response to things that hurt.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: The only lasting trauma is the one we suffer without positive change.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: We cannot have a world where everyone is a victim. "I'm this way because my father made me this way. I'm this way because my husband made me this way." Yes, we are indeed formed by traumas that happen to us. But you must take charge, you must take over, you are responsible.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: An unacknowledged trauma is like a wound that never heals over and may start to bleed again at any time.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: Trauma is survivable, but often not much more.. It kills you while allowing you to still live
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: It is the rare and strong person that can carry their trauma without having it spill into the next generation.
quotes.author: Bruce D. Perry

quotes.quote: Though I walk through the valley of the shadow of trauma, I will fear no concussion.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
quotes.author: Miriam Beard

quotes.quote: There are no foreign lands. It is the traveler only who is foreign.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The use of traveling is to regulate imagination by reality, and instead of thinking how things may be, to see them as they are.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: To awaken quite alone in a strange town is one of the pleasantest sensations in the world.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: All travel has its advantages. If the passenger visits better countries, he may learn to improve his own. And if fortune carries him to worse, he may learn to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: One's destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: When you're traveling, you are what you are right there and then. People don't have your past to hold against you. No yesterdays on the road.
quotes.author: William Least Heat Moon

quotes.quote: A person needs at intervals to separate from family and companions and go to new places. One must go without familiars in order to be open to influences, to change.
quotes.author: Katharine Butler Hathaway

quotes.quote: I have found out that there ain't no surer way to find out whether you like people or hate them than to travel with them.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.
quotes.author: Rosalia de Castro

quotes.quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.quote: Travel makes one modest, you see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Travel is like a giant blank canvas, and the painting on the canvas is only limited by one's imagination.
quotes.author: Ross Morley

quotes.quote: We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education; in the elder, a part of experience.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Traveling, you realize that differences are lost: each city takes to resembling all cities, places exchange their form, order, distances, a shapeless dust cloud invades the continents.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: Travelling expands the mind rarely.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Once a year, go some place you've never been before.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: When preparing to travel, lay out all your clothes and all your money. Then take half the clothes and twice the money.
quotes.author: Susan Heller

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.quote: Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
quotes.author: Mary Ritter Beard

quotes.quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: The use of traveling is to regulate imagination with reality, and instead of thinking of how things may be, see them as they are.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Perhaps travel cannot prevent bigotry, but by demonstrating that all peoples cry, laugh, eat, worry, and die, it can introduce the idea that if we try and understand each other, we may even become friends.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education; in the elder, a part of experience.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Traveling expands the mind rarely.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Traveling - it leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller.
quotes.author: Ibn Battuta

quotes.quote: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other places, other lives, other souls.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: The man who goes alone can start today; but he who travels with another must wait till that other is ready.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Traveling tends to magnify all human emotions.
quotes.author: Peter Hoeg

quotes.quote: He who would travel happily must travel light.
quotes.author: Antoine de St. Exupery

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: The whole object of travel is not to set foot on foreign land; it is at last to set foot on one's own country as a foreign land.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: To move, to breathe, to fly, to float; to gain all while you give; to roam the roads of lands remote; to travel is to live.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Travel makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: I haven't been everywhere but it's on my list.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Once a year go somewhere you have never been before.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: I don't know where i am going but I'm on my way.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.
quotes.author: Rosalia de Castro

quotes.quote: The further one goes, the less (he realizes he) one knows.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: Not until we are lost do we begin to find ourselves.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: People don't take trips, trips take people.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: Once a year, go somewhere you have never been before.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Travel is the only thing you buy that makes you richer.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The journey not the arrival matters.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Don't listen to what they say, go see.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The journey is the destination.
quotes.author: Dan Eldon

quotes.quote: To travel is to live.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: We travel not to escape life, but for life not to escape us.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One's destination is never a place, but always a new way of seeing things.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Don't tell me how educated you are, tell me how much you travelled.
quotes.author: Mohamed

quotes.quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.quote: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education; in the elder, a part of experience.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Travel makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Half of the fun of travel is the aesthetic of lostness.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Take only memories, leave only footprints.
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.quote: Stop worrying about the potholes in the road and celebrate the journey.
quotes.author: Fitzhugh Mullan

quotes.quote: Traveling â€“ it leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller.
quotes.author: Ibn Battuta

quotes.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Travel safe, travel far, travel wide, and travel often.
quotes.author: Nomadic Matt

quotes.quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I love to travel, but hate to arrive.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If you wish to travel far and fast, travel light. Take off all your envies, jealousies, unforgiveness, selfishness and fears.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Travel and change of place impart new vigor to the mind.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Once you have travelled, the voyage never ends, but is played out over and over again in the quietest chambers. The mind can never break off from the journey.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: To sentence a man of true genius, to the drudgery of a school is to put a racehorse on a treadmill.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Hit the gym... Working out is the key to your life. All you need is a half an hour on the treadmill.
quotes.author: Grizz Chapman

quotes.quote: The world is a treadmill, and we are being pulled backward on it if we aren't consciously walking forward.
quotes.author: J. Grant Howard

quotes.quote: There is nothing like having to change your physical form to put you in contact with every weak part of yourself, to train yourself in discipline. Put somebody on a treadmill and I'll tell you how good they are at any other thing they do in life.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: The treadmill won't run on its own; you have to put some work into this. If you're going to lose weight, you have to apply yourself.
quotes.author: Joanna Coles

quotes.quote: The biggest problem with working at a treadmill desk: the compulsion to announce constantly that you are working at a treadmill desk.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: An hour of basketball feels like 15 minutes. An hour on a treadmill feels like a weekend in traffic school.
quotes.author: David Walters

quotes.quote: Everybody thinks that once you reach the top, you can lie back on a divan with a goddamn mai tai. No. Wrong. Success is not a mountain climb. Success is a treadmill.
quotes.author: Susan Jane Gilman

quotes.quote: Don't put your characters on a treadmill. They need to go new places, face new challenges and do new things.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: When you step on the treadmill, make a commitment. Do, say, 3 miles a day. And don't get off until you finish. It doesn't matter what speed you're going. Just don't get off.
quotes.author: Tyrese Gibson

quotes.quote: There is a treadmill quality to workaholism.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: Getting off this treadmill requires a willingness to stand on our own and disregard others' opinions.
quotes.author: Joshua Rosenthal

quotes.quote: You gotta run more than your mouth to escape the treadmill of mediocrity. A true hustler jogs during the day, and sleepwalks at night.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: We inherit plots. There are only two or three in the world, five or six at most. We ride them like treadmills.
quotes.author: Janette Turner Hospital

quotes.quote: You run on the treadmill. But you need to stop watching The Food Network when you're doing it. That is how you torture yourself.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: We are living in the machine age. For the first time in history the comedian has been compelled to supply himself with jokes and comedy material to compete with the machine. Whether he knows it or not, the comedian is on a treadmill to oblivion.
quotes.author: Fred A. Allen

quotes.quote: Get off the treadmill of consumption, replication, and mediocrity. Begin lifting the weights of creativity, originality, and success.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: Housework is a treadmill from futility to oblivion with stop-offs at tedium and counter productivity.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Life is one big gym where we need to constantly workout to stay fit for this world. And indeed love here is the treadmill.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Consuming is an endless treadmill.
quotes.author: Rob Pruitt

quotes.quote: Lies are like a treadmill with no off switch. You have to keep walking or you'll fall off.
quotes.author: Iris St. Clair

quotes.quote: There is no way to step off the tread mill. It is all treadmill.
quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

quotes.quote: Competition is like a treadmill. If you stand still, you get swept off. But when you run, you can never really get ahead of the treadmill and cover new terrain - so you never run faster than the speed that is set.
quotes.author: Raghuram Rajan

quotes.quote: The most luxurious possession, the richest treasure anybody has, is his personal dignity.
quotes.author: Jackie Robinson

quotes.quote: Memory is the treasure house of the mind wherein the monuments thereof are kept and preserved.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Treasure the love you receive above all. It will survive long after your good health has vanished.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: If you want to be perfect, go, sell your possessions and give to the poor, and you will have treasure in heaven.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.quote: Our treasure lies in the beehive of our knowledge. We are perpetually on the way thither, being by nature winged insects and honey gatherers of the mind.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Gold is a treasure, and he who possesses it does all he wishes to in this world, and succeeds in helping souls into paradise.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: Treasure the things about you that make you different and unique.
quotes.author: Karen Kain

quotes.quote: God has entrusted us with his most precious treasure - people. He asks us to shepherd and mold them into strong disciples, with brave faith and good character.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: Knowledge is the treasure of a wise man.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Truth is the property of no individual but is the treasure of all men.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The home should be the treasure chest of living.
quotes.author: Le Corbusier

quotes.quote: There is more treasure in books than in all the pirate's loot on Treasure Island.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: No thief, however skillful, can rob one of knowledge, and that is why knowledge is the best and safest treasure to acquire.
quotes.author: L. Frank Baum

quotes.quote: Life is a gift. Treasure what you do have. There are some that would be blessed to even have SOME of what you have and complain bitterly about.
quotes.author: Cam Richmond

quotes.quote: Where your pleasure is, there is your treasure: where your treasure, there your heart; where your heart, there your happiness
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Loving oneself isn't hard, when you understand who and what 'yourself' is. It has nothing to do with the shape of your face, the size of your eyes, the length of your hair or the quality of your clothes. It's so beyond all of those things and it's what gives life to everything about you. Your own self is such a treasure.
quotes.author: Phylicia Rashad

quotes.quote: To truly cherish the things that are important to you, you must first discard those that have outlived their purpose. And if you no longer need them, then that is neither wasteful nor shameful. Can you truthfully say that you treasure something buried so deeply in a cupboard or drawer that you have forgotten its existence?
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: Guard well within yourself that treasure, kindness. Know how to give without hesitation, how to lose without regret, how to acquire without meanness.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Treasure your relationships, not your possessions.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can either be a victim of the world or an adventurer in search of treasure. It all depends on how you view your life.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Ours is a culture and a time immensely rich in trash as it is in treasures.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: When people bury treasure nowadays they do it in the Post-Office bank.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: There is all the difference in the world between treasure and money.
quotes.author: Roderick Townley

quotes.quote: If we're destroying our trees and destroying our environment and hurting animals and hurting one another and all that stuff, there's got to be a very powerful energy to fight that. I think we need more love in the world. We need more kindness, more compassion, more joy, more laughter. I definitely want to contribute to that.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Consider a tree for a moment. As beautiful as trees are to look at, we don't see what goes on underground - as they grow roots. Trees must develop deep roots in order to grow strong and produce their beauty. But we don't see the roots. We just see and enjoy the beauty. In much the same way, what goes on inside of us is like the roots of a tree.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: If I were a tree, I would have no reason to love a human.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: Love the trees until their leaves fall off, then encourage them to try again next year.
quotes.author: Chad Sugg

quotes.quote: If a tree falls in the forest and nobody is there to hear it, doesn't it just lie there and rot?
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: He who plants a tree. Plants a hope.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.quote: Trees are your best antiques.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Trees are poems that earth writes upon the sky,We fell them down and turn them into paper,That we may record our emptiness.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The tree which moves some to tears of joy is in the eyes of others only a green thing that stands in the way. Some see Nature all ridicule and deformity, and some scarce see Nature at all. But to the eyes of the man of imagination, Nature is Imagination itself.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Though a tree grows so high, the falling leaves return to the root.
quotes.author: Malay proverb

quotes.quote: Keep a green tree in your heart and perhaps a singing bird will come.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A tree falls the way it leans.
quotes.author: Bulgarian proverb

quotes.quote: A tree does not move unless there is wind.
quotes.author: Afghan Proverb

quotes.quote: If trees could scream, would we be so cavalier about cutting them down? We might, if they screamed all the time, for no good reason.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: To be able to walk under the branches of a tree that you have planted is really to feel you have arrived with your garden. So far we are on the way: we can now stand beside ours.
quotes.author: Mirabel Osler

quotes.quote: They kill good trees to put out bad newspapers.
quotes.author: James G. Watt

quotes.quote: Green leaves on a dead tree is our epitaph--green leaves, dear reader, on a dead tree.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Everybody who's anybody longs to be a tree.
quotes.author: Rita Dove

quotes.quote: The tree the tempest with a crash of woodThrows down in front of us is not to bar Our passage to our journey's end for good,But just to ask us who we think we are.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Between every two pine trees there is a door leading to a new way of life.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: By felling the trees which cover the tops and sides of mountains, men in all climates seem to bring upon future generations two calamities at once; want of fuel and a scarcity of water.
quotes.author: Baron Alexander von Humboldt

quotes.quote: He that plants trees, loves others besides himself.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Once there was a tree, and she loved a little boy.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: For a tree to become tall it must grow tough roots among the rocks.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A tree bends when its fruits have ripened; a fresh water cloud hangs low; similarily, a gentleman becomes all the more humble in prosperity.
quotes.author: Shakuntala

quotes.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossom and fruit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A tree against the sky possesses the same interest, the same character, the same expression as the figure of a human.
quotes.author: Georges Rouault

quotes.quote: We can learn a lot from trees: they're always grounded but never stop reaching heavenward.
quotes.author: Everett Mamor

quotes.quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Style is something each of us already has, all we need to do is find it.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: In difficult times, fashion is always outrageous.
quotes.author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quotes.quote: When a woman says, 'I have nothing to wear!' what she really means is, 'There's nothing here for who I'm supposed to be today.
quotes.author: Caitlin Moran

quotes.quote: There is a lot of noise out there. I don't want to follow the trend - I want to create the trend.
quotes.author: Iman

quotes.quote: Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way to live.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: Never let a trend get in the way of creating a great outfit for yourself.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Style is a simple way of saying complicated things.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Trendy is the last stage before tacky.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Don't follow a trend. Follow your heart.
quotes.author: Krist Novoselic

quotes.quote: If you follow the trend, you'll always be right behind it.
quotes.author: Lindsey Haun

quotes.quote: We trendsetters, not trend sweaters.
quotes.author: Takeoff

quotes.quote: Socrates became a trendsetter. Other philosophers, including Plato and Aristotle and Gus, quickly followed suit, dropping their last names too. And, for centuries after that there would be countless imitators including oltaire, Michelangelo, and, much later, Cher.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: It's always about timing. If it's too soon, no one understands. If it's too late, everyone's forgotten.
quotes.author: Anna Wintour

quotes.quote: If you are not a trend setter, at least be able to exploit the ones you see.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: I don't do fashion. I am fashion.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: You gotta give everybody a new trend a new wave, something new to do.
quotes.author: Quavo

quotes.quote: Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself.
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: I have a trend of my own.
quotes.author: Andrei Platonov

quotes.quote: The real trendsetters are the ones who rebel. Those are the ones who everyone in fashion eventually follows.
quotes.author: Jurnee Smollett-Bell

quotes.quote: Anyone can get dressed up and glamorous, but it is how people dress in their days off that are the most intriguing.
quotes.author: Alexander Wang

quotes.quote: You dont have to follow trends, you should set them, because there are too many 'her's and 'him's but there is only one 'you'.
quotes.author: Jessica Atef

quotes.quote: Fashion you can buy, but style you possess. The key to style is learning who you are, which takes years. There's no how-to road map to style. It's about self expression and, above all, attitude.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Any fool can do something cool and look cool, but it takes skill to make something uncool cool again.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I never try to follow a trend or fashion
quotes.author: Victoria Beckham

quotes.quote: Fashion is the armor to survive everyday life
quotes.author: Bill Cunningham

quotes.quote: If you can’t be better than your competition, just dress better
quotes.author: Anna Wintour

quotes.quote: Style is primarily a matter of instinct
quotes.author: Bill Blass

quotes.quote: Great style means having a point of view, but evolving your look is even more important. Rushing to embrace every trend will leave you fashionable, but not stylish.
quotes.author: Michael Kors

quotes.quote: Being stylish is about enjoying your life and expressing yourself and your inner light.
quotes.author: Tori Amos

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what kind of clothes you put on: if you're a stylish individual, you're going to preserve that.
quotes.author: G-Dragon

quotes.quote: You don't need to follow trends to be stylish.
quotes.author: Naomie Harris

quotes.quote: Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself.
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: A fashionable woman is always in love - with herself.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The truly fashionable are beyond fashion.
quotes.author: Cecil Beaton

quotes.quote: The fashionable woman wears clothes. The clothes don't wear her.
quotes.author: Mary Quant

quotes.quote: You can make jeans and a t-shirt super stylish. It's what you make of it, you know?
quotes.author: Phillip Lim

quotes.quote: Fashion should be stylish and fun.
quotes.author: Twiggy

quotes.quote: Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Fashion is in the sky, in the street.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Fashion is everything that can pass fashionable
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: It is ever so much easier to be good if your clothes are fashionable.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Trials are no longer about freeing the innocent, punishing the guilty, and making restitution to the injured. They have devolved into a contest over who will win.
quotes.author: Tammy Bruce

quotes.quote: You learn a lot of different things with trials and tribulations and, at the end of the day, you get some positives from whatever mistakes you've made.
quotes.author: Brock Lesnar

quotes.quote: The pause between the errors and trials of the day and the hopes of the night.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the scariest thing you will ever have to do is trust God to fight the battles you can no longer fight.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Don't let your trials blow you down; let them lift you up.
quotes.author: Woodrow Kroll

quotes.quote: Personal trials are the great equalizer that continues to draw public fascination.
quotes.author: Alana Stewart

quotes.quote: The trials on the road to world harmony are no greater than the courage of those who accept the challenge.
quotes.author: Carl Lewis

quotes.quote: The trials and tribulations in your life make you stronger.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: It's quite easy to start Trials riding. You just need a bike and you're set.
quotes.author: Sete Gibernau

quotes.quote: All the trials we endure cannot be compared to these interior battles.
quotes.author: Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: Trials have no value or intrinsic meaning in themselves. It's the way we respond to those trials that makes all the difference.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Trials by the adversarial contest must in time go the way of the ancient trial by battle and blood.
quotes.author: Warren E. Burger

quotes.quote: Times of great calamity and confusion have been productive for the greatest minds. The purest ore is produced from the hottest furnace. The brightest thunder-bolt is elicited from the darkest storm.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: We are always on the anvil; by trials God is shaping us for higher things.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: No matter what storm you face, you need to know that God loves you. He has not abandoned you.
quotes.author: Franklin Graham

quotes.quote: Through the trials and tribulations of life come the openness to receive greatness.
quotes.author: Michelle Cruz

quotes.quote: Let the darkness find you if it must. Throw off the quick and tempting escapes, and seek help only from those who would teach you to grow, feed your soul, embrace your heart, but would not steal away your journey.
quotes.author: Jennifer DeLucy

quotes.quote: There's so many things that life is, and no matter how many breakthroughs, trials will exist and we're going to get through it. Just be strong.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: The tragedy is not that things are broken. The tragedy is that they are not mended again.
quotes.author: Alan Paton

quotes.quote: Trials teach us what we are; they dig up the soil, and let us see what we are made of.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The moon will guide you through the night with her brightness, but she will always dwell in the darkness, in order to be seen.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Your trials, crosses, and conflicts are all temporary.
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: We cannot always control everything that happens to us in this life, but we can control how we respond.
quotes.author: L. Lionel Kendrick

quotes.quote: There's a lot of trials and tribulations you have to go through to get what you want, especially if you feel like it belongs to you.
quotes.author: Keyshia Cole

quotes.quote: Trials are the soil in which faith flourishes.
quotes.author: T. B. Joshua

quotes.quote: Our most significant opportunities will be found in times of greatest difficulty.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: To live greatly, we must develop the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and triumph with humility.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: No one is without troubles, without personal hardships and genuine challenges. That fact may not be obvious because most people don't advertise their woes and heartaches. But nobody, not even the purest heart, escapes life without suffering battle scars.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Though our trials are diverse, there is one thing the Lord expects of us no matter our difficulties and sorrows: He expects us to press on.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: What is life worth without trials and tribulations which are the salt of life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Having to try and going through the trials and tribulations to actually overcome, to get there to win, to triumph, that's what makes life interesting.
quotes.author: Tavis Smiley

quotes.quote: Diamonds are formed in pressure; that is why God allows you to go through difficult times
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: The testing of your faith produces perseverance. Don't look at trials and tribulations always as a bad thing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: All the trials and tribulations have paid off. In life, you have setbacks. When you're in your valley, that's when you're tested the most not when you're at your peak.
quotes.author: Rashad Evans

quotes.quote: No one is immune to the trials and tribulations of life.
quotes.author: Martin Lawrence

quotes.quote: You learn a lot of different things with trials and tribulations and, at the end of the day, you get some positives from whatever mistakes you've made.
quotes.author: Brock Lesnar

quotes.quote: There's no doubt that there will be many trials and tribulations along the way in taming space for the benefit of all, unmasking its truths and using the boundless resources available to us. Taking a chance allows us to seek new horizons and we all benefit from being horizon hunters.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: When life throws trials and tribulations towards you, shield your destiny with courage, faith and perseverance.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Trials and tribulations only come into your life to test you, so you could make some testimonies out of them.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: This life is full of trials and tribulations, so you have to capture humor whenever and wherever you can find it.
quotes.author: Steven Callahan

quotes.quote: The trials on the road to world harmony are no greater than the courage of those who accept the challenge.
quotes.author: Carl Lewis

quotes.quote: The road of life is never without trials and tribulations.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Through the trials and tribulations of life come the openness to receive greatness.
quotes.author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes trials and tribulations to strengthen you for the glory ahead. It's been a trying last few weeks but I'm ready.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A leaf has no power to resist when the wind blows, but when life's storms rage, you do.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Trials and tribulations tend to squeeze the artificiality out of us, leaving the essence of what we really are and clarifying what we really yearn for.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You are not forever in the dark. Look up. There's the Light.
quotes.author: Mac Canoza

quotes.quote: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Overcoming the trials and tribulations of human beliefs, enables you to gain the inspiration needed to practice it in daily life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The trials and tribulations in your life make you stronger.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: All of the trials and tribulations from personal to the artist. It shows that I'm human. People see the glamorous stuff, but they don't see the background.
quotes.author: Missy Elliott

quotes.quote: Trials and tribulations are nothing but opportunities to test the true potential of your mind.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: There's a lot of trials and tribulations you have to go through to get what you want, especially if you feel like it belongs to you.
quotes.author: Keyshia Cole

quotes.quote: We can choose to see life as a series of trials and tribulations, or we can choose to see life as an accumulation of treasures.
quotes.author: Max De Pree

quotes.quote: There's certain lines you don't cross when you're dealing with a man who came up like he did and who's been through the trials and tribulations like he did in his life.
quotes.author: Stephen Jackson

quotes.quote: Often trials and tribulations are allowed to come into our lives because of what we are doing right.
quotes.author: Glenn L. Pace

quotes.quote: War crimes trials are always messy, but holding this trial in absentia would be extremely troubling to a lot of people.
quotes.author: Miranda Sissons

quotes.quote: Trials and tribulations offer us a chance to make reparation for our past faults and sins. On such occasions the Lord comes to us like a physician to heal the wounds left by our sins. Tribulation is the divine medicine.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Trials teach us what we are; they dig up the soil, and let us see what we are made of.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: If you set a goal for yourself and are able to achieve it, you have won your race. Your goal can be to come in first, to improve your performance, or just finish the race it's up to you.
quotes.author: Dave Scott

quotes.quote: Swim like your gonna drown, Ride like you stole it and Run like they are chasing you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You need to save some mental, physical, and emotional resources for enhancing your product after you ship. A revolution is a triathlon, not a hundred-yard dash-it requires long distance stamina and multiple skills such as creating, churning, and evangelizing.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: When the going gets tough, the tough tri harder.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In triathlon you don't get to race that much so when you're on the start line you just need to make sure you focus on the job in hand and enjoy yourself.
quotes.author: Alistair Brownlee

quotes.quote: As your training moves from base training to more intense work, to tapering, your nutrition needs to change.
quotes.author: Charlotte Campbell

quotes.quote: Almost drowned, crashed the bike, puked on the run. When's the next Tri?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Triathlon doesn't build character. It reveals it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Not everybody is going to run a marathon or do a triathlon. It's not necessary to do that to be in good health.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: You don't play triathlon. You play soccer; it's fun. You play baseball. Triathlon is work that can leave you crumpled in a heap, puking by the roadside. It's the physical brutality of climbing Mount Everest without the great view from the top of the world. What kind of person keeps coming back for more of that?
quotes.author: Chris McCormack

quotes.quote: You can keep going and your legs might hurt for a week or you can quit and your mind will hurt for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Mark Allen
