quotes.quote: Quitters don't tri. Triathletes don't quit.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If God invented marathons to keep people from doing anything more stupid, triathlon must have taken Him completely by surprise.
quotes.author: P. Z. Pearce

quotes.quote: It's always the athlete's responsibility to keep everything in check. We have to listen to our bodies sometimes the hardest part is to back off and rest.
quotes.author: Julie Dibens

quotes.quote: It's rude to count people as you pass them. Out loud
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Triathlon - It's not about finding your limits. It's about finding out what lies just beyond them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You can quit if you want, and no one will care. But you will know the rest of your life.
quotes.author: John Collins

quotes.quote: Ridicule is the tribute paid to the genius by the mediocrities.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Every journalist owes tribute to the evil one.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: In recognizing the humanity of our fellow beings, we pay ourselves the highest tribute.
quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

quotes.quote: Hypocrisy is the tribute that vice pays to virtue.
quotes.author: Grover Norquist

quotes.quote: Carve your name on hearts, not tombstones. A legacy is etched into the minds of others and the stories they share about you.
quotes.author: Shannon Alder

quotes.quote: Be happy. That's the finest tribute one can pay to the dead.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: She stands as a tribute to all that surrounds her. A woman of beauty, in a sunset of desire.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: I've always looked on criticism as a sort of envious tribute.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The greatest tribute one can give to a writer is that it is simply enough to read him.
quotes.author: Isaac Goldberg

quotes.quote: Make your life a tribute equal to the magnitude of the gift of life.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The citizen who criticizes his country is paying it an implied tribute.
quotes.author: J. William Fulbright

quotes.quote: Pay ye tribute also: for they are God's ministers. Tribute to whom tribute is due; custom to whom custom; fear to whom fear; honour to whom honour.
quotes.author: Romans 13:6-7

quotes.quote: Therefore, it is with loving pride we drape the colors in tribute of respect to this citizen of your great Republic, and here and now, in the shadow of the illustrious dead, we pledge our hearts and our honor in carrying this war to successful issue.
quotes.author: Stanton

quotes.quote: Every public man pays tribute to malignity, but he is rewarded in honors and gold.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: On this day of thanksgiving, let us generously remember the poor and needy, so that our tribute of praise and gratitude may be acceptable in the sight of the Lord.
quotes.author: Stephen Grover Cleveland

quotes.quote: For ne'er was flattery lost on poet's ear; / A simple race! they waste their toil / For the vain tribute of a smile.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: Themes, the most loved of all the Ocean's sons, / By his old sire, to his embraces runs, / Hasting to pay his tribute to the Sea, / Like mortal life to meet eternity.
quotes.author: John Denham

quotes.quote: Whereas terrorists usually dismiss the law altogether, without even pretending to abide by it, states pay tribute to law and norms and breach them only under extreme circumstances in the changing rules of combating terrorism.
quotes.author: Ze'ev Ibiansky

quotes.quote: To all teachers— past, present, and future. Yours is the greatest profession! Thanks be to God for the teachers of the world.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: NoÂ tributeÂ is laid on castles in the air.
quotes.author: Charles Churchill

quotes.quote: A greatÂ tribute, is expressing the great love for a Grandmother we share with our children.
quotes.author: Tom Baker

quotes.quote: It is better to payÂ tributeÂ of gold to the enemy thanÂ tributeÂ of blood in war.
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: The accolades usually come when you're dead or too old to get a job
quotes.author: John Frankenheimer

quotes.quote: It's a tribute to the human brain that anyone is able to function out there on television in a talk situation that is entirely artificial.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.quote: The most importantÂ tributeÂ any human being can pay to a poem or a piece of prose he or she really loves is to learn it by heart. Not by brain, by heart; the expression is vital.
quotes.author: George Steiner

quotes.quote: TheÂ commendationÂ of adversaries is the greatest triumph of a writer, because it never comes unless extorted.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: GiveÂ tribute, but not oblation, to human wisdom.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: Let our tribute to the dead be a new resolve: to respect people for what they individually think, rather than respect groups for what they were collectively brought up to believe.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: CommendationÂ heals; condemnation destroys.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Accolades are there to congratulate you but also to make you understand that it's not over. You now have to continue trying to improve the craft and keep going. It's not something to rest on.
quotes.author: Joe Morton

quotes.quote: The mind plays tricks. It rejects things until it thinks ― or something tells it ― that the remembering can be handled.
quotes.author: Robert Ludlum

quotes.quote: Magic is a trick, and the trick is to believe it's real.
quotes.author: Osman Welela

quotes.quote: One thing you learn doing magic tricks for a living is how close every performance of every magic trick is to disaster. There are no robust magic tricks. They're all hanging from a thread - sometimes literally.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: Yes, I have tricks in my pocket, I have things up my sleeve. But I am the opposite of a stage magician. He gives you illusion that has the appearance of truth. I give you truth in the pleasant disguise of illusion.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: A lot of people experience the world with the same incredulity as when a magician pulls a rabbit out of a hat.…We know that the world is not all sleight of hand and deception because we are in it, we are part of it. Actually we are the white rabbit being pulled out of the hat. The only difference beween us and the white rabbit is that the rabbit does not realize it is taking part in a magic trick.
quotes.author: Jostein Gaarder

quotes.quote: Son, the greatest trick the Devil pulled was convincing the world there was only one of him.
quotes.author: David Wong

quotes.quote: The trick and the beauty of language is that it seems to order the whole universe, misleading us into believing that we live in sight of a rational space, a possible harmony.
quotes.author: John Burnside

quotes.quote: The trick to negotiation was to hold all the cards going in and, even if you didn't, to try to look as though you did.
quotes.author: Eoin Colfer

quotes.quote: Tricks and treachery are the practice of fools, that don't have brains enough to be honest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: How strange are the tricks of memory, which, often hazy as a dream about the most important events of a man's life, religiously preserve the merest trifles.
quotes.author: Richard Burton

quotes.quote: Men are so simple and yield so readily to the desires of the moment that he who will trick will always find another who will suffer to be tricked.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Nothing more completely baffles one who is full of trick and duplicity himself, than straight forward and simple integrity in another.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: We are such spendthrifts with our lives, the trick of living is to slip on and off the planet with the least fuss you can muster. I’m not running for sainthood. I just happen to think that in life we need to be a little like the farmer, who puts back into the soil what he takes out.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: It is a trick among the dishonest to offer sacrifices that are not needed or not possible, to avoid making those that are required.
quotes.author: Ivan Goncharov

quotes.quote: The tricks of magic follow the archetypes of narrative fiction - there are tales of creation and loss, death and resurrection, and obstacles that must be overcome.
quotes.author: Marco Tempest

quotes.quote: Like the juggler, deceiving by his tricks, one is deluded by egotism, falsehood and illusion.
quotes.author: Guru Nanak

quotes.quote: How strange are the tricks of memory, which, often hazy as a dream about the most important events of a man's life, religiously preserve the merest trifles.
quotes.author: Richard Burton

quotes.quote: The trick to forgetting the big picture is to look at everything close-up. The shortcut to closing a door is to bury yourself in the details. This is how we must look to God. As if everything's just fine.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: The longer I lie, the worse it gets. That's the truth about lies - when they linger, they slowly trick you into believing they're the truth.
quotes.author: Rebekah Crane

quotes.quote: Honesty is the only trick to not trick anyone.
quotes.author: Shawn Lukas

quotes.quote: Some people are so busy learning the tricks of the trade that they never learn the trade.
quotes.author: Vernon Law

quotes.quote: The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: The trick to writing for people is, you have to be able to turn them on in your head. And know how they'd word something or how they'd inflect it.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.quote: Success can also cause misery. The trick is not to be surprised when you discover it doesn’t bring you all the happiness and answers you thought it would.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: One of the tricks of life is to have sense and money in roughly equal proportions.
quotes.author: Craig Brown

quotes.quote: Some people carry their heart in their head and some carry their head in their heart. The trick is to keep them apart yet working together.
quotes.author: David Hare

quotes.quote: Life is movement. Movement is change. Every time a sub molecular particle swings through time and space, something is changing. Change, therefore, is inevitable. It is the nature of life itself. The trick in life is not to try to avoid change, but to create change. Then it is the kind of change you choose.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Tricks you need to transform something which appears fantastic, unbelievable into something plausible, credible, those I learned from journalism. The key is to tell it straight. It is done by reporters and by country folk.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: You will not be stuck forever. The trick is to know there are no tricks. There is, in fact, no easy way. There is only the work.
quotes.author: Blaine Hogan

quotes.quote: The trick is to realize that after giving your best, there's nothing more to give.
quotes.author: Sparky Anderson

quotes.quote: There someÂ triflesÂ well habited, as there are some fools well clothed.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: WeÂ trifleÂ when we assign limits to our desires, since nature hath set none.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: At everyÂ trifleÂ take offense, that always shows great pride or little sense.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Sometimes, theÂ inessentialÂ is essential.
quotes.author: T.L. Rese

quotes.quote: To trifle with Scripture is to deprive yourself of its aid. Reverence it, and look up to God with devout gratitude for having given it to you.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: In practice, suchÂ triflesÂ as contradictions in principle are easily set aside; the faculty of ignoring them makes the practical man.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Any trifle is enough to entertain two lovers.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Trifles themselves are elegant in him.
quotes.author: Pope

quotes.quote: AÂ trifleÂ consoles us, for aÂ trifleÂ distresses us.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: There is nothingÂ unimportantÂ in the universe.
quotes.author: Ruth Bernhard

quotes.quote: There are noÂ triflesÂ in the moral universe of God. Speak me a word to-day; â€” it shall go ringing on through the ages.
quotes.author: William Morley Punshon

quotes.quote: Don't fuss aboutÂ trifles. Don't permit little things-the mere termites of life-to ruin your happiness.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: A trifle can be enough when luck is on your side.
quotes.author: Margi Preus

quotes.quote: TriflesÂ discover a character, more than actions of importance.
quotes.author: William Shenstone

quotes.quote: Contentions for trifles can get but a trifling victory.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: There are noÂ triflesÂ in the human story, no trifling leaves on the tree.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: How full ofÂ triflesÂ everything is! It is only one's thoughts that fill a room with something more than furniture.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Trifles render us miserable, but trifles also console us.
quotes.author: Romainville

quotes.quote: A trifle is often pregnant with high importance; the prudent man neglects no circumstance.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: It is, of course, a trifle, but there is nothing so important as trifles.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: To be angry about trifles is mean and childish; to rage and be furious is brutish; and to maintain perpetual wrath is akin to the practice and temper of devils; but to prevent and suppress rising resentment is wise and glorious, is manly and divine.
quotes.author: Isaac Watts

quotes.quote: In allÂ unimportantÂ matters, style, not sincerity, is the essential. In all important matters, style, not sincerity, is the essential.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: TriflesÂ light as air are to the jealous confirmations strong as proofs of holy writ.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Do not letÂ triflesÂ disturb your tranquility of mind. Life is too precious to be sacrificed for the nonessential and transient. Ignore the inconsequential!
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: SinceÂ triflesÂ make the sum of human things, And half our misery from our foibles springs.
quotes.author: Hannah More

quotes.quote: Who gives a trifle meanly is meaner than the trifle.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: A little thing comforts us because a little thing afflicts us.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Sometimes anÂ unimportantÂ incident is capable of turning everything beautiful into a moment of anxiety. We insist on seeing the mote in the eye and forget about the mountains, the fields and the olive groves.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: TriflesÂ make up the happiness or the misery of human life.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: TriflesÂ lighter than straws are levers in the building up of character.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Everything you do is triggered by an emotion of either desire or fear.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: We still seem to trigger that intensity in people, which was quite incredible.
quotes.author: Roger Andrew Taylor

quotes.quote: Genetics loads the gun, lifestyle pulls the trigger.
quotes.author: Caldwell Esselstyn

quotes.quote: Just like the first breath of life, any engine must be triggered in order to turn it on.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: One always pulls the trigger out of self-interest and quotes history to avoid responsibility or pangs of conscience.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Triggers can happen when you least expect them. When you think all the emotional wounds are healed something can happen that emonds you there is still a scar.
quotes.author: Alexandra Eva-May

quotes.quote: New facts often trigger new ideas.
quotes.author: TL Osborn

quotes.quote: The people who trigger us to feel negative emotion are messengers. They are messengers for the unhealed parts of our being.
quotes.author: Teal Swan

quotes.quote: The best ideas will eat at you for days, maybe even weeks, until something, some incident, some impulse, triggers you to finally express them.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Guns require a finger to pull the trigger.
quotes.author: Rick Perry

quotes.quote: Passion is the trigger for success.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Next in importance to having a good aim is to recognize when to pull the trigger.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: If you're not gonna pull the trigger, don't point the gun.
quotes.author: James Baker

quotes.quote: Triggers are like little psychic explosions that crash through avoidance and bring the dissociated, avoided trauma suddenly, unexpectedly, back into consciousness.
quotes.author: Carolyn Spring

quotes.quote: Know your goal, make a plan and pull the trigger.
quotes.author: Phil Mcgraw

quotes.quote: Always wait for the trigger. The trigger is the final part of the puzzle, the reason you want to shoot.
quotes.author: Jay Maisel

quotes.quote: Be sure you positively identify your target before you pull the trigger.
quotes.author: Tom Flynn

quotes.quote: There might be 1 finger on the trigger, but there will be 15 fingers on the safety catch.
quotes.author: Harold MacMillan

quotes.quote: Our inner beliefs trigger failure before it happens. They sabotage lasting change by canceling its possibility. We employ these beliefs as articles of faith to justify our inaction and then wish away the result. I call them belief triggers
quotes.author: Marshall Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Every intention is a trigger for transformation
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: There never was any separate and supernatural trinity - it has always been the human mind playing the triangle.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Three is a sacred number. Some say it represents the trinity or three layers of the soul.
quotes.author: Laura Treacy Bentley

quotes.quote: If you have faith in all the trinities and apostles in the world, and still have no faith in yourself, there is no salvation for you.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Courage, conscience and compassion, these are the real Trinity of a civilized society.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: God is not silent. It is the nature of God to speak. The second person of the Holy Trinity is called 'The Word.' The Bible is the inevitable outcome of God's continuous speech. It is the infallible declaration of His mind.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Fear, ignorance, and hatred - these are the trinity of malice.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: In art and mythology, the Goddess appears in three forms. White represents the virgin, red the mother, and black, the crone, or the death-goddess.
quotes.author: Erin O'Riordan

quotes.quote: The Best ideal is the true and other truth is none. All glory be ascribed to the holy Three in One.
quotes.author: Gerard Manley Hopkins

quotes.quote: In the trinity of skin, bones, and brown water, men and women lose all difference.
quotes.author: Herta Müller

quotes.quote: And there's you. You're just beautiful. Effortlessly beautiful, like nature. You have the trinity of beauty: a beautiful heart, a beautiful mind, and a beautiful soul.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: Trinity of the soul, body and mind is the geolocation of God.
quotes.author: Mihail Militaru

quotes.quote: The modern holy trinity is money, sex and celebrity.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: Therefore when the mind knows itself and loves itself, there remains a trinity, that is the mind, love and knowledge.
quotes.author: Peter Lombard

quotes.quote: Reason, observation, and experience; the holy trinity of science.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: It needs the Trinity to make a Christian, it needs the Trinity to cheer a Christian, it needs the Trinity to complete a Christian, it needs the Trinity to create in a Christian the hope of glory.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Remember, you cannot pray without the Trinity. If the full work of salvation requires a Trinity, so does that very breath by which we live.
quotes.author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Also there is a similitude of a Trinity shining in the body, soul and spirit.
quotes.author: George Ripley

quotes.quote: I think it is a good thing that the Trinity is confusing. If it weren't, we wouldn't have the desire to learn more.
quotes.author: Jule Warner

quotes.quote: If the mystery of the Trinity is the template of all reality, what we have in the Trinitarian God is the perfect balance between union and differentiation, autonomy and mutuality, identity and community.
quotes.author: Richard Rohr

quotes.quote: An overburdened, overstretched executive is the best executive, because he or she doesn't have the time to meddle, to deal in trivia, to bother people.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: To have a high IQ, you tend to specialize, think deep thoughts. You avoid trivia.
quotes.author: Christopher Langan

quotes.quote: In the absence of clearly-defined goals, we become strangely loyal to performing daily trivia until ultimately we become enslaved by it.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Lead yourself, lead your superiors, lead your peers, and free your people to do the same. All else is trivia.
quotes.author: "Dee Hock "

quotes.quote: The first rule of success, and the one that supersedes all others, is to have energy. It is important to know how to concentrate it, how to husband it, how to focus it on important things instead of frittering it away on trivia.
quotes.author: Michael Korda

quotes.quote: Trivia rarely affect efficiency. Are all the machinations worth it, when their primary effect is to make the code less readable?
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: From such trivia, I believe my soul was born.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: It's a great medium for trivia and hobbies, but not the place for reasoned, reflective judgment. Suprisingly often, discussions degenerate into acrimony, insults and flames.
quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

quotes.quote: In a fast paced world, today's popular brand could be tomorrow's trivia question.
quotes.author: Wayne Calloway

quotes.quote: In wilderness I sense the miracle of life, and behind it our scientific accomplishments fade to trivia.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Once you have been confronted with a life and death situation, trivia no longer matters. Your perspective grows and you live at a deeper level. There's no time for pettiness.
quotes.author: Margaretta Rockfeller

quotes.quote: By object is meant some element in the complex whole that is defined in abstraction from the whole of which it is a distinction.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: TriviaÂ rarely affect efficiency. Are all the machinations worth it, when their primary effect is to make the code less readable?
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: Trivia are not knowledge. Lists of facts don't comprise knowledge. Analyzing, hypothesizing, concluding from data, sharing insights, those comprise knowledge. You can't google for knowledge.
quotes.author: Elaine Chaika

quotes.quote: Game shows are designed to make us feel better about the random, useless facts that are all we have left of our education.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: You get so tied up with the minutiae of the day-to-day, there's never a chance to sit back and let your subconscious run wild.
quotes.author: Eric Betzig

quotes.quote: There is no trivia in a strategic mind.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Why is it trivia? People call it trivia because they know nothing and they are embarrassed about it.
quotes.author: Robbie Coltrane

quotes.quote: The brain may die, but my compulsion for useless trivia lives on.
quotes.author: Molly Harper

quotes.quote: No champion has ever lifted a trophy that was not already being held inside.
quotes.author: Steve Ilg

quotes.quote: One trophy is good, but two are better. That way, when a hero wears his medals on his chest, at least his steps are level as he walks by.
quotes.author: Johan Cruyff

quotes.quote: A trophy's value isn't measured by the worth of its metal but by the amount of work that's required to obtain it
quotes.author: Johannes Schiefer

quotes.quote: I think very often the price paid for a work is the trophy itself.
quotes.author: Arne Glimcher

quotes.quote: The idea that talent is directly proportional to your trophy cabinet is one I oppose.
quotes.author: Alex Turner

quotes.quote: My trophy value exceeded my military usefulness.
quotes.author: Lord Mountbatten

quotes.quote: A friend of mine has a trophy wife, but apparently, it wasn't first place.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Trophies collect dust but memories last forever.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: As players, you never make one trophy a priority.
quotes.author: Ashley Cole

quotes.quote: Those who lift trophies of success are those who do what they do without stretching their necks to see “who else is doing what?
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Experience has taught me the power of trophies. You may have every knick-knack and useless contraption ever devised, but while they weigh you down, a simple trophy can go a long, long way.
quotes.author: Tahir Shah

quotes.quote: The mother of a trophy wife is not automatically a trophy mother-in-law.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: The bigger the trophy, the more trivial the contest.
quotes.author: William Rainey Harper

quotes.quote: I hate to speak about individuals. Players don't win you trophies, teams win trophies, squads win trophies.
quotes.author: Jose Mourinho

quotes.quote: Success doesn't always come in the form of a trophy. Keep striving for success.
quotes.author: Andre Agassi

quotes.quote: Trophies separate the winners from losers, and life is about winning and losing. Go into business and you see. You're competing every day.
quotes.author: Jim Courier

quotes.quote: Life is a game and true love is a trophy.
quotes.author: Rufus Wainwright

quotes.quote: Trophies should go to the winners. Self-esteem does not lead to success in life. Self-discipline and self-control do, and sports can help teach those.
quotes.author: Roy Baumeister

quotes.quote: All great works of art are trophies of victorious struggle.
quotes.author: Julius Meier-Graefe

quotes.quote: Dead men never pick up their trophies.
quotes.author: Michael Weisskopf

quotes.quote: There is no trophy for the team that sails the most.
quotes.author: James Spithill

quotes.quote: If everyone is special, then no one is. If everyone gets a trophy, trophies become meaningless.
quotes.author: David McCullough

quotes.quote: Not to say "trophies" aren't wonderful, but they should not be your driving force.
quotes.author: Renee Lawless

quotes.quote: What is the point of competing for a trophy if everyone gets a trophy?
quotes.author: Glenn Beck

quotes.quote: You trivialize the idea of competition totally, then there's no point in having the competition in the first place, and everybody is getting a trophy.
quotes.author: Wayne Rogers

quotes.quote: Reputations do not win matches and trophies, only goals can do that.
quotes.author: Alfredo Di Stefano

quotes.quote: The greater difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it. Skillful pilots gain their reputation from storms and tempests.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Borrow trouble for yourself, if that's your nature, but don't lend it to your neighbors.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: Most of the trouble in the world is caused by people wanting to be important.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Difficulties are opportunities to better things, they are stepping stones to greater experience. Perhaps some day you will be thankful for some temporary failure in a particular direction. When one door closes, another always opens, as a natural law it has to be, to balance.
quotes.author: Bryan Adams

quotes.quote: Difficulties show men what they are. In case of any difficulty, God has pitted you against a rough antagonist that you may be a conqueror, and this cannot be without toil.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Every problem has a gift for you in its hands.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Trouble is the common denominator of living. It is the great equalizer.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Eliminate today's troubles and problems by finding solutions, and then concentrate your energy on implementing those solutions.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Trouble shared is trouble halved.
quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quotes.quote: Don't trouble trouble until trouble troubles you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The trouble with people is not that they don't know but that they know so much that ain't so.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: The trouble is if you don't spend your life yourself, other people spend it for you.
quotes.author: Peter Shaffer

quotes.quote: The fundamental cause of trouble in the world today is that the stupid are cocksure while the intelligent are full of doubt.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Troubles are often the tools by which God fashions us for better things.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: There is a tendency at every important but difficult crossroad to pretend that it's not really there.
quotes.author: Bill McKibben

quotes.quote: Expect trouble as an inevitable part of life and repeat to yourself, the most comforting words of all; this, too, shall pass.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Every great and deep difficulty bears in itself its own solution. It forces us to change our thinking in order to find it.
quotes.author: Neils Bohr

quotes.quote: The trouble with most people is that they think with their hopes or fears or wishes rather than with their minds.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: It is not in the still calm of life, or the repose of a pacific station, that great characters are formed. The habits of a vigorous mind are formed in contending with difficulties.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The trouble ain't that there is too many fools, but that the lightning ain't distributed right.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Trouble is the next best thing to enjoyment. There is no fate in the world so horrible as to have no share in either its joys or sorrows.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Difficulties give us the opportunity to prove our greatness by overcoming them.
quotes.author: Meher Baba

quotes.quote: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: The trouble with the future is that it usually arrives before we're ready for it.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: If you cry at trouble, it grows double. But if you learn to laugh at trouble, trouble will disappear like a bubble.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The troublemakers are the caged canaries, children who are more sensitive than their peers to the toxic environment of the classroom that limits their freedom, clips their wings, and mutes their voices.
quotes.author: Carla Shalaby

quotes.quote: Society honors its living conformists and its dead troublemakers.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: For years, decades, the system has taught us to stay quiet. They've made us believe that those who take to the streets to speak up are crazy, criminals, troublemakers.
quotes.author: Bad Bunny

quotes.quote: If you can get the proper definition of trouble, then we can find out who the real troublemakers are.
quotes.author: Al Sharpton

quotes.quote: I don't do anything in order to cause trouble. It just so happens that what I do naturally causes trouble. I'm proud to be a troublemaker.
quotes.author: Sinead O'Connor

quotes.quote: I was a born troublemaker and might as well earn a living at it.
quotes.author: Bill Mauldin

quotes.quote: Trouble is the place where you find yourself when your judgment malfunction.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: You can try to keep the apprentice out of trouble, but you can’t keep the trouble out of the apprentice.
quotes.author: Ian Gregoire

quotes.quote: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.quote: You're too much of a troublemaker, Arthur, you should take things as they come and enjoy life.
quotes.author: Alan Sillitoe

quotes.quote: Mike can be funny at times then you want to just kill him the next. He's actually a good guy deep down. I just think that he likes to be a little troublemaker sometimes.
quotes.author: Anthony Beltempo

quotes.quote: It is an evil in men's hearts that must be fought. If we stand up to the troublemakers, they will give up their cruel designs. If we fail, their intolerance will grow, and many could perish.
quotes.author: Mark Edward Edens

quotes.quote: I am so, so sorry. I can't seem to go anywhere without causing problems for everyone around me. I'm just a born troublemaker, I suppose. It's true. I'm so worthless I can't carry a paper bag. I don't deserve to share the same air with the rest of the human race.
quotes.author: John Burgmeier

quotes.quote: Popping bottles with models and just watching them drank / Partying so hard, the ladies don't want it to end / They looked at me and said, 'I heard that you're a heart breaker / Baby I'm a troublemaker, I heard that you're a heart breaker
quotes.author: Timothy James Walls

quotes.quote: Oh oh oh, trouble troublemaker yeah / That's your middle name, oh oh oh / I know you're no good but you're stuck in my brain
quotes.author: Breyan Stanley Isaac

quotes.quote: And here I thought I knew you well (troublemaker) / I thought you'd catch me if I fell (troublemaker) / But when I fell, you never came (aah) / That's when I knew this was a game
quotes.author: Bonnie Leigh Mckee

quotes.quote: That's the boy I'm waiting for / 'Cause he'll grow up someday / I know he treats me mean, but he's 17 / He thinks he's gotta act that way / Oh yeah, he's a / Heart breaker, hip shaker, troublemaker
quotes.author: Jeff Barry

quotes.quote: She's a soul shaker, troublemaker, she is a heart breaker / Undertaker, moneymaker, she is a lover faker / Soul shaker, troublemaker, she is a heart breaker / Undertaker, moneymaker, she is a love faker
quotes.author: Achim Kleist

quotes.quote: Step back onto the road / And the troublemaker's back in default / I hear familiar voices / Calling me home / They saying son you've been away / For too long
quotes.author: Zak Abel

quotes.quote: And we're stuck in a moment, heart like a stolen car / And I can't control it, I should really, really hate her / But I can't, 'cause she's my troublemaker
quotes.author: Jimmy Rainsford

quotes.quote: Hang tough, troublemaker / Hang tough, you're not to blame / Hang tough, troublemaker / He's burning now in flames
quotes.author: Mat Sinner

quotes.quote: Where everybody is done, inside hollow; they have no dreams to follow and no tomorrow / Why am I still worried 'bout the person I'm trying to be? Life is fine - the troublemaker is me
quotes.author: Dan Vornovitskii

quotes.quote: And if our fates have all been wrapped around your finger / And if you wrote the script then why the troublemakers?
quotes.author: Shakira Isabel Mebarak Ripoll

quotes.quote: Go be a troublemaker, trouble another girl's water.
quotes.author: Yoon Ho Kim

quotes.quote: Let's party tonight / Will sit until is wasted / They call us troublemakers / But we just like to party / And party tonight
quotes.author: Andres Gunnar Ballinas

quotes.quote: You want to build fires on hot days / Feel the coolness of my gaze / I'm a troublemaker
quotes.author: Tracyanne Campbell

quotes.quote: The troublemakers did not always have much in common, but they shared two traits: they were persistent, and they were audacious.
quotes.author: Leslie Berlin

quotes.quote: When you meet up with a troublemaker, start by giving the troublemaker the benefit of the doubt.
quotes.author: Richard H. Axelrod

quotes.quote: The teachers were told that the exceptional students were the troublemakers and that the troublemakers were the exceptional students.
quotes.author: Robert C. Jameson

quotes.quote: You're just a gang of troublemakers--all of you engaged on the same activity, stropping your egos.
quotes.author: Celia Fremlin

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if there is a sheet hanging in your closet and a gun rack hanging in your truck.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: Seeing a catering truck feels like home.
quotes.author: Dakota Johnson

quotes.quote: Only in country music can you compare an old pickup truck and an old guitar to your wife and turn it into a love song. Thank God for country music.
quotes.author: Dierks Bentley

quotes.quote: Women are like cars: we all want a Ferrari, sometimes want a pickup truck, and end up with a station wagon.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: Like a garbage truck, we need a lie-truck which will collect lies from everyone's houses every morning, even every hour.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Where I come from your truck is a reflection of who you are.
quotes.author: Jase Robertson

quotes.quote: It turns out that speeding irresponsibly in a large truck, placing personal wealth ahead of the welfare of others, is one of the greatest sins in the Universe.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: What's going to happen is, very soon, we're going to run out of petroleum, and everything depends on petroleum. And there go the school buses. There go the fire engines. The food trucks will come to a halt. This is the end of the world.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Fire truck with back end on fire drives really fast in circles.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Being divorced is like being hit by a Mack truck. If you live through it, you start looking very carefully to the right and to the left.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Where food trucks are concerned, nothing's better than having a whole flock of them at one location. Competition not only improves the quality of the food, it prompts these rolling lunch wagons to lower prices and offer specials, too.
quotes.author: Robert Sietsema

quotes.quote: Anyone singing about trucks, in any form, in any song, anywhere, literally just stop nobody cares!
quotes.author: Kacey Musgraves

quotes.quote: America is two Mack trucks colliding on a superhighway because all the drivers are on amphetamines.
quotes.author: Phil Ochs

quotes.quote: All those trucks and barges that carry our goods to port are vital connections to the only force which can balance our trade deficit: export. We must keep doing what we do best if we are going to get America out of the red.
quotes.author: Jo Ann Emerson

quotes.quote: Food trucks give creative entrepreneurs the ability to cook with freedom and make what they love, meaning that they can create highly specialized meals without having the high overhead costs of running a restaurant.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.quote: You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow straight ahead.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: There is more credit and satisfaction in being a first-rate truck driver than a tenth-rate executive
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: There is no situation like the open road, and seeing things completely afresh.
quotes.author: James Salter

quotes.quote: I’ve been on every interstate highway in the lower forty-eight states by now, and I never get tired of the view.
quotes.author: Steve Earle

quotes.quote: My dad was a truck driver. We all used to ride along with him. And the way he'd keep awake was to sing while he was going down the road. So we all joined in.
quotes.author: Johnny Van Zant

quotes.quote: I worked as a truck driver, carpenter's assistant, doing whatever it took to keep bread on the table for the family.
quotes.author: Scott Glenn

quotes.quote: I don't think there's any real motivation for somebody to be a truck driver. Mine was simple; dad was a truck driver, I wanted to own one.
quotes.author: Lindsay Fox

quotes.quote: Truck drivers are the only ones that know the best places to stop on the road.
quotes.author: Carole Eastman

quotes.quote: I am just trying to work out whether you're a truck driver who writes books or a writer who drives trucks.
quotes.author: Antony J. Bowman

quotes.quote: People don't become what they wanted to when they were kids, otherwise all little boys would be firefighters or dump truck drivers and all little girls would become Madonna.
quotes.author: Jennifer Heath

quotes.quote: Both men and women drive commercial trucks. About one in twenty truckers in the United States is a woman.
quotes.author: William David Thomas

quotes.quote: Life on the road can be one of two things. If you are flexible--able to adapt and change to new situations and events--truck driving means constant adventure.
quotes.author: Connor Syrewicz

quotes.quote: Truck driving means the stress of never knowing where you will be and what you will be doing the following day.
quotes.author: Connor Syrewicz

quotes.quote: Truck driving is what you make of it. It can be lonely, especially if you drive alone.
quotes.author: Connor Syrewicz

quotes.quote: You can go days without seeing anyone, let alone someone you know or love--but if you are excited to experience all that the road has to offer, truck driving is a geat way to be paid well while doing it.
quotes.author: Connor Syrewicz

quotes.quote: The best truck drivers are patient, independent, determined, and hard working. They love adventure and like thinking quickly.
quotes.author: Joanna Dunham

quotes.quote: A good truck driver needs discipline. Traffic, weather, eating, sleeping, showering, fueling, getting work done on the truck; it takes a truck driver a long time to learn how to jungle everything.
quotes.author: Joanna Dunham

quotes.quote: Like they say there is no place like home. That is something everybody that wants to drive a truck needs to think about you may have has that dream to drive a big truck but it's not what everybody thinks it's like.
quotes.author: Johnny Napier

quotes.quote: Just because you're in the driver's seat, doesn't mean you have to run people over.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: As a driver, you always want to be in the car getting as much experience as possible; especially when there's something new like different tyres.
quotes.author: Romain Grosjean

quotes.quote: If the road is not patchy, rough and on a hilly terrain, then the journey is not often worth undertaking as all destinations are already enough crowded.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: The driver on the highway is safe not when He reads the signs, but when He obeys them.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: There is more credit and satisfaction in being a first-rate truck driver than a tenth-rate executive.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: As a driver, your target is always to be with the most competitive team possible.
quotes.author: Sebastian Vettel

quotes.quote: In any other job, they're truck drivers. In show-biz, they're Transportation Captains.
quotes.author: Drew Carey

quotes.quote: Each driver has their own identity and from one week to another, normally it stays the same.
quotes.author: Kurt Busch

quotes.quote: The only driver for his work was desire, a kind of hunger for reality, for presence, and also for intimacy, as opposed to publicity. In a very wide sense, he was interested in transcendence.
quotes.author: Peter Stamm

quotes.quote: For a driver to be driven by somebody else is an ordeal, for there are only three types of drivers: the too fast, the timid and oneself.
quotes.author: Virginia Graham

quotes.quote: A driver is a king on a vinyl bucket-seat throne, changing direction with the turn of a wheel, changing the climate with a flick of the button, changing the music with the switch of a dial.
quotes.author: Andrew H. Malcolm

quotes.quote: People don't realize how many miles a truck drives a year on the road.
quotes.author: Johnny Napier

quotes.quote: Just keep being true to yourself, if you're passionate about something go for it. Don't sacrifice anything, just have fun.
quotes.author: Blake Lewis

quotes.quote: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Live your life in your own unique way and be true to yourself.
quotes.author: Josei Toda

quotes.quote: Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Truth can be stated in a thousand different ways, yet each one can be true.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Be true to your heart... put your whole heart and soul into it, and then whatever you do, it will shine through.
quotes.author: Jamie Brewer

quotes.quote: Pretend and it will be true.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: Your only obligation in any lifetime is to be true to yourself.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Being true to yourself really means being true to all the complexities of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Rita Dove

quotes.quote: Be true, and thou shalt fetter time with everlasting chain.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Nothing has to be true, but everything has to sound true.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov Quote

quotes.quote: You make your mark by being true to who you are and letting that be your staple.
quotes.author: Kath Graham

quotes.quote: What is really beautiful must always be true.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: Not being known doesn't stop the truth from being true.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: A truth ceases to be true when more than one person believes in it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It's very easy to say that something is a shadow of itself, and it may be true in some senses.
quotes.author: Sydney Schanberg

quotes.quote: Always tell the truth and be true.
quotes.author: Emily Saliers

quotes.quote: Unlikely things are often true.
quotes.author: Sheridan Hay

quotes.quote: It's important to be true to yourself and your vision.
quotes.author: Nicole Polizzi

quotes.quote: To be true to ourselves, we must be true to others.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: Satisfaction doesn't come from needs and desires or fulfilling them, it comes from being yourself, being true.
quotes.author: Tony Samara

quotes.quote: The truer you are to yourself, the greater your gifts will manifest themselves.
quotes.author: Tiffany L. Jackson

quotes.quote: Be true to yourself. If you follow that principle, a lot of decisions are actually pretty easy.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: Sometimes, being true to yourself means changing your mind. Self changes, and you follow.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Stay true in the dark, and humble in the spotlight.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Believe it to be true and meet yourself there.
quotes.author: Rocky Marquette

quotes.quote: Things we wish to be true are apt to gain too ready credit with us.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Be true to yourself, stay focused and stay you, take advice from other folks, use what you can, but never mind what is not for you. For the most part, trust yourself and believe in what you are doing.
quotes.author: Musiq Soulchild

quotes.quote: Be true to what matters most to your heart.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: It is true if you believe it to be true.
quotes.author: Luise Hay

quotes.quote: All other friends may come and go, / All other friendships fail; / But these, the friends I've worked to win, / Oh, they will never stale; / And comfort me till Time shall write / The finish to my tale.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: WE have been friends together, / In sunshine and in shade; / Since first beneath the chestnut-trees / In infancy we played.
quotes.author: Caroline Elizabeth Sarah Norton

quotes.quote: You are a true friend pointing me to Him / Lifting my downcast eyes / Turning my wondering gaze to the sky / Proving your love again, you are a true friend
quotes.author: Twila Paris

quotes.quote:
You're a true friend / You're here till the end / You pull me aside when something ain't right / Talk with me now and into the night
'Til it's alright again / You're a true friend
quotes.author: Jeannie Lurie

quotes.quote: One true friend / Is what you've always been to me / One true friend / Is what I always wanna be
quotes.author: John Michael Montgomery

quotes.quote: And when I left, it's you who stayed. / You always knew that I'd come home again. / In the end, / You are my one true friend.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: Don't have to go out / Lookin' for trouble / Trouble will find you it's a matter of time / That's when you're gonna need someone behind you / A true friend isn't easy to find
quotes.author: Shannon Curfman

quotes.quote: From the beginning you've been / Always there my old friend / True until the end of time
quotes.author: John Ross Lang

quotes.quote: You just bear this in mind, a true friend is hard to find / So don't you mind people grinning in your face
quotes.author: Bernard Alexander

quotes.quote: Friends come and friends may go / My friend, you're real I know / True self you have shown / You're alright with me / Through thick and thick to thin.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: A true friend is hard to find / Go get yourself outside of your mind / Whether it's right or whether it's wrong / I'm on the treadmill all day long
quotes.author: Sergio Pizzorno

quotes.quote: Everybody needs a true, true friend / To help them through the day
quotes.author: Garrett Dutton

quotes.quote: It's been so long / Since he had a true friend / True friends are sure hard to come by
quotes.author: Tekitha

quotes.quote: You were there through it all, now it's my turn / There's no doubt, good lookin' out / When life's not fair / True friends will always be there
quotes.author: Armand Majidi

quotes.quote: True friends are few and far between / But nothing comes between true friends.
quotes.author: Jeremy S. Stover

quotes.quote: Anytime your world is lonely / And you'll find true friends are few / Anytime you see a rainbow / That will be a sign the storm is through.
quotes.author: Herbert Happy Lawson

quotes.quote: In a world of delusion / Never turn your back on a friend / 'cause you can count your / Real true friends on one hand.
quotes.author: Janick Gers

quotes.quote: I need a true friend to hold on the final round of tears and lonely nights / A sweet companion from now on to hear this very special prayer right.
quotes.author: Nevil Bernard

quotes.quote: Let me / Let me sit with you beside a street / Let me / Let me laugh with you and share your dream / I'll be your true friend until the end, you can depend on me / So let me, let me, say you let me.
quotes.author: Baden Powell

quotes.quote: Sometimes I feel so down / And no one here's around / But you, you never left me lonely / And now I see, what a true friend means / And I trust that you would always be here for me / Lord I give you all.
quotes.author: Monica Arnold

quotes.quote: Don't you mind people grinning in your face / Don't you mind people grinning in your face / There's one thing to bear in mind / A true friend is hard to find.
quotes.author: Sun House

quotes.quote: Well, when you're down and all alone, / There's always somewhere you can go / Here I am / A true friend / There's nothing gonna change over here on my end / Don't be scared / It's better shared / You know I always cared / I'm a everything's all righter / I'm a prizefighter.
quotes.author: Mark O. Everett

quotes.quote: To reach out your hand and reconcile, reconcile / And in the end you'll make amends / Be a true friend, strong enough to bend / Be grateful when you start again, start again / When you start again.
quotes.author: Dillon O'Doherty

quotes.quote: True friends stab you in the front / Keep you from getting what you want / When one more fix could kill you / They help you realize that.
quotes.author: Teppei Teranishi

quotes.quote: A true friend freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
quotes.author: Len Wein

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: True friends are those who came into your life, saw the most negative part of you, but are not ready to leave you, no matter how contagious you are to them.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: True friends can communicate with their eyes.
quotes.author: Mary Rose Magnaye

quotes.quote: Unless you are willing to compromise, society cannot live together.
quotes.author: Allan Greenspan

quotes.quote: True happiness is... to enjoy the present without anxious dependence upon the future.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: The only thing that holds true happiness is that moment when you're in it. Nothing can be controlled.
quotes.author: Eliza Doolittle

quotes.quote: Happiness, true happiness is an inner quality. It is a state of mind. If your mind is at peace, you are happy.
quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

quotes.quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: True happiness arises, in the first place, from the enjoyment of one's self, and in the next, from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: True happiness...is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
quotes.author: Heller Keller

quotes.quote: All true happiness, pure joy, sweet bounties, and unclouded pleasure are contained within the knowledge and love of God.
quotes.author: Said Nursi

quotes.quote: The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: True happiness consists not in the multitude of friends, but in the worth and choice.
quotes.author: Ben Johnson

quotes.quote: Whenever you choose power over love, you will never find true happiness.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Man's only true happiness is to live in hope of something to be won by him. Reverence something to be worshipped by him, and love something to be cherished by him, forever.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The only true happiness comes from squandering ourselves for a purpose.
quotes.author: John Mason Brown

quotes.quote: It's enough to indulge and to be selfish but true happiness is really when you start giving back.
quotes.author: Adrian Grenier

quotes.quote: True happiness isn't the act of choosing to be happy, it's the art and allowance of accepting human emotions, observing them, and being ok with them being a part of our lives.
quotes.author: Sarah Steckler

quotes.quote: When you discover true happiness you will find that you are wealthier beyond the dreams of kings.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.quote: Learn to be your own best friend first then you will find true happiness, because happiness is from within.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: True happiness is not found in people, places, or things. It is found in our own hearts.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: True happiness is not achieved when you have a perfect life. It is achieved when you are happy with the imperfections.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: If you are looking for true happiness, you have to change your level of conciousness and deepness of awareness.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Opening a dark box can make you very unhappy! But for the love of truth, never hesitate even a second to open it, because the truth is the way to true happiness.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Idan

quotes.quote: When we know we are delaying the consequences of truth, whether buried in our subconcious or ignored by our concious thoughts, our denial continues to steal our potential for true happiness.
quotes.author: Elaina Marie

quotes.quote: Being service to others is what brings true happiness.
quotes.author: Marie Osmond

quotes.quote: Just staying healthy, that is true wealth and true happiness.
quotes.author: Jon Jones

quotes.quote: True success, true happiness lies in freedom and fulfillment.
quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

quotes.quote: Work hard and stay focused to achieve your goals and dreams in life. That is the path to true happiness.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Sometimes you need to let go of things, emotions, and people to achieve true happiness.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: True happiness cannot be achieved through wealth, fame or action, But through love, modesty and self satisfaction.
quotes.author: Mouloud Benzadi

quotes.quote: The truest state of humanity is that you're living for other people.
quotes.author: Joe Flanigan

quotes.quote: The truest interpretations are those with the best justification.
quotes.author: Bernard Ramm

quotes.quote: The truest poetry is the most feigning.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Being kind without expectation is the truest kind of kindness.
quotes.author: Zero Dean

quotes.quote: The truest writers are those who see language not as a linguistic process but as a living element.
quotes.author: Derek Walcott

quotes.quote: Virtue is the truest nobility.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: The truest smiles are those which spread across our faces when no one's watching us.
quotes.author: Minhal Mehdi

quotes.quote: The truest tales require time and familiarity to become what they are.
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: In the truest sense, freedom cannot be bestowed; it must be achieved.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The truest help we can render an afflicted man is not to take his burden from him, but to call out his best energy, that he may be able to bear the burden.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: The truest comparison we can make of love is to liken it to a fever; we have no more power over the one than the other, either as to its violence or duration.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: One of the truest things to commit to is your own nature.
quotes.author: Alec Baldwin

quotes.quote: The truest friends are usually the ones telling you what you don't want to hear.
quotes.author: Mark Hart

quotes.quote: The truest test of independent judgment is being able to dislike someone who admires us, and to admire someone who dislikes us.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: The truest expression of a people is in its dances and its music. Bodies never lie.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: The most heartbreaking things are the ones that are sometimes the truest.
quotes.author: Emma Stone

quotes.quote: The truest indication of gratitude is to return what you are grateful for.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: The sure mark of one born with noble qualities is being born without envy.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Time is the truest form of wealth. And the beauty is, we are all born equally rich in time.
quotes.author: Rolf Potts

quotes.quote: The truest success is but the development of self.
quotes.author: Charles Atlas

quotes.quote: One of the truest tests of integrity is its blunt refusal to be compromised.
quotes.author: Chinua Achebe

quotes.quote: The truest drive comes from doing what you love.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: The truest self-respect is not to think of self.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The truest end of life is to know that life never ends.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The joy of creating is the truest joy.
quotes.author: Priyanka Chopra

quotes.quote: The simplest things are often the truest.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The truest mark of your success in life will be the quality of your marriage.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: In the truest sense, Christian pilgrims have the best of both worlds. We have joy whenever this world reminds us of the next, and we take solace whenever it does not.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The truest experience of life is when we dream awake.
quotes.author: Alberto Villoldo

quotes.quote: No trumpets sound when the important decisions of our life are made. Destiny is made known silently.
quotes.author: Agnes De Mille

quotes.quote: There may be no trumpet sound or loud applause when we make a right decision, just a calm sense of resolution and peace.
quotes.author: Gloria Gaither

quotes.quote: He who sounds his own trumpet will soon find plenty to laugh at him.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: One may imagine that a man who blew the trumpet for his living would be glad to play the violin for his amusement.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: We are Christians and Catholics not because we worship a key, but because we have passed a door and felt the wind that is the trumpet of liberty blow over the land of the living.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: You can't blow an uncertain trumpet.
quotes.author: Theodore Hesburgh

quotes.quote: Playing the trumpet is such a intangible experience. The player is compelled to start from the beginning and build anew each day... It isnt like building a house, where we resume where we left the previous accomplishments. Each new day we must rebuild the foundation of our musical structure.
quotes.author: Armando Ghitalla

quotes.quote: Life is like a trumpet. If you don't put anything into it, you don't get anything out.
quotes.author: W.C Handy

quotes.quote: The trumpet is forceful.
quotes.author: Lester Bowie

quotes.quote: The hardest part of playing the trumpet is the physical act of making the sound.
quotes.author: Tom Harrell

quotes.quote: If you got a trumpet, get on your feet, brother, and blow it!
quotes.author: Nick Cave

quotes.quote: To play the trumpet well, a musician can not let more than a few days pass without practicing.
quotes.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quotes.quote: Playing the trumpet is such an intangible experience. The player is compelled to start from the beginning and build anew each day. It isn't like building a house, where we can resume building where we left off the previous day's accomplishments. Each new day we must rebuild the foundation of our musical structure.
quotes.author: Armando Ghitalla

quotes.quote: The trumpet is an extremely difficult instrument. It feels and reacts differently to the player each and every day.
quotes.author: Allen Vizzutti

quotes.quote: We never blow to the horn. We blow through the horn. We never blow up to a note, we blow out to it.
quotes.author: Don Jacoby

quotes.quote: The trumpet does no more stun you by its loudness, than a whisper teases you by its provoking inaudibility.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Playing the trumpet is hard because it is so easy.
quotes.author: Charles Schleuter

quotes.quote: Trust is like a vase.. once it's broken, though you can fix it, the vase will never be same again.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: Do not trust all men, but trust men of worth; the former course is silly, the latter a mark of prudence.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: Trust is something that is difficult to establish. It is very fragile that needs to be taken care of. Once trust breaks or shatters into pieces, it is very difficult to rebuild it.
quotes.author: K. Cunningham

quotes.quote: Trust is the easiest thing in the world to loose, and the hardest thing in the world to get back.
quotes.author: R. Williams

quotes.quote: In order to establish trust, it is first important that you be trustworthy. This means you should be forthright with all your dealings.
quotes.author: Paul Melendez

quotes.quote: Trust is involved in all the basic elements of a healthy relationship: namely, love (respect and consideration for another person), communication, commitment and honesty.
quotes.author: Harold Duarte-Bernhardt

quotes.quote: Respect people who trust you. It takes a lot for people to trust you, so treat their trust like precious porcelain.
quotes.author: Brandon Cox

quotes.quote: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough.
quotes.author: Frank Crane

quotes.quote: Trust is like blood pressure. It's silent, vital to good health, and if abused it can be deadly.
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: Trust is the glue of life. It's the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It's the foundational principle that holds all relationships.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Trust is only gained when one person risks and doesn't get harmed. It grows as both people increasingly risk and don't get harmed in the process.
quotes.author: Glen Williams

quotes.quote: Trust is the fruit of a relationship in which you know you are loved.
quotes.author: William Paul Young

quotes.quote: Deciding whether or not to trust a person is like deciding whether or not to climb a tree, because you might get a wonderful view from the highest branch, or you might simply get covered in sap, and for this reason many people choose to spend their time alone and indoors, where it is harder to get a splinter.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: We're never so vulnerable than when we trust someone - but paradoxically, if we cannot trust, neither can we find love or joy.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: A man who doesn't trust himself can never truly trust anyone else.
quotes.author: Cardinal de Retz

quotes.quote: Trust is a skill learned over time so that, like a well-trained athlete, one makes the right moves, usually without much reflection.
quotes.author: Robert C. Solomon

quotes.quote: It is an equal failing to trust everybody, and to trust nobody.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Trust is always earned, never given.
quotes.author: R. Williams

quotes.quote: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath.
quotes.author: Solon

quotes.quote: Trust is the lubrication that makes it possible for organizations to work.
quotes.author: Warren Bennis

quotes.quote: He who does not trust enough will not be trusted.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Trust is letting go of needing to know all the details before you open your heart.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Trust opens up new and unimagined possibilities.
quotes.author: Robert C. Solomon

quotes.quote: Trust in God for great things. With your five loaves and two fishes He will show you a way to feed thousands.
quotes.author: Horace Bushnell

quotes.quote: The best proof of love is trust.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: The toughest thing about the power of trust is that it's very difficult to build and very easy to destroy.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Trust yourself, you will start to trust others.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: I trust everyone. I just don't trust the devil inside them.
quotes.author: Troy Kennedy-Martin

quotes.quote: Building trust means thinking about trust in a positive way.
quotes.author: Robert C. Solomon

quotes.quote: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Learning to trust is one of life's most difficult tasks.
quotes.author: Isaac Watts

quotes.quote: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough.
quotes.author: Frank Crane

quotes.quote: Men trust their ears less than their eyes.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the people that love you the most turn out to be the people you will trust the least.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Trust is like a vase.. once it's broken, though you can fix it the vase will never be same again.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: We're never so vulnerable than when we trust someone - but paradoxically, if we cannot trust, neither can we find love or joy.
quotes.author: Walter Anderson

quotes.quote: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: He who does not trust enough, will not be trusted.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Trust in a relationship is very crucial. Without trust, a relationship cannot last as a healthy and happy bond.
quotes.author: Alana Johnson

quotes.quote: Trust is something that is difficult to establish. It is very fragile that needs to be taken care of. Once trust breaks or shatters into pieces, it is very difficult to rebuild it.
quotes.author: K. Cunningham

quotes.quote: One error a trust-breaker makes when attempting to rebuild trust with another, is refusing to take full ownership for what they did. Learn not to blame, project, or minimize what you have done.
quotes.author: Karen Wells

quotes.quote: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough.
quotes.author: Frank Crane

quotes.quote: Not being able to let go and trust those around you can be incredibly stressful. You will be constantly questioning the actions of those around you, never feel in control and generally unhappy.
quotes.author: David Cannell

quotes.quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: A man who trusts nobody is apt to be the kind of man nobody trusts.
quotes.author: Harold MacMillan

quotes.quote: How can I trust you when you keep on running away every time I untie you?
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Raisin cookies that look like chocolate chip cookies are the main reason I have trust issues.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Trust is the easiest thing in the world to lose, and the hardest thing in the world to get back.
quotes.author: R. Williams

quotes.quote: People ask me why it's so hard to trust people, and I ask them why is it so hard to keep a promise.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Trust is hard to come by. That's why my circle is small and tight. I'm kind of funny about making new friends.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: When someone breaks your trust. Don't feel stupid for trusting them. You didn't do anything wrong, they're just an untrustworthy person.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Trust is like a sticker, once removed, it does not sticky anymore as it did before.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Trust is like blood pressure. It's silent, vital to good health, and if abused it can be deadly.
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: You must trust and believe in people, or life becomes impossible.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Not everyone can be trusted. I think we all have to be very selective about the people we trust.
quotes.author: Shelley Long

quotes.quote: The antidote for covetousness is contentment. The two are in opposition. Whereas the covetous, greedy person worships himself, the contented person worships God. Contentment comes from trusting God.
quotes.author: John Macarthur

quotes.quote: Faith begins where the will of God is known.
quotes.author: Kenneth E. Hagin Sr.

quotes.quote: Faith is the hand with which we take from God. When we have met all the conditions and taken what God is offering us, we must believe that we have that thing.
quotes.author: C. Nuzum

quotes.quote: Faith isn't the ability to believe long and far into the misty future. It's simply taking God at His Word and taking the next step.
quotes.author: Joni Erickson Tada

quotes.quote: Faith is believing that God is going to take you places before you even get there.
quotes.author: Matthew Barnett

quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Trust in God alone, and lean not on the needs of human help. Be not surprised when friends fail you; it is a failing world. Never reckon upon immutability in man: inconstancy you may reckon upon without fear of disappointment.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Pray, and let God worry.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Worry is blind and cannot discern the future, but Jesus sees the end from the beginning. In every difficulty He has His way prepared to bring relief.
quotes.author: Ellen White

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Faith talks in the language of God. Doubt talks in the language of man.
quotes.author: E.W. Kenyon

quotes.quote: Faith is a reasoning trust, a trust which reckons thoughtfully and confidently upon the trustworthiness of God.
quotes.author: John R. Stott

quotes.quote: To live by faith means to make decisions based on what God says, even though you do not yet see the results.
quotes.author: Tony Evens

quotes.quote: Every fear is distrust, and trust is the remedy for fear.
quotes.author: B. Simpson

quotes.quote: It is good to remind ourselves that the will of God comes from the heart of God and that we need not be afraid.
quotes.author: Warren Wiersbe

quotes.quote: We are not saved by making promises to God. We are saved by believing God's promises to us.
quotes.author: Warren Wiersbe

quotes.quote: Faith is not just about being faithful; it's also about trusting in God's faithfulness.
quotes.author: John D. Barry

quotes.quote: All you have to do is trust your Heavenly Father. Trust Him enough to follow His plan.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: I would rather trust in the living God than in any other power on earth.
quotes.author: John Taylor

quotes.quote: Do your duty, that is best; leave unto the Lord the rest.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: The nations of the world, if they follow the Lord, will continue to be a blessing to His children so long as they trust and follow Him.
quotes.author: L. Tom Perry

quotes.quote: I am optimistic about the future. Brethren, for our part, we must remain steadfast in hope, work with all our strength, and trust in God.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: When the toughest of the problems strike me, I just remind myself that God is on my side.
quotes.author: RVM

quotes.quote: Worry implies that we don't quite trust that God is big enough, powerful enough, or loving enough to take care of what's happening in out lives.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: I believe God is managing affairs and that He doesn't need any advice from me. With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end. So what is there to worry about.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It is better to have God over your shoulder, than carry the world alone on your back.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Having thus chosen our course, without guile and with pure purpose, let us renew our trust in God, and go forward without fear and with manly hearts.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: All I have seen teaches me to trust the Creator for all I have not seen.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Faith is accepting that you don't know, and trusting that God does.
quotes.author: Brandi Keeler

quotes.quote: God's promises are like the stars; the darker the night, the brighter they shine.
quotes.author: David Nicholas

quotes.quote: All truth passes through three stages: First it is ridiculed, second it is violently opposed and third it is accepted as being self-evident
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: As you shall sow, so shall you reap.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Be sure you are right, then go ahead.
quotes.author: Davy Crockett

quotes.quote: Better slip with foot than tongue.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Diamond cuts diamond.
quotes.author: Marstow (1604)

quotes.quote: Fine words butter no parsnips.
quotes.author: John Clarke

quotes.quote: History repeats itself.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: It is wise not to seek a secret and honest not to reveal it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Just because everybody's doing something, doesn't mean it's right.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Liars need good memories.
quotes.author: French (on truth and falsehood)

quotes.quote: No sin is hidden to the soul.
quotes.author: Bengali (Asian Indian) (on conscience)

quotes.quote: Play the part and you shall become.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Practice what you preach.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Put a silk on a goat and it is still a goat.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Search others for their virtues, thyself for thy vices.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Take it straight from the horse's mouth.
quotes.author: Francis Iles

quotes.quote: What you would seem to be, be really.
